atk-s0101a0:4_0: Buddhopi buddhabhāvaṃ, bhāvetvā ceva sacchikatvā ca;
atk-s0101a0:5_0: Yaṃ upagato gatamalaṃ, vande tamanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:13_0: Pañcahi yā saṅgītā, anusaṅgītā ca pacchāpi.
atk-s0101a0:28_0: Iti pana sabbaṃ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:29_0: Vuttaṃ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṃ idha vicārayissāmi.
atk-s0101a0:31_0: Ṭhatvā pakāsayissati, tattha yathā bhāsitaṃ atthaṃ”.
atk-s0101a0:32_0: Icceva kato tasmā, tampi gahetvāna saddhimetāya;
atk-s0101a0:35_6: Brahmajālassāpi “evaṃ me suta”ntiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādi.
atk-s0101a0:37_0: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesā kiñcāpi vinayapiṭake tantimārūḷhā,
atk-s0101a0:37_2: Dhammacakkappavattanañhi ādiṃ katvā yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā katabuddhakicce,
atk-s0101a0:37_3: kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare visākhapuṇṇamadivase paccūsasamaye anupādisesāya
atk-s0101a0:37_5: bhagavato dhātubhājanadivase sannipatitānaṃ sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ saṅghatthero āyasmā mahākassapo
atk-s0101a0:37_15: yaṃ na icchissāma na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttavacanamanussaranto,
atk-s0101a0:37_16: īdisassa ca saṅghasannipātassa puna dullabhabhāvaṃ maññamāno,
atk-s0101a0:37_18: yaṃ pāpabhikkhū ‘atītasatthukaṃ pāvacana’nti maññamānā pakkhaṃ labhitvā nacirasseva saddhammaṃ antaradhāpeyyuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:38_0: ‘Yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā’ti.
atk-s0101a0:39_0: ‘Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ, yathayidaṃ sāsanaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ’.
atk-s0101a0:41_1: sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānī’ti vatvā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena.
atk-s0101a0:42_2: yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi;
atk-s0101a0:42_5: ākaṅkhati vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī’ti.
atk-s0101a0:43_0: Evamādinā nayena navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhede uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahito,
atk-s0101a0:43_1: tathā ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvā alaggacittatāya ceva candopamapaṭipadāya ca pasaṃsito,
atk-s0101a0:43_3: Nanu maṃ bhagavā rājā viya sakakavacaissariyānuppadānena attano kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpakaṃ puttaṃ ‘saddhammavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako me ayaṃ bhavissatī’ti,
atk-s0101a0:43_5: imāya ca uḷārāya pasaṃsāya pasaṃsīti cintayanto dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesi. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:44_2: samayaṃ pāvāya kusināraṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehī”ti
atk-s0101a0:47_2: Thero pana sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapariyattidhare puthujjanasotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmi sukkhavipassaka khīṇāsavabhikkhū anekasate,
atk-s0101a0:47_3: anekasahasse ca vajjetvā tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhare paṭisambhidāppatte mahānubhāve yebhuyyena
atk-s0101a0:47_4: bhagavato etadaggaṃ āropite tevijjādibhede khīṇāsavabhikkhūyeva ekūnapañcasate pariggahesi.
atk-s0101a0:47_6: “atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo ekenūnāni pañca arahantasatāni uccinī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:48_6: Yasmā panassa kiñci dasabaladesitaṃ suttageyyādikaṃ appaccakkhaṃ nāma natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:50_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:52_0: Yadi evaṃ sekkhopi samāno dhammasaṅgītiyā bahukārattā therena uccinitabbo assa,
atk-s0101a0:52_3: Thero hi āyasmante ānande ativiya vissattho ahosi,
atk-s0101a0:52_4: tathā hi naṃ sirasmiṃ palitesu jātesupi ‘na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī’ti,
atk-s0101a0:52_7: Tattha keci bhikkhū chandāgamanaṃ viya maññamānā –
atk-s0101a0:52_8: “bahū asekkhapaṭisambhidāppatte bhikkhū ṭhapetvā ānandaṃ sekkhapaṭisambhidāppattaṃ thero uccinī”ti upavadeyyuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:52_11: bhikkhūnaṃyeva naṃ anumatiyā gahessāmī’ti na uccini.
atk-s0101a0:53_0: Atha sayameva bhikkhū ānandassatthāya theraṃ yāciṃsu. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:54_1: āyasmā ānando kiñcāpi sekkho abhabbo chandā dosā mohā bhayā agatiṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:54_2: bahu cānena bhagavato santike dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto, tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:54_4: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:55_0: Evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā uccinitena tenāyasmatā saddhiṃ pañcatherasatāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:56_1: “kattha nu kho mayaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāmā”ti?
atk-s0101a0:56_4: yaṃnūna mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
atk-s0101a0:56_5: na aññe bhikkhū rājagahe vassaṃ upagaccheyyu”nti.
atk-s0101a0:58_2: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ saṅgho imāni pañca bhikkhusatāni sammanneyya rājagahe vassaṃ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ,
atk-s0101a0:58_3: na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabba”nti.
atk-s0101a0:59_2: saṅgho imāni pañcabhikkhusatāni sammanna”ti ‘rājagahe vassaṃ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ,
atk-s0101a0:59_3: na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabbanti.
atk-s0101a0:59_4: Yassāyasmato khamati imesaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ sammuti’ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantānaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ,
atk-s0101a0:59_5: na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabbanti,
atk-s0101a0:60_0: “Sammatāni saṅghena imāni pañcabhikkhusatāni rājagahe vassaṃ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ,
atk-s0101a0:60_1: na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabbanti,
atk-s0101a0:61_0: Ayaṃ pana kammavācā tathāgatassa parinibbānato ekavīsatime divase katā.
atk-s0101a0:61_2: athassa sattāhaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjayiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:61_5: sattāhaṃ sattipañjaraṃ katvā sandhāgārasālāyaṃ dhātupūjaṃ kariṃsūti,
atk-s0101a0:61_8: Etasmiṃ dhātubhājanadivase sannipatitassa mahābhikkhusaṅghassa subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena kataṃ anācāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:61_9: ārocetvā vuttanayeneva ca bhikkhū uccinitvā ayaṃ kammavācā katā.
atk-s0101a0:62_0: Imañca pana kammavācaṃ katvā thero bhikkhū āmantesi – “āvuso,
atk-s0101a0:62_1: idāni tumhākaṃ cattālīsa divasā okāso kato,
atk-s0101a0:62_2: tato paraṃ ‘ayaṃ nāma no palibodho atthī’ti,
atk-s0101a0:62_4: tasmā etthantare yassa rogapalibodho vā ācariyupajjhāyapalibodho vā mātāpitupalibodho vā atthi,
atk-s0101a0:62_7: so taṃ palibodhaṃ chinditvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ karotū”ti.
atk-s0101a0:63_0: Evañca pana vatvā thero attano pañcasatāya parisāya parivuto rājagahaṃ gato.
atk-s0101a0:63_1: Aññepi mahātherā attano attano parivāre gahetvā sokasallasamappitaṃ mahājanaṃ assāsetukāmā taṃ taṃ disaṃ pakkantā.
atk-s0101a0:63_2: Puṇṇatthero pana sattasatabhikkhuparivāro ‘tathāgatassa parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ āgatāgataṃ mahājanaṃ assāsessāmī’ti kusinārāyaṃyeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0101a0:64_1: evaṃ parinibbutassāpi bhagavato sayameva pattacīvaramādāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0101a0:64_2: Gacchato gacchato panassa parivārā bhikkhū gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
atk-s0101a0:64_4: Anupubbena pana sāvatthimanuppatte there sāvatthivāsino manussā “thero kira āgato”ti sutvā gandhamālādihatthā paccuggantvā – “bhante, ānanda,
atk-s0101a0:64_6: ajja kuhiṃ bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā āgatatthā”tiādīni vadamānā parodiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:64_7: Buddhassa bhagavato parinibbānadivase viya mahāparidevo ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:65_0: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā ānando aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyākathāya taṃ mahājanaṃ saññāpetvā jetavanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:65_1: pavisitvā dasabalena vasitagandhakuṭiṃ vanditvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā mañcapīṭhaṃ nīharitvā papphoṭetvā gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0101a0:65_2: sammajjitvā milātamālākacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā mañcapīṭhaṃ atiharitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā bhagavato ṭhitakāle
atk-s0101a0:65_11: yathā taṃ bhagavato guṇagaṇāmatarasaññutāya patiṭṭhitapemo ceva akhīṇāsavo ca anekesu ca jātisatasahassesu aññamaññassūpakārasañjanitacittamaddavo.
atk-s0101a0:65_13: tumhe evaṃ paridevamānā kathaṃ aññe assāsessathā”ti saṃvejesi.
atk-s0101a0:65_14: So tassā vacanena saṃviggahadayo santhambhitvā tathāgatassa parinibbānato pabhuti ṭhānanisajjabahulattā
atk-s0101a0:65_15: ussannadhātukaṃ kāyaṃ samassāsetuṃ dutiyadivase khīravirecanaṃ pivitvā vihāreyeva nisīdi.
atk-s0101a0:65_16: Yaṃ sandhāya subhena māṇavena pahitaṃ māṇavakaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0101a0:66_0: “Akālo, kho māṇavaka, atthi me ajja bhesajjamattā pītā, appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:67_0: Dutiyadivase cetakattherena pacchāsamaṇena gantvā subhena māṇavena puṭṭho imasmiṃ dīghanikāye subhasuttaṃ nāma dasamaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0101a0:68_0: Atha ānandatthero jetavanamahāvihāre khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ kārāpetvā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya
atk-s0101a0:68_1: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ohāya rājagahaṃ gato tathā aññepi dhammasaṅgāhakā bhikkhūti.
atk-s0101a0:68_6: Te āsaḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ uposathaṃ katvā pāṭipadadivase sannipatitvā vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:69_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārā honti,
atk-s0101a0:69_2: Bhagavato hi parinibbāne sabbepi bhikkhū attano attano pattacīvaramādāya vihāre ca pariveṇe ca chaḍḍetvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:69_3: Tattha katikavattaṃ kurumānā therā bhagavato vacanapūjanatthaṃ titthiyavādaparimocanatthañca –
atk-s0101a0:69_6: “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā satthari ṭhiteyeva vihāre paṭijaggiṃsu,
atk-s0101a0:69_10: Evaṃ cintayitvā ca pana katikavattaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:70_6: majjhimaṃ māsaṃ sannipatitvā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyissāmā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:71_6: Therā paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ sabbavihāre paṭisaṅkharāpetvā rañño ārocesuṃ –
atk-s0101a0:71_18: bhante”ti kho rājā ajātasattu vissakammunā nimmitasadisaṃ suvibhattabhittithambhasopānaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:71_26: tasmiṃ mahāmaṇḍape pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anagghāni pañca kappiyapaccattharaṇasatāni paññapetvā,
atk-s0101a0:71_28: maṇḍapamajjhe puratthābhimukhaṃ buddhassa bhagavato āsanārahaṃ dhammāsanaṃ paññapetvā,
atk-s0101a0:72_0: Tasmiñca pana divase ekacce bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sandhāya evamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0101a0:72_1: “imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe eko bhikkhu vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaratī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:72_2: Thero taṃ sutvā imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe añño vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaraṇakabhikkhu nāma natthi.
atk-s0101a0:72_3: Addhā ete maṃ sandhāya vadantīti saṃvegaṃ āpajji.
atk-s0101a0:72_8: tena te na yuttaṃ sannipātaṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:73_2: na kho metaṃ patirūpaṃ yvāhaṃ sekkho samāno sannipātaṃ gaccheyya’nti,
atk-s0101a0:73_3: bahudeva rattiṃ kāyagatāya satiyā vītināmetvā rattiyā paccūsasamaye caṅkamā orohitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā “nipajjissāmī”ti kāyaṃ āvajjesi,
atk-s0101a0:73_6: etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci.
atk-s0101a0:73_7: Ayañhi āyasmā caṅkamena bahi vītināmetvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto cintesi –
atk-s0101a0:73_16: caṅkamā orohitvā pādadhovanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā pāde dhovitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā mañcake nisīditvā,
atk-s0101a0:73_20: etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:73_22: Tena “imasmiṃ sāsane anipanno anisinno aṭṭhito acaṅkamanto ko bhikkhu arahattaṃ patto”ti vutte “ānandatthero”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:74_0: Atha therā bhikkhū dutiyadivase pañcamiyaṃ kāḷapakkhassa katabhattakiccā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:74_1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando arahā samāno sannipātaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0101a0:74_3: “Idānimhi sannipātamajjhaṃ pavisanāraho”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhacitto ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā bandhanā muttatālapakkaṃ viya,
atk-s0101a0:74_7: parisuddhena pariyodātena sappabhena sassirīkena ca mukhavarena attano arahattappattiṃ ārocayamāno viya agamāsi.
atk-s0101a0:74_8: Atha naṃ disvā āyasmato mahākassapassa etadahosi –
atk-s0101a0:75_1: “ānandatthero attano arahattappattiṃ ñāpetukāmo bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nāgato,
atk-s0101a0:75_2: bhikkhū yathāvuḍḍhaṃ attano attano pattāsane nisīdantā ānandattherassa āsanaṃ ṭhapetvā nisinnā.
atk-s0101a0:75_9: Tato attano ānubhāvaṃ dassento pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā attano āsaneyeva attānaṃ dassesī”ti,
atk-s0101a0:75_12: Sabbathāpi taṃ disvā āyasmato mahākassapassa sādhukāradānaṃ yuttameva.
atk-s0101a0:76_0: Evaṃ āgate pana tasmiṃ āyasmante mahākassapatthero bhikkhū āmantesi – “āvuso,
atk-s0101a0:76_6: Vinaye ṭhite sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0101a0:76_12: Api ca kho pana sammāsambuddho dharamānoyeva vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ etadagge ṭhapesi –
atk-s0101a0:76_15: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:77_0: Tato thero vinayaṃ pucchanatthāya attanāva attānaṃ sammanni.
atk-s0101a0:77_3: atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0101a0:78_0: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:81_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:82_0: Ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti. ;
atk-s0101a0:83_0: Evaṃ attānaṃ sammannitvā āyasmā upāli uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0101a0:83_1: tato mahākassapatthero therāsane nisīditvā āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ vinayaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0101a0:84_0: “Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ paṭhamassa pārājikassa vatthumpi pucchi,
atk-s0101a0:85_0: Kiṃ panettha paṭhamapārājike kiñci apanetabbaṃ vā pakkhipitabbaṃ vā atthi natthīti?
atk-s0101a0:85_2: Buddhassa hi bhagavato bhāsite apanetabbaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0101a0:85_3: Na hi tathāgatā ekabyañjanampi niratthakaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:85_4: Sāvakānaṃ pana devatānaṃ vā bhāsite apanetabbampi hoti,
atk-s0101a0:85_18: Paṭhamapārājike saṅgahamārūḷhe pañca arahantasatāni saṅgahaṃ āropitanayeneva gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu –
atk-s0101a0:85_20: Tesaṃ sajjhāyāraddhakāleyeva sādhukāraṃ dadamānā viya mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampittha.
atk-s0101a0:86_0: Eteneva nayena sesāni tīṇi pārājikāni saṅgahaṃ āropetvā “idaṃ pārājikakaṇḍa”nti ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:86_8: Evaṃ sattavīsādhikāni dve sikkhāpadasatāni “mahāvibhaṅgo”ti kittetvā ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:87_0: Tato bhikkhunīvibhaṅge aṭṭha sikkhāpadāni “pārājikakaṇḍaṃ nāma ida”nti ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:87_7: Evaṃ tīṇi sikkhāpadasatāni cattāri ca sikkhāpadāni “bhikkhunīvibhaṅgo”ti kittetvā –
atk-s0101a0:88_1: pañcavīsatibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ parivārañca saṅgahaṃ āropetvā “idaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ nāmā”ti ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:88_5: Vinayapiṭakasaṅgahāvasāne upālitthero dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ nikkhipitvā dhammāsanā orohitvā there bhikkhū vanditvā attano pattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0101a0:89_0: Vinayaṃ saṅgāyitvā dhammaṃ saṅgāyitukāmo āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū pucchi –
atk-s0101a0:89_1: “dhammaṃ saṅgāyante hi kaṃ puggalaṃ dhuraṃ katvā dhammo saṅgāyitabbo”ti? Bhikkhū –
atk-s0101a0:90_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0101a0:91_0: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:93_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0101a0:94_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:95_0: Ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena dhammaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti;
atk-s0101a0:96_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0101a0:96_1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū pucchi – “kataraṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0101a0:97_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca,
atk-s0101a0:97_5: rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ rājāgārake ambalaṭṭhikāya”nti.
atk-s0101a0:97_11: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ brahmajālassa nidānampi pucchi,
atk-s0101a0:98_2: kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā nayena pucchāvissajjanānukkamena saddhiṃ brahmajālena sabbepi terasa suttante saṅgāyitvā –
atk-s0101a0:99_2: evaṃ tivaggasaṅgahaṃ catutiṃsasuttapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ catusaṭṭhibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ tantiṃ saṅgāyitvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:99_3: dīghanikāyo nāmā”ti vatvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ – “āvuso,
atk-s0101a0:100_0: Tato anantaraṃ asītibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ majjhimanikāyaṃ saṅgāyitvā dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa nissitake paṭicchāpesuṃ –
atk-s0101a0:101_0: Tato anantaraṃ satabhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ saṃyuttanikāyaṃ saṅgāyitvā mahākassapattheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ – “bhante,
atk-s0101a0:102_0: Tato anantaraṃ vīsatibhāṇavārasataparimāṇaṃ aṅguttaranikāyaṃ saṅgāyitvā anuruddhattheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ –
atk-s0101a0:103_2: “idaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāmā”ti vatvā pañca arahantasatāni sajjhāyamakaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:104_9: therīgāthāti imaṃ tantiṃ saṅgāyitvā “khuddakagantho nāmāya”nti ca vatvā “abhidhammapiṭakasmiṃyeva saṅgahaṃ āropayiṃsū”ti dīghabhāṇakā vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:104_10: Majjhimabhāṇakā pana “cariyāpiṭakabuddhavaṃsehi saddhiṃ sabbampetaṃ khuddakaganthaṃ nāma suttantapiṭake pariyāpanna”nti vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:106_1: Yañhi bhagavatā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā yāva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati,
atk-s0101a0:106_2: etthantare pañcacattālīsavassāni devamanussanāgayakkhādayo anusāsantena vā paccavekkhantena vā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:107_1: Sabbameva cetaṃ dhammo ceva vinayo cāti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:111_0: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi, puna gehaṃ na kāhasi;
atk-s0101a0:112_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0101a0:114_1: Keci “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”ti khandhake udānagāthaṃ vadanti.

atk-s0101a0:116_21: cariyāpiṭakavasena pannarasappabhedo khuddakanikāyoti idaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:119_0: Vividhā hi ettha pañcavidhapātimokkhuddesapārājikādi satta āpattikkhandhamātikā vibhaṅgādippabhedā nayā.
atk-s0101a0:119_3: tasmā vividhanayattā visesanayattā kāyavācānaṃ vinayanato ceva vinayoti akkhāto.
atk-s0101a0:125_10: yathā hi tacchakānaṃ suttaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:125_12: Yathā ca suttena saṅgahitāni pupphāni na vikirīyanti,
atk-s0101a0:130_0: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”.
atk-s0101a0:131_1: Tathā hesa “bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti,
atk-s0101a0:131_6: Aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhamme ca vinaye cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:132_1: “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā nayena vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā.
atk-s0101a0:132_2: “Rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhaṇīyattā salakkhaṇāpi.
atk-s0101a0:132_11: anuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena adhikāpi dhammā vuttā.
atk-s0101a0:134_0: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”ti.
atk-s0101a0:138_1: “Atha puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭakamādāyā”tiādīsu yaṃ kiñci bhājanampi.
atk-s0101a0:139_1: tena evaṃ duvidhatthena piṭakasaddena saha samāsaṃ katvā vinayo ca so piṭakañca pariyattibhāvato,
atk-s0101a0:139_2: tassa tassa atthassa bhājanato cāti vinayapiṭakaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:139_3: yathāvutteneva nayena suttantañca taṃ piṭakañcāti suttantapiṭakaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:140_0: Evaṃ ñatvā ca punapi tesuyeva piṭakesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:144_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye”.
atk-s0101a0:145_1: Etāni hi tīṇi piṭakāni yathākkamaṃ āṇāvohāraparamatthadesanā,
atk-s0101a0:145_4: Ettha hi vinayapiṭakaṃ āṇārahena bhagavatā āṇābāhullato desitattā āṇādesanā,
atk-s0101a0:145_5: suttantapiṭakaṃ vohārakusalena bhagavatā vohārabāhullato desitattā vohāradesanā,
atk-s0101a0:145_6: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ paramatthakusalena bhagavatā paramatthabāhullato desitattā paramatthadesanāti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:146_2: te yathāparādhaṃ ettha sāsitā’ti yathāparādhasāsanaṃ, dutiyaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:146_3: ‘anekajjhāsayānusayacariyādhimuttikā sattā yathānulomaṃ ettha sāsitā’ti yathānulomasāsanaṃ, tatiyaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:146_4: ‘dhammapuñjamatte “ahaṃ mamā”ti saññino sattā yathādhammaṃ ettha sāsitā’ti yathādhammasāsananti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:147_2: Saṃvarāsaṃvaroti khuddako ceva mahanto ca saṃvaro,
atk-s0101a0:148_3: Tathā hi vinayapiṭake visesena adhisīlasikkhā vuttā,
atk-s0101a0:150_3: Desanāti tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā.
atk-s0101a0:150_6: Yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāḷhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca,
atk-s0101a0:150_8: Evaṃ ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:151_11: so ca lokiyalokuttaro visayato asammohato ca,
atk-s0101a0:151_15: Tesaṃ tesaṃ vā tattha tattha vuttadhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo.
atk-s0101a0:152_0: Idāni yasmā etesu piṭakesu yaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ vā atthajātaṃ vā,
atk-s0101a0:152_1: yā cāyaṃ yathā yathā ñāpetabbo attho sotūnaṃ ñāṇassa abhimukho hoti,
atk-s0101a0:152_4: tesaṃ tesaṃ vā dhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo.
atk-s0101a0:152_5: Sabbampetaṃ anupacitakusalasambhārehi duppaññehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo dukkhogāḷhaṃ alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhañca,
atk-s0101a0:152_7: Evampi ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:158_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye”ti –
atk-s0101a0:159_0: Ettha pana tīsu piṭakesu tividho pariyattibhedo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:160_7: tamenaṃ bhoge vā naṅguṭṭhe vā gaṇheyya,
atk-s0101a0:160_8: tassa so alagaddo paṭiparivattitvā hatthe vā bāhāyaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅge ḍaṃseyya,
atk-s0101a0:160_9: so tato nidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya,
atk-s0101a0:160_19: te taṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññāya atthaṃ na upaparikkhanti,
atk-s0101a0:160_20: tesaṃ te dhammā paññāya atthaṃ anupaparikkhataṃ na nijjhānaṃ khamanti,
atk-s0101a0:160_25: tesaṃ te dhammā duggahitā dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.
atk-s0101a0:161_0: Yā pana suggahitā sīlakkhandhādipāripūriṃyeva ākaṅkhamānena pariyāpuṭā,
atk-s0101a0:161_4: “tesaṃ te dhammā suggahitā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti.
atk-s0101a0:162_0: Yaṃ pana pariññātakkhandho pahīnakileso bhāvitamaggo paṭividdhākuppo sacchikatanirodho khīṇāsavo kevalaṃ
atk-s0101a0:163_0: Vinaye pana suppaṭipanno bhikkhu sīlasampadaṃ nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:163_2: Sutte suppaṭipanno samādhisampadaṃ nissāya cha abhiññā pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:163_4: Abhidhamme suppaṭipanno paññāsampadaṃ nissāya catasso paṭisambhidā pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:163_6: evametesu suppaṭipanno yathākkamena imaṃ vijjāttayachaḷabhiññācatuppaṭisambhidābhedaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0101a0:164_0: Vinaye pana duppaṭipanno anuññātasukhasamphassaattharaṇapāvuraṇādiphassasāmaññato paṭikkhittesu upādinnakaphassādīsu anavajjasaññī hoti.
atk-s0101a0:164_3: yathā ye me antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā,
atk-s0101a0:164_9: puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā”tiādīsu adhippāyaṃ ajānanto duggahitaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a0:164_15: Abhidhamme duppaṭipanno dhammacintaṃ atidhāvanto acinteyyānipi cinteti.
atk-s0101a0:164_22: yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:164_23: Evametesu duppaṭipanno yathākkamena imaṃ dussīlabhāva micchādiṭṭhitā cittakkhepabhedaṃ vipattiṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:167_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye”ti –
atk-s0101a0:168_1: Evaṃ nānappakārato piṭakāni ñatvā tesaṃ vasenetaṃ buddhavacanaṃ tividhanti ñātabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:172_8: Poṇikanikāyo cikkhallikanikāyoti evamādīni cettha sādhakāni sāsanato lokato ca.
atk-s0101a0:173_1: Majjhimappamāṇāni pañcadasavaggasaṅgahāni mūlapariyāyasuttādīni diyaḍḍhasataṃ dve ca suttāni.
atk-s0101a0:176_1: Devatāsaṃyuttādivasena kathitāni oghataraṇādīni satta suttasahassāni satta ca suttasatāni dvāsaṭṭhi ca suttāni.
atk-s0101a0:179_1: Ekekaaṅgātirekavasena kathitāni cittapariyādānādīni nava suttasahassāni pañca suttasatāni sattapaññāsañca suttāni.
atk-s0101a0:186_7: suttanipāte maṅgalasuttaratanasuttanālakasuttatuvaṭṭakasuttāni ca aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:186_12: yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:186_17: suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā ca gāthāti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:186_18: Somanassaññāṇamayikagāthā paṭisaṃyuttā dveasīti suttantā udānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:186_23: acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”tiādinayappavattā sabbepi acchariyabbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttasuttantā abbhutadhammanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:186_29: mahāpuṇṇamasuttādayo sabbepi vedañca tuṭṭhiñca laddhā laddhā pucchitasuttantā vedallanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:187_0: Kathaṃ dhammakkhandhavasena caturāsītisahassavidhaṃ? Sabbameva cetaṃ buddhavacanaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:189_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti.
atk-s0101a0:190_16: Tattha ekameko koṭṭhāso ekameko dhammakkhandhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:191_1: bhedato dhammavinayādivasena duvidhādibhedaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṅgāyantena mahākassapappamukhena vasīgaṇena “ayaṃ dhammo,
atk-s0101a0:191_22: anekavidhaṃ tīsu piṭakesu sandissamānaṃ saṅgahappabhedaṃ vavatthapetvā eva sattahi māsehi saṅgītaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:192_1: “idaṃ mahākassapattherena dasabalassa sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālaṃ pavattanasamatthaṃ kata”nti
atk-s0101a0:192_2: sañjātappamodā sādhukāraṃ viya dadamānā ayaṃ mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā anekappakāraṃ kampi saṅkampi
atk-s0101a0:196_0: Imissā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyā vattamānāya vinayasaṅgahāvasāne suttantapiṭake ādinikāyassa ādisuttaṃ brahmajālaṃ pucchantena āyasmatā mahākassapena –
atk-s0101a0:196_6: taṃ sabbaṃ pakāsento āyasmā ānando evaṃ me sutantiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:196_7: Tena vuttaṃ “brahmajālassāpi evaṃ me sutantiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:198_4: kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti evamādīsu upamāyaṃ āgato.
atk-s0101a0:198_9: “Evamevaṃ panāyaṃ vasalī yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”tiādīsu garahaṇe. “Evaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:198_10: bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosu”ntiādīsu vacanasampaṭiggahe.
atk-s0101a0:198_15: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha.
atk-s0101a0:198_16: “Subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:198_18: sādhu kira bhavaṃ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:198_21: ime dhammā kusalā vā akusalā vāti? Akusalā, bhante.
atk-s0101a0:198_22: Sāvajjā vā anavajjā vāti? Sāvajjā, bhante.
atk-s0101a0:198_25: Samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti no vā,
atk-s0101a0:198_26: kathaṃ vo ettha hotīti? Samattā, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:199_6: sabbasattānaṃ sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchantaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ sabbappakārena ko samattho viññātuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:199_7: sabbathāmena pana sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi ‘evaṃ me sutaṃ’ mayāpi ekenākārena sutanti.
atk-s0101a0:200_2: na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento –
atk-s0101a0:200_4: ‘mayāpi evaṃ suta’nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0101a0:201_3: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando,
atk-s0101a0:201_14: Evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā ca pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ dassento sattānaṃ sotukāmataṃ janeti –
atk-s0101a0:201_16: tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnamanadhikaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:202_5: bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu mayhanti attho.
atk-s0101a0:203_14: Idha panassa sotadvārānusārena upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti vāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:203_15: ‘Me’ saddassa hi ‘mayā’ti atthe sati ‘evaṃ mayā sutaṃ’ sotadvārānusārena upadhāritanti yujjati.
atk-s0101a0:203_16: ‘Mamā’ti atthe sati evaṃ mama sutaṃ sotadvārānusārena upadhāraṇanti yujjati.
atk-s0101a0:204_3: Tathā evanti tassā sotadvārānusārena pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattibhāvappakāsanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:204_7: “nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0101a0:206_0: Tathā evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:206_5: Ettāvatā nānākārappavattena cittasantānena taṃ samaṅgino kattu visayaggahaṇasanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:208_0: Tattha evanti ca meti ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti.
atk-s0101a0:208_2: yaṃ evanti vā meti vā niddesaṃ labhetha?
atk-s0101a0:208_9: Ettha ca evanti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0101a0:208_13: na so kālantarena mayā sutanti paṭijānāti.
atk-s0101a0:209_5: Tathā hi vikkhittacitto puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:209_7: Yoniso manasikārena cettha attasammāpaṇidhiṃ pubbe ca katapuññataṃ sādheti,
atk-s0101a0:209_8: sammā appaṇihitattassa pubbe akatapuññassa vā tadabhāvato.
atk-s0101a0:209_11: na ca sappurise anupassayamānassa savanaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0101a0:210_1: yasmā evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:210_3: so ca evaṃ bhaddako ākāro na sammāappaṇihitattano pubbe akatapuññassa vā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:210_4: tasmā evanti iminā bhaddakenākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattimattano dīpeti.
atk-s0101a0:210_6: Na hi appatirūpadese vasato sappurisūpanissayavirahitassa vā savanaṃ atthi.
atk-s0101a0:210_11: Iti payogāsayasuddhassa āgamādhigamasampannassa vacanaṃ aruṇuggaṃ viya sūriyassa udayato yoniso manasikāro
atk-s0101a0:210_12: viya ca kusalakammassa arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitunti ṭhāne nidānaṃ ṭhapento –
atk-s0101a0:211_3: ‘Eva’nti ca idaṃ yoniso manasikāradīpakaṃ vacanaṃ bhāsamāno –
atk-s0101a0:211_7: “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti dīpeti.
atk-s0101a0:211_8: Tadubhayenāpi atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ dīpento savane ādaraṃ janeti.
atk-s0101a0:211_9: Atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇañhi dhammaṃ ādarena assuṇanto mahatā hitā paribāhiro hotīti,
atk-s0101a0:211_10: tasmā ādaraṃ janetvā sakkaccaṃ ayaṃ dhammo sotabboti.
atk-s0101a0:212_0: “Evaṃ me suta”nti iminā pana sakalena vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammaṃ attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ atikkamati.
atk-s0101a0:212_5: tasseva bhagavato vacana”nti dīpento attānaṃ parimoceti,
atk-s0101a0:213_0: Apica “evaṃ me suta”nti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimavacanaṃ vivaranto –
atk-s0101a0:213_1: “sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyino
atk-s0101a0:213_2: sīhanādanādino sabbasattuttamassa dhammissarassa dhammarājassa dhammādhipatino dhammadīpassa dhammasaraṇassa
atk-s0101a0:213_4: na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kātabbā”ti sabbesaṃ devamanussānaṃ imasmiṃ dhamme assaddhiyaṃ vināseti,
atk-s0101a0:218_0: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati”.
atk-s0101a0:219_1: “appevanāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu samavāyo attho.
atk-s0101a0:219_3: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu khaṇo.
atk-s0101a0:219_10: bhaddāli nāma bhikkhu satthusāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī’ti.
atk-s0101a0:219_14: “Tena kho pana samayena uggahamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme paṭivasatī”tiādīsu diṭṭhi.
atk-s0101a0:220_0: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-s0101a0:222_2: “Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”tiādīsu paṭivedho.
atk-s0101a0:222_5: mapacchimayāmamuhuttādīsu kālappabhedabhūtesu samayesu ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti.
atk-s0101a0:223_0: Tattha kiñcāpi etesu saṃvaccharādīsu samayesu yaṃ yaṃ suttaṃ yasmiṃ yasmiṃ saṃvacchare utumhi māse pakkhe rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:223_1: sabbaṃ taṃ therassa suviditaṃ suvavatthāpitaṃ paññāya.
atk-s0101a0:223_3: “evaṃ me sutaṃ” asukasaṃvacchare asukautumhi asukamāse asukapakkhe asukarattibhāge asukadivasabhāge vāti
atk-s0101a0:223_4: evaṃ vutte na sakkā sukhena dhāretuṃ vā uddisituṃ vā uddisāpetuṃ vā,
atk-s0101a0:223_6: tasmā ekeneva padena tamatthaṃ samodhānetvā “ekaṃ samaya”nti āha.
atk-s0101a0:223_16: evamādayo bhagavato devamanussesu ativiya pakāsā anekakālappabhedā eva samayā.
atk-s0101a0:223_17: Tesu samayesu desanāsamayasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti.
atk-s0101a0:223_21: tesupi samayesu aññataraṃ samayaṃ sandhāya “ekaṃ samaya”nti āha.
atk-s0101a0:224_0: Kasmā panettha yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacara”nti ca,
atk-s0101a0:224_4: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca bhummavacananiddeso kato,
atk-s0101a0:224_8: Tattha tathā idha ca aññathā atthasambhavato.
atk-s0101a0:224_9: Tattha hi abhidhamme ito aññesu suttapadesu ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvena bhāvalakkhaṇattho ca sambhavati.
atk-s0101a0:224_12: tattha tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyati,
atk-s0101a0:225_0: Vinaye ca hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati.
atk-s0101a0:225_1: Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi dubbiññeyyo,
atk-s0101a0:225_2: tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi,
atk-s0101a0:225_3: tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ tattha karaṇavacanena niddeso kato.
atk-s0101a0:226_0: Idha pana aññasmiñca evaṃ jātike accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati.
atk-s0101a0:226_1: Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā imaṃ aññaṃ vā suttantaṃ desesi,
atk-s0101a0:229_0: Aññatra samayo vutto, upayogena so idhā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:230_6: Tasmā “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttepi “ekasmiṃ samaye”ti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:233_0: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:237_0: Imissā gāthāya vasenassa padassa vitthāraattho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:238_0: Ettāvatā cettha evaṃ me sutanti vacanena yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ dassento bhagavato dhammakāyaṃ paccakkhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0101a0:238_2: ayaṃ vo satthā”ti satthu adassanena ukkaṇṭhitaṃ janaṃ samassāseti.
atk-s0101a0:239_0: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavāti vacanena tasmiṃ samaye bhagavato avijjamānabhāvaṃ dassento rūpakāyaparinibbānaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0101a0:239_1: Tena “evaṃvidhassa nāma ariyadhammassa desako dasabaladharo vajirasaṅghāta samānakāyo sopi bhagavā parinibbuto,
atk-s0101a0:239_2: kena aññena jīvite āsā janetabbā”ti jīvitamadamattaṃ janaṃ saṃvejeti,
atk-s0101a0:241_0: Antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandanti antarā-
atk-s0101a0:241_3: “janā saṅgamma mantenti mañca tañca kimantara”nti ca ādīsu hi kāraṇe antarā- saddo.
atk-s0101a0:241_5: aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe.
atk-s0101a0:241_10: tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu vivare.
atk-s0101a0:241_12: tasmā rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca vivareti evametthattho veditabbo. Antarā-
atk-s0101a0:241_14: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti,
atk-s0101a0:242_0: Addhānamaggappaṭipanno hotīti addhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno hoti,
atk-s0101a0:242_2: Addhānagamanasamayassa hi vibhaṅge “aḍḍhayojanaṃ gacchissāmīti bhuñjitabba”ntiādivacanato aḍḍhayojanampi addhānamaggo hoti.
atk-s0101a0:243_2: So hi bhikkhusaṅgho guṇehipi mahā ahosi,
atk-s0101a0:244_2: tasmā yathā “bhojane mattaññū”ti vutte “bhojane mattaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0101a0:245_0: Suppiyopi kho paribbājakoti suppiyoti tassa nāmaṃ. Pi-
atk-s0101a0:250_6: ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”ntiādīsu hi vāre pariyāyasaddo vattati.
atk-s0101a0:251_0: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti avaṇṇavirahitassa aparimāṇavaṇṇasamannāgatassāpi buddhassa bhagavato –
atk-s0101a0:251_2: taṃ samaṇassa gotamassa natthi tasmā arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo, nibbhogo,
atk-s0101a0:251_14: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ akāraṇameva kāraṇanti vatvā tathā tathā avaṇṇaṃ dosaṃ nindaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a0:252_1: evaṃ dhammassāpi taṃ taṃ akāraṇameva kāraṇato vatvā –
atk-s0101a0:253_1: evaṃ saṅghassāpi yaṃ vā taṃ vā akāraṇameva kāraṇato vatvā –
atk-s0101a0:253_4: paccanīkapaṭipadaṃ ananulomapaṭipadaṃ adhammānulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno”ti tathā tathā avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a0:254_7: pabhinnamadaṃ caṇḍahatthiṃ hatthena gaṇhanto viya ca vaṇṇārahasseva ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsamāno anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇissati.
atk-s0101a0:254_8: Ācariye kho pana gūthaṃ vā aggiṃ vā kaṇṭakaṃ vā kaṇhasappaṃ vā akkamante,
atk-s0101a0:254_14: Kammassakā hi sattā attano kammānurūpameva gatiṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0101a0:254_23: Mayhañca ācariyo tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0101a0:254_25: Evaṃ yoniso ummujjitvā ācariyavādaṃ maddamāno sammākāraṇameva kāraṇato apadisanto anekapariyāyena tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitumāraddho,
atk-s0101a0:254_28: “suppiyassa pana paribbājakassa antevāsī brahmadatto māṇavo anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0101a0:256_0: “Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:257_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccatī”ti. –
atk-s0101a0:258_7: Ayaṃ kira taṃ taṃ bhūtameva kāraṇaṃ apadisanto anekapariyāyena ratanattayassa guṇūpasañhitaṃ pasaṃsaṃ abhāsi. Tattha –
atk-s0101a0:258_13: asamo asamasamo”tiādinā ca nayena buddhassa vaṇṇo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:258_17: agge te pasannā”ti ca evamādīhi nayehi dhammassa vaṇṇo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:258_21: agge te pasannā”ti ca evamādīhi pana nayehi saṅghassa vaṇṇo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:258_22: Pahontena pana dhammakathikena pañcanikāye navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassāni ogāhitvā buddhādīnaṃ vaṇṇo pakāsetabbo.
atk-s0101a0:258_23: Imasmiñhi ṭhāne buddhādīnaṃ guṇe pakāsento atitthena pakkhando dhammakathikoti na sakkā vattuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:258_24: Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu dhammakathikassa thāmo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:258_25: Brahmadatto pana māṇavo anussavādimattasambandhitena attano thāmena ratanattayassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a0:259_0: Itiha te ubho ācariyantevāsīti evaṃ te dve ācariyantevāsikā.
atk-s0101a0:259_4: Ācariyena hi ratanattayassa avaṇṇe bhāsite antevāsī vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0101a0:259_6: itaro vaṇṇanti evaṃ ācariyo sāraphalake visarukkhaāṇiṃ ākoṭayamāno viya punappunaṃ ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a0:259_7: Antevāsī pana suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayāya āṇiyā taṃ āṇiṃ paṭibāhayamāno viya punappunaṃ ratanattayassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a0:260_0: Bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhā honti bhikkhusaṅghañcāti bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca pacchato
atk-s0101a0:260_1: pacchato dassanaṃ avijahantā iriyāpathānubandhanena anubandhā honti,
atk-s0101a0:261_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno?
atk-s0101a0:261_2: Kasmā ca so ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti?
atk-s0101a0:261_3: Bhagavā tāva tasmiṃ kāle rājagahaparivattakesu aṭṭhārasasu mahāvihāresu aññatarasmiṃ vasitvā pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ
atk-s0101a0:261_4: katvā bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahe piṇḍāya carati.
atk-s0101a0:261_5: So taṃ divasaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ katvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā –
atk-s0101a0:261_8: Suppiyopi kho tasmiṃ kāle rājagahaparivattake aññatarasmiṃ paribbājakārāme vasitvā paribbājakaparivuto rājagahe bhikkhāya carati.
atk-s0101a0:261_9: Sopi taṃ divasaṃ paribbājakaparisāya sulabhabhikkhaṃ katvā bhuttapātarāso paribbājake paribbājakaparikkhāraṃ gāhāpetvā –
atk-s0101a0:261_10: nāḷandaṃ gamissāmicceva bhagavato taṃ maggaṃ paṭipannabhāvaṃ ajānantova anubandho.
atk-s0101a0:261_12: So ajānitvāva gacchanto gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā olokayamāno bhagavantaṃ addasa buddhasiriyā sobhamānaṃ rattakambalaparikkhittamiva jaṅgamakanakagirisikharaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:262_0: Tasmiṃ kira samaye dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhamitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo samantā asītihatthappamāṇe padese
atk-s0101a0:263_0: Asīti anubyañjanānurañjitañca pana bhagavato sarīraṃ vikasitakamaluppalamiva,
atk-s0101a0:263_4: byāmappabhāparikkhepavilāsinī cassa dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇamālā ganthetvā ṭhapitadvattiṃsacandamālāya dvattiṃsasūriyamālāya
atk-s0101a0:263_6: Tañca pana bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū sabbeva appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā codakā
atk-s0101a0:263_8: Tesaṃ majjhe bhagavā rattakambalapākāraparikkhitto viya kañcanathambho,
atk-s0101a0:263_11: tārāgaṇaparivārito viya puṇṇacando migapakkhīnampi cakkhūni pīṇayati,
atk-s0101a0:263_13: Tasmiñca pana divase yebhuyyena asītimahātherā meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā kattaradaṇḍaṃ ādāya
atk-s0101a0:263_14: suvammavammitā viya gandhahatthino vigatadosā vantadosā bhinnakilesā vijaṭitajaṭā chinnabandhanā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:263_29: aparimitakālasañcitapuññabalanibbattāya acinteyyāya anopamāya buddhalīlāya cando viya gaganatalaṃ taṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0101a0:264_0: Athevaṃ bhagavantaṃ anopamāya buddhalīlāya gacchantaṃ bhikkhū ca okkhittacakkhū santindriye santamānase
atk-s0101a0:264_1: uparinabhe ṭhitaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ viya bhagavantaṃyeva namassamāne disvāva paribbājako attano parisaṃ avalokesi.
atk-s0101a0:264_4: asukassa pādā”ti evamādiniratthakavacanā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā adassanīyā apāsādikā.
atk-s0101a0:265_0: Idāni tena bhagavato vaṇṇo vattabbo bhaveyya.
atk-s0101a0:265_1: Yasmā panesa lābhasakkārahāniyā ceva pakkhahāniyā ca niccampi bhagavantaṃ usūyati.
atk-s0101a0:265_6: Upatissakolitānañca sañjayassa santike pabbajitakāleyeva paribbājakā mahāparisā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:265_7: tesu pana pakkantesu sāpi tesaṃ parisā bhinnā.
atk-s0101a0:265_8: Iti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ paribbājako yasmā niccampi bhagavantaṃ usūyati,
atk-s0101a0:265_9: tasmā taṃ usūyavisuggāraṃ uggiranto ratanattayassa avaṇṇameva bhāsatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:266_1: Atha kho bhagavā ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ rājāgārake ekarattivāsaṃ upagacchi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenāti bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:266_2: tāya buddhalīlāya gacchamāno anupubbena ambalaṭṭhikādvāraṃ pāpuṇitvā sūriyaṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0101a0:266_4: atthasamīpaṃ gato sūriyo”ti ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ rājāgārake ekarattivāsaṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0101a0:267_3: Tassa avidūre bhavattā uyyānampi ambalaṭṭhikā tveva saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0101a0:267_4: Taṃ chāyūdakasampannaṃ pākāraparikkhittaṃ suyojitadvāraṃ mañjusā viya suguttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:267_5: Tattha rañño kīḷanatthaṃ paṭibhānacittavicittaṃ agāraṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:268_0: Suppiyopi khoti suppiyopi tasmiṃ ṭhāne sūriyaṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0101a0:268_3: bahuparissayo ca ayaṃ maggo corehipi vāḷayakkhehipi vāḷamigehipi.
atk-s0101a0:268_4: Ayaṃ kho pana samaṇo gotamo uyyānaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0101a0:268_5: samaṇassa ca gotamassa vasanaṭṭhāne devatā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0101a0:268_6: handāhampi idha ekarattivāsaṃ upagantvā sveva gamissāmī”ti tadevuyyānaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0101a0:268_7: Tato bhikkhusaṅgho bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā attano attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhesi.
atk-s0101a0:268_8: Paribbājakopi uyyānassa ekapasse paribbājakaparikkhāre otāretvā vāsaṃ upagacchi saddhiṃ attano parisāya.
atk-s0101a0:269_0: Evaṃ vāsaṃ upagato pana so paribbājako rattibhāge dasabalaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0101a0:269_1: Tasmiñca samaye samantā vippakiṇṇatārakā viya padīpā jalanti,
atk-s0101a0:269_4: Tattha ekabhikkhussapi hatthakukkuccaṃ vā pādakukkuccaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddo vā khipitasaddo vā natthi.
atk-s0101a0:269_5: Sā hi parisā attano ca sikkhitasikkhatāya satthari ca gāravenāti dvīhi kāraṇehi nivāte padīpasikhā viya niccalā sannisinnāva ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:269_6: Paribbājako taṃ vibhūtiṃ disvā attano parisaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0101a0:269_12: So ratanattayassa guṇavaṇṇe vattabbepi issāvasena puna avaṇṇameva ārabhi.
atk-s0101a0:270_4: Suttantapariyāyena pana tayo tayova tato paṭṭhāya sambahulā.
atk-s0101a0:270_6: Maṇḍalamāḷeti katthaci dve kaṇṇikā gahetvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katā kūṭāgārasālāpi “maṇḍalamāḷo”ti vuccati,
atk-s0101a0:270_7: katthaci ekaṃ kaṇṇikaṃ gahetvā thambhapantiṃ parikkhipitvā katā upaṭṭhānasālāpi “maṇḍalamāḷo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:270_16: Tattha andhassa pabbatārohaṇaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:270_23: Yāvañcidanti yāva ca idaṃ tena suppaṭividitatāya appameyyattaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:271_2: Yo so bhagavā samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0101a0:271_3: tena bhagavatā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayaṃ jānatā,
atk-s0101a0:271_4: hatthatale ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya sabbañeyyadhammaṃ passatā.
atk-s0101a0:272_2: Tīhi vijjāhi chahi vā pana abhiññāhi jānatā,
atk-s0101a0:272_5: sabbasattānaṃ cakkhuvisayātītāni tirokuṭṭādigatānipi rūpāni ativisuddhena maṃsacakkhunā passatā.
atk-s0101a0:273_1: Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhena antarāyikadhamme vā jānatā,
atk-s0101a0:273_5: Evaṃ catūvesārajjavasena catūhākārehi thomitena sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatā nānajjhāsayatā suppaṭividitā yāva ca suṭṭhu paṭividitā.
atk-s0101a0:274_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yā ca ayaṃ bhagavatā “dhātuso,
atk-s0101a0:274_17: paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā saṃsandanti samenti,
atk-s0101a0:274_19: kalyāṇādhimuttikā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samentī”ti evaṃ sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatā,
atk-s0101a0:274_24: nāḷiyā minantena viya tulāya tulayantena viya ca nānādhimuttikatāñāṇena sabbaññutaññāṇena viditā,
atk-s0101a0:274_26: Dvepi nāma sattā ekajjhāsayā dullabhā lokasmiṃ.
atk-s0101a0:274_29: Imesu cāpi dvīsu ācariyantevāsīsu ayañhi “suppiyo paribbājako…pe…
atk-s0101a0:274_30: bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhā honti bhikkhusaṅghañcā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:275_1: Atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imaṃ saṅkhiyadhammaṃ viditvāti ettha viditvāti sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitvā.
atk-s0101a0:275_2: Bhagavā hi katthaci maṃsacakkhunā disvā jānāti –
atk-s0101a0:275_3: “addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”ntiādīsu viya.
atk-s0101a0:275_5: “addasā kho bhagavā dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tā devatāyo sahassasseva pāṭaligāme vatthūni parigaṇhantiyo”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0101a0:275_7: “assosi kho bhagavā āyasmato ānandassa subhaddena paribbājakena saddhiṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpa”ntiādīsu viya.
atk-s0101a0:275_9: “assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya sandhānassa gahapatissa nigrodhena
atk-s0101a0:275_16: Tattha niratthakakiccaṃ bhagavatā bodhipallaṅkeyeva arahattamaggena samugghātaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0101a0:277_0: Bhagavā hi pātova uṭṭhāya upaṭṭhākānuggahatthaṃ sarīraphāsukatthañca mukhadhovanādisarīraparikammaṃ katvā
atk-s0101a0:277_2: bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya kadāci ekako,
atk-s0101a0:277_4: gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati;
atk-s0101a0:277_8: piṇḍāya pavisato lokanāthassa purato purato gantvā mudugatavātā pathaviṃ sodhenti,
atk-s0101a0:277_9: valāhakā udakaphusitāni muñcantā magge reṇuṃ vūpasametvā upari vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0101a0:277_10: apare vātā pupphāni upasaṃharitvā magge okiranti,
atk-s0101a0:277_15: Indakhīlassa anto ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde sarīrato chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāni
atk-s0101a0:277_16: viya citrapaṭaparikkhittāni viya ca pāsādakūṭāgārādīni alaṅkarontiyo ito cito ca dhāvanti,
atk-s0101a0:277_17: hatthiassavihaṅgādayo sakasakaṭṭhānesu ṭhitāyeva madhurenākārena saddaṃ karonti,
atk-s0101a0:277_18: tathā bherivīṇādīni tūriyāni manussānañca kāyūpagāni ābharaṇāni.
atk-s0101a0:277_21: Te sunivatthā supārutā gandhapupphādīni ādāya gharā nikkhamitvā antaravīthiṃ paṭipajjitvā bhagavantaṃ gandhapupphādīhi sakkaccaṃ pūjetvā vanditvā – “amhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:277_25: sataṃ dethā”ti yācitvā bhagavatopi pattaṃ gahetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā sakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātena paṭimānenti.
atk-s0101a0:277_26: Bhagavā katabhattakicco tesaṃ sattānaṃ cittasantānāni oloketvā tathā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0101a0:277_31: Evaṃ mahājanaṃ anuggahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:277_34: Tato bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosāne upaṭṭhāko bhagavato nivedeti.
atk-s0101a0:278_0: Atha bhagavā evaṃ katapurebhattakicco gandhakuṭiyā upaṭṭhāne nisīditvā pāde pakkhāletvā pādapīṭhe ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ovadati –
atk-s0101a0:278_10: Tato sabbepi bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni gacchanti.
atk-s0101a0:278_16: Tato bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā sace ākaṅkhati,
atk-s0101a0:278_17: dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno muhuttaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0101a0:278_18: Atha samassāsitakāyo vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyabhāge lokaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0101a0:278_19: Tatiyabhāge yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati tattha mahājano purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:278_20: sunivattho supāruto gandhapupphādīni ādāya vihāre sannipatati.
atk-s0101a0:278_21: Tato bhagavā sampattaparisāya anurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisajja dhammaṃ deseti kālayuttaṃ samayayuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:279_0: So evaṃ niṭṭhitapacchābhattakicco sace gattāni osiñcitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0101a0:279_1: buddhāsanā vuṭṭhāya nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā upaṭṭhākena paṭiyāditaudakena gattāni utuṃ gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0101a0:279_3: Bhagavā surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā tattha gantvā nisīdati ekakova muhuttaṃ paṭisallīno,
atk-s0101a0:279_4: atha bhikkhū tato tato āgamma bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0101a0:279_8: Bhagavā tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ sampādento purimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0101a0:280_0: Purimayāmakiccapariyosāne pana bhikkhūsu bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pakkantesu sakaladasasahassilokadhātudevatāyo
atk-s0101a0:280_1: okāsaṃ labhamānā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti,
atk-s0101a0:280_3: Bhagavā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento majjhimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0101a0:281_0: Pacchimayāmaṃ pana tayo koṭṭhāse katvā purebhattato paṭṭhāya nisajjāya pīḷitassa sarīrassa kilāsubhāvamocanatthaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ caṅkamena vītināmeti.
atk-s0101a0:281_1: Dutiyakoṭṭhāse gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0101a0:281_2: Tatiyakoṭṭhāse paccuṭṭhāya nisīditvā purimabuddhānaṃ santike dānasīlādivasena katādhikārapuggaladassanatthaṃ buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0101a0:282_0: Tasmiṃ pana divase bhagavā purebhattakiccaṃ rājagahe pariyosāpetvā pacchābhatte maggaṃ āgato,
atk-s0101a0:282_3: pacchimayāme caṅkamaṃ āruyha caṅkamamāno pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ imaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ kathaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇeneva sutvā aññāsīti.
atk-s0101a0:283_1: “ime bhikkhū mayhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbha guṇaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0101a0:283_4: Mayi pana gate ete attano kathaṃ nirantaraṃ ārocessanti,
atk-s0101a0:283_5: tato nesaṃ ahaṃ taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā tividhaṃ sīlaṃ vibhajanto,
atk-s0101a0:283_8: sineruṃ ukkhipento viya suvaṇṇakūṭena nabhaṃ paharanto viya ca dasasahassilokadhātukampanaṃ brahmajālasuttantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:283_10: sā me desanā parinibbutassāpi pañcavassasahassāni sattānaṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ sampāpikā bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:284_0: Paññatte āsane nisīdīti buddhakāle kira yattha yattha ekopi bhikkhu viharati sabbattha buddhāsanaṃ paññattameva hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:284_1: Bhagavā kira attano santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā phāsukaṭṭhāne viharante manasi karoti –
atk-s0101a0:284_3: sakkhissati nu kho visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ no vā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:284_4: Atha naṃ passati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā akusalavitakkaṃ vitakkayamānaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:284_5: tato “kathañhi nāma mādisassa satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantaṃ imaṃ kulaputtaṃ akusalavitakkā
atk-s0101a0:284_6: abhibhavitvā anamatagge vaṭṭadukkhe saṃsāressantī”ti tassa anuggahatthaṃ tattheva attānaṃ dassetvā taṃ
atk-s0101a0:284_7: kulaputtaṃ ovaditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:284_9: “satthā amhākaṃ manaṃ jānitvā āgantvā amhākaṃ samīpe ṭhitaṃyeva attānaṃ dasseti”.
atk-s0101a0:284_17: so mañcaṃ vā phalakaṃ vā kaṭṭhaṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā vālukapuñjaṃ vā paññapeti.
atk-s0101a0:284_18: Taṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇānipi saṅkaḍḍhitvā tattha paṃsukūlaṃ pattharitvā ṭhapenti.
atk-s0101a0:284_20: taṃ papphoṭetvā paññapetvā parivāretvā te bhikkhū bhagavato adhimuttikañāṇamārabbha guṇaṃ thomayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:285_0: Evaṃ nisinno pana jānantoyeva kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ bhikkhū pucchi.
atk-s0101a0:285_4: Tattha kāya nutthāti katamāya nu kathāya sannisinnā bhavathāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:285_6: tassā katamāya nu etthāti attho kāya notthātipi pāḷi.
atk-s0101a0:286_6: ahaṃ pana sabbaññutāya tumhākaṃ kathaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā matthakappattaṃ katvā dassāmīti āgato”ti nisajjeva sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāreti.
atk-s0101a0:286_10: Ayaṃ bhante amhākaṃ bhagavato sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbha guṇakathā vippakatā,
atk-s0101a0:287_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ āyasmatā ānandena kamalakuvalayujjalavimalasādhurasasalilāya pokkharaṇiyā sukhāvataraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:287_6: mahādvāraṃ viya ca atthabyañjanasampannassa buddhaguṇānubhāvasaṃsūcakassa imassa suttassa sukhāvagahaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:288_3: pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādinā nayena bhagavatā nikkhittassa suttassa vaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto.
atk-s0101a0:288_5: Yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:289_0: Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva kathesi;
atk-s0101a0:290_0: Yāni pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācaniyā dhammā;
atk-s0101a0:290_1: yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti;
atk-s0101a0:290_2: evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ manaṃ abhinīhāraṃ bujjhanabhāvañca avekkhitvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni;
atk-s0101a0:291_10: “Kiṃ sūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”ntiādinā nayena pañhaṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0101a0:291_11: Evaṃ puṭṭhena bhagavatā yāni kathitāni bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni,
atk-s0101a0:292_0: Yāni pana tāni uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kathitāni,
atk-s0101a0:293_0: Evametesu catūsu nikkhepesu imassa suttassa aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo.
atk-s0101a0:293_6: Iti imaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā desanākusalo bhagavā –
atk-s0101a0:294_0: Na āghātotiādīhi kiñcāpi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āghātoyeva natthi,
atk-s0101a0:294_1: atha kho āyatiṃ kulaputtānaṃ īdisesupi ṭhānesu akusaluppattiṃ paṭisedhento dhammanettiṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0101a0:294_4: Appatītā honti tena atuṭṭhā asomanassikāti appaccayo;
atk-s0101a0:294_6: Neva attano na paresaṃ hitaṃ abhirādhayatīti anabhiraddhi;
atk-s0101a0:294_10: Tesaṃ vasena sesānampi sampayuttadhammānaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭikkhittameva.
atk-s0101a0:295_1: dutiyena nayena tattha ādīnavaṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0101a0:295_2: “tatra ce tumhe assatha kupitā vā anattamanā vā,
atk-s0101a0:295_4: Tattha ‘tatra ce tumhe assathā’ti tesu avaṇṇabhāsakesu,
atk-s0101a0:295_5: tasmiṃ vā avaṇṇe tumhe bhaveyyātha ce;
atk-s0101a0:295_9: ‘Tumhaṃ yevassa tena antarāyo’ti tumhākaṃyeva tena kopena,
atk-s0101a0:295_10: tāya ca anattamanatāya paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ antarāyo bhaveyya.
atk-s0101a0:296_6: na paccatthikānaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānāti. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:297_0: “Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0101a0:298_0: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ kodho sahate naraṃ.
atk-s0101a0:301_0: Evaṃ sabbathāpi avaṇṇe manopadosaṃ nisedhetvā idāni paṭipajjitabbākāraṃ dassento –
atk-s0101a0:302_8: saṅgho duppaṭipanno”tiādīni sutvā na tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:302_30: goṇosī”tiādinā pana nayena dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosantaṃ puggalaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā adhivāsanakhantiyeva tattha kātabbā.
atk-s0101a0:303_1: Evaṃ avaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ tādilakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā idāni vaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ dassetuṃ “mamaṃ vā,
atk-s0101a0:303_4: Tattha pareti ye keci pasannā devamanussā.
atk-s0101a0:304_3: Idhāpi tumhaṃ yevassa tena antarāyoti tena uppilāvitattena tumhākaṃyeva paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ antarāyo bhaveyyāti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:306_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenāpi jambudīpassa.
atk-s0101a0:307_0: Dhammoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
atk-s0101a0:308_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenāpi jambudīpassa.
atk-s0101a0:309_0: Saṅghoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
atk-s0101a0:310_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenāpi jambudīpassā”ti ca.
atk-s0101a0:311_3: agge te pasannā”ti ca evamādīhi anekasatehi suttehi ratanattaye pītisomanassameva vaṇṇitanti.
atk-s0101a0:311_7: amhākaṃ dhammo”tiādinā nayena āyasmato channassa uppannasadisaṃ gehassitaṃ pītisomanassaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:311_9: Tenevāyasmā channopi yāva buddho na parinibbāyi,
atk-s0101a0:311_11: parinibbānakāle paññattena pana brahmadaṇḍena tajjito taṃ pītisomanassaṃ pahāya visesaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-s0101a0:311_12: Tasmā antarāyakaraṃyeva sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:312_0: “Luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0101a0:313_0: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate naraṃ.
atk-s0101a0:316_0: Tatiyavāro pana idha anāgatopi atthato āgato yevāti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:317_3: saṅgho suppaṭipanno”tiādīni sutvā na tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:319_3: Idaṃ suttaṃ dvīhi padehi ābaddhaṃ vaṇṇena ca avaṇṇena ca.
atk-s0101a0:319_9: So pana duvidho brahmadattena bhāsitavaṇṇo ca bhikkhusaṅghena acchariyaṃ āvusotiādinā nayena āraddhavaṇṇo ca.
atk-s0101a0:319_10: Tesu bhikkhusaṅghena vuttavaṇṇassa upari suññatāpakāsane anusandhiṃ dassessati.
atk-s0101a0:319_11: Idha pana brahmadattena vuttavaṇṇassa anusandhiṃ dassetuṃ “appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:320_9: oramattakaṃ sīlamattakaṃ’ nāma yena “tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadāmī”ti ussāhaṃ katvāpi vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno puthujjano vadeyyāti.
atk-s0101a0:320_11: nanu idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma yogino aggavibhūsanaṃ?
atk-s0101a0:323_0: Bhagavatāpi ca anekesu suttasatesu sīlaṃ mahantameva katvā kathitaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:323_3: bhikkhu ‘sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo cassaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā’ti,
atk-s0101a0:332_0: Candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpi, uppalaṃ atha vassikī;
atk-s0101a0:335_0: Yo ca sīlavataṃ gandho, vāti devesu uttamo.
atk-s0101a0:337_0: Sammadaññā vimuttānaṃ, māro maggaṃ na vindatī”ti ca. ;
atk-s0101a0:338_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:339_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti ca. ;
atk-s0101a0:340_2: ye keci bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti,
atk-s0101a0:340_5: evamete bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0101a0:340_8: bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya sattabojjhaṅge bhāvento sattabojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesū”ti ca.
atk-s0101a0:340_10: Evamanekesu suttasatesu sīlaṃ mahantameva katvā kathitaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:340_15: tasmā uparimaṃ upanidhāya heṭṭhimaṃ oramattakaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0101a0:340_17: Bhagavā hi abhisambodhito sattame saṃvacchare sāvatthinagara –
atk-s0101a0:340_18: dvāre kaṇḍambarukkhamūle dvādasayojane ratanamaṇḍape yojanappamāṇe ratanapallaṅke nisīditvā tiyojanike
atk-s0101a0:340_19: dibbasetacchatte dhāriyamāne dvādasayojanāya parisāya attādānaparidīpanaṃ titthiyamaddanaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:340_25: Tassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇasarīrato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmiyo uggantvā yāva bhavaggā gacchanti,
atk-s0101a0:340_27: dutiyā dutiyā rasmiyo purimāya purimāya yamakayamakā viya ekakkhaṇe viya pavattanti.
atk-s0101a0:341_0: Dvinnañca cittānaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti nāma natthi.
atk-s0101a0:341_1: Buddhānaṃ pana bhagavantānaṃ bhavaṅgaparivāsassa lahukatāya pañcahākārehi āciṇṇavasitāya ca,
atk-s0101a0:341_3: Tassā tassā pana rasmiyā āvajjanaparikammādhiṭṭhānāni visuṃ visuṃyeva.
atk-s0101a0:342_6: nimmito tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappetīti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:343_0: Yaṃ pana bhagavā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā,
atk-s0101a0:343_1: ekūnatiṃsavassakāle cakkavattisirīnivāsabhūtā bhavanā nikkhamma anomānadītīre pabbajitvā,
atk-s0101a0:343_3: visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ uruvelagāme sujātāya dinnaṃ pakkhittadibbojaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā,
atk-s0101a0:343_4: sāyanhasamaye dakkhiṇuttarena bodhimaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā assatthadumarājānaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā,
atk-s0101a0:343_9: cuddasahatthapallaṅkavaragato suvaṇṇapīṭhe ṭhapitaṃ rajatakkhandhaṃ viya paññāsahatthaṃ bodhikkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā,
atk-s0101a0:343_18: maggapaṭipāṭiyā adhigatena catutthamaggena sabbakilese khepetvā sabbabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhi,
atk-s0101a0:344_0: Tattha yathā hatthe udakaṃ pātiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:344_1: pātiyaṃ udakaṃ ghaṭe udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:344_2: ghaṭe udakaṃ kolambe udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:344_3: kolambe udakaṃ cāṭiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:344_4: cāṭiyaṃ udakaṃ mahākumbhiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:344_5: mahākumbhiyaṃ udakaṃ kusobbhe udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:344_6: kusobbhe udakaṃ kandare udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:344_7: kandare udakaṃ kunnadiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:344_8: kunnadiyaṃ udakaṃ pañcamahānadiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:344_9: pañcamahānadiyaṃ udakaṃ cakkavāḷamahāsamudde udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:344_10: cakkavāḷamahāsamudde udakaṃ sinerupādake mahāsamudde udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0101a0:344_11: Pātiyaṃ udakaṃ upanidhāya hatthe udakaṃ parittaṃ…pe…
atk-s0101a0:344_12: sinerupādakamahāsamudde udakaṃ upanidhāya cakkavāḷamahāsamudde udakaṃ parittaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:344_13: Iti uparūpari udakaṃ bahukaṃ upādāya heṭṭhā heṭṭhā udakaṃ parittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:345_0: Evameva upari upari guṇe upādāya heṭṭhā heṭṭhā sīlaṃ appamattakaṃ oramattakanti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0101a0:352_0: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:353_8: puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gathitā mucchitā ajjhopannā laggā laggitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā,
atk-s0101a0:353_9: puthu pañcahi nīvaraṇehi āvutā nivutā ovutā pihitā paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti puthujjanā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:353_10: Puthūnaṃ gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjano,
atk-s0101a0:353_11: puthuvāyaṃ visuṃyeva saṅkhyaṃ gato visaṃsaṭṭho sīlasutādiguṇayuttehi ariyehi janehīti puthujjanoti.
atk-s0101a0:355_1: Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā sammāsambuddhā āgatā,
atk-s0101a0:355_27: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgato,
atk-s0101a0:361_0: Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yathā sampatijāto vipassī bhagavā gato…pe… kassapo bhagavā gato.
atk-s0101a0:362_1: So hi sampati jātova samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gato. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:362_3: bodhisatto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati,
atk-s0101a0:362_4: setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā ca disā anuviloketi,
atk-s0101a0:363_2: Yañhi so sampatijātova samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0101a0:366_0: “Suvaṇṇadaṇḍā vītipatanti cāmarā”ti, ettha vuttacāmarukkhepo pana sabbatitthiyanimmaddanassa.
atk-s0101a0:381_2: ayampi bhagavā tatheva nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ pahāya gato,
atk-s0101a0:381_6: dhammavavatthānena vicikicchaṃ pahāya ñāṇena avijjaṃ padāletvā,
atk-s0101a0:383_0: Kathaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato?Pathavīdhātuyā kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:394_0: Khaye ñāṇassa samucchedanalakkhaṇaṃ. Anuppāde ñāṇassa passaddhilakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:395_9: Evaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto anuppattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a0:396_9: tasmā tathānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:397_0: Api ca jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…,
atk-s0101a0:397_4: jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho.
atk-s0101a0:397_6: tasmāpi tathānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:398_2: sadevamanussāya pajāya aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0101a0:398_5: tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā.
atk-s0101a0:398_7: Yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0101a0:398_8: anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tathameva hoti,
atk-s0101a0:398_10: Esa nayo sotadvārādīsupi āpāthaṃ āgacchantesu saddādīsu.
atk-s0101a0:398_14: sadevamanussāya pajāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
atk-s0101a0:398_20: Tattha tathadassī atthe tathāgatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:399_1: Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0101a0:399_2: yañca rattiṃ yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi,
atk-s0101a0:399_3: etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe kāle paṭhamabodhiyāpi majjhimabodhiyāpi pacchimabodhiyāpi yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ – suttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:399_5: taṃ sabbaṃ atthato ca byañjanato ca anupavajjaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:399_14: tathameva hoti avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ. Tenāha – “yañca, cunda,
atk-s0101a0:399_17: yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0101a0:400_4: kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evametasmiṃ atthe padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:402_1: Upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi,
atk-s0101a0:402_2: vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi;
atk-s0101a0:402_3: atulo appameyyo anuttaro rājātirājā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā. Tenāha –
atk-s0101a0:402_6: sadevamanussāya pajāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī,
atk-s0101a0:403_4: Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca lokaṃ abhibhavati.
atk-s0101a0:403_5: Iti sabbālokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāsamayo ceva puññussayo ca agado assāti. Da-
atk-s0101a0:405_0: Tattha sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a0:405_1: Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a0:405_2: Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a0:405_3: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a0:407_2: Sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya.
atk-s0101a0:408_0: Katamañca taṃ bhikkhaveti yena appamattakena oramattakena sīlamattakena puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyya,
atk-s0101a0:409_3: tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhāvanāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0101a0:410_3: tassa aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0101a0:412_4: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti. Aniccaṃ, bhante.
atk-s0101a0:414_0: Iti imāsu pañcasu pucchāsu adiṭṭhassa tāva kassaci dhammassa abhāvato tathāgatassa adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā natthi.
atk-s0101a0:414_1: “Idaṃ nāma aññehi paṇḍitehi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā desessāmī”ti samannāhārasseva anuppajjanato diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchāpi natthi.
atk-s0101a0:414_2: Yasmā pana buddhānaṃ ekadhammepi āsappanā parisappanā natthi,
atk-s0101a0:414_5: Avasesā pana dve pucchā buddhānaṃ atthi,
atk-s0101a0:415_0: 8. Idāni taṃ kathetukamyatāya pucchāya pucchitamatthaṃ kathetuṃ “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:416_5: tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
atk-s0101a0:416_6: So guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo,
atk-s0101a0:416_12: Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo,
atk-s0101a0:417_9: Imasmiṃ panatthe vitthāriyamāne ativiya papañco hoti,
atk-s0101a0:417_12: Atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:418_1: Paṭiviratoti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova.
atk-s0101a0:418_2: Natthi tassa vītikkamissāmīti cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā pageva kāyikāti imināva nayena aññesupi evarūpesu padesu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:419_4: desanā pana ādito paṭṭhāya evaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0101a0:419_5: atthaṃ pana dīpentena bhikkhusaṅghavasenāpi dīpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:420_0: Nihitadaṇḍo nihitasatthoti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍo ceva nikkhittasattho cāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:420_1: Ettha ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍaṃ sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ viheṭhanabhāvato satthanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:420_2: Yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā vāsiṃ pipphalikaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti,
atk-s0101a0:420_4: Tasmā nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:421_4: Tāya dayāpannatāya sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:421_8: Vā saddo upari “adinnādānaṃ pahāyā”tiādīni apekkhitvā vikappattho vutto,
atk-s0101a0:421_9: evaṃ sabbattha purimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā apekkhitvā vikappabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:422_2: puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-s0101a0:422_8: iti mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ katvā vaṇṇaṃ vattukāmopi appamattakaṃ oramattakaṃ ācārasīlamattakameva vakkhati.
atk-s0101a0:422_9: Upari asādhāraṇabhāvaṃ nissāya vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ na sakkhissati.
atk-s0101a0:422_10: Na kevalañca puthujjanova sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmiarahantopi paccekabuddhāpi na sakkontiyeva;
atk-s0101a0:423_0: Adinnādānaṃ pahāyāti ettha adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:423_4: yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo ca hoti.
atk-s0101a0:423_10: Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:423_11: Taṃ taṃ guṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:425_6: Athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attānaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:426_3: Methunāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunāti saṅkhyaṃ gatā asaddhammā.
atk-s0101a0:427_1: Musāvādaṃ pahāyāti ettha musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjanako vacīpayogo kāyapayogo,
atk-s0101a0:427_2: vā visaṃvādanādhippāyena panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0101a0:428_3: Lakkhaṇato pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0101a0:429_0: Api ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya natthītiādinayappavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0101a0:429_2: pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena –
atk-s0101a0:429_3: “ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī”ti pūraṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0101a0:429_4: adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0101a0:430_6: So kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā vācāya vā paravisaṃvādanakiriyākaraṇena daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:430_7: Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0101a0:431_0: Yasmā pana yathā kāyakāyapaṭibaddhavācāhi paraṃ visaṃvādeti,
atk-s0101a0:431_1: tathā “idamassa bhaṇāhī”ti āṇāpentopi paṇṇaṃ likhitvā purato nissajjantopi,
atk-s0101a0:432_3: Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati,
atk-s0101a0:432_5: tassa musāvādena antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati;
atk-s0101a0:432_8: jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahati yevāti saccasandho.
atk-s0101a0:433_3: assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na thirakatho hoti,
atk-s0101a0:433_6: asinā sīsaṃ chindantepi dve kathā na katheti,
atk-s0101a0:434_2: Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko hoti,
atk-s0101a0:434_4: asukenā”ti vutte “mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0101a0:434_12: Avisaṃvādako lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādetīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:435_0: Pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pahāyātiādīsu yāya vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0101a0:436_0: Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusaṃ karoti,
atk-s0101a0:437_0: Yena samphaṃ palapati niratthakaṃ, so samphappalāpo.
atk-s0101a0:438_0: Tesaṃ mūlabhūtā cetanāpi pisuṇavācādināmeva labhati, sā eva ca idhādhippetāti.
atk-s0101a0:439_0: Tattha saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pisuṇavācā.
atk-s0101a0:440_4: “iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsiko”ti piyakamyatā vā,
atk-s0101a0:440_8: yesaṃ itoti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ tesaṃ bhedāya.
atk-s0101a0:441_0: Bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātāti dvinnaṃ mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ
atk-s0101a0:441_1: upasaṅkamitvā “tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta”ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā anukattā.
atk-s0101a0:441_4: “tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta”ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:441_11: te pahāya aññattha gantumpi na icchatīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:441_13: samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti,
atk-s0101a0:442_2: eko kira dārako mātuvacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0101a0:442_11: Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya na pharusā vācā hoti.
atk-s0101a0:442_12: Mātāpitaro hi kadāci puttake evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0101a0:442_14: uppalapattampi ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti.
atk-s0101a0:442_15: Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0101a0:442_19: Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusā vācā na hoti,
atk-s0101a0:442_20: evaṃ vacanasaṇhatāya apharusā vācā na hoti.
atk-s0101a0:442_22: “imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā”ti vacanaṃ apharusā vācā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:443_7: Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti pemanīyā.
atk-s0101a0:443_10: Guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti porī pure saṃvaḍḍhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī.
atk-s0101a0:443_17: Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-s0101a0:443_18: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuḍḍhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-s0101a0:445_0: Kālena vadatīti kālavādī vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:445_1: Bhūtaṃ tathaṃ tacchaṃ sabhāvameva vadatīti bhūtavādī.
atk-s0101a0:445_3: Navalokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti dhammavādī saṃvaravinayapahānavinayasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti vinayavādī.
atk-s0101a0:446_4: “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī”ti na akālena bhāsati,
atk-s0101a0:446_8: Pariyantavatinti paricchedaṃ dassetvā yathāssā paricchedo paññāyati,
atk-s0101a0:446_10: Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a0:446_11: Yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati,
atk-s0101a0:446_12: tena atthena sahitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0101a0:446_13: na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:447_1: Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhāti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva,
atk-s0101a0:447_2: yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca samārambhā,
atk-s0101a0:448_3: Tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:449_2: Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:450_0: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:450_1: Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccādivasenapi pavattānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:450_3: Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnañca vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0101a0:451_5: gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma.
atk-s0101a0:451_7: Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti,
atk-s0101a0:452_0: Uccāsayanaṃ vuccati pamāṇātikkantaṃ. Mahāsayananti akappiyapaccattharaṇaṃ. Tato viratoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:454_4: Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a0:456_0: Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:456_2: ārāmikaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:457_1: Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati.
atk-s0101a0:458_1: gihīnaṃ pahitaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:458_2: Pahiṇagamanaṃ vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:459_5: Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a0:459_7: Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati,
atk-s0101a0:459_9: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a0:459_11: Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti,
atk-s0101a0:460_2: Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇe karoti,
atk-s0101a0:460_3: tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhaṃ kulaṃ pavisitvā –
atk-s0101a0:460_4: “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti.
atk-s0101a0:460_7: “vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbā pātiyo datvā gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:461_3: “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a0:461_4: dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti.
atk-s0101a0:462_1: Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a0:462_2: dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti.
atk-s0101a0:463_1: Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-s0101a0:464_0: Ukkoṭanādīsu ukkoṭananti assāmike sāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:464_1: Vañcananti tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:464_3: eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati,
atk-s0101a0:464_8: migapotako eka”nti ca vutte ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto –
atk-s0101a0:464_11: migaṃ me dehī”ti āha. Tena hi –
atk-s0101a0:464_14: mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo dinno”ti? “Āma, dinno”ti.
atk-s0101a0:464_17: ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:464_18: So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
atk-s0101a0:464_19: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti,
atk-s0101a0:464_28: Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:465_5: Yaṃ himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti,
atk-s0101a0:465_11: Gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:468_1: Idāni majjhimasīlaṃ vitthārento “yathā vā paneke bhonto”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:468_3: Saddhādeyyānīti kammañca phalañca idhalokañca paralokañca saddahitvā dinnāni.
atk-s0101a0:468_9: Evaṃ dinnāni hi na saddhādeyyāni nāma honti.
atk-s0101a0:468_11: atthato pana saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā cīvarāni pārupitvā senāsanāni sevamānā gilānabhesajjaṃ paribhuñjamānāti sabbametaṃ vuttameva hoti.
atk-s0101a0:469_8: Khandhabījaṃ nāma assattho, nigrodho, pilakkho, udumbaro, kacchako,
atk-s0101a0:470_4: Vinayavasena tāva yaṃ kiñci annaṃ ajja paṭiggahitaṃ aparajju sannidhikārakaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:470_7: tehi laddhaṃ ṭhapāpetvā dutiyadivase bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a0:471_1: Tattha pānaṃ nāma ambapānādīni aṭṭha pānāni,
atk-s0101a0:472_0: Vatthasannidhimhi anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ sannidhi ca hoti,
atk-s0101a0:472_5: Sace yassa kassaci dātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0101a0:472_7: so uddesatthāya vā paripucchatthāya vā gato,
atk-s0101a0:472_10: Cīvare pana appahonte satiyā paccāsāya anuññātakālaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:472_11: Sūcisuttacīvarakārakānaṃ alābhena tato parampi vinayakammaṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:472_12: “Imasmiṃ jiṇṇe puna īdisaṃ kuto labhissāmī”ti pana ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a0:473_0: Yānasannidhimhi yānaṃ nāma vayhaṃ, ratho, sakaṭaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:473_9: “Imasmiṃ jiṇṇe aññaṃ kuto labhissāmī”ti hi ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a0:474_2: eko divāṭhāneti ukkaṃsato dve mañcā vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0101a0:474_3: Tato uttari labhitvā aññassa bhikkhuno vā gaṇassa vā dātabbo;
atk-s0101a0:475_0: Gandhasannidhimhi bhikkhuno kaṇḍukacchuchavidosādiābādhe sati gandhā vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0101a0:475_1: Te gandhe āharāpetvā tasmiṃ roge vūpasante aññesaṃ vā ābādhikānaṃ dātabbā,
atk-s0101a0:475_3: “Puna roge sati bhavissantī”ti pana ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a0:476_4: So vassakāle kālasseva sāmaṇerehi yāguṃ pacāpetvā paribhuñjitvā “sāmaṇera,
atk-s0101a0:476_6: gaccha asukaṃ kulaṃ gantvā mayhaṃ vihāre nisinnabhāvaṃ ārocehi;
atk-s0101a0:476_14: Atha sāmaṇeropi dadhiādīni āharitvā bhattañca byañjanañca sampādetvā upaneti,
atk-s0101a0:477_4: Te hi ettakampi āmisapaṭisanthāraṃ alabhantā jīvitāpi voropeyyuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:477_9: Kappiyakuṭiyaṃ pana bahuṃ ṭhapentassāpi sannidhi nāma natthi.
atk-s0101a0:477_10: Tathāgatassa pana taṇḍulanāḷiādīsu vā yaṃ kiñci caturatanamattaṃ vā pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ “idaṃ me ajja vā sve vā bhavissatī”ti ṭhapitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0101a0:478_1: Visūkadassanesu naccaṃ nāma yaṃ kiñci naccaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:478_2: taṃ maggaṃ gacchantenāpi gīvaṃ pasāretvā daṭṭhuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:478_6: Ito parañhi ettakampi avatvā tattha tattha payojanamattameva vaṇṇayissāmāti.
atk-s0101a0:480_1: ekaccesu kira janapadesu kālaṅkate ñātake na jhāpenti,
atk-s0101a0:480_3: Atha nesaṃ pūtibhūtaṃ kāyaṃ ñatvā nīharitvā aṭṭhīni dhovitvā gandhehi makkhetvā ṭhapenti.
atk-s0101a0:480_4: Te nakkhattakāle ekasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhīni ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne surādīni ṭhapetvā rodantā paridevantā suraṃ pivanti.
atk-s0101a0:480_8: tattha hoti annampi pānampi khajjampi bhojjampi leyyampi peyyampi naccampi gītampi vāditampi. Atthetaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:480_11: Ekacce pana indajālena aṭṭhidhovanaṃ dhovanantipi vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:481_0: Hatthiyuddhādīsu bhikkhuno neva hatthiādīhi saddhiṃ yujjhituṃ,
atk-s0101a0:481_9: “tayo hatthī pacchimaṃ hatthānīka”ntiādinā nayena vuttassa anīkassa dassanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:482_3: Ekekāya pantiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha padāni assāti aṭṭhapadaṃ dasapadepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0101a0:482_5: Parihārapathanti bhūmiyaṃ nānāpathamaṇḍalaṃ katvā tattha tattha pariharitabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:482_8: Ekajjhaṃ ṭhapitā sāriyo vā sakkharāyo vā acālentā nakheneva apanenti ca upanenti ca,
atk-s0101a0:482_14: Salākahatthanti lākhāya vā mañjiṭṭhikāya vā piṭṭhodakena vā salākahatthaṃ temetvā –
atk-s0101a0:482_15: “kiṃ hotū”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā bhittiyaṃ vā taṃ paharitvā hatthiassādirūpadassanakīḷanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:482_21: ākāse vā daṇḍakaṃ gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ vā sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhupariyabhāvena parivattanakīḷāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:482_22: Ciṅgulikaṃ vuccati tālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ vātappahārena paribbhamanacakkaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:482_27: Akkharikā vuccati ākāse vā piṭṭhiyaṃ vā akkharajānanakīḷā.
atk-s0101a0:482_29: Yathāvajjaṃ nāma kāṇakuṇikhujjādīnaṃ yaṃ yaṃ vajjaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:483_2: Anuyuttā viharantīti idaṃ apekkhitvā pana sabbapadesu upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0101a0:483_19: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni na vaṭṭantī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:484_0: Kuttakanti soḷasannaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ ṭhatvā naccanayoggaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:484_3: Ajinappaveṇīti ajinacammehi mañcappamāṇena sibbitvā katā paveṇī.
atk-s0101a0:484_7: Taṃ kira setavatthassa upari kadalīmigacammaṃ pattharitvā sibbetvā karonti.
