atk-s0101a0:484_10: Setavitānampi heṭṭhā akappiyapaccattharaṇe sati na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a0:484_12: Ubhatolohitakūpadhānanti sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti mañcassa ubhatolohitakaṃ upadhānaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:484_14: Yaṃ pana ekameva upadhānaṃ ubhosu passesu rattaṃ vā hoti padumavaṇṇaṃ vā vicitraṃ vā,
atk-s0101a0:484_19: Dātuṃ asakkonto mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi labhati.
atk-s0101a0:485_1: Ucchādanādīsu mātukucchito nikkhantadārakānaṃ sarīragandho dvādasavassapattakāle nassati,
atk-s0101a0:485_4: Puññavante pana dārake ūrūsu nipajjāpetvā telena makkhetvā hatthapādaūrunābhiādīnaṃ saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ parimaddanti,
atk-s0101a0:486_1: Sambāhananti mahāmallānaṃ viya hatthapāde muggarādīhi paharitvā bāhuvaḍḍhanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:486_2: Ādāsanti yaṃ kiñci ādāsaṃ pariharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:486_6: Mukhacuṇṇaṃ mukhalepananti mukhe kāḷapīḷakādīnaṃ haraṇatthāya mattikakakkaṃ denti,
atk-s0101a0:486_10: tena chavivaṇṇe ārūḷhe mukhacuṇṇakena mukhaṃ cuṇṇenti,
atk-s0101a0:487_1: taṃ vā aññaṃ vā sabbampi hatthābharaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a0:487_5: Apare catuhatthadaṇḍaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana alaṅkatadaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā vicaranti,
atk-s0101a0:487_6: tathā itthipurisarūpādivicittaṃ bhesajjanāḷikaṃ suparikkhittaṃ vāmapasse olaggitaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:487_10: keci ratanamattāyāmaṃ caturaṅgulavitthataṃ kesantaparicchedaṃ dassetvā meghamukhe vijjulataṃ viya nalāṭe uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ bandhanti,
atk-s0101a0:488_2: Tattha rājānaṃ ārabbha mahāsammato mandhātā dhammāsoko evaṃ mahānubhāvotiādinā nayena pavattā kathā rājakathā.
atk-s0101a0:488_4: Tesu asuko rājā abhirūpo dassanīyotiādinā nayena gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā hoti.
atk-s0101a0:488_5: Sopi nāma evaṃ mahānubhāvo khayaṃ gatoti evaṃ pavattā pana kammaṭṭhānabhāve tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0101a0:488_7: meghamālo evaṃ mahānubhāvoti tesaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca aho sūrāti gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā.
atk-s0101a0:488_8: Yuddhepi bhāratayuddhādīsu asukena asuko evaṃ mārito,
atk-s0101a0:488_10: Tepi nāma khayaṃ gatāti evaṃ pavattā pana sabbattha kammaṭṭhānameva hoti.
atk-s0101a0:488_11: Api ca annādīsu evaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ gandhavantaṃ rasavantaṃ phassasampannaṃ khādimha bhuñjimhāti kāmassādavasena kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:488_12: Sātthakaṃ pana katvā pubbe evaṃ vaṇṇādisampannaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ sayanaṃ mālaṃ gandhaṃ sīlavantānaṃ adamha,
atk-s0101a0:488_14: Ñātikathādīsu pana “amhākaṃ ñātakā sūrā samatthā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evaṃ vicitrehi yānehi vicarimhā”ti vā assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:488_15: Sātthakaṃ pana katvā “tepi no ñātakā khayaṃ gatā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evarūpā upāhanā saṅghassa adamhā”ti vā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:488_16: Gāmakathāpi suniviṭṭhadunniviṭṭhasubhikkhadubbhikkhādivasena vā “asukagāmavāsino sūrā samatthā”ti vā evaṃ assādavasena na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:488_17: Sātthakaṃ pana katvā “saddhā pasannā”ti vā “khayavayaṃ gatā”ti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:489_0: Itthikathāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca assādavasena na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a0:489_1: saddhā pasannā khayavayaṃ gatāti evameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:489_2: Sūrakathāpi ‘nandimitto nāma yodho sūro ahosī’ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:489_3: Saddho ahosi khayaṃ gatoti evameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:489_4: Visikhākathāpi “asukā visikhā suniviṭṭhā dunniviṭṭhā sūrā samatthā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:489_5: Saddhā pasannā khayavayaṃ gatāti evameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:490_3: sāpi “pāsādikā naccituṃ gāyituṃ chekā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati;
atk-s0101a0:491_0: Nānattakathāti purimapacchimakathāhi vimuttā avasesā nānāsabhāvā niratthakakathā.
atk-s0101a0:492_3: Khato meti hatthamuddāya sayaṃ niveditattā “samuddo”ti evamādikā niratthakā samuddakkhāyanakathā.
atk-s0101a0:492_7: iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ vatvā pavattitakathā itibhavābhavakathā.
atk-s0101a0:493_3: Tattha sahitaṃ meti mayhaṃ vacanaṃ sahitaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttanti attho.
atk-s0101a0:493_4: Asahitaṃ teti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ asahitaṃ asiliṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:493_5: Adhiciṇṇaṃ te viparāvattanti yaṃ tuyhaṃ dīgharattāciṇṇavasena suppaguṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:493_6: taṃ mayhaṃ ekavacaneneva viparāvattaṃ parivattitvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:494_0: Āropito te vādoti mayā tava doso āropito.
atk-s0101a0:494_3: Nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosīti atha sayaṃ pahosi,
atk-s0101a0:495_1: Dūteyyakathāyaṃ idha gacchāti ito asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gaccha.
atk-s0101a0:495_2: Amutrāgacchāti tato asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ āgaccha.
atk-s0101a0:495_3: Idaṃ harāti ito idaṃ nāma hara.
atk-s0101a0:495_4: Amutra idaṃ āharāti asukaṭṭhānato idaṃ nāma idha āhara.
atk-s0101a0:495_5: Saṅkhepato pana idaṃ dūteyyaṃ nāma ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike ratanattayassa upakārapaṭisaṃyuttañca gihīsāsanaṃ aññesaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:496_6: Lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanti magganti pariyesantīti lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsitāro. Kuhanā, lapanā,
atk-s0101a0:496_9: lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatāti etāhi samannāgatānaṃ puggalānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:496_11: Vitthārena panetā kuhanādikā visuddhimagge sīlaniddeseyeva pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca āharitvā pakāsitāti.
atk-s0101a0:499_2: Aṅganti hatthapādādīsu yena kenaci evarūpena aṅgena samannāgato dīghāyu yasavā hotītiādinayappavattaṃ aṅgasatthaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:499_4: Paṇḍurājā kira tisso muttāyo muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā nemittikaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0101a0:499_7: tasmiñca samaye gharagolikāya makkhikā gayhantī muttā,
atk-s0101a0:499_9: Puna “katī”ti puṭṭho kukkuṭassa tikkhattuṃ ravantassa saddaṃ sutvā “tisso”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:499_10: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ ādisitvā nimittamanuyuttā viharanti.
atk-s0101a0:500_6: tassa idaṃ nāma hotītiādinā nayena supinakaṃ anuyuttā viharanti.
atk-s0101a0:500_7: Lakkhaṇanti iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgato rājā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:500_10: Tenāpi hi ahate vā vatthe anahate vā vatthe ito paṭṭhāya evaṃ chinne idaṃ nāma hotīti ādisanti.
atk-s0101a0:500_11: Aggihomanti evarūpena dārunā evaṃ hute idaṃ nāma hotīti aggijuhanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:500_13: evarūpāya dabbiyā īdisehi kaṇādīhi hute idaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ pavattivasena pana visuṃ vuttāni.
atk-s0101a0:501_4: Sāsapādīni pana mukhena gahetvā aggimhi pakkhipanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:501_7: Aṅgavijjāti pubbe aṅgameva disvā byākaraṇavasena aṅgaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:501_8: idha aṅgulaṭṭhiṃ disvā vijjaṃ parijappitvā ayaṃ kulaputto vā no vā,
atk-s0101a0:501_9: sirīsampanno vā no vātiādibyākaraṇavasena aṅgavijjā vuttā.
atk-s0101a0:501_11: Mattikādivisesaṃ disvāpi hi vijjaṃ parijappitvā heṭṭhā pathaviyaṃ tiṃsaratanamatte,
atk-s0101a0:501_12: ākāse ca asītiratanamatte padese guṇadosaṃ passanti.
atk-s0101a0:502_2: ayaṃ ettaka”nti evaṃ pavattaṃ ādiṭṭhañāṇanti attho.
atk-s0101a0:502_6: Migacakkanti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikaṃ sabbasakuṇacatuppadānaṃ rutañāṇavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:503_5: evaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena maṇiādīnaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ anuyuttā viharantīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:503_6: Tattha āvudhanti ṭhapetvā asiādīni avasesaṃ āvudhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:503_7: Itthilakkhaṇādīnipi yamhi kule te itthipurisādayo vasanti,
atk-s0101a0:503_9: Ajalakkhaṇādīsu pana evarūpānaṃ ajādīnaṃ maṃsaṃ khāditabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:503_10: evarūpānaṃ na khāditabbanti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:504_0: Api cettha godhāya lakkhaṇe cittakammapiḷandhanādīsupi evarūpāya godhāya sati idaṃ nāma hotīti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:504_2: ekasmiṃ kira vihāre cittakamme godhaṃ aggiṃ dhamamānaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:505_1: Raññaṃ niyyānaṃ bhavissatīti asukadivase asukanakkhattena asukassa nāma rañño niggamanaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ rājūnaṃ pavāsagamanaṃ byākaroti.
atk-s0101a0:505_3: Kevalaṃ panettha aniyyānanti vippavutthānaṃ puna āgamanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:505_5: bāhirānaṃ raññaṃ apayānanti antonagare amhākaṃ rājā paṭiviruddhaṃ bahirājānaṃ upasaṅkamissati,
atk-s0101a0:505_6: tato tassa paṭikkamanaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ raññaṃ upayānāpayānaṃ byākaroti.
atk-s0101a0:506_1: Candaggāhādayo asukadivase rāhu candaṃ gahessatīti byākaraṇavaseneva veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:507_8: so rukkhampi disvā ettakāni ettha paṇṇānīti jānāti.
atk-s0101a0:507_15: Imesaṃ catunnaṃ kavīnaṃ attano cintāvasena vā;
atk-s0101a0:507_16: “vessantaro nāma rājā ahosī”tiādīni sutvā sutavasena vā;
atk-s0101a0:507_18: evaṃ taṃ yojessāmīti evaṃ atthavasena vā;
atk-s0101a0:507_19: kiñcideva disvā tappaṭibhāgaṃ kattabbaṃ karissāmīti evaṃ ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānavasena vā;
atk-s0101a0:508_1: Āvāhanaṃ nāma imassa dārakassa asukakulato asukanakkhattena dārikaṃ ānethāti āvāhakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:508_2: Vivāhananti imaṃ dārikaṃ asukassa nāma dārakassa asukanakkhattena detha,
atk-s0101a0:508_6: iti vo viyogo na bhavissatī’ti evaṃ samaggakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:508_9: iti vo puna saṃyogo na bhavissatī’ti evaṃ visaṃyogakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:508_10: Saṅkiraṇanti ‘uṭṭhānaṃ vā iṇaṃ vā dinnaṃ dhanaṃ ajja saṅkaḍḍhatha,
atk-s0101a0:508_11: ajja saṅkaḍḍhitañhi taṃ thāvaraṃ hotī’ti evaṃ dhanapiṇḍāpanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:508_13: ajja payojitaṃ diguṇacatugguṇaṃ hotī’ti evaṃ dhanapayojāpanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:508_16: Viruddhagabbhakaraṇanti viruddhassa vilīnassa aṭṭhitassa matassa gabbhassa karaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:508_20: Tattha vātena vinassante nibbāpanīyaṃ sītalaṃ bhesajjaṃ deti,
atk-s0101a0:508_22: kammunā vinassante pana buddhāpi paṭibāhituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0101a0:509_1: Hanusaṃhanananti mukhabandhamantena yathā hanukaṃ cāletuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0101a0:509_4: Tasmiṃ kira mante sattapadantare ṭhatvā jappite itaro hatthe parivattetvā khipati.
atk-s0101a0:509_5: Kaṇṇajappananti kaṇṇehi saddaṃ assavanatthāya vijjāya jappanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:509_6: Taṃ kira jappitvā vinicchayaṭṭhāne yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0101a0:509_11: Kumārikapañhanti kumārikāya sarīre devataṃ otāretvā pañhapucchanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:509_12: Devapañhanti dāsiyā sarīre devataṃ otāretvā pañhapucchanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:509_17: mayhaṃ sire patiṭṭhāhī”ti evaṃ sirena siriyā avhāyanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:510_1: Santikammanti devaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sace me idaṃ nāma samijjhissati,
atk-s0101a0:510_2: tumhākaṃ iminā ca iminā ca upahāraṃ karissāmīti samiddhikāle kattabbaṃ santipaṭissavakammaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:510_3: Tasmiṃ pana samiddhe tassa karaṇaṃ paṇidhikammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:510_21: Kaṇṇatelanti kaṇṇānaṃ bandhanatthaṃ vā vaṇaharaṇatthaṃ vā bhesajjatelapacanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:510_24: Añjananti dve vā tīṇi vā paṭalāni nīharaṇasamatthaṃ khārañjanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:510_30: Osadhīnaṃ paṭimokkhoti khārādīni datvā tadanurūpe vaṇe gate tesaṃ apanayanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:513_1: Evaṃ brahmadattena vuttavaṇṇassa anusandhivasena tividhaṃ sīlaṃ vitthāretvā idāni bhikkhusaṅghena vuttavaṇṇassa anusandhivasena – “atthi,
atk-s0101a0:513_3: aññeva dhammā gambhīrā duddasā”tiādinā nayena suññatāpakāsanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0101a0:514_0: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
atk-s0101a0:515_0: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti. ;
atk-s0101a0:516_10: aññeva tathāgatassa guṇāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:517_0: Gambhīrāti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā aññatra tathāgatā aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā,
atk-s0101a0:518_0: Ye tathāgato sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetīti ye dhamme tathāgato anaññaneyyo hutvā sayameva abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ katvā pavedeti, dīpeti, katheti,
atk-s0101a0:518_4: Vaṇṇaṃ sammā vadamānā vadeyyunti tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vattukāmā sammā vadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:518_6: Katame ca pana te dhammā bhagavatā evaṃ thomitāti?
atk-s0101a0:518_13: na cassa koci dhammo ārammaṇaṃ nāma na hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:518_16: Iti puthucittasamāyogato punappunaṃ uppattivasena puthuārammaṇato ca bahuvacananiddeso katoti.
atk-s0101a0:519_2: Gambhīrāva na uttānā”ti evaṃ sabbapadehi yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:519_4: paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ pana tato gambhīrataranti tattha vavatthānaṃ natthi,
atk-s0101a0:519_5: sabbaññutaññāṇañca tatopi gambhīrataranti tatthāpi vavatthānaṃ natthi,
atk-s0101a0:519_8: Tathā duddasāva duranubodhā vāti sabbaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:520_0: Katame ca te bhikkhaveti ayaṃ pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ kathetukamyatā pucchā. Santi,
atk-s0101a0:520_4: Buddhānañhi cattāri ṭhānāni patvā gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:520_26: imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ idaṃ paññapetabba”nti yaṃ evaṃ otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0101a0:520_27: tattha aññesaṃ thāmo vā balaṃ vā natthi;
atk-s0101a0:520_30: Iti vinayapaññattiṃ patvā buddhānaṃ gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:521_17: ettakā lokuttarā dhammā nāmāti catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānaṃ anantanayaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ vibhajitvā kathetuṃ aññesaṃ thāmo vā balaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0101a0:521_20: Iti bhūmantaraparicchedaṃ patvā buddhānaṃ gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:522_0: Tathā ayaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ navahākārehi paccayo hoti,
atk-s0101a0:522_7: Avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhiti ca pavattaṭṭhiti ca,
atk-s0101a0:522_17: ubhopete dhammā paccayasamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:522_19: anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhiti ca…pe…
atk-s0101a0:522_24: ubhopete dhammā paccayasamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti.
atk-s0101a0:522_25: Evamimaṃ tassa tassa dhammassa tathā tathā paccayabhāvena pavattaṃ tivaṭṭaṃ tiyaddhaṃ tisandhiṃ catusaṅkhepaṃ
atk-s0101a0:522_26: vīsatākāraṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ vibhajitvā kathetuṃ aññesaṃ thāmo vā balaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0101a0:522_29: iti paccayākāraṃ patvā buddhānaṃ gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:523_10: Te idaṃ nissāya idaṃ gaṇhantīti dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni bhinditvā nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā kathetuṃ aññesaṃ thāmo vā balaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0101a0:523_13: Iti samayantaraṃ patvā buddhānaṃ gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:524_1: tasmā sabbaññutaññāṇassa mahantabhāvadassanatthaṃ desanāya ca suññatāpakāsanavibhāvanatthaṃ samayantaraṃ anupavisanto dhammarājā – “santi,
atk-s0101a0:525_6: Lokena vā samaṇāti ca brāhmaṇāti ca evaṃ sammatā.
atk-s0101a0:525_11: “Caranti loke parivārachannā anto asuddhā bahi sobhamānā”tiādīsu abbhantare.
atk-s0101a0:525_13: “Sā haritantaṃ vā panthantaṃ vā selantaṃ vā udakantaṃ vā”tiādīsu mariyādāyaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:525_18: Sabbapaccayasaṅkhayo hi dukkhassa parabhāgo koṭīti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:526_10: Tasmā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena atītaṃ khandhakoṭṭhāsaṃ kappetvā pakappetvā ṭhitāti pubbantakappikāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:526_11: Tesaṃ evaṃ pubbantaṃ kappetvā ṭhitānaṃ punappunaṃ uppajjanavasena pubbantameva anugatā diṭṭhīti pubbantānudiṭṭhino.
atk-s0101a0:526_12: Te evaṃdiṭṭhino taṃ pubbantaṃ ārabbha āgamma paṭicca aññampi janaṃ diṭṭhigatikaṃ karontā anekavihitāni
atk-s0101a0:527_2: Atha vā bhūtaṃ atthaṃ abhibhavitvā yathāsabhāvato aggahetvā pavattanato adhimuttiyoti diṭṭhiyo vuccanti.
atk-s0101a0:528_2: tesaṃ kathetukamyatāya pucchāya “te ca kho bhonto”tiādinā nayena pucchitvā tāni vatthūni vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “santi,
atk-s0101a0:528_8: Eteneva nayena ito paresampi evarūpānaṃ padānaṃ attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:528_9: Sassataṃ attānañca lokañcāti rūpādīsu aññataraṃ attāti ca lokoti ca gahetvā taṃ sassataṃ amaraṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ paññapenti. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:528_10: “rūpaṃ attā ceva loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapenti tathā vedanaṃ, saññaṃ, saṅkhāre,
atk-s0101a0:528_11: viññāṇaṃ attā ceva loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:529_1: Ātappamanvāyātiādīsu vīriyaṃ kilesānaṃ ātāpanabhāvena ātappanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:529_4: Evaṃ tippabhedaṃ vīriyaṃ anvāya āgamma paṭiccāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:529_9: Yasmiñhi manasikāre ṭhitassa pubbenivāsānussati ñāṇaṃ ijjhati,
atk-s0101a0:529_11: Tasmā vīriyañca satiñca ñāṇañca āgammāti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0101a0:529_15: Yathā samāhite citteti yena samādhinā sammā āhite suṭṭhu ṭhapite cittamhi anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsantiādīnaṃ attho visuddhimagge vutto.
atk-s0101a0:530_0: So evamāhāti so evaṃ jhānānubhāvasampanno hutvā diṭṭhigatiko evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0101a0:530_1: Vañjhoti vañjhapasuvañjhatālādayo viya aphalo kassaci ajanakoti.
atk-s0101a0:530_2: Etena “attā”ti ca “loko”ti ca gahitānaṃ jhānādīnaṃ rūpādijanakabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0101a0:530_4: Esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitoti esikaṭṭhāyī viya hutvā ṭhitoti esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhito.
atk-s0101a0:530_8: Keci pana īsikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitoti pāḷiṃ vatvā muñje īsikā viya ṭhitoti vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:530_11: taṃ muñjato īsikā viya vijjamānameva nikkhamati.
atk-s0101a0:531_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pubbe “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti vatvā idāni te ca sattā sandhāvantītiādinā vacanena
atk-s0101a0:531_4: ayaṃ diṭṭhigatiko attanāyeva attano vādaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0101a0:531_7: ummattakapacchiyaṃ pūvakhaṇḍagūthagomayādīni viya cettha sundarampi asundarampi hoti yevāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:531_8: Atthitveva sassatisamanti ettha sassatīti niccaṃ vijjamānatāya mahāpathaviṃva maññati,
atk-s0101a0:531_10: Tato tehi samaṃ attānaṃ maññamānā atthi tveva sassatisamanti vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:532_0: Idāni sassato attā ca loko cātiādikāya paṭiññāya sādhanatthaṃ hetuṃ dassento “taṃ kissa hetu?
atk-s0101a0:532_2: Tattha imināmahaṃ etaṃ jānāmīti iminā visesādhigamena ahaṃ etaṃ paccakkhato jānāmi,
atk-s0101a0:532_6: paṭhamaṃ ṭhānanti catūhi vatthūhīti vatthusaddena vuttesu catūsu ṭhānesu idaṃ paṭhamaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:534_6: Yathā hi puriso yaṭṭhiyā udakaṃ vīmaṃsitvā otarati,
atk-s0101a0:534_7: evameva yo tulayitvā ruccitvā khamāpetvā diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a0:535_4: Tattha yo “vessantaro nāma rājā ahosī”tiādīni sutvā “tena hi yadi vessantarova bhagavā,
atk-s0101a0:535_9: tasmā sassato attā”ti takkayanto jātissaratakkiko nāma.
atk-s0101a0:535_10: Yo pana lābhitāya “yathā me idāni attā sukhī hoti,
atk-s0101a0:535_14: “Evaṃ sati idaṃ hotī”ti takkamatteneva gaṇhanto pana suddhatakkiko nāma.
atk-s0101a0:536_1: Etesaṃ vā aññatarenāti etesaṃyeva catunnaṃ vatthūnaṃ aññatarena ekena vā dvīhi vā tīhi vā.
atk-s0101a0:536_2: Natthi ito bahiddhāti imehi pana vatthūhi bahi aññaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇampi sassatapaññattiyā natthīti appaṭivattiyaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati.
atk-s0101a0:537_3: taṃ idaṃ catubbidhampi diṭṭhigataṃ tathāgato nānappakārato jānāti.
atk-s0101a0:537_4: Tato taṃ pajānanākāraṃ dassento ime diṭṭhiṭṭhānātiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:537_22: “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti evaṃgahitā ādinnā,
atk-s0101a0:537_27: Kāraṇasaṅkhātā pana diṭṭhiṭṭhānā yathā gayhamānā diṭṭhiyo samuṭṭhāpenti,
atk-s0101a0:537_28: evaṃ ārammaṇavasena ca pavattanavasena ca āsevanavasena ca gahitā.
atk-s0101a0:538_0: Tañca tathāgato pajānātīti na kevalañca tathāgato sakāraṇaṃ sagatikaṃ diṭṭhigatameva pajānāti,
atk-s0101a0:538_2: tato ca uttaritaraṃ sīlañceva samādhiñca sabbaññutaññāṇañca pajānāti.
atk-s0101a0:538_3: Tañca pajānanaṃ na parāmasatīti tañca evaṃvidhaṃ anuttaraṃ visesaṃ pajānantopi ahaṃ pajānāmīti taṇhādiṭṭhimānaparāmāsavasena tañca na parāmasati.
atk-s0101a0:538_4: Aparāmasato cassa paccattaññeva nibbuti viditāti evaṃ aparāmasato cassa aparāmāsapaccayā sayameva attanāyeva tesaṃ parāmāsakilesānaṃ nibbuti viditā. Pākaṭaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:539_0: Idāni yathāpaṭipannena tathāgatena sā nibbuti adhigatā,
atk-s0101a0:539_1: taṃ paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ yāsu vedanāsu rattā titthiyā “idha sukhino bhavissāma,
atk-s0101a0:539_3: tāsaṃyeva vedanānaṃ vasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto vedanānaṃ samudayañcātiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:539_4: Tattha yathābhūtaṃ viditvāti “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
atk-s0101a0:539_5: taṇhāsamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
atk-s0101a0:539_6: kammasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
atk-s0101a0:539_7: phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati.
atk-s0101a0:539_8: Nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passatī”ti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vasena vedanānaṃ samudayaṃ yathābhūtaṃ viditvā;
atk-s0101a0:539_10: taṇhānirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati,
atk-s0101a0:539_11: kammanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati,
atk-s0101a0:539_12: phassanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati.
atk-s0101a0:539_13: Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passatī”ti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vasena vedanānaṃ atthaṅgamaṃ yathābhūtaṃ viditvā,
atk-s0101a0:539_15: ayaṃ vedanāya assādo”ti evaṃ assādañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā,
atk-s0101a0:539_17: ayaṃ vedanāya ādīnavo”ti evaṃ ādīnavañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā,
atk-s0101a0:539_19: idaṃ vedanāya nissaraṇa”nti evaṃ nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā vigatachandarāgatāya anupādāno anupādāvimutto,
atk-s0101a0:539_24: tassa abhāvā kiñci dhammaṃ anupādiyitvāva vimutto bhikkhave tathāgatoti.
atk-s0101a0:540_2: bhikkhaveti ye te ahaṃ – “katame, ca te,
atk-s0101a0:540_7: tañca tathāgato pajānāti tato ca uttaritaraṃ pajānātī”ti evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbaññutaññāṇadhammā gambhīrā duddasā…pe…
atk-s0101a0:540_10: na sotāpannādīsu aññataro vaṇṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ vattuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0101a0:540_11: atha kho tathāgatova yathābhūtaṃ vaṇṇaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyāti evaṃ pucchamānenāpi sabbaññutaññāṇameva puṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:544_7: Yebhuyyenāti ye uparibrahmalokesu vā arūpesu vā nibbattanti,
atk-s0101a0:544_14: subhaṭṭhāyino subhā vā manorammavatthābharaṇā hutvā tiṭṭhantīti subhaṭṭhāyino.
atk-s0101a0:545_2: Suññaṃ brahmavimānanti pakatiyā nibbattasattānaṃ natthitāya suññaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:545_4: Tassa kattā vā kāretā vā natthi,
atk-s0101a0:545_5: visuddhimagge vuttanayena pana kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānā ratanabhūmi nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:545_7: Atha sattānaṃ pakatiyā vasitaṭṭhāne nikanti uppajjati,
atk-s0101a0:545_10: Āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vāti ye uḷāraṃ puññakammaṃ katvā yattha katthaci appāyuke devaloke nibbattanti,
atk-s0101a0:545_11: te attano puññabalena ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0101a0:545_12: tassa pana devalokassa āyuppamāṇeneva cavantīti āyukkhayā cavantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0101a0:545_13: Ye pana parittaṃ puññakammaṃ katvā dīghāyukadevaloke nibbattanti,
atk-s0101a0:545_16: Dīghamaddhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti kappaṃ vā upaḍḍhakappaṃ vā.
atk-s0101a0:546_9: Tattha “jātiṃ paṭicca bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso cetaso utrāso. Jaraṃ… byādhiṃ…
atk-s0101a0:546_12: “Aho vata aññepi sattā itthattaṃ āgaccheyyu”nti ayaṃ taṇhātassanā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:546_14: “Tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjantī”ti ayaṃ ñāṇatassanā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:546_16: Brahmavimānanti idha pana paṭhamābhinibbattassa atthitāya suññanti na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:547_7: Issaro kattā nimmātāti ahaṃ loke issaro,
atk-s0101a0:547_8: ahaṃ lokassa kattā ca nimmātā ca, pathavī –
atk-s0101a0:547_13: Seṭṭho sajitāti ahaṃ lokassa uttamo ca sajitā ca,
atk-s0101a0:547_18: goṇo hohī”ti “evaṃ sattānaṃ saṃvisajetā aha”nti maññati.
atk-s0101a0:547_19: Vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānanti ahamasmi ciṇṇavasitāya vasī,
atk-s0101a0:547_21: Tattha aṇḍajajalābujā sattā antoaṇḍakose ceva antovatthimhi ca bhabyā nāma,
atk-s0101a0:547_27: Te sabbepi mayhaṃ puttāti saññāya “ahaṃ pitā bhūtabhabyāna”nti maññati.
atk-s0101a0:548_1: “mayā ime sattā nimmitā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā “taṃ kissa hetū”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:548_4: Iminā mayanti attano kammavasena cutāpi upapannāpi ca kevalaṃ maññanāmatteneva “iminā mayaṃ nimmitā”ti
atk-s0101a0:548_5: maññamānā vaṅkacchidde vaṅkaāṇī viya onamitvā tasseva pādamūlaṃ gacchantīti.
atk-s0101a0:550_1: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetanti kāraṇaṃ kho panetaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:550_2: So tato cavitvā aññatra na gacchati,
atk-s0101a0:550_7: Pabbajjā hi yasmā agārassa hi taṃ kasigorakkhādikammaṃ tattha natthi,
atk-s0101a0:550_10: Tato paraṃ nānussaratīti tato pubbenivāsā paraṃ na sarati,
atk-s0101a0:550_11: sarituṃ asakkonto tattha ṭhatvā diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0101a0:551_0: Niccotiādīsu tassa upapattiṃ apassanto niccoti vadati,
atk-s0101a0:552_6: Hassakhiḍḍāratidhammasamāpannāti hassarati dhammañceva khiḍḍāratidhammañca samāpannā anuyuttā,
atk-s0101a0:553_1: Te kira puññavisesādhigatena mahantena attano sirivibhavena nakkhattaṃ kīḷantā tāya sampattimahantatāya –
atk-s0101a0:553_4: Atha ekāhārātikkamanato paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva,
atk-s0101a0:553_10: Tesaṃ tejassa mandatāya karajakāyassa balavatāya sattāhampi atikkamitvā uṇhodakaacchayāguādīhi sakkā vatthuṃ upatthambhetuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:553_13: Te ekaṃ āhāravelaṃ atikkamitvāva saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0101a0:553_14: Yathā nāma gimhānaṃ majjhanhike tattapāsāṇe ṭhapitaṃ padumaṃ vā uppalaṃ vā sāyanhasamaye ghaṭasatenāpi siñciyamānaṃ pākatikaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0101a0:553_16: Evameva pacchā nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva,
atk-s0101a0:553_18: Tenāha “satiyā sammosā te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:553_22: karajaṃ manda”nti avisesena vuttattā pana ye keci kabaḷīkārāhārūpajīvino devā evaṃ karonti,
atk-s0101a0:554_4: nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmīti saparivāro rathena vīthiṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0101a0:554_5: athañño nikkhamanto taṃ purato gacchantaṃ disvā –
atk-s0101a0:554_8: “pītiyā uddhumāto viya bhijjamāno viya ca gacchatī”ti kujjhati.
atk-s0101a0:554_9: Purato gacchantopi nivattitvā taṃ kuddhaṃ disvā –
atk-s0101a0:554_10: kuddhā nāma suviditā hontīti kuddhabhāvamassa ñatvā –
atk-s0101a0:554_13: ayaṃ sampatti mayā dānasīlādīnaṃ vasena laddhā,
atk-s0101a0:554_16: ubhosu pana kuddhesu ekassa kodho itarassa paccayo hoti.
atk-s0101a0:554_17: Tassapi kodho itarassa paccayo hotīti ubho kandantānaṃyeva orodhānaṃ cavanti.
atk-s0101a0:555_2: cittaṃ pana yasmā purimaṃ purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa paccayaṃ datvāva nirujjhati,
atk-s0101a0:555_3: tasmā cakkhādīnaṃ bhedato balavatarampi cittassa bhedaṃ na passati.
atk-s0101a0:555_4: So taṃ apassanto yathā nāma sakuṇo ekaṃ rukkhaṃ jahitvā aññasmiṃ nilīyati,
atk-s0101a0:555_5: evameva imasmiṃ attabhāve bhinne cittaṃ aññatra gacchatīti gahetvā evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:557_2: antaṃ vā anantaṃ vā antānantaṃ vā nevantānānantaṃ vā ārabbha pavattavādāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:558_1: Antasaññī lokasmiṃ viharatīti paṭibhāganimittaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ avaḍḍhetvā taṃ –
atk-s0101a0:558_3: cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā vaḍḍhitakasiṇo pana anantasaññī hoti,
atk-s0101a0:558_4: uddhamadho avaḍḍhetvā pana tiriyaṃ vaḍḍhetvā uddhamadho antasaññī,
atk-s0101a0:558_7: Ime cattāropi attanā diṭṭhapubbānusāreneva diṭṭhiyā gahitattā pubbantakappikesu paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0101a0:560_2: Evantipi me notiādinā nayena pariyantarahitā diṭṭhigatikassa diṭṭhi ceva vācā ca.
atk-s0101a0:560_4: amarāya diṭṭhiyā vācāya ca vikkhepoti amarāvikkhepo,
atk-s0101a0:560_8: sā ummujjananimujjanādivasena udake sandhāvamānā gahetuṃ na sakkāti,
atk-s0101a0:560_9: evameva ayampi vādo itocito ca sandhāvati,
atk-s0101a0:561_1: “Idaṃ kusala”nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti dasa kusalakammapathe yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:561_3: So mamassa vighātoti “musā mayā bhaṇita”nti vippaṭisāruppattiyā mama vighāto assa,
atk-s0101a0:561_5: So mamassa antarāyoti so mama saggassa ceva maggassa ca antarāyo assa.
atk-s0101a0:561_6: Musāvādabhayā musāvādaparijegucchāti musāvāde ottappena ceva hiriyā ca.
atk-s0101a0:561_7: Vācāvikkhepaṃ āpajjatīti vācāya vikkhepaṃ āpajjati. Kīdisaṃ?
atk-s0101a0:562_0: Evantipi me notiādīsu evantipi me noti aniyamitavikkhepo.
atk-s0101a0:562_1: Tathātipi me noti “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti vuttaṃ sassatavādaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0101a0:562_2: Aññathātipi me noti sassatato aññathā vuttaṃ ekaccasassataṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0101a0:562_4: “na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vuttaṃ ucchedaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0101a0:562_5: No notipi me noti “neva hoti na na hotī”ti vuttaṃ takkīvādaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0101a0:562_6: Sayaṃ pana “idaṃ kusala”nti vā “akusala”nti vā puṭṭho na kiñci byākaroti.
atk-s0101a0:562_8: Tato “kiṃ akusala”nti vutte “tathātipi me no”ti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:562_9: “Kiṃ ubhayato aññathā”ti vutte “aññathātipi me no”ti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:562_11: kiṃ te laddhī”ti vutte “notipi me no”ti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:562_12: Tato “kiṃ no noti te laddhī”ti vutte “no notipi me no”ti evaṃ vikkhepameva āpajjati,
atk-s0101a0:563_1: Chando vā rāgo vāti ajānantopi sahasā kusalameva “kusala”nti vatvā akusalameva “akusala”nti vatvā mayā asukassa nāma evaṃ byākataṃ,
atk-s0101a0:563_2: kiṃ taṃ subyākatanti aññe paṇḍite pucchitvā tehi –
atk-s0101a0:563_6: akusalameva akusalanti byākata”nti vutte natthi mayā sadiso paṇḍitoti evaṃ me tattha chando vā rāgo vā assāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:563_9: Doso vā paṭigho vāti kusalaṃ pana “akusala”nti,
atk-s0101a0:563_10: akusalaṃ vā “kusala”nti vatvā aññe paṇḍite pucchitvā tehi –
atk-s0101a0:563_11: “dubyākataṃ tayā”ti vutte ettakampi nāma na jānāmīti tattha me assa doso vā paṭigho vāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:564_1: so mamassa vighātoti taṃ chandarāgadvayaṃ mama upādānaṃ assa,
atk-s0101a0:564_5: Rāgo hi amuñcitukāmatāya ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhāti jalūkā viya.
atk-s0101a0:564_7: Ubhopi cete santāpakaṭṭhena vihananti yevāti “upādāna”nti ca “vighāto”ti ca vuttā.
atk-s0101a0:565_3: Kataparappavādāti viññātaparappavādā ceva parehi saddhiṃ katavādaparicayā ca.
atk-s0101a0:565_5: Te bhindantā maññeti vālavedhi viya vālaṃ sukhumānipi paresaṃ diṭṭhigatāni attano paññāgatena bhindantā viya carantīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:565_6: Te maṃ tatthāti te samaṇabrāhmaṇā maṃ tesu kusalākusalesu.
atk-s0101a0:565_8: kiṃ akusalanti attano laddhiṃ vadā”ti laddhiṃ puccheyyuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:565_9: Samanugāheyyunti “idaṃ nāmā”ti vutte “kena kāraṇena etamatthaṃ gāheyyu”nti kāraṇaṃ puccheyyuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:565_10: Samanubhāseyyunti “iminā nāma kāraṇenā”ti vutte kāraṇe dosaṃ dassetvā “na tvaṃ idaṃ jānāsi,
atk-s0101a0:565_15: So mamassa vighātoti yaṃ taṃ punappunaṃ vatvāpi asampāyanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0101a0:566_5: Imepi cattāro pubbe pavattadhammānusāreneva diṭṭhiyā gahitattā pubbantakappikesu paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0101a0:568_1: “Adhiccasamuppanno attā ca loko cā”ti dassanaṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:569_4: ekacco hi titthāyatane pabbajitvā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya –
atk-s0101a0:569_6: citte sati hatthacchedādidukkhañceva sabbabhayāni ca honti,
atk-s0101a0:569_9: evaṃ citte dosaṃ passitvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā asaññasattesu nibbattati,
atk-s0101a0:569_12: Te tattha yathā nāma jiyāvegakkhitto saro yattako jiyāvego,
atk-s0101a0:569_16: jhānavege pana parihīne tattha rūpakkhandho antaradhāyati,
atk-s0101a0:569_18: Yasmā pana tāya idha uppannasaññāya tesaṃ tattha cuti paññāyati,
atk-s0101a0:569_19: tasmā “saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:571_1: Evaṃ aṭṭhārasa pubbantakappike dassetvā idāni catucattārīsaṃ aparantakappike dassetuṃ – “santi,
atk-s0101a0:571_3: Tattha anāgatakoṭṭhāsasaṅkhātaṃ aparantaṃ kappetvā gaṇhantīti aparantakappikā,
atk-s0101a0:574_1: Rūpī attātiādīsu kasiṇarūpaṃ “attā”ti tattha pavattasaññañcassa “saññā”ti gahetvā vā ājīvakādayo viya takkamatteneva vā “rūpī attā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:574_2: arogo paraṃ maraṇā saññī”ti naṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0101a0:574_4: Arūpasamāpattinimittaṃ pana “attā”ti samāpattisaññañcassa “saññā”ti gahetvā vā nigaṇṭhādayo viya takkamatteneva vā “arūpī attā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:574_5: arogo paraṃ maraṇā saññī”ti naṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0101a0:574_13: Catutthacatukke pana dibbena cakkhunā tikacatukkajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbattamānaṃ disvā “ekantasukhī”ti gaṇhāti.
atk-s0101a0:576_1: Asaññīvādo saññīvāde ādimhi vuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:576_3: Kevalañhi tattha “saññī attā”ti gaṇhantānaṃ tā diṭṭhiyo,
atk-s0101a0:578_8: Lābhī arahato dibbena cakkhunā cutiṃ disvā upapattiṃ apassanto,
atk-s0101a0:578_12: Alābhī ca “ko paralokaṃ na jānātī”ti kāmasukhagiddhatāya vā.
atk-s0101a0:578_13: “Yathā rukkhato paṇṇāni patitāni na puna viruhanti,
atk-s0101a0:578_14: evameva sattā”tiādinā takkena vā ucchedaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0101a0:578_15: Idha pana taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena tathā ca aññathā ca vikappetvāva imā satta diṭṭhiyo uppannāti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:582_1: Sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamātiādīnaṃ attho visuddhimagge vutto.
atk-s0101a0:585_1: Pañcahi kāmaguṇehīti manāpiyarūpādīhi pañcahi kāmakoṭṭhāsehi bandhanehi vā.
atk-s0101a0:585_4: Paricāretīti tesu kāmaguṇesu yathāsukhaṃ indriyāni cāreti sañcāreti itocito ca upaneti.
atk-s0101a0:585_10: Evarūpe kāme upagatānañhi te diṭṭhadhammanibbānasampattiṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0101a0:586_1: Dutiyavāre hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā,
atk-s0101a0:586_3: Tesaṃ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvāti tesaṃ kāmānaṃ vipariṇāmasaṅkhātā aññathābhāvā,
atk-s0101a0:586_5: tampi me natthīti vuttanayena uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā.
atk-s0101a0:587_3: Etenetanti etena vitakkitena ca vicāritena ca etaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ oḷārikaṃ sakaṇḍakaṃ viya khāyati.
atk-s0101a0:588_3: Cetaso ābhogoti jhānā vuṭṭhāya tasmiṃ sukhe punappunaṃ cittassa ābhogo manasikāro samannāhāroti.
atk-s0101a0:590_2: bhikkhave”ti iminā vārena sabbepi te aparantakappike ekajjhaṃ niyyātetvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ vissajjeti. Puna – “imehi,
atk-s0101a0:590_3: kho te bhikkhave”tiādinā vārena sabbepi te pubbantāparantakappike ekajjhaṃ niyyātetvā tadeva ñāṇaṃ vissajjeti.
atk-s0101a0:590_6: dhammā”tiādimhi pucchamānopi sabbaññutaññāṇameva pucchitvā vissajjamānopi sattānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ tulāya
atk-s0101a0:590_7: tulayanto viya sinerupādato vālukaṃ uddharanto viya dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni uddharitvā sabbaññutaññāṇameva
atk-s0101a0:591_4: Tattha “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0101a0:591_13: ko antopūtibhāvo”ti evaṃ pucchantānaṃ bhagavatā vissajjitasuttavasena pucchānusandhi veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:592_0: Atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi –
atk-s0101a0:592_1: “iti kira bho rūpaṃ anattā…, vedanā…, saññā…,
atk-s0101a0:592_5: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā ceto parivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0101a0:592_8: yaṃ idhekacco moghapuriso avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena cetasā satthusāsanaṃ atidhāvitabbaṃ maññeyya –
atk-s0101a0:592_14: Evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā bhagavatā vuttasuttavasena ajjhāsayānusandhi veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:593_0: Yena pana dhammena ādimhi desanā uṭṭhitā,
atk-s0101a0:593_1: tassa dhammassa anurūpadhammavasena vā paṭipakkhavasena vā yesu suttesu upari desanā āgacchati,
atk-s0101a0:593_12: Imasmimpi brahmajāle heṭṭhā diṭṭhivasena desanā uṭṭhitā,
atk-s0101a0:595_3: Tadapi tesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ajānataṃ apassataṃ vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ paritassitavipphanditamevāti
atk-s0101a0:595_4: yena diṭṭhiassādena diṭṭhisukhena diṭṭhivedayitena te somanassajātā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti
atk-s0101a0:595_6: tadapi tesaṃ bhavantānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ ajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ vedayitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:595_9: Diṭṭhisaṅkhātena ceva taṇhāsaṅkhātena ca paritassitena vipphanditameva calitameva kampitameva thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇusadisaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:597_2: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sassatavādā”tiādi paramparapaccayadassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:597_3: Tattha tadapi phassapaccayāti yena diṭṭhiassādena diṭṭhisukhena diṭṭhivedayitena te somanassajātā sassataṃ
atk-s0101a0:598_1: Idāni tassa paccayassa diṭṭhivedayite balavabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna – “tatra,
atk-s0101a0:598_4: Tattha te vata aññatra phassāti te vata samaṇabrāhmaṇā taṃ vedayitaṃ vinā phassena paṭisaṃvedissantīti kāraṇametaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0101a0:598_5: Yathā hi patato gehassa upatthambhanatthāya thūṇā nāma balavapaccayo hoti,
atk-s0101a0:598_6: na taṃ thūṇāya anupatthambhitaṃ ṭhātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0101a0:598_8: taṃ vinā idaṃ diṭṭhivedayitaṃ natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:600_2: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sassatavādā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti catūhi vatthūhi,
atk-s0101a0:600_3: yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekaccasassatikātiādinā nayena sabbadiṭṭhivedayitāni sampiṇḍeti. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:600_5: Sabbe te chahi phassāyatanehi phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentīti.
atk-s0101a0:600_14: paṇṇattimattatthesu hi ayaṃ āyatanasaddo pavattati. Tattha –
atk-s0101a0:600_23: Cakkhādīsu hi phassapañcamakā dhammā sañjāyanti samosaranti,
atk-s0101a0:600_25: Idha pana “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:600_26: tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti iminā nayena phassasīseneva desanaṃ āropetvā phassaṃ ādiṃ katvā paccayaparamparaṃ dassetuṃ phassāyatanādīni vuttāni.
atk-s0101a0:601_0: Phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentīti phusitvā phusitvā paṭisaṃvedenti.
atk-s0101a0:601_1: Ettha ca kiñcāpi āyatanānaṃ phusanakiccaṃ viya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:601_6: tasmā sabbe te cha phassāyatanasambhavena phassena rūpādīni ārammaṇāni phusitvā taṃ diṭṭhivedanaṃ paṭisaṃvedayantīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:602_0: Tesaṃ vedanāpaccayā taṇhātiādīsu vedanāti cha phassāyatanasambhavā vedanā.
atk-s0101a0:602_1: Sā rūpataṇhādibhedāya taṇhāya upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo hoti.
atk-s0101a0:602_4: Sā pana catubbidhassa upādānassa upanissayakoṭiyā ceva sahajātakoṭiyā ca paccayo hoti.
atk-s0101a0:603_1: jāti jarāmaraṇassa ceva sokādīnañca upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo hoti.
atk-s0101a0:603_11: atha ca pana paññāyati “idappaccayā avijjā”ti evaṃ avijjāsīsena vā, purimā,
atk-s0101a0:603_18: Idha pana diṭṭhisīsena kathento vedanārāgena uppajjamānā diṭṭhiyo kathetvā vedanāmūlakaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0101a0:603_21: idaṃ dassanaṃ gahetvā tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu
atk-s0101a0:603_22: ito ettha etto idhāti sandhāvantā saṃsarantā yante yuttagoṇo viya,
atk-s0101a0:603_24: vātena vippannaṭṭhanāvā viya ca vaṭṭadukkhameva anuparivattanti,
atk-s0101a0:605_1: Evaṃ diṭṭhigatikādhiṭṭhānaṃ vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā idāni yuttayogabhikkhuadhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā vivaṭṭaṃ dassento –
atk-s0101a0:605_6: Channaṃ phassāyatanānanti yehi chahi phassāyatanehi phusitvā paṭisaṃvedayamānānaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vattati,
atk-s0101a0:605_8: Samudayantiādīsu avijjāsamudayā cakkhusamudayotiādinā vedanākammaṭṭhāne vuttanayena phassāyatanānaṃ samudayādayo veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:605_9: Yathā pana tattha “phassasamudayā phassanirodhā”ti vuttaṃ, evamidha,
atk-s0101a0:606_1: Ayaṃ pana diṭṭhiñca diṭṭhito ca uttaritaraṃ sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttinti yāva arahattā jānāti.
atk-s0101a0:607_1: Evaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ kathetvā idāni “desanājālavimutto diṭṭhigatiko nāma natthī”ti dassanatthaṃ puna –
atk-s0101a0:607_4: Tattha antojālīkatāti imassa mayhaṃ desanājālassa antoyeva katā.
atk-s0101a0:607_5: Ettha sitā vāti etasmiṃ mama desanājāle sitā nissitā avasitāva.
atk-s0101a0:607_7: Te adho osīdantāpi uddhaṃ uggacchantāpi mama desanājāle sitāva hutvā osīdanti ca uggacchanti ca.
atk-s0101a0:607_8: Ettha pariyāpannāti ettha mayhaṃ desanājāle pariyāpannā,
atk-s0101a0:607_9: etena ābaddhā antojālīkatā ca hutvā ummujjamānā ummujjanti,
atk-s0101a0:607_10: na hettha asaṅgahito diṭṭhigatiko nāma atthīti.
atk-s0101a0:608_5: Tassa tīre ṭhatvā olokentassa oḷārikānaṃ pāṇānaṃ antojālīkatabhāvadassanaṃ viya bhagavato sabbadiṭṭhigatānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:609_1: Evaṃ imāhi dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīhi sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ saṅgahitattā sabbesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ etasmiṃ desanājāle
atk-s0101a0:609_2: pariyāpannabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni attano katthaci apariyāpannabhāvaṃ dassento –
atk-s0101a0:609_9: Idha pana nettisadisatāya bhavataṇhā nettīti adhippetā.
atk-s0101a0:609_10: Sā hi mahājanaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ neti upanetīti bhavanetti.
atk-s0101a0:610_0: Kāyassa bhedā uddhanti kāyassa bhedato uddhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:610_4: Devā vā manussā vā na dakkhissanti,
atk-s0101a0:611_4: rukkhe jātamahāvaṇṭo viya taṃ nissāya pubbe pavattataṇhā.
atk-s0101a0:611_5: Tasmiṃ vaṇṭe upanibaddhā pañcapakkadvādasapakkaaṭṭhārasapakkaparimāṇā ambapiṇḍī viya taṇhāya sati taṇhūpanibandhanā
atk-s0101a0:611_6: hutvā āyatiṃ nibbattanakā pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo.
atk-s0101a0:611_7: Yathā pana tasmiṃ vaṇṭe chinne sabbāni tāni ambāni tadanvayāni honti,
atk-s0101a0:611_10: evameva ye bhavanettivaṇṭassa anupacchinnattā āyatiṃ uppajjeyyuṃ pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasadhātuyo,
atk-s0101a0:611_11: sabbe te dhammā tadanvayā honti bhavanettiṃ anugatā,
atk-s0101a0:612_0: Yathā pana tasmimpi rukkhe maṇḍūkakaṇṭakavisasamphassaṃ āgamma anupubbena sussitvā mate –
atk-s0101a0:612_1: “imasmiṃ ṭhāne evarūpo nāma rukkho ahosī”ti vohāramattameva hoti,
atk-s0101a0:612_3: evaṃ ariyamaggasamphassaṃ āgamma taṇhāsinehassa pariyādinnattā anupubbena sussitvā viya bhinne imasmiṃ kāye,
atk-s0101a0:612_4: kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā na taṃ dakkhanti,
atk-s0101a0:612_6: evarūpassa nāma kira satthuno idaṃ sāsananti vohāramattameva bhavissatīti anupādisesanibbānadhātuṃ pāpetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0101a0:613_1: Evaṃ vutte āyasmā ānandoti evaṃ bhagavatā imasmiṃ sutte vutte thero ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ suttaṃ samannāharitvā
atk-s0101a0:613_2: evaṃ buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā kathitasuttassa na bhagavatā nāmaṃ gahitaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:613_3: handassa nāmaṃ gaṇhāpessāmīti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0101a0:614_1: yasmā imasmiṃ dhammapariyāye idhatthopi paratthopi vibhatto,
atk-s0101a0:614_2: tasmātiha tvaṃ imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ “atthajāla”ntipi naṃ dhārehi;
atk-s0101a0:614_5: yasmā ca ettha seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ vibhattaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:614_9: yasmā pana imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ sutvā devaputtamārampi khandhamārampi maccumārampi kilesamārampi sakkā maddituṃ,
atk-s0101a0:615_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ nidānāvasānato pabhuti yāva “anuttaro saṅgāmavijayotipi naṃ dhārehī”ti sakalaṃ
atk-s0101a0:615_1: suttantaṃ bhagavā paresaṃ paññāya alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhaṃ paramagambhīraṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pakāsento sūriyo
atk-s0101a0:616_1: Attamanā te bhikkhūti te bhikkhū attamanā sakamanā,
atk-s0101a0:616_2: buddhagatāya pītiyā udaggacittā hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:616_3: Bhagavato bhāsitanti evaṃ vicitranayadesanāvilāsayuttaṃ idaṃ suttaṃ karavīkarutamañjunā kaṇṇasukhena
atk-s0101a0:616_4: paṇḍitajanahadayānaṃ amatābhisekasadisena brahmassarena bhāsamānassa bhagavato vacanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:623_3: Tasmā dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatesu viniveṭhetvā desiyamānesu tassa tassa diṭṭhigatassa pariyosāne pariyosāneti dvāsaṭṭhiyā ṭhānesu akampitthāti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:624_11: hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā”ti evaṃ mahāparinibbāne āgatāya tantiyā vaṇṇanākāle vakkhāma.
atk-s0101a0:624_12: Ayaṃ pana mahāpathavī aparesupi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu akampittha –
atk-s0101a0:624_22: Paṃsukūlaggahaṇe dvisahassadīpaparivāre cattāro mahādīpe pahāya pabbajitvā susānaṃ gantvā paṃsukūlaṃ
atk-s0101a0:624_23: gaṇhantena dukkaraṃ bhagavatā katanti acchariyavegābhihatā akampittha.
atk-s0101a0:624_27: Imasmiṃ pana brahmajāle dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatesu vijaṭetvā niggumbaṃ katvā desiyamānesu sādhukāradānavasena akampitthāti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:625_0: Na kevalañca etesu ṭhānesuyeva pathavī akampittha,
atk-s0101a0:625_1: atha kho tīsu saṅgahesupi mahāmahindattherassa imaṃ dīpaṃ āgantvā jotivane nisīditvā dhammaṃ desitadivasepi akampittha.
atk-s0101a0:625_2: Kalyāṇiyavihāre ca piṇḍapātiyattherassa cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā tattheva nisīditvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ
atk-s0101a0:625_3: gahetvā imaṃ suttantaṃ āraddhassa suttapariyosāne udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampittha.
atk-s0101a0:625_6: tesaṃ sajjhāyapariyosānepi udakapariyantameva katvā pathavī akampitthāti.
atk-s0101a0:632_6: Aññepi ettha pakāre vaṇṇayanti, kiṃ tehi?
atk-s0101a0:632_8: Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:632_13: Tena ṭhitopi gacchantopi nisinnopi sayānopi bhagavā viharati ceva veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:632_14: So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati pavatteti,
atk-s0101a0:633_0: Jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavaneti idamassa yaṃ gocaragāmaṃ upanissāya viharati,
atk-s0101a0:633_2: rājagahe viharati jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavaneti rājagahasamīpe jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavane viharatīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:633_9: Jīvati bhaṇeti? Jīvati, devāti. Tena hi,
atk-s0101a0:633_10: bhaṇe taṃ dārakaṃ amhākaṃ antepuraṃ netvā dhātīnaṃ detha posetunti.
atk-s0101a0:633_12: Kumārena posāpitoti komārabhaccoti nāmaṃ akaṃsū”ti ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0101a0:634_0: Ayaṃ pana jīvako ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavato dosābhisannaṃ kāyaṃ virecetvā siveyyakaṃ dussayugaṃ datvā vatthānumodanāpariyosāne
atk-s0101a0:634_6: So tasmiṃ ambavane rattiṭṭhānadivāṭhānaleṇakuṭimaṇḍapādīni sampādetvā bhagavato anucchavikaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0101a0:634_7: kārāpetvā ambavanaṃ aṭṭhārasahatthubbedhena tambapaṭṭavaṇṇena pākārena parikkhipāpetvā buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:634_8: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sacīvarabhattena santappetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ pātetvā vihāraṃ niyyātesi.
atk-s0101a0:635_0: Aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehīti aḍḍhasatena ūnehi terasahi bhikkhusatehi.
atk-s0101a0:635_1: Rājātiādīsu rājati attano issariyasampattiyā catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi mahājanaṃ rañjeti vaḍḍhetīti rājā.
atk-s0101a0:635_3: Ajātoyeva rañño sattu bhavissatīti nemittakehi niddiṭṭhoti ajātasattu.
atk-s0101a0:636_0: Tasmiṃ kira kucchigate deviyā evarūpo dohaḷo uppajji –
atk-s0101a0:636_3: na sakkā kassaci ārocetu”nti taṃ kathetuṃ asakkontī kisā dubbaṇṇā ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:636_9: tvaṃ attano ajjhāsayaṃ mayhaṃ akathentī kassa kathessasī”ti tathā tathā nibandhitvā kathāpesi.
atk-s0101a0:636_11: kiṃ ettha tuyhaṃ bhāriyasaññā ahosī”ti vejjaṃ pakkosāpetvā suvaṇṇasatthakena bāhuṃ phālāpetvā suvaṇṇasarakena
atk-s0101a0:636_17: “mayhaṃ kira kucchito nikkhanto rājānaṃ māressatī”ti gabbhaṃ pātetukāmā uyyānaṃ gantvā kucchiṃ maddāpesi,
atk-s0101a0:636_20: Rājā kimatthaṃ ayaṃ abhiṇhaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchatīti parivīmaṃsanto taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā – “bhadde,
atk-s0101a0:636_21: tava kucchiyaṃ puttoti vā dhītāti vā na paññāyati,
atk-s0101a0:636_22: attano nibbattadārakaṃ evamakāsīti mahā aguṇarāsipi no jambudīpatale āvibhavissati,
atk-s0101a0:636_23: mā tvaṃ evaṃ karohī”ti nivāretvā ārakkhaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0101a0:636_26: Athāparena samayena vuḍḍhippattaṃ kumāraṃ deviyā dassesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:637_4: So “na sakkā vinā lābhena parisaṃ uppādetuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:637_5: handāhaṃ lābhaṃ nibbattemī”ti cintetvā khandhake āgatanayena ajātasattuṃ kumāraṃ iddhipāṭihāriyena pasādetvā
atk-s0101a0:637_6: sāyaṃ pātaṃ pañcahi rathasatehi upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchantaṃ ativissatthaṃ ñatvā ekadivasaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca –
atk-s0101a0:637_12: ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ hantvā buddho bhavissāmī”ti kumāraṃ pituvadhe uyyojeti.
atk-s0101a0:638_2: etassa aviditaṃ nāma natthī”ti ūruyā potthaniyaṃ bandhitvā divā divassa bhīto ubbiggo ussaṅkī utrasto
atk-s0101a0:638_7: sabbe ca bhikkhū hantabbā”ti sammantayitvā rañño āṇāvasena karissāmāti rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:639_3: te uccesu ṭhānesu ṭhapetvā kumāraṃ pucchi –
atk-s0101a0:640_0: So mayhaṃ manoratho nipphannoti devadattassa ārocesi.
atk-s0101a0:640_2: “tvaṃ siṅgālaṃ antokatvā bheripariyonaddhapuriso viya sukiccakārimhīti maññasi,
atk-s0101a0:640_3: katipāheneva te pitā tayā kataṃ avamānaṃ cintetvā sayameva rājā bhavissatī”ti. Atha, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:640_10: “Mama mātaraṃ ṭhapetvā aññassa daṭṭhuṃ mā dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:640_11: Devī suvaṇṇasarake bhattaṃ pakkhipitvā ucchaṅgenādāya pavisati.
atk-s0101a0:640_13: “mayhaṃ pitā kathaṃ yāpetī”ti pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā –
atk-s0101a0:640_14: “mayhaṃ mātu ucchaṅgaṃ katvā pavisituṃ mā dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:640_15: Tato paṭṭhāya devī moḷiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pavisati.
atk-s0101a0:640_16: Tampi sutvā “moḷiṃ bandhitvā pavisituṃ mā dethā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:640_17: Tato suvaṇṇapādukāsu bhattaṃ ṭhapetvā pidahitvā pādukā āruyha pavisati.
atk-s0101a0:640_19: Puna “kathaṃ yāpetī”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “pādukā āruyha pavisitumpi mā dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:640_20: Tato paṭṭhāya devī gandhodakena nhāyitvā sarīraṃ catumadhurena makkhetvā pārupitvā pavisati.
atk-s0101a0:640_22: Puna pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “ito paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ mātu pavesanaṃ nivārethā”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:640_28: nāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya tumhe passituṃ labhāmi,
atk-s0101a0:641_2: Ativiya assa attabhāvo virocati. So – “kathaṃ, me bhaṇe,
atk-s0101a0:641_4: ativiya cassa attabhāvo virocatī”ti sutvā ‘caṅkamaṃ dānissa hāressāmī’ti cintetvā –
atk-s0101a0:641_5: “mayhaṃ pitu pāde khurena phāletvā loṇatelena makkhetvā khadiraṅgārehi vītaccitehi pacathā”ti nhāpite pesesi.
atk-s0101a0:641_10: ‘Kasmā āgatatthā’ti ca puṭṭhā taṃ sāsanaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:641_15: nayidaṃ tumhādisānaṃ dhammarājūnaṃ anucchavika”nti vatvā vāmahatthena gopphake gahetvā dakkhiṇahatthena
atk-s0101a0:641_16: khuraṃ gahetvā pādatalāni phāletvā loṇatelena makkhetvā khadiraṅgārehi vītaccitehi paciṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:641_17: Rājā kira pubbe cetiyaṅgaṇe saupāhano agamāsi,
atk-s0101a0:641_23: aho saṅgho”ti anussarantoyeva cetiyaṅgaṇe khittamālā viya milāyitvā cātumahārājikadevaloke vessavaṇassa
atk-s0101a0:641_24: paricārako janavasabho nāma yakkho hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0101a0:642_1: puttassa jātabhāvañca pitumatabhāvañca nivedetuṃ dve lekhā ekakkhaṇeyeva āgatā. Amaccā –
atk-s0101a0:642_2: “paṭhamaṃ puttassa jātabhāvaṃ ārocessāmā”ti taṃ lekhaṃ rañño hatthe ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:642_3: Rañño taṅkhaṇeyeva puttasineho uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ khobhetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0101a0:642_5: “mayi jātepi mayhaṃ pitu evameva sineho uppanno”ti. So –
atk-s0101a0:643_0: So taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rodamāno mātusamīpaṃ gantvā –
atk-s0101a0:643_2: mayhaṃ pitu mayi jāte sineho”ti? Sā āha –
atk-s0101a0:643_6: Atha taṃ rodamānaṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontā taṃ gahetvā vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisinnassa tava pitu santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:643_9: Atha kho pitā tava sinehena taṃ lohitamissakaṃ pubbaṃ aniṭṭhubhitvāva ajjhohari.
atk-s0101a0:643_11: So roditvā paridevitvā pitu sarīrakiccaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0101a0:644_1: ye samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropessantī”ti vatvā tena dinne purise pesetvā sayaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ āruyha yantena
atk-s0101a0:644_2: silaṃ pavijjhitvā nāḷāgirihatthiṃ muñcāpetvāpi kenaci upāyena bhagavantaṃ māretuṃ asakkonto parihīnalābhasakkāro
atk-s0101a0:644_3: pañca vatthūni yācitvā tāni alabhamāno tehi janaṃ saññāpessāmīti saṅghabhedaṃ katvā sāriputtamoggallānesu
atk-s0101a0:644_4: parisaṃ ādāya pakkantesu uṇhalohitaṃ mukhena chaḍḍetvā navamāse gilānamañce nipajjitvā vippaṭisārajāto –
atk-s0101a0:644_5: “kuhiṃ etarahi satthā vasatī”ti pucchitvā “jetavane”ti vutte mañcakena maṃ āharitvā satthāraṃ dassethāti
atk-s0101a0:644_6: vatvā āhariyamāno bhagavato dassanārahassa kammassa akatattā jetavane pokkharaṇīsamīpeyeva dvedhā bhinnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:644_11: Evaṃ ajātoyeva rañño sattu bhavissatīti nemittakehi niddiṭṭhoti ajātasattu.
atk-s0101a0:646_3: upavasantīti sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:646_15: So panesa aṭṭhamī cātuddasī pannarasībhedena tividho.
atk-s0101a0:647_4: sā hi catunnaṃ māsānaṃ pariyosānabhūtāti cātumāsī.
atk-s0101a0:647_6: Māsapuṇṇatāya utupuṇṇatāya saṃvaccharapuṇṇatāya puṇṇā sampuṇṇāti puṇṇā.
atk-s0101a0:647_9: Evaṃ puṇṇāya puṇṇamāyāti imasmiṃ padadvaye ca attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:648_0: Rājāmaccaparivutoti evarūpāya rajataghaṭaviniggatāhi khīradhārāhi dhoviyamānadisābhāgāya viya,
atk-s0101a0:648_8: “niddaṃ okkamissāmī”ti nimīlitamattesuyeva akkhīsu sattisataabbhāhato viya kandamānoyeva pabujjhi.
atk-s0101a0:648_13: Api ca tasmiṃ divase nakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:649_1: yathā hi yaṃ telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0101a0:649_4: Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0101a0:649_7: evameva yaṃ pītivacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0101a0:650_0: Dosināti dosāpagatā, abbhā, mahikā, dhūmo, rajo,
atk-s0101a0:650_1: rāhūti imehi pañcahi upakkilesehi virahitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:650_3: Sā hi mahājanassa manaṃ ramayatīti ramaṇīyā.
atk-s0101a0:650_4: Vuttadosavimuttāya candappabhāya obhāsitattā ativiya surūpāti abhirūpā.
atk-s0101a0:651_0: Kaṃ nu khvajjāti kaṃ nu kho ajja.
atk-s0101a0:651_1: Samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vāti samitapāpatāya samaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:651_4: yaṃ amhākaṃ pañhapucchanavasena payirupāsantānaṃ madhuraṃ dhammaṃ sutvā cittaṃ pasīdeyyāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:651_5: Iti rājā iminā sabbenapi vacanena obhāsanimittakammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0101a0:651_10: Kiṃ bhagavantaṃ sayaṃ dassanāya upagantuṃ na sakkotīti? Āma,
atk-s0101a0:652_0: Tena hi bhagavato upaṭṭhāko ariyasāvako attano pitā mārito,
atk-s0101a0:652_1: devadatto ca tameva nissāya bhagavato bahuṃ anatthamakāsi,
atk-s0101a0:652_3: tāya mahāparādhatāya sayaṃ gantuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0101a0:652_5: tassa piṭṭhichāyāya bhagavantaṃ passissāmīti obhāsanimittakammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0101a0:653_0: Tassañhi parisati channaṃ satthārānaṃ upaṭṭhākā bahū sannipatitā,
atk-s0101a0:653_2: Te mayi bhagavato guṇakathaṃ āraddhe antarantarā uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya attano satthārānaṃ guṇaṃ kathessanti,
atk-s0101a0:653_3: evaṃ me satthu guṇakathā pariyosānaṃ na gamissati.
atk-s0101a0:653_4: Rājā pana imesaṃ kulūpake upasaṅkamitvā gahitāsāratāya tesaṃ guṇakathāya anattamano hutvā maṃ paṭipucchissati,
atk-s0101a0:653_5: athāhaṃ nibbikkhepaṃ satthu guṇaṃ kathetvā rājānaṃ satthu santikaṃ gahetvā gamissāmīti jānantova vikkhepapacchedanatthaṃ tuṇhī ahosīti.
atk-s0101a0:654_2: addhā kiñci samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā dhammaṃ sotukāmo,
atk-s0101a0:654_5: yassa pana kulūpako samaṇo rājakulūpako hoti,
atk-s0101a0:655_2: “ahaṃ attano kulūpakasamaṇassa vaṇṇaṃ vatvā rājānaṃ gahetvā gamissāmi,
atk-s0101a0:655_3: ahaṃ gamissāmī”ti attano attano kulūpakānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathetuṃ āraddhā. Tenāha –
atk-s0101a0:655_7: So kira aññatarassa kulassa ekūnadāsasataṃ pūrayamāno jāto,
atk-s0101a0:655_13: so paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0101a0:655_14: Manussā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ samaṇo arahā appiccho,
atk-s0101a0:655_15: natthi iminā sadiso”ti pūvabhattādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamanti. So –
atk-s0101a0:655_16: “mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena idaṃ uppanna”nti tato paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi,
atk-s0101a0:655_18: tassa santike aññepi aññepīti pañcasatamanussā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:656_5: Appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsetī”ti evaṃ samuggato yaso assa atthīti yasassī.
atk-s0101a0:656_10: Pabbajitato paṭṭhāya atikkantā bahū rattiyo jānātīti rattaññū.
atk-s0101a0:656_12: acirapabbajitassa hi kathā okappanīyā na hoti,
atk-s0101a0:656_18: “daharassa kathā okappanīyā na hotī”ti etaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:657_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ madhurarasaṃ ambapakkaṃ khāditukāmo puriso āharitvā hatthe ṭhapitaṃ kājarapakkaṃ
atk-s0101a0:657_1: disvā viya jhānābhiññādiguṇayuttaṃ tilakkhaṇabbhāhataṃ madhuraṃ dhammakathaṃ sotukāmo pubbe pūraṇassa
atk-s0101a0:657_2: dassanenāpi anattamano idāni guṇakathāya suṭṭhutaraṃ anattamano hutvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:657_3: Anattamano samānopi pana “sacāhaṃ etaṃ tajjetvā gīvāyaṃ gahetvā nīharāpessāmi,
atk-s0101a0:657_5: taṃ taṃ rājā evaṃ karotī’ti bhīto aññopi koci kiñci na kathessatī”ti amanāpampi taṃ kathaṃ adhivāsetvā tuṇhī eva ahosi. Athañño –
atk-s0101a0:657_6: “ahaṃ attano kulūpakassa vaṇṇaṃ kathessāmī”ti cintetvā vattuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0101a0:658_2: Taṃ kira sakaddamāya bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ – “tāta,
atk-s0101a0:658_4: So pamādena khalitvā patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0101a0:658_6: So sāṭakaṃ chaḍḍetvā acelako hutvā palāyi.
atk-s0101a0:659_3: Iti nāmadvayaṃ saṃsanditvā ajito kesakambaloti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:659_5: Tato paṭikiṭṭhataraṃ vatthaṃ nāma natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:660_3: Iti nāmagottaṃ saṃsanditvā pakudho kaccāyanoti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:660_6: uṇhodakaṃ vā kañjiyaṃ vā labhitvā karoti,
atk-s0101a0:660_8: “sīlaṃ me bhinna”nti vālikathūpaṃ katvā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:661_0: 155. Sañcayoti tassa nāmaṃ. Belaṭṭhassa puttoti belaṭṭhaputto.
atk-s0101a0:664_1: Atha kho rājāti rājā kira tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā cintesi –
atk-s0101a0:664_5: esa nāgavasaṃ pivitvā ṭhito supaṇṇo viya tuṇhībhūto,
atk-s0101a0:664_10: tasmā vattasampanno bhikkhu viya tuṇhībhūtova nisinno,
atk-s0101a0:664_12: hatthimhi kho pana maddante hatthisseva pādo gahetabbo”ti tena saddhiṃ sayaṃ mantetumāraddho.
atk-s0101a0:664_15: Tattha kiṃ tuṇhīti kena kāraṇena tuṇhī.
atk-s0101a0:664_16: Imesaṃ amaccānaṃ attano attano kulūpakasamaṇassa vaṇṇaṃ kathentānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti.
atk-s0101a0:664_20: na te mama pitarā issariyaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:665_3: yathā kho panime rājānaṃ vanditvā nisinnāva attano kulūpakasamaṇānaṃ guṇaṃ kathayiṃsu,
atk-s0101a0:665_4: na mayhaṃ evaṃ satthuguṇe kathetuṃ yutta”nti uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavato vihārābhimukho pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
atk-s0101a0:665_8: ‘ayaṃ yaṃ vā taṃ vā samaṇaṃ upasaṅkamatī’ti,
atk-s0101a0:665_22: Tattha taṃ kho pana bhagavantanti itthambhūtākhyānatthe upayogavacanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:665_28: Abbhuggatoti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharitvā uggato. Kinti?
atk-s0101a0:666_1: so bhagavā itipi arahaṃ itipi sammāsambuddho…pe…
atk-s0101a0:666_3: Iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:666_8: imehi tāva kāraṇehi so bhagavā arahanti veditabbotiādinā nayena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā sabbāneva cetāni
atk-s0101a0:666_9: padāni visuddhimagge buddhānussatiniddese vitthāritānīti tato nesaṃ vitthāro gahetabbo.
atk-s0101a0:667_0: Jīvako pana ekamekassa padassa atthaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā – “evaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0101a0:667_5: appeva nāma devassa taṃ bhagavantaṃ payirupāsato cittaṃ pasīdeyyā”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:667_6: Ettha ca taṃ devo payirupāsatūti vadanto “mahārāja,
atk-s0101a0:667_7: tumhādisānañhi satenapi sahassenapi satasahassenapi puṭṭhassa mayhaṃ satthuno sabbesaṃ cittaṃ gahetvā kathetuṃ thāmo ca balañca atthi,
atk-s0101a0:668_0: Raññopi bhagavato guṇakathaṃ suṇantassa sakalasarīraṃ pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:668_2: “imāya kho pana velāya mayhaṃ dasabalassa santikaṃ gacchato na añño koci khippaṃ yānāni yojetuṃ sakkhissati aññatra jīvakā”ti cintetvā – “tena hi,
atk-s0101a0:669_1: Tattha tena hīti uyyojanatthe nipāto. Gaccha,
atk-s0101a0:669_3: Hatthiyānānīti anekesu assarathādīsu yānesu vijjamānesupi hatthiyānaṃ uttamaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:669_7: hatthiyānassa padānupadaṃ gacchantāpi saddaṃ na suṇanti.
atk-s0101a0:669_8: Nibbutassa pana kho bhagavato santike nibbuteheva yānehi gantabbanti ca cintayitvā hatthiyānānīti āha.
atk-s0101a0:670_4: Kiṃ panesa raññā vuttaṃ akāsi avuttanti? Avuttaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:670_11: “jīvako rājā me kathaṃ gaṇhātīti akālepi rājānaṃ gahetvā nikkhamatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:670_13: ‘mayhaṃ kathā vattatī’ti kālaṃ asallakkhetvāva dhammaṃ kathetī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:671_0: Tato itthiyo nissāya purisānaṃ bhayaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0101a0:671_1: ‘sukhaṃ itthiparivuto gamissāmī’ti pañca hatthinikāsatāni kappāpetvā pañca itthisatāni purisavesaṃ gāhāpetvā –
atk-s0101a0:671_3: “imassa rañño imasmiṃ attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthi,
atk-s0101a0:671_4: buddhā ca nāma upanissayaṃ disvāva dhammaṃ kathenti. Handāhaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:671_6: evañhi sati satthā kassacideva upanissayena dhammaṃ desessati,
atk-s0101a0:671_11: sabbe attano vibhavānurūpena rañño ārakkhaṃ gaṇhantū”ti.
atk-s0101a0:672_5: Sabbe gandhamālādīni gahetvā rañño āgamanaṃ ākaṅkhamānā magge aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:672_10: Tattha yassa dāni kālaṃ maññasīti upacāravacanametaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:672_14: idāni tvaṃ yassa gamanassa vā agamanassa vā kālaṃ maññasi,
atk-s0101a0:673_2: ekekissā hatthiniyā ekekaṃ itthinti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:673_11: Tassa hi asukadivasaṃ rājā tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamissatīti paṭhamataraṃ saṃvidahane asatipi taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0101a0:673_12: pañca itthisatāni purisavesaṃ gahetvā paṭimukkaveṭhanāni aṃse āsattakhaggāni maṇidaṇḍatomare gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:674_4: Tesaṃ pariyante vividhālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā nānappakāraāvudhahatthā vijjādharataruṇā viya navutisahassamattā raṭṭhiyaputtā.
atk-s0101a0:674_5: Tesaṃ pariyante satagghanikāni nivāsetvā pañcasatagghanikāni ekaṃsaṃ katvā sunhātā suvilittā kañcanamālādinānābharaṇasobhitā
atk-s0101a0:674_6: dasasahassamattā brāhmaṇā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ ussāpetvā jayasaddaṃ ghosantā gacchanti.
atk-s0101a0:674_10: Hatthīnaṃ pariyante gīvāya gīvaṃ paharamānā assapanti.
atk-s0101a0:674_13: Tesaṃ pariyante attano attano anurūpāya ābharaṇasampattiyā virocamānā aṭṭhārasa seniyo.
atk-s0101a0:674_14: Iti yathā pariyante ṭhatvā khitto saro rājānaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:674_15: evaṃ jīvako komārabhacco rañño parisaṃ saṃvidahitvā attanā rañño avidūreneva gacchati –
atk-s0101a0:674_18: Ukkānaṃ pana ettakāni satāni vā sahassāni vāti paricchedo natthīti evarūpiṃ rājiddhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:675_4: tattha “jātiṃ paṭicca bhayaṃ bhayānaka”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ cittutrāsabhayaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:675_5: “Tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjantī”ti evamāgataṃ ñāṇabhayaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:675_6: “Etaṃ nūna taṃ bhayabheravaṃ āgacchatī”ti ettha vuttaṃ ārammaṇabhayaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:677_0: Bhayā hi santo, na karonti pāpa”nti. ;
atk-s0101a0:678_7: So panāyaṃ lomahaṃso dhammassavanādīsu pītiuppattikāle pītiyāpi hoti.
atk-s0101a0:679_4: Jīvakassa ambavanaṃ pākārassa ca gijjhakūṭassa ca antarā hoti.
atk-s0101a0:679_7: pabbatacchāyāya ca rukkhacchāyāya ca andhakāraṃ ahosīti,
atk-s0101a0:679_9: Tadā hi ukkānaṃ satasahassānampi paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0101a0:680_0: Ayaṃ pana appasaddataṃ nissāya jīvake āsaṅkāya bhīto.
atk-s0101a0:680_9: So taṃ appasaddataṃ nissāya ukkaṇṭhito jīvakepi āsaṅkaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0101a0:680_10: “Ayaṃ jīvako mayhaṃ ambavane aḍḍhateḷasāni bhikkhusatānī”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:680_13: esa vañcetvā maṃ nagarato nīharitvā purato balakāyaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā maṃ gaṇhitvā attanā chattaṃ ussāpetukāmo.
atk-s0101a0:680_16: santike ca me āvudhahattho ekapurisopi natthi.
atk-s0101a0:680_18: Evaṃ bhāyitvā ca pana abhīto viya sandhāretumpi nāsakkhi.
atk-s0101a0:680_25: Na palambhesīti yaṃ natthi taṃ atthīti vatvā kacci maṃ na vippalambhayasi.
atk-s0101a0:681_2: “ayaṃ rājā maṃ na jānāti ‘nāyaṃ paraṃ jīvitā voropetī’ti;
atk-s0101a0:681_3: sace kho pana naṃ na assāsessāmi,
atk-s0101a0:681_4: vinasseyyā”ti cintayitvā daḷhaṃ katvā samassāsento “mā bhāyi mahārājā”ti vatvā “na taṃ devā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:681_7: Sakiṃ vutte pana daḷhaṃ na hotīti taramānova dvikkhattuṃ āha.
atk-s0101a0:681_9: corabalaṃ nāma na dīpe jāletvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0101a0:683_1: Nāgassa bhūmīti yattha sakkā hatthiṃ abhirūḷhena gantuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:683_3: Nāgā paccorohitvāti vihārassa bahidvārakoṭṭhake hatthito orohitvā.
atk-s0101a0:683_4: Bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitasamakālameva pana bhagavato tejo rañño sarīraṃ phari.
atk-s0101a0:683_8: So ujukaṃ bhagavato santikaṃ gantuṃ asakkonto jīvakaṃ hatthe gahetvā ārāmacārikaṃ caramāno viya “idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:683_9: te samma jīvaka suṭṭhu kāritaṃ idaṃ suṭṭhu kārita”nti vihārassa vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamāno anukkamena yena maṇḍalamāḷassa
atk-s0101a0:684_2: Iminā kira daharakāle pitarā saddhiṃ āgamma bhagavā diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0101a0:684_3: pacchā pana pāpamittasaṃsaggena pitughātaṃ katvā abhimāre pesetvā dhanapālaṃ muñcāpetvā mahāparādho hutvā
atk-s0101a0:684_4: bhagavato sammukhībhāvaṃ na upagatapubboti asañjānanto pucchatīti.
atk-s0101a0:684_6: bhagavā hi ākiṇṇavaralakkhaṇo anubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍito chabbaṇṇāhi rasmīhi sakalaṃ ārāmaṃ obhāsetvā tārāgaṇaparivuto
atk-s0101a0:684_15: sinerumūle ṭhatvā kuhiṃ sinerūti vadamāno viya dasabalassa purato ṭhatvā kuhiṃ bhagavā’ti pucchati.
atk-s0101a0:684_16: “Handassa bhagavantaṃ dassessāmī”ti cintetvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā “eso mahārājā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:685_1: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti yattha bhagavā tattha gato,
atk-s0101a0:685_3: Ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsīti bhagavantaṃ vā bhikkhusaṃghaṃ vā asaṅghaṭṭayamāno attano ṭhātuṃ anucchavike ekasmiṃ padese bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekova aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0101a0:685_6: Tattha hi ekabhikkhussapi hatthakukkuccaṃ vā pādakukkuccaṃ vā khipitasaddo vā natthi,
atk-s0101a0:685_7: sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nāṭakaparivāraṃ bhagavato abhimukhe ṭhitaṃ rājānaṃ vā rājaparisaṃ vā ekabhikkhupi na olokesi.
atk-s0101a0:686_0: Rājā tesaṃ upasame pasīditvā vigatapaṅkatāya vippasannarahadamiva upasantindriyaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ punappunaṃ anuviloketvā udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0101a0:686_1: Tattha imināti yena kāyikena ca vācasikena ca mānasikena ca sīlūpasamena bhikkhusaṅgho upasanto,
atk-s0101a0:686_3: Tattha “aho vata me putto pabbajitvā ime bhikkhū viya upasanto bhaveyyā”ti nayidaṃ sandhāya esa evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:686_4: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā pasanno puttaṃ anussari.
atk-s0101a0:686_5: Dullabhañhi laddhā acchariyaṃ vā disvā piyānaṃ ñātimittādīnaṃ anussaraṇaṃ nāma lokassa pakatiyeva.
atk-s0101a0:686_6: Iti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā puttaṃ anussaramāno esa evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:687_0: Api ca putte āsaṅkāya tassa upasamaṃ icchamāno pesa evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:687_5: So “pitarā te ghātito”ti sutvā “ahampi pitaraṃ ghātetvā rajjaṃ kāressāmī”ti maññissati.
atk-s0101a0:687_6: Iti putte āsaṅkāya tassa upasamaṃ icchamāno pesa evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:688_1: Bhagavā kira rañño vacībhede akateyeva cintesi –
atk-s0101a0:688_5: “ayaṃ mayā saddhiṃ sallapituṃ asakkonto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anuviloketvā puttaṃ anussari,
atk-s0101a0:688_6: na kho panāyaṃ mayi anālapante kiñci kathetuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0101a0:688_8: Tasmā rañño vacanānantaraṃ “agamā kho tvaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0101a0:688_11: yathā nāma unname vuṭṭhaṃ udakaṃ yena ninnaṃ tena gacchati,
atk-s0101a0:688_12: evameva tvaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anuviloketvā yena pemaṃ tena gatoti.
atk-s0101a0:689_2: mayā sadiso bhagavato aparādhakārako nāma natthi,
atk-s0101a0:689_4: devadattassa ca kathaṃ gahetvā abhimārā pesitā,
atk-s0101a0:689_7: evaṃ mahāparādhaṃ nāma maṃ ālapato dasabalassa mukhaṃ nappahoti;
atk-s0101a0:689_9: Evarūpaṃ nāma satthāraṃ pahāya bahiddhā na pariyesissāmā”ti so somanassajāto bhagavantaṃ ālapanto “piyo me,
atk-s0101a0:690_1: Bhikkhusaṅghassa añjaliṃ paṇāmetvāti evaṃ kirassa ahosi bhagavantaṃ vanditvā itocito ca gantvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0101a0:690_2: vandantena ca bhagavā piṭṭhito kātabbo hoti,
atk-s0101a0:690_4: Rājānaṃ vanditvā uparājānaṃ vandantenapi hi rañño agāravo kato hoti.
atk-s0101a0:690_5: Tasmā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva bhikkhusaṅghassa añjaliṃ paṇāmetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0101a0:691_0: Athassa bhagavā pañhapucchane ussāhaṃ janento āha – “puccha, mahārāja,
atk-s0101a0:692_0: “Puccha, vāsava, maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0101a0:693_0: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te”ti. vā;
atk-s0101a0:694_0: Tena hi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sake āsane nisīditvā puccha, yadākaṅkhasīti vā,
atk-s0101a0:696_0: Katāvakāsā pucchavho, yaṃ kiñci manasicchathā”ti. vā;
atk-s0101a0:697_0: “Puccha maṃ, sabhiya, pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0101a0:698_0: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te”ti. vā;
atk-s0101a0:699_2: yaṃ bhagavā buddhabhūmiṃ patvā etaṃ pavāraṇaṃ pavāreyya.
atk-s0101a0:709_1: Sambhavajātake ca sakalajambudīpaṃ tikkhattuṃ vicaritvā pañhānaṃ antakaraṃ adisvā suciratena brāhmaṇena,
atk-s0101a0:709_2: pañhaṃ puṭṭhuṃ okāse kārite jātiyā sattavassiko rathikāya paṃsuṃ kīḷanto pallaṅkamābhujitvā antaravīthiyaṃ nisinnova –
atk-s0101a0:711_0: Rājā ca kho taṃ jānāti, yadi kāhati vā na vā”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:713_1: Evaṃ bhagavatā sabbaññupavāraṇāya pavāritāya attamano rājā pañhaṃ pucchanto –
atk-s0101a0:713_7: Hatthārohātiādīhi ye taṃ taṃ sippaṃ nissāya jīvanti,
atk-s0101a0:713_10: “yathā imesaṃ sippūpajīvīnaṃ taṃ taṃ sippaṃ nissāya sandiṭṭhikaṃ sippaphalaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0101a0:713_11: Sakkā nu kho evaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ paññāpetu”nti.
atk-s0101a0:714_4: Celakāti ye yuddhe jayadhajaṃ gahetvā purato gacchanti.
atk-s0101a0:714_8: Te kira parasenaṃ pavisitvā parasīsaṃ piṇḍamiva chetvā chetvā dayanti,
atk-s0101a0:714_10: Ye vā saṅgāmamajjhe yodhānaṃ bhattapātiṃ gahetvā parivisanti,
atk-s0101a0:714_13: Pakkhandinoti ye “kassa sīsaṃ vā āvudhaṃ vā āharāmā”ti “vatvā asukassā”ti vuttā saṅgāmaṃ pakkhanditvā tadeva āharanti,
atk-s0101a0:714_18: ye sajālikāpi sacammikāpi samuddaṃ tarituṃ sakkonti.
atk-s0101a0:714_19: Cammayodhinoti ye cammakañcukaṃ vā pavisitvā saraparittāṇacammaṃ vā gahetvā yujjhanti.
atk-s0101a0:714_30: Te diṭṭheva dhammeti te hatthārohādayo tāni puthusippāyatanāni dassetvā rājakulato mahāsampattiṃ labhamānā sandiṭṭhikameva sippaphalaṃ upajīvanti.
atk-s0101a0:714_33: Uddhaggikādīsu upari phalanibbattanato uddhaṃ aggamassā atthīti uddhaggikā.
atk-s0101a0:714_36: Suṭṭhu agge rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbaāyuvaṇṇasukhayasaādhipateyyasaṅkhāte dasa dhamme saṃvatteti nibbattetīti saggasaṃvattanikā.
atk-s0101a0:714_37: Taṃ evarūpaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dānaṃ patiṭṭhapentīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:714_54: Upari āgataṃ pana dāsakassakopamaṃ sandhāya pucchati.
atk-s0101a0:715_2: te kaṇhapakkhañca sukkapakkhañca dīpetvā kathīyamāne amhākaṃ rājā mahantena ussāhena idhāgato,
atk-s0101a0:715_3: tassāgatakālato paṭṭhāya samaṇo gotamo samaṇakolāhalaṃ samaṇabhaṇḍanameva kathetīti ujjhāyissanti,
atk-s0101a0:715_5: raññā pana kathīyamāne ujjhāyituṃ na sakkhissanti,
atk-s0101a0:715_8: ‘Handāhaṃ raññova bhāraṃ karomī’ti rañño bhāraṃ karonto “abhijānāsi no tva”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:716_1: Tattha abhijānāsi no tvanti abhijānāsi nu tvaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:716_6: tvaṃ imaṃ pañhaṃ aññe samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchitā nu,
atk-s0101a0:716_9: Sace te agarūti sace tuyhaṃ yathā te byākariṃsu,
atk-s0101a0:716_10: tathā idha bhāsituṃ bhāriyaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0101a0:716_13: Na kho me bhanteti kiṃ sandhāyāha?
atk-s0101a0:716_15: te pade pade akkhare akkhare dosameva vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:716_16: Ekantapaṇḍitā pana kathaṃ sutvā sukathitaṃ pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0101a0:716_19: Bhagavatā ca sadiso ekantapaṇḍito nāma natthi. Tenāha –
atk-s0101a0:718_2: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvāti sammodajanakaṃ saritabbayuttakaṃ kathaṃ pariyosāpetvā.
atk-s0101a0:719_7: Socāpayatoti sokaṃ sayaṃ karontassapi parehi kārāpentassapi.
atk-s0101a0:719_8: Kilamatoti āhārupacchedabandhanāgārappavesanādīhi sayaṃ kilamantassapi parehi kilamāpentassapi.
atk-s0101a0:719_9: Phandato phandāpayatoti paraṃ phandantaṃ phandanakāle sayampi phandato parampi phandāpayato.
atk-s0101a0:720_4: Karoto na karīyati pāpanti yaṃ kiñci pāpaṃ karomīti saññāya karotopi pāpaṃ na karīyati,
atk-s0101a0:720_6: Sattā pana pāpaṃ karomāti evaṃsaññino hontīti dīpeti.
atk-s0101a0:721_2: Uttaratīre sattā saddhā honti pasannā buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā saṅghamāmakā,
atk-s0101a0:722_1: yo kīdiso ambo kīdisāni vā ambassa khandhapaṇṇapupphaphalānīti vutte ediso labujo edisāni vā labujassa khandhapaṇṇapupphaphalānīti byākaroti.
atk-s0101a0:722_5: Appaṭikkositvāti bāladubbhāsitaṃ tayā bhāsitanti evaṃ appaṭibāhitvā.
atk-s0101a0:724_5: Yena attanā katakammena ime sattā devattampi mārattampi brahmattampi sāvakabodhimpi paccekabodhimpi sabbaññutampi pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0101a0:724_7: Dutiyapadena yaṃ parakāraṃ parassa ovādānusāsaniṃ nissāya ṭhapetvā mahāsattaṃ avaseso jano manussasobhagyataṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:724_9: Evamayaṃ bālo jinacakke pahāraṃ deti nāma.
atk-s0101a0:724_10: Natthi purisakāreti yena purisakārena sattā vuttappakārā sampattiyo pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0101a0:724_12: Natthi balanti yamhi attano bale patiṭṭhitā sattā vīriyaṃ katvā tā sampattiyo pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0101a0:724_16: idaṃ purisaparakkamena pavatta”nti evaṃ pavattavacanapaṭikkhepakaraṇavasena panetāni visuṃ ādiyanti.
atk-s0101a0:725_3: Sabbe bhūtāti aṇḍakosavatthikosesu bhūte sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0101a0:725_6: Avasā abalā avīriyāti tesaṃ attano vaso vā balaṃ vā vīriyaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0101a0:725_8: Saṅgatīti channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:725_10: Evaṃ niyatiyā ca saṅgatiyā ca bhāvena ca pariṇatā nānappakārataṃ pattā.
atk-s0101a0:725_15: Chasvevābhijātīsūti chasu eva abhijātīsu ṭhatvā sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedenti.
atk-s0101a0:726_0: Yonipamukhasatasahassānīti pamukhayonīnaṃ uttamayonīnaṃ cuddasasatasahassāni aññāni ca saṭṭhisatāni aññāni ca chasatāni.
atk-s0101a0:726_1: Pañca ca kammuno satānīti pañcakammasatāni ca.
atk-s0101a0:726_3: Pañca ca kammāni tīṇi ca kammānītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0101a0:726_7: Kamme ca upaḍḍhakamme cāti ettha panassa kāyakammañca vacīkammañca kammanti laddhi,
atk-s0101a0:726_10: Dvaṭṭhantarakappāti ekasmiṃ kappe catusaṭṭhi antarakappā nāma honti.
atk-s0101a0:726_11: Ayaṃ pana aññe dve ajānanto evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:727_6: Tattha orabbhikā, sākuṇikā, māgavikā, sūkarikā, luddā,
atk-s0101a0:727_13: te kira catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti.
atk-s0101a0:727_15: Atha vā kaṇṭakavuttikā eva nāma eke pabbajitāti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:727_19: Evaṃ attano paccayadāyake nigaṇṭhehipi jeṭṭhakatare karoti.
atk-s0101a0:727_21: Te kira purimehi catūhi paṇḍaratarā. Nando, vaccho, kiso,
atk-s0101a0:728_8: Tattha jātadivasato paṭṭhāya sattadivase sambādhaṭṭhānato nikkhantattā sattā mandā honti momūhā,
atk-s0101a0:728_11: te abhiṇhaṃ rodanti ceva viravanti ca,
atk-s0101a0:728_14: Mātāpitūnaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ padanikkhipanaṃ padavīmaṃsabhūmi nāma.
atk-s0101a0:728_19: Bhikkhu ca pannako jino na kiñci āhāti evaṃ alābhiṃ samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:729_15: Satta pisācāti pisācā mahantamahantā sattāti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:730_6: Tattha ekamhā mahāsarā vassasate vassasate kusaggena ekaṃ udakabinduṃ nīharitvā sattakkhattuṃ tamhi sare nirudake kate eko mahākappoti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:730_7: Evarūpānaṃ mahākappānaṃ caturāsītisatasahassāni khepetvā bāle ca paṇḍite ca dukkhassantaṃ karontīti ayamassa laddhi.
atk-s0101a0:730_8: Paṇḍitopi kira antarā visujjhituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0101a0:731_0: Sīlenāti acelakasīlena vā aññena vā yena kenaci.
atk-s0101a0:731_5: Paripakkaṃ phussa phussa byantiṃ karoti nāma yo “ahaṃ bālo”ti vuttaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ atikkamitvā yāti.
atk-s0101a0:731_7: Tañhi ubhayampi na sakkā kātunti dīpeti.
atk-s0101a0:732_2: Nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletīti pabbate vā rukkhagge vā ṭhatvā khittaṃ suttappamāṇena nibbeṭhiyamānameva gacchati,
atk-s0101a0:732_5: Evameva vuttakālato uddhaṃ na gacchatīti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:734_1: Ajitavāde natthi dinnanti dinnaphalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0101a0:734_7: Phalaṃ vipākoti yaṃ phalanti vā vipākoti vā vuccati,
atk-s0101a0:734_9: Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthi,
atk-s0101a0:734_10: natthi paro lokoti idha loke ṭhitassāpi paro loko natthi,
atk-s0101a0:734_12: Natthi mātā natthi pitāti tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvavasena vadati.
atk-s0101a0:734_13: Natthi sattā opapātikāti cavitvā upapajjanakā sattā nāma natthīti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:735_10: mañco ceva cattāro mañcapāde gahetvā ṭhitā cattāro purisā cāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:735_21: na tato paraṃ phaladāyakaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:736_0: Tattha pūraṇo “karoto na karīyati pāpa”nti vadanto kammaṃ paṭibāhati.
atk-s0101a0:736_1: Ajito “kāyassa bhedā ucchijjatī”ti vadanto vipākaṃ paṭibāhati.
atk-s0101a0:736_3: Tattha kammaṃ paṭibāhantenāpi vipāko paṭibāhito hoti,
atk-s0101a0:736_5: Iti sabbepete atthato ubhayappaṭibāhakā ahetukavādā ceva akiriyavādā ca natthikavādā ca honti.
atk-s0101a0:737_0: Ye vā pana tesaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā rattiṭṭhāne divāṭhāne nisinnā sajjhāyanti vīmaṃsanti,
atk-s0101a0:737_4: mato ucchijjatī”ti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe micchāsati santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0101a0:737_10: Tattha koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamati, koci dve,
atk-s0101a0:741_3: Evaṃ karohīti kenaci kārāpitāpi na hontīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:741_10: Na iñjantīti esikatthambho viya ṭhitattā na calanti.
atk-s0101a0:741_12: Na aññamaññaṃ byābādhentīti na aññamaññaṃ upahananti.
atk-s0101a0:741_17: Sattannaṃ tveva kāyānanti yathā muggarāsiādīsu pahataṃ satthaṃ muggādīnaṃ antarena pavisati,
atk-s0101a0:741_18: evaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ antarena chiddena vivarena satthaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0101a0:741_19: Tattha ahaṃ imaṃ jīvitā voropemīti kevalaṃ saññāmattameva hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:747_2: vālukaṃ pīḷetvā telaṃ alabhamāno viya titthiyavādesu sāraṃ alabhanto bhagavantaṃ pucchāmīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:748_1: Yathā te khameyyāti yathā te rucceyya.
atk-s0101a0:748_5: Evaṃ uṭṭhito sāmino āsanaṃ paññapetvā pādadhovanādikattabbakiccaṃ katvā pacchā nipatati nisīdatīti pacchānipātī.
atk-s0101a0:748_6: Sāmikamhi vā sayanato avuṭṭhite pubbeyeva vuṭṭhātīti pubbuṭṭhāyī.
atk-s0101a0:748_7: Paccūsakālato paṭṭhāya yāva sāmino rattiṃ niddokkamanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:748_11: kiṃ karomīti evaṃ kiṃkārameva paṭisuṇanto vicaratīti kiṃ kārapaṭissāvī.
atk-s0101a0:748_14: Sāmino tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhaṃ mukhaṃ ullokayamāno vicaratīti mukhullokako.
atk-s0101a0:749_1: So vatassāhaṃ puññāni kareyyanti so vata ahaṃ evarūpo assaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:749_7: tato satabhāgampi yāvajīvaṃ na sakkhissāmi dātunti pabbajjāyaṃ ussāhaṃ katvā evaṃ cintanabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:750_0: Kāyena saṃvutoti kāyena pihito hutvā akusalassa pavesanadvāraṃ thaketvāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:750_3: etadatthampi anesanaṃ pahāya aggasallekhena santuṭṭhoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:750_6: paramavodānappattānaṃ upadhiviveko ca nirupadhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ visaṅkhāragatāna”nti evaṃ vutte tividhepi viveke rato;
atk-s0101a0:750_9: phalasamāpattiṃ vā nirodhasamāpattiṃ vā pavisitvā nibbānaṃ patvā viharatīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:751_1: Āsanenapi nimanteyyāmāti nisinnāsanaṃ papphoṭetvā idha nisīdathāti vadeyyāma.
atk-s0101a0:751_5: Tumhākaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe amhākaṃ cīvarādīhi vadeyyātha yenatthoti vadanto hi vācāya abhiharitvā nimanteti nāma.
atk-s0101a0:751_6: Cīvarādivekallaṃ sallakkhetvā idaṃ gaṇhāthāti tāni dento pana kāyena abhiharitvā nimanteti nāma.
atk-s0101a0:751_8: Ettha ca gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāroti yaṃ kiñci gilānassa sappāyaṃ osadhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:751_11: Sā panesā na āvudhahatthe purise ṭhapentena dhammikā nāma saṃvidahitā hoti.
atk-s0101a0:751_12: Yathā pana avelāya kaṭṭhahārikapaṇṇahārikādayo vihāraṃ na pavisanti,
atk-s0101a0:751_13: migaluddakādayo vihārasīmāya mige vā macche vā na gaṇhanti,
atk-s0101a0:751_14: evaṃ saṃvidahantena dhammikā nāma rakkhā saṃvihitā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:752_1: Yadi evaṃ santeti yadi tava dāso tuyhaṃ santikā abhivādanādīni labheyya.
atk-s0101a0:752_5: Teneva ca rājā sakkā pana, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:755_0: Appaṃ vāti parittakaṃ vā antamaso taṇḍulanāḷimattakampi.
atk-s0101a0:755_3: Yathā hi mahantaṃ pahāya pabbajituṃ dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0101a0:755_5: Dāsavāre pana yasmā dāso attanopi anissaro,
atk-s0101a0:757_2: aññampi diṭṭheva dhammeti idha evamevāti na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:757_4: evamevāti hi vuccamāne pahoti bhagavā sakalampi rattindivaṃ tato vā bhiyyopi evarūpāhi upamāhi sāmaññaphalaṃ dīpetuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:757_5: Tattha kiñcāpi etassa bhagavato vacanasavane pariyantaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0101a0:757_6: tathāpi attho tādisoyeva bhavissatīti cintetvā upari visesaṃ pucchanto evamevāti avatvā –
atk-s0101a0:758_0: Sādhukaṃ manasikarohīti ettha pana sādhukaṃ sādhūti ekatthametaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:758_4: bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu hi āyācane dissati. “Sādhu,
atk-s0101a0:758_5: bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane.
atk-s0101a0:761_1: suṇohi sādhukaṃ manasi karohī”tiādīsu sādhukasaddoyeva daḷhīkamme,
atk-s0101a0:761_3: Idhāpi assa ettheva daḷhīkamme ca āṇattiyañca veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:761_8: sundaratthena sundaramimaṃ bhaddakaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāhīti evaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:762_5: Sādhukaṃ manasi karohīti manasikāre daḷhīkammaniyojanena manindriyavikkhepanivāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:762_14: Sādhukapadaṃ vā ubhayapadehi yojetvā yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dhammagambhīro ceva desanāgambhīro ca,
atk-s0101a0:762_17: tasmā sādhukaṃ manasi karohīti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:762_18: Bhāsissāmīti sakkā mahārājāti evaṃ paṭiññātaṃ sāmaññaphaladesanaṃ vitthārato bhāsissāmi.
atk-s0101a0:765_1: bhante”ti kho rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto bhagavato paccassosi bhagavato vacanaṃ sampaṭicchi,
atk-s0101a0:766_3: idāni vattabbaṃ “idha mahārājā”tiādiṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ avocāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:766_5: svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:768_0: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:769_4: Idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:769_5: Mahārājāti yathā paṭiññātaṃ desanaṃ desetuṃ puna mahārājāti ālapati.
atk-s0101a0:769_14: Sattaloke uppajjamānopi ca tathāgato na devaloke,
atk-s0101a0:769_20: “puratthimāya disāya gajaṅgalaṃ nāma nigamo tassāparena mahāsālo,
atk-s0101a0:769_21: tato parā paccantimā janapadā orato majjhe,
atk-s0101a0:769_32: tato parā paccantimā janapadā orato majjhe”ti evaṃ paricchinne āyāmato tiyojanasate,
atk-s0101a0:769_41: cakkavattī rājā aññe ca sārappattā brāhmaṇagahapatikā etthevuppajjanti.
atk-s0101a0:770_0: Tattha tathāgato sujātāya dinnamadhupāyāsabhojanato yāva arahattamaggo,
atk-s0101a0:770_8: Idha sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sandhāya uppajjatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:770_9: Tathāgato loke uppanno hotīti ayañhettha attho.
atk-s0101a0:771_0: So imaṃ lokanti so bhagavā imaṃ lokaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:771_17: Evamettha tīhi padehi okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko.
atk-s0101a0:772_4: Sassamaṇabrāhmaṇādiggahaṇena catuparisavasena sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko,
atk-s0101a0:773_0: Api cettha sadevakavacanena ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbassa lokassa sacchikatabhāvamāha.
atk-s0101a0:773_6: “brahmā mahānubhāvo ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati,
atk-s0101a0:773_8: dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati.
atk-s0101a0:773_15: tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajanti āha.
atk-s0101a0:773_16: Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhānaṃ sacchikatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā atha sammutideve avasesamanusse ca upādāya ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena
atk-s0101a0:774_0: Porāṇā panāhu sadevakanti devehi saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:774_3: Evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte tīhākārehi tīsu padesu pakkhipitvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādiyanto sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussanti āha.
atk-s0101a0:774_4: Evaṃ pañcahipi padehi tena tenākārena tedhātukameva pariyādinnanti.
