atk-s0101a0:775_0: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetīti ettha pana sayanti sāmaṃ aparaneyyo hutvā.
atk-s0101a0:776_1: pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0101a0:776_2: Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti. Ādimhipi,
atk-s0101a0:776_3: kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā deseti, majjhepi,
atk-s0101a0:776_5: kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā desetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:776_8: Desanāya tāva catuppadikāyapi gāthāya paṭhamapādo ādi nāma,
atk-s0101a0:776_16: majjhe eko vā dve vā bahū vā majjhameva.
atk-s0101a0:777_5: majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ vutto pana ariyamaggo majjhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:777_10: etaṃ pariyosāna”nti hi ettha phalaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:777_14: nibbānaparāyanaṃ nibbānapariyosāna”nti ettha nibbānaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:777_16: Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento ādimhi sīlaṃ dassetvā majjhe maggaṃ pariyosāne nibbānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:780_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti yassa hi yāgubhattaitthipurisādivaṇṇanānissitā desanā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:780_2: Bhagavā pana tathārūpaṃ desanaṃ pahāya catusatipaṭṭhānādinissitaṃ desanaṃ deseti.
atk-s0101a0:780_4: Yassa pana desanā ekabyañjanādiyuttā vā sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā sabbavissaṭṭhasabbaniggahītabyañjanā vā,
atk-s0101a0:780_5: tassa damiḷakirātasavarādimilakkhūnaṃ bhāsā viya byañjanapāripūriyā abhāvato abyañjanā nāma desanā hoti.
atk-s0101a0:783_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0101a0:783_8: Yo hi imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ nissāya lābhaṃ vā sakkāraṃ vā labhissāmīti deseti,
atk-s0101a0:783_10: Bhagavā pana lokāmisanirapekkho hitapharaṇena mettābhāvanāya muduhadayo ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena cittena deseti.
atk-s0101a0:784_1: saddo dāne veyyāvacce pañcasikkhāpadasīle appamaññāsu methunaviratiyaṃ sadārasantose vīriye uposathaṅgesu ariyamagge sāsaneti imesvatthesu dissati.
atk-s0101a0:793_0: Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:799_0: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
atk-s0101a0:800_0: Tena pāṇi kāmadado, tena pāṇi madhussavo;
atk-s0101a0:801_0: Tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:802_2: tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī”ti imasmiṃ tittirajātake pañcasikkhāpadasīlaṃ brahmacariyanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:802_5: brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya…pe…
atk-s0101a0:802_6: yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā”ti imasmiṃ mahāgovindasutte catasso appamaññāyo brahmacariyanti vuttā.
atk-s0101a0:802_8: mayamettha brahmacārī bhavissāmā”ti imasmiṃ sallekhasutte methunavirati brahmacariyanti vuttā.
atk-s0101a0:806_0: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:807_4: tapassī sudaṃ homī”ti lomahaṃsanasutte vīriyaṃ brahmacariyanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:810_0: Evaṃ nimijātake attadamanavasena kato aṭṭhaṅgiko uposatho brahmacariyanti vutto.
atk-s0101a0:810_4: ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti mahāgovindasuttasmiṃyeva ariyamaggo brahmacariyanti vutto.
atk-s0101a0:810_5: “Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāva devamanussehi suppakāsita”nti
atk-s0101a0:810_8: Tasmā brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0101a0:810_10: Evaṃ desento ca sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:810_12: Brahmabhūtānaṃ vā buddhādīnaṃ cariyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:811_2: Suṇāti gahapati vāti kasmā paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisati?
atk-s0101a0:811_5: Yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato pabbajitā jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
atk-s0101a0:811_6: Brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
atk-s0101a0:811_7: Hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano attano vijātitāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0101a0:811_8: Gahapatidārakā pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā tādisassa mānassa abhāvato nihatamānadappā honti.
atk-s0101a0:811_9: Te pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ sakalabuddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:811_10: Itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā nāma na bahukā,
atk-s0101a0:811_12: Iti nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti.
atk-s0101a0:812_0: Aññatarasmiṃ vāti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ.
atk-s0101a0:812_2: Tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā dhammassāmimhi tathāgate –
atk-s0101a0:812_5: Sambādho gharāvāsoti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti,
atk-s0101a0:812_10: Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsādadevavimānādīsu pihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati,
atk-s0101a0:812_15: Api ca sambādho gharāvāso kusalakiriyāya okāsābhāvato.
atk-s0101a0:812_16: Rajopatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato.
atk-s0101a0:813_2: yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:813_3: caritabbaṃ ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:813_5: Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ,
atk-s0101a0:813_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-s0101a0:813_7: vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti.
atk-s0101a0:813_8: Ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati,
atk-s0101a0:814_1: Appaṃ vāti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti,
atk-s0101a0:814_4: Sopi vīsatiyā heṭṭhā appo nāma hoti,
atk-s0101a0:814_7: Ācāragocarasampannoti ācārena ceva gocarena ca sampanno.
atk-s0101a0:814_12: Sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhati.
atk-s0101a0:815_0: Kāyakammavacīkammena samannāgato kusalena parisuddhājīvoti ettha ācāragocaraggahaṇeneva ca kusale kāyakammavacīkamme
atk-s0101a0:815_1: gahitepi yasmā idaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ nāma na ākāse vā rukkhaggādīsu vā uppajjati,
atk-s0101a0:815_3: tasmā tassa uppattidvāradassanatthaṃ kāyakammavacīkammena samannāgato kusalenāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:815_11: parisuddhaṃ ājīvampi kho ahaṃ thapati sīlasmiṃ vadāmī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:816_0: Sīlasampannoti brahmajāle vuttena tividhena sīlena samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0101a0:816_1: Indriyesu guttadvāroti manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu pihitadvāro hoti.
atk-s0101a0:816_2: Satisampajaññena samannāgatoti abhikkante paṭikkantetiādīsu sattasu ṭhānesu satiyā ceva sampajaññena ca samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0101a0:816_3: Santuṭṭhoti catūsu paccayesu tividhena santosena santuṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0101a0:818_1: Evaṃ mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā anupubbena bhājento “kathañca, mahārāja,
atk-s0101a0:818_3: Tattha idampissa hoti sīlasminti idampi assa bhikkhuno pāṇātipātā veramaṇi sīlasmiṃ ekaṃ sīlaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:818_5: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyañhi idampi tassa samaṇassa sīlanti ayameva attho vutto.
atk-s0101a0:818_7: Idamassa hoti sīlasminti idaṃ assa sīlaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:819_2: yadidaṃ sīlasaṃvaratoti yāni asaṃvaramūlakāni bhayāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0101a0:819_3: tesu yaṃ idaṃ bhayaṃ sīlasaṃvarato bhaveyya,
atk-s0101a0:819_4: taṃ kutoci ekasaṃvaratopi na samanupassati. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:819_7: Yadidaṃ paccatthikatoti yaṃ kutoci ekapaccatthikatopi bhayaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0101a0:819_12: Anavajjasukhanti anavajjaṃ aninditaṃ kusalaṃ sīlapadaṭṭhānehi avippaṭisārapāmojjapītipassaddhidhammehi
atk-s0101a0:819_13: pariggahitaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Evaṃ kho, mahārāja,
atk-s0101a0:819_14: bhikkhu sīlasampanno hotīti evaṃ nirantaraṃ vitthāretvā dassitena tividhena sīlena samannāgato bhikkhu sīlasampanno nāma hotīti sīlakathaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0101a0:821_1: Indriyesu guttadvārabhājanīye cakkhunā rūpanti ayaṃ cakkhusaddo katthaci buddhacakkhumhi vattati, yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:821_6: Katthaci dhammacakkhumhi “virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti hi ettha ariyamaggattayapaññā.
atk-s0101a0:821_7: “Cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti ettha pubbenivāsādiñāṇaṃ paññācakkhūti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:821_9: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”ti ettha pasādacakkhumhi vattati.
atk-s0101a0:821_14: Abyāsekasukhanti kilesabyāsekavirahitattā abyāsekaṃ asammissaṃ parisuddhaṃ adhicittasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti.
atk-s0101a0:823_1: Satisampajaññabhājanīyamhi abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha tāva abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:823_4: Gamane tāva purato kāyaṃ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma.
atk-s0101a0:823_6: Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṃ purato onāmento abhikkamati nāma,
atk-s0101a0:823_8: Nisajjāya nisinnakova āsanassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṃsaranto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-s0101a0:824_8: “kinnu me ettha gatena attho atthi natthī”ti atthānatthaṃ pariggahetvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:824_10: Cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā disvāpi hi buddhārammaṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:824_12: pītiṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0101a0:824_14: asubhaṃ disvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0101a0:825_0: Tasmiṃ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:825_3: sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare parisā sannipatanti,
atk-s0101a0:825_4: attano vibhavānurūpā itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni viya sañcaranti.
atk-s0101a0:825_5: Tatra cassa iṭṭhe ārammaṇe lobho hoti,
atk-s0101a0:825_14: Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbarattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ karontesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca hoti,
atk-s0101a0:826_2: eko kira daharabhikkhu sāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato.
atk-s0101a0:826_3: Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto asubhaṃ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā
atk-s0101a0:826_4: saṅkhāre sammasanto tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0101a0:826_6: So ‘mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā.
atk-s0101a0:826_7: Aññasmimpi divase upari visesaṃ nibbattessāmī’ti cintetvā kiṃ,
atk-s0101a0:826_10: iminā tāva maggeneva gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṃ puratthābhimukho ṭhatvā olokethā’ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:826_11: So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi.
atk-s0101a0:826_12: Evaṃ ekaṃ asubhaṃ dvinnaṃ janānaṃ atthāya jātaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:826_13: Evaṃ sātthampi panetaṃ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṃ asappāyaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:826_15: sabhāgameva sappāyanti evaṃ sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:827_0: Evaṃ pariggahitasātthakasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu attano cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0101a0:827_1: gocaraṃ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṃ gahetvāva gamanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:828_8: Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya ca āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetvā tathā rattiyā paṭhamayāme,
atk-s0101a0:828_9: majjhimayāme seyyaṃ kappetvā pacchimayāmepi nisajjacaṅkamehi vītināmetvā pageva cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ āsiñcitvā,
atk-s0101a0:828_10: pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ācariyupajjhāyavattādīni sabbāni khandhakavattāni samādāya vattati.
atk-s0101a0:828_11: So sarīraparikammaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṃ gāhāpento kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitvā
atk-s0101a0:828_12: bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ uṭṭhahitvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva pattacīvaramādāya senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:828_17: sopānamūle ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṃ viya taṃ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha,
atk-s0101a0:828_19: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:828_21: tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:828_22: Cetiyaṃ vanditvā bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pattenāpi buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccākāraṃ dassetvā bodhi vanditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:828_23: So evaṃ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṭisāmitabhaṇḍakaṃ hatthena gaṇhanto viya
atk-s0101a0:828_24: nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva cīvaraṃ pārupitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-s0101a0:828_25: Atha naṃ manussā disvā ayyo no āgatoti paccuggantvā pattaṃ gahetvā āsanasālāya vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ datvā yāva bhattaṃ na niṭṭhāti,
atk-s0101a0:828_26: tāva pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā purato te nisīditvā pañhaṃ vā pucchanti,
atk-s0101a0:828_29: janasaṅgahatthaṃ dhammakathā nāma kātabbā yevāti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:828_31: tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva dhammakathaṃ kathetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ katvā
atk-s0101a0:828_32: nivattiyamānehipi manussehi anugatova gāmato nikkhamitvā tattha te nivattetvā maggaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0101a0:829_0: Atha naṃ puretaraṃ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti.
atk-s0101a0:829_1: Porāṇakabhikkhū kira amhākaṃ upajjhāyo ācariyoti na mukhaṃ oloketvā vattaṃ karonti,
atk-s0101a0:829_13: Īdisā nāma amhākaṃ upakārino natthīti tesaṃ guṇe kathento gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:830_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ karontassa kammajatejodhātu pajjalati,
atk-s0101a0:830_4: so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasā cetiyaṃ vanditvā gorūpānaṃ nikkhamanavelāyameva gāmaṃ yāgubhikkhāya
atk-s0101a0:830_5: pavisitvā yāguṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivati,
atk-s0101a0:830_6: athassa dvattikkhattuṃ ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejodhātu upādinnakaṃ muñcitvā anupādinnakaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a0:830_7: ghaṭasatena nhāto viya tejodhātu pariḷāhanibbānaṃ patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṃ paribhuñjitvā pattañca
atk-s0101a0:830_8: mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena
atk-s0101a0:830_9: āhārañca paribhuñjitvā tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā āgacchati,
atk-s0101a0:830_11: Edisā ca bhikkhū yāguṃ pivitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā buddhasāsane arahattappattā nāma gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
atk-s0101a0:830_12: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāyaṃ vā na taṃ āsanamatthi,
atk-s0101a0:830_13: yattha yāguṃ pivitvā arahattappattā bhikkhū natthīti.
atk-s0101a0:831_2: “kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī”ti saññampi akatvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho nikkhamati,
atk-s0101a0:831_3: ayaṃ vuccati neva harati na paccāharatīti.
atk-s0101a0:832_3: Attakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṃ katvā viharanti, “āvuso,
atk-s0101a0:833_0: Te evaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu pāsāṇā honti,
atk-s0101a0:833_7: ananucchavikaṃ te eta”nti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tattheva ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati;
atk-s0101a0:833_9: Athassa pacchato āgacchantopi nisīdatīti soyeva nayo.
atk-s0101a0:833_10: Ariyabhūmiṃ okkamituṃ asakkontopi taṃ kilesaṃ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati,
atk-s0101a0:834_0: So kira ekūnavīsativassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento eva vihāsi,
atk-s0101a0:834_1: manussāpi addasaṃsu antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā theraṃ tathāgacchantaṃ disvā –
atk-s0101a0:834_5: So taṃ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0101a0:834_6: arahattappattadivase cassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṃ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0101a0:834_7: Cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:834_8: Tañca obhāsaṃ disvā vanavāsī mahātissatthero taṃ dutiyadivase pucchi –
atk-s0101a0:834_11: Thero vikkhepaṃ karonto obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti,
atk-s0101a0:835_1: paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmīti sattavassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0101a0:835_2: Puna soḷasavassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0101a0:835_4: viyuttena uddhaṭe paṭinivattento gāmasamīpaṃ gantvā “gāvī nu pabbajito nū”ti āsaṅkanīyapadese ṭhatvā
atk-s0101a0:835_5: cīvaraṃ pārupitvā kacchakantarato udakena pattaṃ dhovitvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ karoti.
atk-s0101a0:835_7: Mā me bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ vā vandituṃ vā āgate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenāpi kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosīti. “Ajja, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:835_8: katimī”ti divasaṃ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṃ vā pañhaṃ vā pucchito pana udakaṃ gilitvā āroceti.
atk-s0101a0:836_3: gāmañca piṇḍāya pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:836_9: “kinnu kho ete amhehiyeva saddhiṃ na sallapanti,
atk-s0101a0:836_14: sabbe vihāraṃ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhūsu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:836_15: Tato yo tesu cakkhumā puriso, so āha –
atk-s0101a0:836_21: Tepi bhikkhū anto temāseyeva arahattaṃ patvā mahāpavāraṇāya visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:837_1: kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatabhikkhū viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṃ
atk-s0101a0:837_3: yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo vā natthi,
atk-s0101a0:837_5: Tattha ca piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya javena gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:837_6: Na hi javena piṇḍapātiyadhutaṅgaṃ nāma kiñci atthi.
atk-s0101a0:837_7: Visamabhūmibhāgappattaṃ pana udakasakaṭaṃ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:837_8: Anugharaṃ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṃ vā adātukāmaṃ vā sallakkhetvā tadanurūpaṃ kālaṃ āgamento bhikkhaṃ paṭilabhitvā
atk-s0101a0:837_9: ādāya antogāme vā bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā yathā phāsuke patirūpe okāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:837_12: neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya…pe…
atk-s0101a0:837_13: bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ bhattakilamathaṃ paṭippassambhetvā yathā purebhattaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:837_14: evaṃ pacchābhattaṃ purimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmañca kammaṭṭhānameva manasi karoti,
atk-s0101a0:837_15: ayaṃ vuccati harati ca paccāharati cāti.
atk-s0101a0:838_0: Idaṃ pana haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento yadi upanissayasampanno hoti,
atk-s0101a0:838_12: seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo mahāpañño vā,
atk-s0101a0:838_18: seyyathāpi thero puṇṇo mantāṇiputto āraññiko vā,
atk-s0101a0:838_22: Iti imasmiṃ catukke yvāyaṃ harati ca paccāharati ca,
atk-s0101a0:839_2: idha bhikkhu abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhabālaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu –
atk-s0101a0:839_7: tathā asammuyhanto “abhikkamāmī”ti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-s0101a0:839_8: Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāto abhikkamati.
atk-s0101a0:839_9: Tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-s0101a0:839_12: Vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-s0101a0:839_15: Tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0101a0:839_20: Tattha tattheva pabbaṃ pabbaṃ sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilāni viya paṭapaṭāyantā bhijjanti.
atk-s0101a0:840_0: Aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati;
atk-s0101a0:843_0: Niṭṭhito abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotīti padassa attho.
atk-s0101a0:844_0: Ālokite vilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṃ nāma purato pekkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:844_2: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato pekkhaṇavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti,
atk-s0101a0:844_5: iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevāti.
atk-s0101a0:845_0: Tattha “ālokessāmī”ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:845_1: taṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:845_5: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi –
atk-s0101a0:845_6: ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato na abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssavissantī’ti.
atk-s0101a0:845_14: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ anuviloketi –
atk-s0101a0:845_15: ‘evaṃ me anudisaṃ anuvilokayato na abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssavissantī’ti.
atk-s0101a0:846_0: Api ca idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā,
atk-s0101a0:846_3: kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanaṃ vilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:846_4: Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi,
atk-s0101a0:846_5: ‘ālokessāmī’ti pana citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-s0101a0:846_6: Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena heṭṭhimaṃ akkhidalaṃ adho sīdati,
atk-s0101a0:846_9: Tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ uppajjatīti evaṃ pajānanaṃ panettha asammohasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:846_10: Api ca mūlapariññā āgantukatāva kālikabhāvavasena pettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:849_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0101a0:849_9: ayaṃ puriso”ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0101a0:849_12: Etesu pana yuddhamaṇḍale yodhesu viya heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesu –
atk-s0101a0:850_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthamāgate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṃ sakakiccanipphādanavasena āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0101a0:850_1: taṃ pubbe uppannānaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti.
atk-s0101a0:850_2: Tassa yathā paragehe kiñci yācituṃ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehassāmikesu tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:850_3: evaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:851_0: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0101a0:851_1: tāni saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti,
atk-s0101a0:851_4: Tattha yathā ekasmiṃ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekassa taṅkhaṇaññeva maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma.
atk-s0101a0:851_5: Evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇeyeva maraṇadhammassa
atk-s0101a0:851_6: javanassāpi rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti.
atk-s0101a0:852_1: Ettha hi cakkhu ceva rūpā ca rūpakkhandho,
atk-s0101a0:852_6: Evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0101a0:853_4: Evametesaṃ catunnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0101a0:854_4: Evametāsaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0101a0:856_1: Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ akatvā hatthapādānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṃ pariggaṇhitvā
atk-s0101a0:856_3: Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṃ samiñjetvā vā pasāretvā vā ṭhitassa khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjati,
atk-s0101a0:856_7: Kāle samiñjentassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā nuppajjanti,
atk-s0101a0:857_0: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:858_2: Tatreko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento kāyasaṃsaggaṃ patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto.
atk-s0101a0:858_3: Aparo bhikkhu pādaṃ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi,
atk-s0101a0:858_9: Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā sappāye pasāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:859_1: mahāthero kira divāṭhāne nisinno antevāsikehi saddhiṃ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjetvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjesi.
atk-s0101a0:859_3: sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjiyitthā”ti?
atk-s0101a0:859_6: na me kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo,
atk-s0101a0:859_7: idāni pana me tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samiñjito.
atk-s0101a0:859_8: Tasmā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:860_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjento vā pasārento vā natthi,
atk-s0101a0:860_2: viya samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ parijānanaṃ panettha asammohasampajaññanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:861_0: Saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇeti ettha saṅghāṭicīvarānaṃ nivāsanapārupanavasena pattassa bhikkhāpaṭiggahaṇādivasena paribhogo dhāraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:861_1: Tattha saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇe tāva nivāsetvā vā pārupitvā vā piṇḍāya carato āmisalābho sītassa paṭighātāyātiādinā
atk-s0101a0:861_2: nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho attho nāma.
atk-s0101a0:862_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṃ sukhumaṃ sappāyaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:862_6: Tādisañhi araññe ekakassa nivāsantarāyakaraṃ jīvitantarāyakarañcāpi hoti.
atk-s0101a0:863_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṃ pārupento natthi,
atk-s0101a0:863_9: Tasmā neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:864_0: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūmavatthādīhi sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0101a0:864_2: Na tehi nāgavammikarukkhādayo somanassaṃ vā domanassaṃ vā karonti.
atk-s0101a0:864_3: Evameva neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:865_0: Pattadhāraṇepi pattaṃ sahasāva aggahetvā imaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṃ labhissāmīti,
atk-s0101a0:865_1: evaṃ pattaggahaṇapaccayā paṭilabhitabbaṃ atthavasena sātthakasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:866_6: nimittakammādivasena laddho pana yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0101a0:867_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṃ gaṇhanto natthi,
atk-s0101a0:868_0: Api ca yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe anāthasālāyaṃ nipanne anāthamanusse disvā,
atk-s0101a0:868_2: te tesaṃ vaṇamattacoḷakāni ceva kapālādīhi ca bhesajjāni upanāmenti.
atk-s0101a0:868_7: na te tattha sumanā vā dummanā vā honti.
atk-s0101a0:868_10: Evameva yo bhikkhu vaṇacoḷakaṃ viya cīvaraṃ,
atk-s0101a0:868_12: kapāle bhesajjamiva ca patte laddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ sallakkheti,
atk-s0101a0:869_4: Tattha neva davāyātiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi attho attho nāma.
atk-s0101a0:870_0: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurarasādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa phāsu na hoti,
atk-s0101a0:871_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi,
atk-s0101a0:871_2: Cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte otāraṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0101a0:871_4: na koci kuñcikāya yantakena vā hanukaṭṭhīni vivarati.
atk-s0101a0:871_9: Iti tattha aggajivhāya tanukakheḷo mūlajivhāya bahalakheḷo makkheti.
atk-s0101a0:871_10: Taṃ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattakaṃ kheḷodakena temitaṃ uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṃ koci
atk-s0101a0:871_11: kaṭacchunā vā dabbiyā vā antopavesento nāma natthi,
atk-s0101a0:871_13: Paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ koci palālasanthāraṃ katvā dhārento nāma natthi,
atk-s0101a0:871_15: Ṭhitaṃ ṭhitaṃ koci uddhanaṃ katvā aggiṃ jāletvā pacanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0101a0:871_17: Pakkaṃ pakkaṃ koci daṇḍakena vā yaṭṭhiyā vā bahi nīhārako nāma natthi,
atk-s0101a0:872_0: Api ca gamanato pariyesanato paribhogato āsayato nidhānato aparipakkato paripakkato phalato nissandato sammakkhanatoti,
atk-s0101a0:873_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe.
atk-s0101a0:873_1: Tattha pattakāle uccārapassāvaṃ akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti,
atk-s0101a0:873_5: Karontassa pana sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0101a0:874_0: Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṃ karontassa pana āpatti hoti,
atk-s0101a0:874_3: patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṃ tassa vasena sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:875_0: Abbhantare attā nāma uccārapassāvakammaṃ karonto natthi,
atk-s0101a0:875_2: Yathā vā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati.
atk-s0101a0:875_3: Yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati.
atk-s0101a0:875_4: Evaṃ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi nikkhamanti.
atk-s0101a0:875_5: So panāyaṃ evaṃ nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano hoti,
atk-s0101a0:875_9: Yathā udakatumbato purāṇudakaṃ chaḍḍentassa neva taṃ attano hoti,
atk-s0101a0:876_10: sayāno vā sayānomhīti pajānātī”ti imasmiñhi sutte addhānairiyāpathā kathitā.
atk-s0101a0:876_11: “Abhikkante paṭikkante ālokite vilokite samiñjite pasārite”ti imasmiṃ majjhimā.
atk-s0101a0:876_12: “Gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite”ti idha pana khuddakacuṇṇiyairiyāpathā kathitā.
atk-s0101a0:877_1: yo ciraṃ gantvā vā caṅkamitvā vā aparabhāge ṭhito iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0101a0:878_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto ciraṃ ṭhatvā aparabhāge nisinno iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0101a0:879_0: Yo sajjhāyādikaraṇavaseneva ciraṃ nisīditvā aparabhāge uṭṭhāya iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0101a0:880_0: Yo pana nipannako sajjhāyaṃ vā karonto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto niddaṃ okkamitvā aparabhāge uṭṭhāya iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0101a0:880_2: Ayaṃ sutte jāgarite ca sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0101a0:881_3: cittassa ca tadanurūpaṃ payogaṃ paṭicca jāyatī”ti sato sampajānova bhāsati.
atk-s0101a0:881_4: Ciraṃ vā pana kālaṃ sajjhāyaṃ vā katvā,
atk-s0101a0:882_0: Yo tuṇhībhūto ciraṃ dhammaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikatvā aparabhāge iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0101a0:883_0: Tayidaṃ mahāsivattherena vuttaṃ asammohadhuraṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:883_1: Imasmiṃ pana sāmaññaphale sabbampi catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ labbhati.
atk-s0101a0:883_2: Tasmā vuttanayeneva cettha catunnaṃ sampajaññānaṃ vasena sampajānakāritā veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:883_3: Sampajānakārīti ca sabbapadesu satisampayuttasseva sampajaññassa vasena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:883_4: Satisampajaññena samannāgatoti etassa hi padassa ayaṃ vitthāro.
atk-s0101a0:883_7: sato sampajāno paṭikkamatī”ti evaṃ etāni padāni vibhattāneva. Evaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:883_8: kho mahārājāti evaṃ satisampayuttassa sampajaññassa vasena abhikkamādīni pavattento satisampajaññena samannāgato nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:885_1: bhikkhu santuṭṭho hotīti ettha santuṭṭhoti itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato.
atk-s0101a0:886_9: So sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:886_12: So pattacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghapattacīvaraṃ bahūni vā pana pattacīvarāni labhitvā idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:886_15: idaṃ appalābhīnaṃ hotūti datvā tesaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ vā gahetvā saṅkārakūṭādito vā nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:887_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0101a0:887_5: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati,
atk-s0101a0:887_7: So sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:887_10: So taṃ cīvaraṃ viya theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhīgilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:888_6: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0101a0:888_8: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:889_0: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati.
atk-s0101a0:889_1: So tāni cīvaraṃ viya theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhīgilānānaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:889_5: niddābhibhūtassa puna paṭibujjhato kāmavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati.
atk-s0101a0:889_6: So taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:890_7: Yo pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati.
atk-s0101a0:890_8: So taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato telaṃ gahetvā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:891_1: So taṃ cīvaraṃ viya theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhīgilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:891_2: Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharīṭakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ – “gaṇhāhi, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:891_3: yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
atk-s0101a0:891_4: atha muttaharīṭakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇitanti catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharīṭakeneva bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:892_0: Iminā pana dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgatassa bhikkhuno aṭṭha parikkhārā vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0101a0:893_0: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:895_0: Te sabbe kāyaparihārikāpi honti kucchiparihārikāpi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0101a0:895_1: Ticīvaraṃ tāva nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakāle kāyaṃ pariharati,
atk-s0101a0:895_3: Cīvarakaṇṇena udakaṃ parissāvetvā pivanakāle khāditabbaphalāphalagahaṇakāle ca kucchiṃ pariharati;
atk-s0101a0:896_0: Pattopi tena udakaṃ uddharitvā nhānakāle kuṭiparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca kāyaparihāriko hoti.
atk-s0101a0:897_0: Vāsipi tāya dantakaṭṭhacchedanakāle mañcapīṭhānaṃ aṅgapādacīvarakuṭidaṇḍakasajjanakāle ca kāyaparihārikā hoti.
atk-s0101a0:898_1: Pūvaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vijjhitvā khādanakāle kucchiparihārikā.
atk-s0101a0:900_3: teneva tilataṇḍulaputhukādīni gahetvā khādanakāle ca kucchiparihāriyaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:900_5: Navaparikkhārikassa pana seyyaṃ pavisantassa tatraṭṭhakaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ vā kuñcikā vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:900_6: Dasaparikkhārikassa nisīdanaṃ vā cammakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:900_7: Ekādasaparikkhārikassa pana kattarayaṭṭhi vā telanāḷikā vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:900_8: Dvādasaparikkhārikassa chattaṃ vā upāhanaṃ vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:900_10: itare asantuṭṭhā mahicchā mahābhārāti na vattabbā.
atk-s0101a0:900_11: Etepi hi appicchāva santuṭṭhāva subharāva sallahukavuttinova.
atk-s0101a0:900_12: Bhagavā pana na yimaṃ suttaṃ tesaṃ vasena kathesi,
atk-s0101a0:900_14: So hi khuddakavāsiñca sūciñca parissāvane pakkhipitvā pattassa anto ṭhapetvā pattaṃ aṃsakūṭe laggetvā
atk-s0101a0:900_15: ticīvaraṃ kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvā yenicchakaṃ sukhaṃ pakkamati.
atk-s0101a0:900_17: Iti imassa bhikkhuno sallahukavuttitaṃ dassento bhagavā –
atk-s0101a0:900_21: Samādāyeva pakkamatīti aṭṭhaparikkhāramattakaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvāva kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvāva gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:900_22: “Mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko”ti āsaṅgo vā bandho vā na hoti.
atk-s0101a0:900_24: yūthā apakkanto madahatthī viya ca icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vanapabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto ekova tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0101a0:906_5: sakuṇā nāma “asukasmiṃ padese rukkho paripakkaphalo”ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapattatuṇḍādīhi tassa phalāni vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti.
atk-s0101a0:906_7: idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī’ti tesaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0101a0:906_8: Phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-s0101a0:906_9: na tattha pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti.
atk-s0101a0:906_10: Atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkho hutvā,
atk-s0101a0:906_13: Evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo nirapekkho yena kāmaṃ pakkamati.
atk-s0101a0:908_3: Yassa hi ime cattāro paccayā natthi,
atk-s0101a0:908_5: Tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi vā saddhiṃ vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0101a0:908_9: “Asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ akāsī”ti ayaso pattharati.
atk-s0101a0:908_12: So hi attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayavayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
atk-s0101a0:908_13: Araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇanti.
atk-s0101a0:908_14: Itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti.
atk-s0101a0:909_7: Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ mañcapīṭhādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0101a0:910_1: “vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā”ti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:910_2: “Mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohana”nti idaṃ mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:910_3: “Cimilikā cammakhaṇḍo tiṇasanthāro paṇṇasanthāro”ti idaṃ santhatasenāsanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:910_4: “Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantī”ti idaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāmāti.
atk-s0101a0:911_0: Idha panassa sakuṇasadisassa cātuddisassa bhikkhuno anucchavikasenāsanaṃ dassento araññaṃ rukkhamūlantiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:911_1: Tattha araññanti nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ araññanti.
atk-s0101a0:911_3: “Āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti idaṃ pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:911_7: Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:911_16: Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni sītāni katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññapetvā
atk-s0101a0:911_17: nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:911_19: ekasmiṃyeva vā umaggasadisaṃ mahāvivaraṃ susānalakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:911_27: Mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti,
atk-s0101a0:911_28: gacchagumbhādīnampi upari palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti.
atk-s0101a0:912_4: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujuṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhike koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-s0101a0:912_6: Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:912_11: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā.
atk-s0101a0:912_14: “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā,
atk-s0101a0:913_1: Abhijjhaṃ loketi ettha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā loko,
atk-s0101a0:913_2: tasmā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu rāgaṃ pahāya kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ayametthattho.
atk-s0101a0:913_5: Abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodhetīti abhijjhāto cittaṃ parimoceti.
atk-s0101a0:913_10: Byāpajjati iminā cittaṃ pūtikummāsādayo viya purimapakatiṃ vijahatīti byāpādo.
atk-s0101a0:913_17: Ālokasaññīti rattimpi divādiṭṭhālokasañjānanasamatthāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya saññāya samannāgato.
atk-s0101a0:913_18: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0101a0:913_24: “Ime nu kho kusalā kathamime kusalā”ti evaṃ na vicikicchati.
atk-s0101a0:913_27: Imesu pana nīvaraṇesu vacanatthalakkhaṇādibhedato yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0101a0:914_1: Yā panāyaṃ seyyathāpi mahārājāti upamā vuttā.
atk-s0101a0:914_2: Tattha iṇaṃ ādāyāti vaḍḍhiyā dhanaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0101a0:914_4: yathā tesaṃ kākaṇikamattopi pariyanto nāma nāvasissati,
atk-s0101a0:915_1: Visabhāgavedanuppattiyā kakaceneva catuiriyāpathaṃ chindanto ābādhatīti ābādho,
atk-s0101a0:916_1: Na cassa kiñci bhogānaṃ vayoti kākaṇikamattampi bhogānaṃ vayo na bhaveyya.
atk-s0101a0:917_2: attano ruciyā kiñci kātuṃ na labhati.
atk-s0101a0:917_3: Parādhīnoti paresu adhīno parasseva ruciyā vattati.
atk-s0101a0:917_4: Na yena kāmaṃ gamoti yena disābhāgenassa gantukāmatā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:918_1: Ime pañca nīvaraṇe appahīneti ettha bhagavā appahīnakāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ iṇasadisaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:918_4: Yo hi paresaṃ iṇaṃ gahetvā vināseti,
atk-s0101a0:918_5: so tehi iṇaṃ dehīti vuccamānopi pharusaṃ vuccamānopi bajjhamānopi vadhīyamānopi kiñci paṭibāhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0101a0:918_10: so tena pharusaṃ vuccamānopi bajjhamānopi vadhīyamānopi sabbaṃ titikkhati,
atk-s0101a0:919_0: Yathā pana pittarogāturo madhusakkarādīsupi dinnesu pittarogāturatāya tesaṃ rasaṃ na vindati,
atk-s0101a0:919_2: Evameva byāpannacitto hitakāmehi ācariyupajjhāyehi appamattakampi ovadiyamāno ovādaṃ na gaṇhati.
atk-s0101a0:919_3: “Ati viya me tumhe upaddavethā”tiādīni vatvā vibbhamati.
atk-s0101a0:919_4: Pittarogāturatāya so puriso madhusakkarādīnaṃ viya kodhāturatāya jhānasukhādibhedaṃ sāsanarasaṃ na vindatīti.
atk-s0101a0:920_0: Yathā pana nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāre baddho puriso nakkhattassa neva ādiṃ na majjhaṃ na pariyosānaṃ passati.
atk-s0101a0:920_1: So dutiyadivase mutto aho hiyyo nakkhattaṃ manāpaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:920_3: aho gītantiādīni sutvāpi paṭivacanaṃ na deti.
atk-s0101a0:920_6: Evameva thinamiddhābhibhūto bhikkhu vicittanayepi dhammassavane pavattamāne neva tassa ādiṃ na majjhaṃ na pariyosānaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0101a0:920_9: aho upamāti dhammassavanassa vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānānaṃ sutvāpi paṭivacanaṃ na deti.
atk-s0101a0:921_4: hatthapādaṃ vā te chindāmi kaṇṇanāsaṃ vā”ti vutto sīghaṃ gacchatiyeva.
atk-s0101a0:921_5: Nakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavituṃ na labhati, kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:921_7: evameva vinaye apakataññunā vivekatthāya araññaṃ paviṭṭhenāpi kismiñcideva antamaso kappiyamaṃsepi akappiyamaṃsasaññāya
atk-s0101a0:921_8: uppannāya vivekaṃ pahāya sīlavisodhanatthaṃ vinayadharassa santikaṃ gantabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:922_0: Yathā pana kantāraddhānamaggappaṭipanno puriso corehi manussānaṃ viluttokāsaṃ pahatokāsañca disvā daṇḍakasaddenapi
atk-s0101a0:922_4: So kicchena kasirena khemantabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti vā na vā pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0101a0:922_5: Evameva yassa aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vicikicchā uppannā hoti, so –
atk-s0101a0:922_7: no nu kho buddho”tiādinā nayena vicikicchanto adhimuccitvā saddhāya gaṇhituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0101a0:922_8: Asakkonto maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā na pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0101a0:922_10: “corā atthi natthī”ti punappunaṃ āsappanaparisappanaṃ apariyogāhanaṃ chambhitattaṃ cittassa uppādento khemantapattiyā antarāyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0101a0:922_13: na buddho”tiādinā nayena punappunaṃ āsappanaparisappanaṃ apariyogāhanaṃ chambhitattaṃ cittassa uppādayamānā
atk-s0101a0:922_14: ariyabhūmippattiyā antarāyaṃ karotīti kantāraddhānamaggo viya vicikicchā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0101a0:923_5: yathā hi puriso iṇaṃ ādāya kammante payojetvā samiddhataṃ patto –
atk-s0101a0:923_6: “idaṃ iṇaṃ nāma palibodhamūla”nti cintetvā savaḍḍhikaṃ iṇaṃ niyyātetvā paṇṇaṃ phālāpeyya.
atk-s0101a0:923_7: Athassa tato paṭṭhāya neva koci dūtaṃ peseti,
atk-s0101a0:923_14: “ayaṃ kāmacchando nāma palibodhamūla”nti cintetvā cha dhamme bhāvetvā kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0101a0:923_15: Te pana cha dhamme mahāsatipaṭṭhāne vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0101a0:923_16: Tassevaṃ pahīnakāmacchandassa yathā iṇamuttassa purisassa iṇassāmike disvā neva bhayaṃ na chambhitattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:923_17: Evameva paravatthumhi neva saṅgo na baddho hoti.
atk-s0101a0:923_18: Dibbānipi rūpāni passato kileso na samudācarati.
atk-s0101a0:924_0: Yathā pana so pittarogāturo puriso bhesajjakiriyāya taṃ rogaṃ vūpasametvā tato paṭṭhāya madhusakkarādīnaṃ rasaṃ vindati.
atk-s0101a0:924_1: Evameva bhikkhu “ayaṃ byāpādo nāma mahā anatthakaro”ti cha dhamme bhāvetvā byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0101a0:924_6: So evaṃ pahīnabyāpādo yathā pittarogavimutto puriso madhusakkarādīnaṃ rasaṃ sampiyāyamāno paṭisevati,
atk-s0101a0:924_7: evameva ācārapaṇṇattiādīni sikkhāpadāni sirasā sampaṭicchitvā sampiyāyamāno sikkhati.
atk-s0101a0:925_0: Yathā so nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāraṃ pavesito puriso aparasmiṃ nakkhattadivase –
atk-s0101a0:925_3: Idāni appamatto bhavissāmī”ti yathāssa paccatthikā okāsaṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0101a0:925_8: “idaṃ thinamiddhaṃ nāma mahāanatthakara”nti cha dhamme bhāvetvā thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0101a0:925_9: so evaṃ pahīnathinamiddho yathā bandhanā mutto puriso sattāhampi nakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavati,
atk-s0101a0:925_10: evameva dhammanakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavanto saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0101a0:925_11: Tasmā bhagavā bandhanā mokkhamiva thinamiddhappahānaṃ āha.
atk-s0101a0:926_0: Yathā pana dāso kiñcideva mittaṃ upanissāya sāmikānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā attānaṃ bhujissaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0101a0:926_3: “idaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ nāma mahā anatthakara”nti cha dhamme bhāvetvā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0101a0:926_4: So evaṃ pahīnauddhaccakukkucco yathā bhujisso puriso yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0101a0:926_6: na taṃ koci balakkārena tato nivatteti,
atk-s0101a0:926_8: na taṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ balakkārena tato nivatteti.
atk-s0101a0:926_9: Tasmā bhagavā bhujissaṃ viya uddhaccakukkuccappahānaṃ āha.
atk-s0101a0:927_0: Yathā balavā puriso hatthasāraṃ gahetvā sajjāvudho saparivāro kantāraṃ paṭipajjeyya,
atk-s0101a0:927_2: So sotthinā taṃ kantāraṃ nittharitvā khemantaṃ patto haṭṭhatuṭṭho assa.
atk-s0101a0:927_3: Evameva bhikkhu “ayaṃ vicikicchā nāma mahā anatthakārikā”ti cha dhamme bhāvetvā vicikicchaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0101a0:927_4: So evaṃ pahīnavicikiccho yathā balavā puriso sajjāvudho saparivāro nibbhayo core tiṇaṃ viya agaṇetvā sotthinā nikkhamitvā khemantabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:927_5: evameva bhikkhu duccaritakantāraṃ nittharitvā paramaṃ khemantabhūmiṃ amataṃ mahānibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0101a0:927_6: Tasmā bhagavā khemantabhūmiṃ viya vicikicchāpahānaṃ āha.
atk-s0101a0:928_2: Pamuditassa pīti jāyatīti tuṭṭhassa sakalasarīraṃ khobhayamānā pīti jāyati.
atk-s0101a0:928_3: Pītimanassa kāyo passambhatīti pītisampayuttacittassa puggalassa nāmakāyo passambhati,
atk-s0101a0:928_5: Sukhaṃ vedetīti kāyikampi cetasikampi sukhaṃ vedayati.
atk-s0101a0:928_6: Cittaṃ samādhiyatīti iminā nekkhammasukhena sukhitassa upacāravasenapi appanāvasenapi cittaṃ samādhiyati.
atk-s0101a0:930_2: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatītiādi pana upacārasamādhinā samāhite citte uparivisesadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:930_3: appanāsamādhinā samāhite citte tassa samādhino pabhedadassanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:930_10: Sabbāvato kāyassāti assa bhikkhuno sabbakoṭṭhāsavato kāyassa kiñci upādinnakasantatipavattiṭṭhāne chavimaṃsalohitānugataṃ
atk-s0101a0:930_11: aṇumattampi ṭhānaṃ paṭhamajjhānasukhena aphuṭaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0101a0:931_1: Dakkhoti cheko paṭibalo nhānīyacuṇṇāni kātuñceva payojetuñca sannetuñca.
atk-s0101a0:931_7: Sanneyyāti vāmahatthena kaṃsathālaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇahatthena pamāṇayuttaṃ udakaṃ siñcitvā siñcitvā parimaddanto piṇḍaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0101a0:931_10: Santarabāhirāti saddhiṃ antopadesena ceva bahipadesena ca sabbatthakameva udakasinehena phuṭāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:931_11: Na ca paggharaṇīti na ca bindu bindu udakaṃ paggharati,
atk-s0101a0:931_12: sakkā hoti hatthenapi dvīhipi tīhipi aṅgulīhi gahetuṃ ovaṭṭikāyapi kātunti attho.
atk-s0101a0:933_11: Sītā vāridhārā ubbhijjitvāti sītaṃ dhāraṃ uggantvā rahadaṃ pūrayamānaṃ ubbhijjitvā.
atk-s0101a0:933_12: Heṭṭhā uggacchanaudakañhi uggantvā uggantvā bhijjantaṃ udakaṃ khobheti,
atk-s0101a0:933_13: catūhi disāhi pavisanaudakaṃ purāṇapaṇṇatiṇakaṭṭhadaṇḍakādīhi udakaṃ khobheti,
atk-s0101a0:933_15: Sannisinnameva pana hutvā iddhinimmitamiva uppajjamānaṃ udakaṃ imaṃ padesaṃ pharati,
atk-s0101a0:935_3: Ettha ca setarattanīlesu yaṃ kiñci uppalaṃ uppalameva.
atk-s0101a0:935_9: Anto nimuggaposīnīti udakatalassa anto nimuggāniyeva hutvā posīni,
atk-s0101a0:937_1: Catutthajjhānasukhūpamāyaṃ parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātenāti ettha nirupakkilesaṭṭhena parisuddhaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:937_6: Imissāya hi upamāya vatthaṃ viya karajakāyo,
atk-s0101a0:937_8: Tasmā yathā sunhātassa purisassa parisuddhaṃ vatthaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nisinnassa sarīrato utu sabbameva vatthaṃ pharati.
atk-s0101a0:937_10: Evaṃ catutthajjhānasukhena bhikkhuno karajakāyassa na koci okāso aphuṭo hotīti.
atk-s0101a0:937_12: Imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ anupadavaṇṇanā ca bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vuttoti idha na vitthārito.
atk-s0101a0:938_2: Na hi aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu cuddasahākārehi ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ vinā upari abhiññādhigamo hoti.
atk-s0101a0:940_2: āneñjappatteti so cuddasahākārehi aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasībhāvo bhikkhūti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:940_4: Ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharatīti ettha ñāṇadassananti maggañāṇampi,
atk-s0101a0:940_10: ñāṇadassanavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti ettha hi maggañāṇaṃ ñāṇadassananti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:940_11: “Ayamañño uttarimanussadhammo alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti ettha phalañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:940_12: “Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇadassanaṃ udapādi sattāhakālaṅkato āḷāro kālāmo”ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:940_13: “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi akuppā me vimutti,
atk-s0101a0:940_14: ayamantimā jātī”ti ettha paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ idha pana ñāṇadassanāya cittanti idaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ ñāṇadassananti vuttanti.
atk-s0101a0:941_0: Abhinīharatīti vipassanāñāṇassa nibbattanatthāya tanninnaṃ tappoṇaṃ tappabbhāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0101a0:941_2: Odanakummāsūpacayoti odanena ceva kummāsena ca upacito vaḍḍhito.
atk-s0101a0:941_6: Daharakāle vā ūrūsu sayāpetvā gabbhāvāsena dussaṇṭhitānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgānaṃ saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ añchanapīḷanādivasena parimaddanadhammo.
atk-s0101a0:941_7: Evaṃ pariharitopi bhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammo bhijjati ceva vikirati ca,
atk-s0101a0:941_9: Tattha rūpī cātumahābhūtikotiādīsu chahi padehi samudayo kathito.
atk-s0101a0:941_11: Ettha sitaṃ ettha paṭibaddhanti ettha cātumahābhūtike kāye nissitañca paṭibaddhañca.
atk-s0101a0:942_9: Evameva khoti ettha evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:942_13: hatthe karitvā paccavekkhato ayaṃ kho maṇīti maṇino āvibhūtakālo viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:942_15: tatridaṃ suttaṃ āvutanti suttassāvibhūtakālo viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:942_16: abhinīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno tadārammaṇānaṃ phassapañcamakānaṃ vā sabbacittacetasikānaṃ vā vipassanāñāṇasseva vā āvibhūtakāloti.
atk-s0101a0:943_1: Evaṃ santepi yasmā abhiññāvāre āraddhe etassa antarāvāro natthi tasmā idheva dassitaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:943_2: Yasmā ca aniccādivasena akatasammasanassa dibbāya sotadhātuyā bheravaṃ saddaṃ suṇato,
atk-s0101a0:943_4: dibbena cakkhunā bheravampi rūpaṃ passato bhayasantāso uppajjati,
atk-s0101a0:943_5: na aniccādivasena katasammasanassa tasmā abhiññaṃ pattassa bhayavinodanahetusampādanatthampi idaṃ idheva dassitaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:943_6: Api ca yasmā vipassanāsukhaṃ nāmetaṃ maggaphalasukhasampādakaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ tasmāpi āditova idaṃ idha dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:945_2: Sabbaṅgapaccaṅginti sabbehi aṅgehi ca paccaṅgehi ca samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0101a0:945_4: Iddhimatā nimmitarūpañhi sace iddhimā odāto tampi odātaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:945_5: Sace aviddhakaṇṇo tampi aviddhakaṇṇanti evaṃ sabbākārehi tena sadisameva hoti.
atk-s0101a0:945_6: Muñjamhā īsikantiādi upamāttayampi hi sadisabhāvadassanatthameva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:945_7: Muñjasadisā eva hi tassa anto īsikā hoti.
atk-s0101a0:945_14: Tattha kiñcāpi “puriso ahiṃ karaṇḍā uddhareyyā”ti hatthena uddharamāno viya dassito,
atk-s0101a0:945_19: sarīraṃ khādayamānaṃ viya purāṇatacaṃ jigucchantoti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi sayameva kañcukaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0101a0:945_21: tasmā cittena uddharaṇaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:945_25: Nimmānavidhānaṃ panettha parato ca iddhividhādipañcaabhiññākathā sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:947_1: Tattha chekakumbhakārādayo viya iddhividhañāṇalābhī bhikkhu daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:947_3: Icchiticchitabhājanavikatiādikaraṇaṃ viya tassa bhikkhuno vikubbanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:948_1: Dibbasotadhātuupamāyaṃ yasmā kantāraddhānamaggo sāsaṅko hoti sappaṭibhayo.
atk-s0101a0:948_4: tasmā kantāraggahaṇaṃ akatvā khemamaggaṃ dassento addhānamaggappaṭipannoti āha.
atk-s0101a0:948_5: Appaṭibhayañhi khemamaggaṃ sīse sāṭakaṃ katvā saṇikaṃ paṭipanno vuttappakāre sadde sukhaṃ vavatthapeti.
atk-s0101a0:948_6: Tassa savanena tesaṃ tesaṃ saddānaṃ āvibhūtakālo viya yogino dūrasantikabhedānaṃ dibbānañceva mānussakānañca saddānaṃ āvibhūtakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:949_3: Maṇḍanakajātikoti yuvāpi samāno na ālasiyo na kiliṭṭhavatthasarīro,
atk-s0101a0:949_5: divasassa dve tayo vāre nhāyitvā suddhavatthaparidahanaalaṅkārakaraṇasīloti attho.
atk-s0101a0:949_7: Tattha yathā tassa mukhanimittaṃ paccavekkhato mukhe doso pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0101a0:949_8: evaṃ cetopariyañāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno paresaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ cittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:950_1: Pubbenivāsañāṇūpamāyaṃ taṃ divasaṃ katakiriyā pākaṭā hotīti taṃ divasaṃ gatagāmattayameva gahitaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:950_3: tayo gāmā viya tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā,
atk-s0101a0:950_4: tassa purisassa tīsu gāmesu taṃ divasaṃ katakiriyāya āvibhāvo viya pubbenivāsāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā
atk-s0101a0:950_5: nisinnassa bhikkhuno tīsu bhavesu katakiriyāya pākaṭabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:951_4: Tattha nagaramajjhe siṅghāṭakamhi pāsādo viya imassa bhikkhuno karajakāyo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0101a0:951_5: pāsāde ṭhito cakkhumā puriso viya ayameva dibbacakkhuṃ patvā ṭhito bhikkhu,
atk-s0101a0:951_6: gehaṃ pavisantā viya paṭisandhivasena mātukucchiyaṃ pavisantā,
atk-s0101a0:951_8: rathikāya vīthiṃ sañcarantā viya aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakasattā,
atk-s0101a0:951_9: purato abbhokāsaṭṭhāne majjhe siṅghāṭake nisinnā viya tīsu bhavesu tattha tattha nibbattasattā,
atk-s0101a0:951_10: pāsādatale ṭhitapurisassa tesaṃ manussānaṃ āvibhūtakālo viya dibbacakkhuñāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā nisinnassa
atk-s0101a0:951_11: bhikkhuno tīsu bhavesu nibbattasattānaṃ āvibhūtakālo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:953_1: So evaṃ samāhite citteti idha vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:953_3: Ettha ca āsavānaṃ khayo nāma maggopi phalampi nibbānampi bhaṅgopi vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:953_5: anuppāde ñāṇa”nti ettha hi maggo āsavānaṃ khayoti vutto.
atk-s0101a0:955_0: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:956_1: “Āsavānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo aniccatā antaradhāna”nti ettha bhaṅgo.
atk-s0101a0:957_0: Cittaṃ abhinīharatīti vipassanā cittaṃ tanninnaṃ tappoṇaṃ tappabbhāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0101a0:957_2: na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:957_3: Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti.
atk-s0101a0:957_6: tassa ca sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:958_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā puna kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento “ime āsavā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:958_1: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa bhikkhuno evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa,
atk-s0101a0:958_8: Tena hi ñāṇena khīṇāsavo paccavekkhanto khīṇā jātītiādīni pajānāti.
atk-s0101a0:959_8: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti,
atk-s0101a0:959_9: sā maggassa bhāvitattā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā.
atk-s0101a0:959_10: Taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā “kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃva hotī”ti jānanto pajānāti.
atk-s0101a0:960_2: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma,
atk-s0101a0:960_4: tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto vusitaṃ brahmacariyanti pajānāti.
atk-s0101a0:960_5: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhaṃ kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:960_10: Tasmā so attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto kataṃ karaṇīyanti pajānāti.
atk-s0101a0:960_11: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayabhāvāya vā kattabbaṃ maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti.
atk-s0101a0:960_12: Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvato imasmā evaṃ pakārā.
atk-s0101a0:960_13: Idāni vattamānakhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi.
atk-s0101a0:960_14: Ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya,
atk-s0101a0:960_15: te carimakacittanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissanti apaṇṇattikabhāvañca gamissantīti pajānāti.
atk-s0101a0:961_8: Yathā pana antarantarā ṭhitāsupi nisinnāsupi vijjamānāsupi “etā gāvo carantī”ti carantiyo upādāya itarāpi carantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0101a0:961_9: Evaṃ tiṭṭhantameva sakkharakathalaṃ upādāya itarampi dvayaṃ tiṭṭhantanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:961_10: Itarañca dvayaṃ carantaṃ upādāya sakkharakathalampi carantanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:961_11: Tattha cakkhumato purisassa tīre ṭhatvā passato sippikasambukādīnaṃ vibhūtakālo viya āsavānaṃ khayāya
atk-s0101a0:961_12: cittaṃ abhinīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno catunnaṃ saccānaṃ vibhūtakālo daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0101a0:962_14: Uttaritaraṃ vā paṇītataraṃ vāti yena kenaci pariyāyena ito seṭṭhataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ nāma natthīti bhagavā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0101a0:964_1: Rājā tattha tattha sādhukāraṃ pavattento ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ sakkaccaṃ sutvā “ciraṃ vatamhi ime pañhe puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchanto,
atk-s0101a0:964_2: thuse koṭṭento viya kiñci sāraṃ nālatthaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:964_4: yo me dīpasahassaṃ jālento viya mahantaṃ ālokaṃ katvā ime pañhe vissajjesi.
atk-s0101a0:964_5: Suciraṃ vatamhi dasabalassa guṇānubhāvaṃ ajānanto vañcito”ti cintetvā buddhaguṇānussaraṇasambhūtāya pañcavidhāya
atk-s0101a0:964_6: pītiyā phuṭasarīro attano pasādaṃ āvikaronto upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesi.
atk-s0101a0:965_6: imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
atk-s0101a0:966_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:968_5: tasmā ‘sādhu sādhu bhante’ti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:970_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budhoti.
atk-s0101a0:971_2: Athavā abhikkantanti abhikantaṃ atiiṭṭhaṃ atimanāpaṃ atisundaranti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:972_5: ‘abhikkantaṃ’ yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti.
atk-s0101a0:972_6: Bhagavatoyeva vā vacanaṃ dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi.
atk-s0101a0:973_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi.
atk-s0101a0:973_6: Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti vadeyya,
atk-s0101a0:973_11: evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhamme patitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentana.
atk-s0101a0:973_13: evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānā pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena,
atk-s0101a0:973_18: mayhaṃ bhagavatā etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0101a0:974_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto esāhantiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:974_2: Bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti bhagavā me saraṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:974_6: Iminā adhippāyena bhagavantaṃ gacchāmi bhajāmi sevāmi payirupāsāmi,
atk-s0101a0:974_10: Tasmā gacchāmīti imassa jānāmi bujjhāmīti ayampi attho vutto.
atk-s0101a0:974_11: Dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ettha pana adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo,
atk-s0101a0:974_16: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0101a0:974_18: Api ca kho ariyaphalehi saddhiṃ pariyattidhammopi.
atk-s0101a0:977_3: Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā dhammakkhandhāti.
atk-s0101a0:979_0: Aṭṭha ca puggaladhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:980_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho bhikkhusaṅgho. Ettāvatā rājā tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi.
atk-s0101a0:982_9: Saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiparikilesaṃ hanati vināsetīti attho,
atk-s0101a0:983_0: Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati buddho.
atk-s0101a0:983_6: Vuttappakārena cittuppādena etāni me tīṇi ratanāni saraṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:984_2: Tattha lokuttaraṃ diṭṭhasaccānaṃ maggakkhaṇe saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati.
atk-s0101a0:984_3: Lokiyaṃ puthujjanānaṃ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā ijjhati.
atk-s0101a0:984_4: Taṃ atthato buddhādīsu vatthūsu saddhāpaṭilābho saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi dasasu puññakiriyavatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:985_12: saṅghassa antevāsiko’ti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ sissabhāvūpagamo.
atk-s0101a0:985_14: “ajjādiṃ katvā ahaṃ abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānaañjalikammasāmīcikammaṃ buddhādīnaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ karomī’ti
atk-s0101a0:985_16: Imesañhi catunnaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarampi karontena gahitaṃyeva hoti saraṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:986_16: Evampi mahākassapassa saraṇagamanaṃ viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:987_0: “So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
atk-s0101a0:989_0: Evampi āḷavakādīnaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:989_1: Atha kho brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati,
atk-s0101a0:989_7: bho gotama brāhmaṇo”ti evampi paṇipāto daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:990_5: Tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo vā –
atk-s0101a0:990_8: “samaṇo gotamo rājapūjito mahānubhāvo avandīyamāno anatthampi kareyyā”ti bhayena vandati,
atk-s0101a0:990_10: Yo vā bodhisattakāle bhagavato santike kiñci uggahitaṃ saramāno buddhakāle vā –
atk-s0101a0:992_0: Ekena bhogaṃ bhuñjeyya, dvīhi kammaṃ payojaye;
atk-s0101a0:995_0: Evaṃ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṃ –
atk-s0101a0:995_1: “ñātako me aya”nti vandato saraṇagamanaṃ na bhijjati,
atk-s0101a0:995_4: So hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandīyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti.
atk-s0101a0:995_5: Tathā yaṃ kiñci sippaṃ sikkhāpakaṃ titthiyampi –
atk-s0101a0:996_0: Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:997_0: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
atk-s0101a0:1001_0: Etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:1003_0: Api ca niccādito anupagamanādivasena petassa ānisaṃsaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1003_3: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya…pe…
atk-s0101a0:1003_13: Lokiyassa pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva.
atk-s0101a0:1004_0: “Ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0101a0:1006_1: “atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami…pe…
atk-s0101a0:1006_2: ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca –
atk-s0101a0:1006_8: evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti…pe…
atk-s0101a0:1006_9: te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti –
atk-s0101a0:1006_15: dibbehi rūpehi saddehi gandhehi rasehi phoṭṭhabbehī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1006_16: Esa nayo dhamme ca saṅghe ca.
atk-s0101a0:1006_17: Api ca velāmasuttādīnaṃ vasenāpi saraṇagamanassa phalaviseso veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1007_0: Tattha ca lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṃkilissati,
atk-s0101a0:1007_11: Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisatīti.
atk-s0101a0:1007_12: Evaṃ saraṇagamanassa saṃkileso ca bhedo ca veditabboti.
atk-s0101a0:1008_0: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhante bhagavā dhāretūti maṃ bhagavā “upāsako aya”nti evaṃ dhāretu,
atk-s0101a0:1009_0: Tattha ko upāsakoti yo koci saraṇagato gahaṭṭho.
atk-s0101a0:1010_0: Kasmā upāsakoti ratanattayaṃ upāsanato. So hi buddhaṃ upāsatīti upāsako, tathā dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1012_0: Ko ājīvoti pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvitakappanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1013_0: Kā vipattīti yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti,
atk-s0101a0:1013_2: Api ca yāya esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1013_5: Te ca atthato assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti. Yathāha – “pañcahi,
atk-s0101a0:1013_7: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1014_0: Kā sampattīti yā cassa sīlasampadā ceva ājīvasampadā ca,
atk-s0101a0:1014_2: ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā saddhādayo pañca dhammā. Yathāha – “pañcahi,
atk-s0101a0:1015_3: āvarāmi dvāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati.
atk-s0101a0:1015_6: “Ambilaggaṃ vā madhuraggaṃ vā tittakaggaṃ vā vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā,
atk-s0101a0:1015_11: Tasmā ajjataggeti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvāti evametthattho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1016_2: tāva upetaṃ anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu jānātu.
atk-s0101a0:1016_3: Ahañhi sacepi me tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindeyya,
atk-s0101a0:1017_0: Evaṃ attasanniyyātanena saraṇaṃ gantvā attanā kataṃ aparādhaṃ pakāsento accayo maṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1017_3: Maṃ accagamāti maṃ atikkamma abhibhavitvā pavatto.
atk-s0101a0:1017_4: Dhammikaṃ dhammarājānanti ettha dhammaṃ caratīti dhammiko.
atk-s0101a0:1017_10: Puna evarūpassa aparādhassa dosassa khalitassa akaraṇatthāya.
atk-s0101a0:1018_2: Yathā dhammaṃ paṭikarosīti yathā dhammo ṭhito tatheva karosi,
atk-s0101a0:1018_4: Taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti taṃ tava aparādhaṃ mayaṃ khamāma.
atk-s0101a0:1018_7: ariyassa vinaye buddhassa bhagavato sāsane vuḍḍhi nāma. Katamā?
atk-s0101a0:1018_8: Yāyaṃ accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaritvā āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā,
atk-s0101a0:1019_2: Handa ca dāni mayaṃ bhanteti ettha handāti vacasāyatthe nipāto.
atk-s0101a0:1019_6: Yassadāni tvanti yassa idāni tvaṃ mahārāja gamanassa kālaṃ maññasi jānāsi,
atk-s0101a0:1019_7: tassa kālaṃ tvameva jānāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1019_8: Padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmīti tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi
atk-s0101a0:1019_9: patiṭṭhapetvā yāva dassanavisayaṃ bhagavato abhimukhova paṭikkamitvā dassanavijahanaṭṭhānabhūmiyaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0101a0:1020_18: idāni idhevāsane nisinno sotāpattimaggaṃ patto abhavissa,
atk-s0101a0:1020_20: Evaṃ santepi yasmā ayaṃ tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ gato,
atk-s0101a0:1020_21: tasmā mama sāsanamahantatāya yathā nāma koci purisassa vadhaṃ katvā pupphamuṭṭhimattena daṇḍena mucceyya,
atk-s0101a0:1020_22: evameva lohakumbhiyaṃ nibbattitvā tiṃsavassasahassāni adho patanto heṭṭhimatalaṃ patvā tiṃsavassasahassāni
atk-s0101a0:1020_23: uddhaṃ gacchanto punapi uparimatalaṃ pāpuṇitvā muccissatīti idampi kira bhagavatā vuttameva,
atk-s0101a0:1021_0: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ sutvā raññā koci ānisaṃso laddhoti?
atk-s0101a0:1021_2: Ayañhi pitu māritakālato paṭṭhāya neva rattiṃ na divā niddaṃ labhati,
atk-s0101a0:1021_3: satthāraṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā imāya madhurāya ojavantiyā dhammadesanāya sutakālato paṭṭhāya niddaṃ labhi.
atk-s0101a0:1021_5: Pothujjanikāya saddhāya samannāgato nāma iminā raññā sadiso nāhosi.
atk-s0101a0:1021_6: Anāgate pana vijitāvī nāma paccekabuddho hutvā parinibbāyissatīti.
atk-s0101a0:1021_8: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
atk-s0101a0:1024_5: Tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado rūḷhīsaddena kosalāti vuccati,
atk-s0101a0:1024_8: yasmā pubbe mahāpanādaṃ rājakumāraṃ nānānāṭakādīni disvā sitamattampi akarontaṃ sutvā rājā āha –
atk-s0101a0:1024_11: Tato naṅgalānipi chaḍḍetvā mahājanakāye sannipatite manussā sātirekāni sattavassāni nānākīḷāyo dassetvāpi taṃ hasāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0101a0:1024_14: Atha te manussā attano attano vasanokāsābhimukhā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1024_15: Te paṭipathe mittasuhajjādayo disvā paṭisanthāraṃ karontā –
atk-s0101a0:1024_18: Tasmā taṃ “kusala”nti vacanaṃ upādāya so padeso kosalāti vuccatīti.
atk-s0101a0:1025_1: Cārikā ca nāmesā bhagavato duvidhā hoti –
atk-s0101a0:1025_4: Tattha dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa bodhanatthāya sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā nāma,
atk-s0101a0:1025_6: Bhagavā hi mahākassapattheraṃ paccuggacchanto muhuttena tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1026_5: bhagavā kira vanavāsissa tissasāmaṇerassa santikaṃ gamissatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1026_6: Tato dutiyadivase vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivāro ākāse uppatitvā vīsatiyojanasatamatthake tassa gocaragāmadvāre otaritvā cīvaraṃ pārupi.
atk-s0101a0:1026_9: mā kammantaṃ agamitthā”ti vatvā āsanāni paññapetvā yāguṃ datvā pātarāsabhattaṃ karontā – “kuhiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1026_13: “amhākaṃ kulūpakassa kira therassa dassanatthāya satthā āgato,
atk-s0101a0:1026_14: no vata no thero oramattako”ti somanassajātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1027_0: Atha kho bhagavato bhattakiccapariyosāne sāmaṇero gāme piṇḍāya caritvā – “upāsakā,
atk-s0101a0:1027_5: Satthā tassa pattaṃ hatthena gahetvā – “alaṃ, tissa,
atk-s0101a0:1027_7: Tato upajjhāyaṃ āpucchitvā attano pattāsane nisīditvā bhattakiccamakāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1027_8: Athassa bhattakiccapariyosāne satthā maṅgalaṃ vatvā nikkhamitvā gāmadvāre ṭhatvā –
atk-s0101a0:1027_13: Bhagavā kira sadevakassa lokassa maggadesakopi samāno sakale tigāvute magge ‘sāmaṇeraṃ daṭṭhuṃ lacchāmī’ti taṃ maggadesakaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1028_0: So attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhagavato vattamakāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1028_3: caṅkamo”ti pucchitvā tattha gantvā sāmaṇerassa nisīdanapāsāṇe nisīditvā – “tissa,
atk-s0101a0:1028_4: imasmiṃ ṭhāne sukhaṃ vasī”ti pucchi. So āha – “āma, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1028_5: imasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantassa sīhabyagghahatthimigamorādīnaṃ saddaṃ suṇato araññasaññā uppajjati,
atk-s0101a0:1028_9: buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī”ti vatvā sannipatite bhikkhusaṅghe upasampādetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsīti.
atk-s0101a0:1028_11: Yaṃ pana gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā devasikaṃ yojanadviyojanavasena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1029_0: Imaṃ pana cārikaṃ caranto bhagavā mahāmaṇḍalaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1029_2: antomaṇḍalanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maṇḍalānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ carati.
atk-s0101a0:1029_10: Itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro mahāmaṇḍale osarati.
atk-s0101a0:1029_11: Tattha bhagavā tesu tesu gāmanigamesu ekāhaṃ dvīhaṃ vasanto mahājanaṃ āmisappaṭiggahena anuggaṇhanto
atk-s0101a0:1029_12: dhammadānena cassa vivaṭṭasannissitaṃ kusalaṃ vaḍḍhento navahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti.
atk-s0101a0:1029_13: Sace pana antovasse bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanā taruṇā honti,
atk-s0101a0:1029_14: mahāpavāraṇāya apavāretvā pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ datvā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ pavāretvā migasirassa paṭhamapāṭipadadivase
atk-s0101a0:1029_16: Aññenapi kāraṇena majjhimamaṇḍale cārikaṃ caritukāmo catumāsaṃ vasitvāva nikkhamati.
atk-s0101a0:1029_17: Vuttanayeneva itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro majjhimamaṇḍale osarati.
atk-s0101a0:1029_18: Bhagavā purimanayeneva lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto aṭṭhahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti.
atk-s0101a0:1029_19: Sace pana catumāsaṃ vutthavassassāpi bhagavato veneyyasattā aparipakkindriyā honti,
atk-s0101a0:1029_20: tesaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno aparampi ekamāsaṃ vā dviticatumāsaṃ vā tattheva vasitvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro nikkhamati.
atk-s0101a0:1029_21: Vuttanayeneva itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro antomaṇḍale osarati.
atk-s0101a0:1029_22: Bhagavā purimanayeneva lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto sattahi vā chahi vā pañcahi vā catūhi vā māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti.
atk-s0101a0:1029_23: Iti imesu tīsu maṇḍalesu yattha katthaci cārikaṃ caranto na cīvarādihetu carati.
atk-s0101a0:1029_26: Mayi pana cārikaṃ carante mahājano tathāgatassa dassanaṃ labhissati.
atk-s0101a0:1029_31: Taṃ nesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti.
atk-s0101a0:1030_0: Api ca catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti,
atk-s0101a0:1030_5: Aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchissantīti vā, dhammaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1030_7: mahatā dhammavassena catasso parisā santappessāmīti vā.
atk-s0101a0:1030_8: Aparehipi pañcahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti pāṇātipātā viramissantīti vā,
atk-s0101a0:1030_12: Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0101a0:1030_16: Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0101a0:1031_0: Tadā kira bhagavato pacchimayāmakiccapariyosāne dasasahassilokadhātuyā ñāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā bodhaneyyabandhave
atk-s0101a0:1031_2: Atha bhagavā ayaṃ brāhmaṇo mayhaṃ ñāṇajāle paññāyati,
atk-s0101a0:1031_3: “atthi nu khvassa upanissayo”ti vīmaṃsanto sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ disvā –
atk-s0101a0:1031_4: “eso mayi etaṃ janapadaṃ gate lakkhaṇapariyesanatthaṃ ambaṭṭhaṃ antevāsiṃ pahiṇissati,
atk-s0101a0:1031_5: so mayā saddhiṃ vādapaṭivādaṃ katvā nānappakāraṃ asabbhivākyaṃ vakkhati,
atk-s0101a0:1031_8: athassācariyo taṃ kathaṃ sutvā āgamma mama lakkhaṇāni pariyesissati,
atk-s0101a0:1031_11: Desanā mahājanassa saphalā bhavissatī”ti pañcabhikkhusataparivāro taṃ janapadaṃ paṭipanno.
atk-s0101a0:1031_13: “kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1032_0: Yena icchānaṅgalanti yena disābhāgena icchānaṅgalaṃ avasaritabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1032_7: Icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍeti icchānaṅgalaṃ upanissāya icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe sīlakhandhāvāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1032_8: bandhitvā samādhikontaṃ ussāpetvā sabbaññutaññāṇasaraṃ parivattayamāno dhammarājā yathābhirucitena vihārena viharati.
atk-s0101a0:1034_1: Tena kho pana samayenāti yena samayena bhagavā tattha viharati,
atk-s0101a0:1034_16: Hatthapādatalāni ceva mukhadvārañca katalākhārasaparikammaṃ viya sobhati,
atk-s0101a0:1034_18: Arājake ṭhāne rājānaṃ kātuṃ yuttamimaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1035_0: Ayaṃ pana kassapasammāsambuddhakāle tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū dasabalassa dānaṃ datvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0101a0:1035_1: So tato manussalokamāgacchanto mātukucchivāsaṃ jigucchitvā himavantapadese mahāsare padumagabbhe nibbatti.
atk-s0101a0:1035_2: Tassa ca sarassa avidūre tāpaso paṇṇasālāya vasati.
atk-s0101a0:1035_3: So tīre ṭhito taṃ padumaṃ disvā –
atk-s0101a0:1035_7: Tāpaso kasmā nu kho idaṃ sattāhenāpi na pupphati.
atk-s0101a0:1035_10: Athassabbhantare suvaṇṇacuṇṇapiñjaraṃ viya rajatabimbakaṃ padumareṇupiñjaraṃ setavaṇṇaṃ dārakaṃ addasa.
atk-s0101a0:1035_12: Handa naṃ paṭijaggāmīti paṇṇasālaṃ netvā paṭijaggitvā sattavassakālato paṭṭhāya tayo vede uggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0101a0:1035_13: Dārako tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṃ gantvā paṇḍito byatto jambudīpe aggabrāhmaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1035_14: So aparena samayena rañño kosalassa sippaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0101a0:1035_15: Athassa sippe pasanno rājā ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma mahānagaraṃ brahmadeyyaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1035_16: Iti naṃ pokkhare sayitattā pokkharasātīti sañjānanti.
atk-s0101a0:1036_2: Tassa nagarassa sāmiko hutvā yāya mariyādāya tattha vasitabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1036_4: Tassa kira nagarassa vatthuṃ ukkā ṭhapetvā ukkāsu jalamānāsu aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1037_3: Yasmā panetaṃ nagaraṃ bahi āvijjhitvā jātena hatthiassādīnaṃ ghāsatiṇena ceva gehacchādanatiṇena ca sampannaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1037_5: Yasmā cassabbhantare vaṭṭacaturassādisaṇṭhānā bahū pokkharaṇiyo jalajakusumavicittāni ca bahūni anekāni taḷākāni udakassa niccabharitāneva honti,
atk-s0101a0:1037_7: Saha dhaññenāti sadhaññaṃ pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇādibhedaṃ bahudhaññasannicayanti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1037_8: Ettāvatā yasmiṃ nagare brāhmaṇo setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā rājalīlāya vasati,
atk-s0101a0:1038_7: Atha vā rājabhogganti sabbaṃ chejjabhejjaṃ anusāsantena nadītitthapabbatādīsu suṅkaṃ gaṇhantena setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā raññā hutvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1038_8: Raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinnaṃ rājadāyanti ettha taṃ nagaraṃ raññā dinnattā rājadāyaṃ dāyakarājadīpanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1038_9: panassa “raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinna”nti idaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1038_11: Yathā dinnaṃ na puna gahetabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1039_4: nāssa koci savanantarāyo ahosīti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1040_15: Tasmā samaṇo khalu bho gotamoti ettha samaṇo kira bho gotamagottoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1041_2: Kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1041_5: Sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho pana.
atk-s0101a0:1041_7: Tathārūpānaṃ arahatanti yathārūpo so bhavaṃ gotamo,
atk-s0101a0:1041_8: evarūpānaṃ yathābhūtaguṇādhigamena loke arahantoti laddhasaddhānaṃ arahataṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1041_9: Dassanaṃ hotīti pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīletvā dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti,
atk-s0101a0:1043_4: ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakā tveva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti,
atk-s0101a0:1043_7: Mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṃsāvacanaṃ katvā voharanti.
atk-s0101a0:1044_2: Saha nighaṇḍunā ca keṭubhena ca sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1044_7: Itihāsapañcamānanti āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā itiha āsa,
atk-s0101a0:1044_8: itiha āsāti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā,
atk-s0101a0:1045_0: Padaṃ tadavasesañca byākaraṇaṃ adhīyati vedeti cāti padako veyyākaraṇo.
atk-s0101a0:1045_2: Mahāpurisalakkhaṇanti mahāpurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇadīpakaṃ dvādasasahassaganthapamāṇaṃ satthaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1045_4: yesaṃ vasena iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgatā buddhā nāma honti,
atk-s0101a0:1046_2: Avayo nāma yo tāni atthato ca ganthato ca sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0101a0:1046_6: “Āma ācariyā”ti attanā tassa paṭivacanadānapaṭiññāya paṭiññātoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1046_9: Esa kira brāhmaṇo cintesi “imasmiṃ loke ‘ahaṃ buddho,
atk-s0101a0:1046_10: ahaṃ buddho’ti uggatassa nāmaṃ gahetvā bahū janā vicaranti.
atk-s0101a0:1046_11: Tasmā na me anussavamatteneva upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1048_2: tanti ettha kathaṃ panāhaṃ bho taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ jānissāmi,
atk-s0101a0:1048_7: Kenākārenāhaṃ taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ jānissāmīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1048_8: Evaṃ vutte kira naṃ upajjhāyo “kiṃ tvaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0101a0:1048_12: candimasūriye na passāmīti viya vadasī”tiādīni vatvā jānanākāraṃ dassento āgatāni kho,
atk-s0101a0:1049_1: Tathāgato kira uppajjissatīti paṭikacceva suddhāvāsā devā vedesu lakkhaṇāni pakkhipitvā buddhamantā nāmeteti brāhmaṇaveseneva vede vācenti.
atk-s0101a0:1050_0: Tattha kiñcāpi yehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato rājā cakkavattī hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1050_5: Sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasatīti yadi agāre vasati.
atk-s0101a0:1050_11: parahitāya ca iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto etasmiṃ atthīti cakkavattī.
atk-s0101a0:1050_16: Dhammena rajjaṃ labhitvā rājā jātoti dhammarājā.
atk-s0101a0:1050_22: Ajjhattaṃ kopādipaccatthike bahiddhā ca sabbarājāno vijetīti vijitāvī.
atk-s0101a0:1050_25: Janapado vā tamhi thāvariyappatto anuyutto sakammanirato acalo asampavedhīti janapadatthāvariyappatto.
atk-s0101a0:1051_5: Imesu pana ratanesu ayaṃ cakkavattirājā cakkaratanena ajitaṃ jināti,
atk-s0101a0:1051_15: Visesato cassa purimāni tīṇi adosakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvena sampajjanti,
atk-s0101a0:1051_19: Vitthāro pana bojjhaṅgasaṃyutte ratanasuttassa upadesato gahetabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1052_10: Parasenappamaddanāti sace paṭimukhaṃ tiṭṭheyya parasenā taṃ parimaddituṃ samatthāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0101a0:1052_12: Arahaṃ hoti sammāsambuddho loke vivaṭṭacchadoti ettha rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhiavijjāduccaritachadanehi
atk-s0101a0:1052_13: sattahi paṭicchanne kilesandhakāre loke taṃ chadanaṃ vivaṭṭetvā samantato sañjātāloko hutvā ṭhitoti vivaṭṭacchado.
atk-s0101a0:1052_18: Atha vā vivaṭṭo ca vicchado cāti vivaṭṭacchado,
atk-s0101a0:1052_21: sammāsambuddho chadanābhāvenāti evaṃ purimapadadvayasseva hetudvayaṃ vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1052_28: Tvaṃ mantānaṃ paṭiggahetāti iminā’ssa mantesu sūrabhāvaṃ janeti.
atk-s0101a0:1053_1: Sopi tāya ācariyakathāya lakkhaṇesu vigatasammoho ekobhāsajāte viya buddhamante sampassamāno evaṃ bhoti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1053_6: Brāhmaṇo kira yena rathena sayaṃ vicarati,
atk-s0101a0:1054_0: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmīti yattakaṃ sakkā hoti yānena gantuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1055_0: Tena kho pana samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye ambaṭṭho ārāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0101a0:1055_6: Tādisānañhi pacchābhattaṃ caṅkamitvā nhāyitvā sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetvā nisajja samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1055_8: “kuhiṃ samaṇo gotamo”ti pariveṇato pariveṇaṃ anāgantvā “pucchitvāva pavisissāmī”ti vilokento araññahatthī
atk-s0101a0:1055_9: viya mahācaṅkame caṅkamamāne paṃsukūlike bhikkhū disvā tesaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1055_10: Taṃ sandhāya yena te bhikkhūtiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1056_2: Tadā kira jambudīpe ambaṭṭhakulaṃ nāma pākaṭakulamahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1056_5: Yo hi ambaṭṭhaṃ ñāpetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-s0101a0:1056_6: tassa tena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo garu bhaveyya.
atk-s0101a0:1056_7: Bhagavato pana tādisānaṃ māṇavānaṃ satenāpi sahassenāpi pañhaṃ puṭṭhassa vissajjane dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti maññamānā –
atk-s0101a0:1057_1: saṇikaṃ padappamāṇaṭṭhāne padaṃ nikkhipanto vattaṃ katvā susammaṭṭhaṃ muttādalasinduvārasantharasadisaṃ vālikaṃ avināsentoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1057_5: Ākoṭehīti agganakhehi saṇikaṃ kuñcikacchiddasamīpe ākoṭehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1057_8: Tathā anākoṭetvā majjhe chiddasamīpe koṭetabbanti idaṃ dvārākoṭanavattanti dīpentā vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:1058_1: Vivari bhagavā dvāranti na bhagavā uṭṭhāya dvāraṃ vivari.
atk-s0101a0:1058_3: Tato “bhagavā tumhehi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu dānaṃ dadamānehi na sahatthā dvāravivaraṇakammaṃ kata”nti sayameva dvāraṃ vivaṭaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1058_4: Taṃ pana yasmā bhagavato manena vivaṭaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1058_5: tasmā vivari bhagavā dvāranti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:1059_0: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsūti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tehi,
atk-s0101a0:1059_1: evaṃ tepi bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1059_2: Sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1059_7: kacci bhoto ca gotamassa sāvakānañca appābādhaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1059_11: taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1059_12: atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ arahabhāvato saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1059_17: Evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1060_0: Ambaṭṭho pana māṇavoti so kira bhagavato rūpasampattiyaṃ cittappasādamattampi akatvā “dasabalaṃ apasādessāmī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1060_1: udare baddhasāṭakaṃ muñcitvā kaṇṭhe olambetvā ekena hatthena dussakaṇṇaṃ gahetvā caṅkamaṃ abhirūhitvā
atk-s0101a0:1060_13: ‘te bahujanā rājapabbajitoti ca buddho’ti ca uppannabahumānā paṇītaṃ ojavantamāhāraṃ denti. Passatha, bho, gehaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1060_18: kiṃ evarūpe ṭhāne vasantassa samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ dukkara”nti evarūpaṃ uppaṇḍanakathaṃ anācārabhāvasāraṇīyaṃ katheti,
atk-s0101a0:1060_20: “ambaṭṭho pana māṇavo caṅkamantopi nisinnena bhagavatā kiñci kiñci kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāreti,
