atk-s0101a0:1060_21: ṭhitopi nisinnena bhagavatā kiñci kiñci kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1061_2: “ayaṃ māṇavo hatthaṃ pasāretvā bhavaggaṃ gahetukāmo viya,
atk-s0101a0:1061_5: sineruṃ ārohitukāmo viya ca aṭṭhāne vāyamati, handa,
atk-s0101a0:1061_6: tena saddhiṃ mantemī”ti ambaṭṭhaṃ māṇavaṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0101a0:1061_7: Ācariyapācariyehīti ācariyehi ca tesaṃ ācariyehi ca.
atk-s0101a0:1063_1: Gacchanto vāti ettha kāmaṃ tīsu iriyāpathesu brāhmaṇo ācariyabrāhmaṇena saddhiṃ sallapitumarahati.
atk-s0101a0:1063_2: Ayaṃ pana māṇavo mānathaddhatāya kathāsallāpaṃ karonto cattāropi iriyāpathe yojessāmīti “sayāno vā hi,
atk-s0101a0:1064_4: nisinnassa vā nisinnenācariyena saddhiṃ kathā nāma sabbācariyesu labbhati.
atk-s0101a0:1064_5: Tvaṃ pana sayāno sayānenācariyena saddhiṃ kathesi,
atk-s0101a0:1064_12: Tattha muṇḍe muṇḍāti samaṇe ca samaṇāti vattuṃ vaṭṭeyya.
atk-s0101a0:1064_13: Ayaṃ pana hīḷento muṇḍakā samaṇakāti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1064_27: Evaṃ kathento ca panesa kiñcāpi aniyametvā katheti.
atk-s0101a0:1065_1: “ayaṃ ambaṭṭho āgatakālato paṭṭhāya mayā saddhiṃ kathayamāno mānameva nissāya kathesi,
atk-s0101a0:1065_6: Handa naṃ jānāpessāmī”ti cintetvā “atthikavato kho pana te,
atk-s0101a0:1065_12: tassa atthikavato tava idhāgamanaṃ ahosīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1066_1: Yāyeva kho panatthāyāti yeneva kho panatthena.
atk-s0101a0:1066_2: Āgaccheyyāthāti mama vā aññesaṃ vā santikaṃ yadā kadāci āgaccheyyātha.
atk-s0101a0:1066_9: Evamassa aññesaṃ santikaṃ āgatānaṃ vattaṃ dassetvā mānaniggaṇhanatthaṃ “avusitavāyeva kho panā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1066_10: Tassattho passatha bho ayaṃ ambaṭṭho māṇavo ācariyakule avusitavā asikkhito appassutova samāno.
atk-s0101a0:1066_11: Vusitamānīti “ahaṃ vusitavā sikkhito bahussuto”ti attānaṃ maññati.
atk-s0101a0:1066_12: Etassa hi evaṃ pharusavacanasamudācāre kāraṇaṃ kimaññatra avusitattāti ācariyakule asaṃvuddhā asikkhitā appassutāyeva hi evaṃ vadantīti.
atk-s0101a0:1067_3: kiṃ pana bhagavā tassa kujjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā evamāha udāhu añatvāti?
atk-s0101a0:1067_8: “ayaṃ mayā evaṃ vutte kujjhitvā mama ñātake akkosissati.
atk-s0101a0:1067_9: Athassāhaṃ yathā nāma kusalo bhisakko dosaṃ uggiletvā nīharati,
atk-s0101a0:1067_12: uṭṭhāpetvā bhavaggappamāṇena viya uṭṭhitaṃ mānaddhajaṃ mūle chetvā nipātessāmī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1068_3: Appakeneva tussanti vā dussanti vā udakapiṭṭhe alābukaṭāhaṃ viya appakeneva uplavanti.
atk-s0101a0:1068_5: Sakyānaṃ mukhe vivaṭe aññassa vacanokāso natthīti adhippāyeneva vadati.
atk-s0101a0:1068_7: Na sakkarontīti na brāhmaṇānaṃ sundarenākārena karonti.
atk-s0101a0:1068_8: Na garuṃ karontīti brāhmaṇesu gāravaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0101a0:1068_10: Na pūjentīti mālādīhi nesaṃ pūjaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0101a0:1068_11: Na apacāyantīti abhivādanādīhi nesaṃ apacitikammaṃ nīcavuttiṃ na dassenti tayidanti taṃ idaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1068_12: Yadime sakyāti yaṃ ime sakyā na brāhmaṇe sakkaronti…pe…
atk-s0101a0:1068_14: taṃ tesaṃ asakkārakaraṇādi sabbaṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1071_2: Ayañca tasmiṃ samaye yāva pādantā olambetvā nivatthasāṭakassa ekena hatthena dussakaṇṇaṃ gahetvā khandhaṭṭhikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1071_3: nāmetvā mānamadena matto viya āgacchati. Tato –
atk-s0101a0:1071_4: “passatha bho amhākaṃ dāsassa kaṇhāyanagottassa ambaṭṭhassa āgamanakāraṇa”nti vadantā evamakaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1072_0: Āsanenāti “idamāsanaṃ, ettha nisīdāhī”ti evaṃ āsanena nimantanaṃ nāma hoti, tathā na koci akāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1074_4: yaṃ yaṃ icchati taṃ taṃ lapati,
atk-s0101a0:1074_5: na taṃ koci haṃso vā koñco vā moro vā āgantvā “kiṃ tvaṃ lapasī’ti nisedheti.
atk-s0101a0:1075_1: “ayaṃ samaṇo gotamo attano ñātake laṭukikasadise katvā amhe haṃsakoñcamorasadise karoti,
atk-s0101a0:1075_2: nimmāno dāni jāto”ti maññamāno uttari cattāro vaṇṇe dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:1077_4: bho gotamā”ti idaṃ kira vacanaṃ ambaṭṭho tikkhattuṃ mahāsaddena avoca.
atk-s0101a0:1077_10: Apassanto mahāsamaṇo kiṃ vakkhatīti maññamāno mānathaddhatāya avoca.
atk-s0101a0:1077_18: evaṃ anupasaṅkamantaṃ taṃ disvā sakyā anujagghiṃsūti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:1078_0: Ito paraṃ tassa dāsabhāvaṃ sakyānañca sāmibhāvaṃ pakāsetvā attano ca ambaṭṭhassa ca kulavaṃsaṃ āharanto sakyā kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1078_4: Tassa kira rañño kathanakāle ukkā viya mukhato pabhā niccharati,
atk-s0101a0:1079_3: paṭhamakappikānaṃ kira rañño mahāsammatassa rojo nāma putto ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1079_15: Tesu tatiyaokkākassa pañca mahesiyo ahesuṃ – hatthā, cittā, jantu, jālinī,
atk-s0101a0:1079_23: Pañca dhītaro – piyā, suppiyā, ānandā, vijitā,
atk-s0101a0:1079_25: Iti sā nava putte vijāyitvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1080_0: Atha rājā aññaṃ dahariṃ abhirūpaṃ rājadhītaraṃ ānetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0101a0:1080_2: Atha naṃ pañcamadivase alaṅkaritvā rañño dassesi.
atk-s0101a0:1080_4: Sā ñātakehi saddhiṃ mantetvā puttassa rajjaṃ yāci. Rājā – “nassa, vasali,
atk-s0101a0:1080_8: musāvādo nāma na vaṭṭatī”tiādīni vatvā yācatiyeva.
atk-s0101a0:1080_11: tumhākaṃ kaniṭṭhaṃ jantukumāraṃ disvā tassa mātuyā sahasā varaṃ adāsiṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1080_13: Tumhe ṭhapetvā maṅgalahatthiṃ maṅgalaassaṃ maṅgalarathañca yattake icchatha,
atk-s0101a0:1081_1: amhākaṃ dosaṃ khamathā”ti rājānañceva rājorodhe ca khamāpetvā,
atk-s0101a0:1081_2: “mayampi bhātūhi saddhiṃ gacchāmā”ti rājānaṃ āpucchitvā nagarā nikkhantā bhaginiyo ādāya caturaṅginiyā senāya parivutā nagarā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1081_4: gacchāma ne upaṭṭhahāmā”ti cintetvā bahū manussā anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1081_10: sace mayaṃ kañci sāmantarājānaṃ madditvā janapadaṃ gaṇheyyāma,
atk-s0101a0:1081_14: araññe nagaraṃ māpessāmā”ti himavantābhimukhā gantvā nagaravatthuṃ pariyesiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1082_0: Tasmiñca samaye amhākaṃ bodhisatto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā kapilabrāhmaṇo nāma hutvā nikkhamma
atk-s0101a0:1082_1: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantapasse pokkharaṇiyā tīre sākavanasaṇḍe paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā vasati.
atk-s0101a0:1082_2: So kira bhummajālaṃ nāma vijjaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0101a0:1082_5: Etasmiṃ padese tiṇagumbalatā dakkhiṇāvaṭṭā pācīnābhimukhā jāyanti.
atk-s0101a0:1082_6: Sīhabyagghādayo migasūkare sappabiḷārā ca maṇḍūkamūsike anubandhamānā taṃ padesaṃ patvā na sakkonti te anubandhituṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1082_7: Tehi te aññadatthu santajjitā nivattantiyeva. So –
atk-s0101a0:1082_8: “ayaṃ pathaviyā aggapadeso”ti ñatvā tattha attano paṇṇasālaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0101a0:1083_0: Atha te kumāre nagaravatthuṃ pariyesamāne attano vasanokāsaṃ āgate disvā pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā tesu anukampaṃ janetvā avoca –
atk-s0101a0:1083_1: “imasmiṃ paṇṇasālaṭṭhāne māpitaṃ nagaraṃ jambudīpe agganagaraṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0101a0:1083_2: Ettha jātapurisesu ekeko purisasatampi purisasahassampi abhibhavituṃ sakkhissati.
atk-s0101a0:1083_5: Imasmiñhi okāse ṭhatvā caṇḍālaputtopi cakkavattibalena atiseyyo”ti. Nanu, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1083_8: Mayhaṃ ekapasse paṇṇasālaṃ katvā nagaraṃ māpetvā kapilavatthunti nāmaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1083_9: Te tathā katvā tattha nivāsaṃ kappesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1084_4: Idāni pana amhākaṃ bhāro”ti cintetvā kumārehi saddhiṃ mantayiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1084_5: Kumārā amhākaṃ sadisā khattiyadhītaro nāma na passāma,
atk-s0101a0:1084_7: asadisasaṃyoge ca no uppannā puttā mātito vā pitito vā aparisuddhā jātisambhedaṃ pāpuṇissanti.
atk-s0101a0:1084_8: Tasmā mayaṃ bhaginīhiyeva saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ rocemāti.
atk-s0101a0:1084_9: Te jātisambhedabhayena jeṭṭhakabhaginiṃ mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā avasesāhi saṃvāsaṃ kappesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1085_0: Tesaṃ puttehi ca dhītāhi ca vaḍḍhamānānaṃ aparena samayena jeṭṭhakabhaginiyā kuṭṭharogo udapādi,
atk-s0101a0:1085_2: Rājakumārā imāya saddhiṃ ekato nisajjaṭṭhānabhojanādīni karontānampi upari ayaṃ rogo saṅkamatīti cintetvā
atk-s0101a0:1085_3: ekadivasaṃ uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchantā viya taṃ yāne āropetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā bhūmiyaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāpetvā
atk-s0101a0:1085_4: tattha khādanīyabhojanīyena saddhiṃ taṃ pakkhipitvā gharasaṅkhepena upari padaraṃ paṭicchādetvā paṃsuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1086_0: Tena ca samayena rāmo nāma bārāṇasirājā kuṭṭharogo nāṭakitthīhi ca orodhehi ca jigucchiyamāno tena saṃvegena
atk-s0101a0:1086_1: jeṭṭhaputtassa rajjaṃ datvā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā mūlaphalāni paribhuñjanto nacirasseva
atk-s0101a0:1086_2: arogo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo hutvā ito cito ca vicaranto mahantaṃ susirarukkhaṃ disvā tassabbhantare soḷasahatthappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1086_3: okāsaṃ sodhetvā dvārañca vātapānañca yojetvā nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā tattha vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0101a0:1086_4: So aṅgārakaṭāhe aggiṃ katvā rattiṃ migasūkarādīnaṃ sadde suṇanto sayati. So –
atk-s0101a0:1086_6: asukasmiṃ byaggho”ti sallakkhetvā pabhāte tattha gantvā vighāsamaṃsaṃ ādāya pacitvā khādati.
atk-s0101a0:1087_0: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ paccūsasamaye aggiṃ jāletvā nisinne rājadhītāya sarīragandhena āgantvā byaggho tasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1087_2: tena ca vivarena sā byagghaṃ disvā bhītā vissaramakāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1087_4: “itthisaddo eso”ti ca sallakkhetvā pātova tattha gantvā –
atk-s0101a0:1087_13: So sabbaṃ pavattiṃ pucchitvā khattiyamānena anikkhamantiṃ –
atk-s0101a0:1087_14: “ahampi khattiyo”ti attano khattiyabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā nisseṇiṃ datvā uddharitvā attano vasanokāsaṃ netvā
atk-s0101a0:1087_15: sayaṃ paribhuttabhesajjāniyeva datvā nacirasseva arogaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ katvā tāya saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0101a0:1087_16: Sā paṭhamasaṃvāseneva gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā dve putte vijāyi,
atk-s0101a0:1087_20: Te anupubbena vuḍḍhippatte pitā sabbasippāni sikkhāpesi.
atk-s0101a0:1088_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko rāmarañño nagaravāsī vanacarako pabbate ratanāni gavesanto rājānaṃ disvā sañjānitvā āha –
atk-s0101a0:1088_2: Tato naṃ rājā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ pucchi.
atk-s0101a0:1088_3: Tasmiṃyeva ca khaṇe te dārakā āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1088_6: “Puttā me”ti ca vutte tesaṃ mātikavaṃsaṃ pucchitvā –
atk-s0101a0:1088_7: “laddhaṃ dāni me pābhata”nti nagaraṃ gantvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0101a0:1088_8: So ‘pitaraṃ ānayissāmī’ti caturaṅginiyā senāya tattha gantvā pitaraṃ vanditvā – “rajjaṃ, deva,
atk-s0101a0:1088_11: idheva me imaṃ rukkhaṃ apanetvā nagaraṃ māpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1088_12: So tathā katvā tassa nagarassa kolarukkhaṃ apanetvā katattā kolanagaranti ca byagghapathe katattā byagghapathanti
atk-s0101a0:1088_13: cāti dve nāmāni āropetvā pitaraṃ vanditvā attano nagaraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1089_2: Mātuladhītānaṃ pana vo evarūpaṃ nāma kesaggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1089_7: Te tatheva gantvā tāsu nhatvā sīsaṃ sukkhāpayamānāsu yaṃ yaṃ icchiṃsu,
atk-s0101a0:1089_8: taṃ taṃ gahetvā nāmaṃ sāvetvā agamiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1089_10: amhākaṃ ñātakā eva te”ti tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1089_12: Evaṃ tesaṃ sakyakoliyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āvāhavivāhaṃ karontānaṃ yāva buddhakālā anupacchinnova vaṃso āgato.
atk-s0101a0:1089_16: Sakyā vata bhoti raṭṭhasmā pabbājitā araññe vasantāpi jātisambhedamakatvā kulavaṃsaṃ anurakkhituṃ sakyā, samatthā,
atk-s0101a0:1089_20: So ca nesaṃ pubbapurisoti so okkāko rājā etesaṃ pubbapuriso.
atk-s0101a0:1090_0: Evaṃ sakyavaṃsaṃ pakāsetvā idāni ambaṭṭhavaṃsaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0101a0:1090_2: Kaṇhaṃ nāma janesīti kāḷavaṇṇaṃ antokucchiyaṃyeva sañjātadantaṃ parūḷhamassudāṭhikaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0101a0:1090_3: Pabyāhāsīti yakkho jātoti bhayena palāyitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya ṭhitesu gharamānusakesu ito cito ca vicaranto dhovatha mantiādīni vadanto uccāsaddamakāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1091_1: Te māṇavakā bhagavantaṃ etadavocunti attano upārambhamocanatthāya –
atk-s0101a0:1091_5: sace mayaṃ evarūpe ṭhāne ekadvevacanamattampi na vakkhāma,
atk-s0101a0:1091_6: ayaṃ no ācariyassa santike amhe paribhindissatī”ti upārambhamocanatthaṃ evaṃ avocuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1092_1: Atha kho bhagavāti atha kho bhagavā –
atk-s0101a0:1092_2: “sace ime māṇavakā ettha nisinnā evaṃ uccāsaddaṃ karissanti,
atk-s0101a0:1092_3: ayaṃ kathā pariyosānaṃ na gamissati. Handa,
atk-s0101a0:1092_4: ne nissadde katvā ambaṭṭheneva saddhiṃ kathemī”ti te māṇavake etadavoca.
atk-s0101a0:1092_6: Mayā saddhiṃ paṭimantetūti mayā saha kathetu.
atk-s0101a0:1092_8: “ambaṭṭho tāva dāsiputtosīti vutte puna sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0101a0:1092_10: sace aññampi kiñci samaṇo gotamo ‘tvaṃ dāso’ti vakkhati,
atk-s0101a0:1092_12: Ambaṭṭho attanā baddhaṃ puṭakaṃ attanāva mocetū”ti attānaṃ parimocetvā tasseva upari khipantā –
atk-s0101a0:1093_4: Aññena vā aññaṃ paṭicarissasīti aññena vacanena aññaṃ vacanaṃ paṭicarissasi ajjhottharissasi,
atk-s0101a0:1093_6: Yo hi “kiṃ gotto tva”nti evaṃ puṭṭho –
atk-s0101a0:1093_9: Pakkamissasi vāti pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ jānantova akathetukāmatāya uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamissasi vā.
atk-s0101a0:1094_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti samaṇo gotamo maṃ sāmaṃyeva dāsiputtabhāvaṃ kathāpetukāmo,
atk-s0101a0:1094_1: sāmaṃ kathite ca dāso nāma jātoyeva hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1094_2: Ayaṃ pana dvatikkhattuṃ codetvā tuṇhī bhavissati,
atk-s0101a0:1094_3: tato ahaṃ parivattitvā pakkamissāmīti cintetvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1095_2: Yakkhoti na yo vā so vā yakkho,
atk-s0101a0:1095_9: kandalamakuḷasadisā dāṭhā bhayānakāni akkhināsādīni evaṃ virūparūpaṃ māpetvā ṭhito.
atk-s0101a0:1096_3: pare ca me na ājāneyyu”nti evaṃ dhammadesanāya appossukkabhāvaṃ āpanne bhagavati sakko mahābrahmunā saddhiṃ āgantvā –
atk-s0101a0:1097_0: Bhagavā ceva passati ambaṭṭho cāti yadi hi taṃ aññepi passeyyuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1097_2: “ayaṃ samaṇo gotamo ambaṭṭhaṃ attano vāde anotarantaṃ ñatvā yakkhaṃ āvāhetvā dassesi,
atk-s0101a0:1097_4: Tasmā bhagavā ceva passati ambaṭṭho ca.
atk-s0101a0:1097_5: Tassa taṃ disvāva sakalasarīrato sedā mucciṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1097_7: So “aññepi nu kho passantī”ti olokento kassaci lomahaṃsamattampi nāddasa. Tato –
atk-s0101a0:1097_12: paṭhamaṃ yakkhaṃ adisvā samaṇena gotamena vādasaṅghaṭṭe pakkhittova yakkhaṃ passasī’ti vadeyyu”nti cintetvā “na dāni me idha aññaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0101a0:1097_13: aññatra samaṇā gotamā”ti maññamāno atha kho ambaṭṭho māṇavo…pe…
atk-s0101a0:1100_3: Tadā kira dakkhiṇāpathe bahū brāhmaṇatāpasā honti,
atk-s0101a0:1100_4: so tattha gantvā ekaṃ tāpasaṃ vattapaṭipattiyā ārādhesi.
atk-s0101a0:1100_5: So tassa upakāraṃ disvā āha – “ambho, purisa,
atk-s0101a0:1100_14: bho”ti tassa dhanuagamanīyaṃ ambaṭṭhaṃ nāma vijjaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0101a0:1100_15: so taṃ vijjaṃ gahetvā tattheva vīmaṃsitvā –
atk-s0101a0:1100_16: “idāni me manorathaṃ pūressāmī”ti isivesaṃ gahetvā okkākassa santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0101a0:1100_18: “dakkhiṇajanapadaṃ gantvā brahmamante adhīyitvā rājānaṃ okkākaṃ upasaṅkamitvā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1101_1: Ko nevaṃ’re ayaṃ mayhaṃ dāsiputtoti ko nu evaṃ are ayaṃ mama dāsiputto.
atk-s0101a0:1101_2: So taṃ khurappanti so rājā taṃ māretukāmatāya sannahitaṃ saraṃ tassa mantānubhāvena neva khipituṃ na apanetuṃ sakkhi,
atk-s0101a0:1101_3: tāvadeva sakalasarīre sañjātasedo bhayena vedhamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1102_4: Nāḷikero pañcasu tāpasasatesu ajjuno ca aṅgīrase aparaddho pathaviṃ bhinditvā nirayaṃ paviṭṭho”ti cintayantā bhayena etaṃ sotthi,
atk-s0101a0:1103_0: Sotthi bhavissati raññoti idaṃ vacanaṃ kaṇho ciraṃ tuṇhī hutvā tato anekappakāraṃ yācīyamāno –
atk-s0101a0:1103_1: “tumhākaṃ raññā mādisassa isino khurappaṃ sannayhantena bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kata”ntiādīni ca vatvā pacchā abhāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1104_2: Idaṃ kira so “sace me rājā taṃ dārikaṃ dassatī”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā avaca.
atk-s0101a0:1104_3: Kumāre khurappaṃ patiṭṭhapesīti tena “saro otaratū”ti mante parivatti,
atk-s0101a0:1104_5: Dhītaraṃ adāsīti sīsaṃ dhovitvā adāsaṃ bhujissaṃ katvā dhītaraṃ adāsi,
atk-s0101a0:1104_7: Mā kho tumhe māṇavakāti idaṃ pana bhagavā –
atk-s0101a0:1104_8: “ekena pakkhena ambaṭṭho sakyānaṃ ñāti hotī”ti pakāsento tassa samassāsanatthaṃ āha.
atk-s0101a0:1104_9: Tato ambaṭṭho ghaṭasatena abhisitto viya passaddhadaratho hutvā samassāsetvā samaṇo gotamo maṃ “tosessāmī”ti ekena pakkhena ñātiṃ karoti,
atk-s0101a0:1106_4: handa naṃ jānāpessāmīti khattiyavaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ uttaridesanaṃ vaḍḍhento –
atk-s0101a0:1106_8: Āsanaṃ vā udakaṃ vāti aggāsanaṃ vā aggodakaṃ vā.
atk-s0101a0:1106_13: Api nussāti api nu assa khattiyaputtassa.
atk-s0101a0:1106_15: brāhmaṇakaññāsu nivāraṇaṃ bhaveyya vā no vā,
atk-s0101a0:1106_16: brāhmaṇadārikaṃ labheyya vā na vā labheyyāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1107_1: Itthiyā vā itthiṃ karitvāti itthiyā vā itthiṃ pariyesitvā.
atk-s0101a0:1107_2: Kismiñcideva pakaraṇeti kismiñcideva dose brāhmaṇānaṃ ayutte akattabbakaraṇe.
atk-s0101a0:1108_3: Ye gottapaṭisārinoti ye janetasmiṃ gottaṃ paṭisaranti –
atk-s0101a0:1108_7: Anumatā mayāti mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā desitā mayā anuññātā.
atk-s0101a0:1111_1: Imāya pana gāthāya vijjācaraṇasampannoti idaṃ padaṃ sutvā ambaṭṭho cintesi –
atk-s0101a0:1111_6: mayameva seṭṭhā”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā vijjācaraṇaṃ pucchanto –
atk-s0101a0:1111_9: katamā ca pana sā vijjā”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1111_10: Athassa bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇasamaye siddhaṃ jātivādādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vijjācaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipitvā anuttaraṃ vijjācaraṇaṃ dassetukāmo –
atk-s0101a0:1112_2: tato no samaṇo gotamo mahāvāte thusaṃ dhunanto viya dūrameva avakkhipi.
atk-s0101a0:1112_5: Ayaṃ no vijjācaraṇasampadā ñātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā puna vijjācaraṇasampadaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0101a0:1112_6: Athassa bhagavā samudāgamato pabhuti vijjācaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ –
atk-s0101a0:1113_1: Ettha ca bhagavā caraṇapariyāpannampi tividhaṃ sīlaṃ vibhajanto “idamassa hoti caraṇasmi”nti aniyyātetvā
atk-s0101a0:1113_3: Tassapi hi kiñci kiñci sīlaṃ atthi,
atk-s0101a0:1113_4: tasmā caraṇavasena niyyātiyamāne “mayampi caraṇasampannā”ti tattha tattheva laggeyya.
atk-s0101a0:1113_5: Yaṃ pana tena supinepi na diṭṭhapubbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1113_6: tasseva vasena niyyātento paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
atk-s0101a0:1113_10: Ettāvatā aṭṭhapi samāpattiyo caraṇanti niyyātitā honti,
atk-s0101a0:1113_11: vipassanā ñāṇato pana paṭṭhāya aṭṭhavidhāpi paññā vijjāti niyyātitā.
atk-s0101a0:1115_4: Khārividhamādāyāti ettha khārīti araṇī kamaṇḍalu sujādayo tāpasaparikkhārā.
atk-s0101a0:1115_12: Kāmañca guṇādhikopi khīṇāsavasāmaṇero puthujjanabhikkhuno vuttanayena paricārako hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1115_13: ayaṃ pana na tādiso guṇavasenapi veyyāvaccakaraṇavasenapi lāmakoyeva.
atk-s0101a0:1116_0: Kasmā pana tāpasapabbajjā sāsanassa vināsamukhanti vuttāti?
atk-s0101a0:1116_1: Yasmā gacchantaṃ gacchantaṃ sāsanaṃ tāpasapabbajjāvasena osakkissati.
atk-s0101a0:1116_2: Imasmiñhi sāsane pabbajitvā tisso sikkhā pūretuṃ asakkontaṃ lajjino sikkhākāmā –
atk-s0101a0:1116_3: “natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti jigucchitvā parivajjenti.
atk-s0101a0:1116_5: tāpasapabbajjā pana sukarā ceva bahujanasammatā cā”ti vibbhamitvā tāpaso hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1116_9: idha pana sachandacārino maya”nti vadati. Sopi,
atk-s0101a0:1116_10: yadi evaṃ ahampi ettheva pabbajāmīti tassa anusikkhanto tāpaso hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1116_11: Evamaññepi aññepīti kamena tāpasāva bahukā honti.
atk-s0101a0:1116_12: Tesaṃ uppannakāle sāsanaṃ osakkitaṃ nāma bhavissati.
atk-s0101a0:1116_14: tassa īdisaṃ nāma sāsanaṃ ahosīti sutamattameva bhavissati.
atk-s0101a0:1116_15: Idaṃ sandhāya bhagavā tāpasapabbajjaṃ sāsanassa vināsamukhanti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1117_2: kasikammādīhi ca jīvitaṃ nipphādetuṃ dukkhanti maññamāno bahujanakuhāpanatthaṃ gāmasāmante vā nigamasāmante
atk-s0101a0:1117_3: vā aggisālaṃ katvā sappiteladadhimadhuphāṇitatilataṇḍulādīhi ceva nānādārūhi ca homakaraṇavasena aggiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1118_0: Catudvāraṃ agāraṃ karitvāti catumukhaṃ pānāgāraṃ katvā tassa dvāre maṇḍapaṃ katvā tattha pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā āgatāgate pānīyena āpucchati.
atk-s0101a0:1118_1: Yampissa addhikā kilantā pānīyaṃ pivitvā parituṭṭhā bhattapuṭaṃ vā taṇḍulādīni vā denti,
atk-s0101a0:1118_2: taṃ sabbaṃ gahetvā ambilayāguādīni katvā bahutaraṃ āmisagahaṇatthaṃ kesañci annaṃ deti,
atk-s0101a0:1118_4: Tehipi dinnaṃ āmisaṃ vā pubbaṇṇādīni vā gaṇhati,
atk-s0101a0:1118_10: “Tamahaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ paṭipūjessāmī”ti idaṃ panassa paṭipattimukhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1118_11: Iminā hi mukhena so evaṃ paṭipajjatīti.
atk-s0101a0:1118_12: Ettāvatā ca bhagavatā sabbāpi tāpasapabbajjā niddiṭṭhā honti.
atk-s0101a0:1119_10: Tattha ye keṇiyajaṭilo viya kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanti,
atk-s0101a0:1120_0: Ye pana “saputtadārabhāvo nāma pabbajitassa ayutto”ti lāyanamaddanaṭṭhānesu vīhimuggamāsatilādīni saṅkaḍḍhitvā pacitvā paribhuñjanti,
atk-s0101a0:1121_0: Ye “khalena khalaṃ vicaritvā vīhiṃ āharitvā koṭṭetvā paribhuñjanaṃ nāma ayutta”nti gāmanigamesu taṇḍulabhikkhaṃ gahetvā pacitvā paribhuñjanti,
atk-s0101a0:1122_0: Ye pana “kiṃ pabbajitassa sāmapākenā”ti gāmaṃ pavisitvā pakkabhikkhameva gaṇhanti,
atk-s0101a0:1123_0: Ye “divase divase bhikkhāpariyeṭṭhi nāma dukkhā pabbajitassā”ti muṭṭhipāsāṇena ambāṭakādīnaṃ rukkhānaṃ tacaṃ koṭṭetvā khādanti,
atk-s0101a0:1124_0: Ye pana “pāsāṇena tacaṃ koṭṭetvā vicaraṇaṃ nāma dukkha”nti danteheva ubbāṭetvā khādanti,
atk-s0101a0:1125_0: Ye “dantehi ubbāṭetvā khādanaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ pabbajitassā”ti leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharitvā patitāni phalāni paribhuñjanti,
atk-s0101a0:1126_0: Ye pana “leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi pātetvā paribhogo nāma asāruppo pabbajitassā”ti sayaṃ patitāneva pupphaphalapaṇḍupalāsādīni khādantā yāpenti,
atk-s0101a0:1127_2: Tattha ye nisinnaṭṭhānato anuṭṭhāya hatthena pāpuṇanaṭṭhāneva patitaṃ gahetvā khādanti,
atk-s0101a0:1127_4: Ye ekarukkhato aññaṃ rukkhaṃ na gacchanti,
atk-s0101a0:1127_6: Ye taṃ taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ gantvā pariyesitvā khādanti,
atk-s0101a0:1128_0: Imā pana aṭṭhapi tāpasapabbajjā imāhi catūhiyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0101a0:1128_1: Etāsu hi saputtabhariyā ca uñchācariyā ca agāraṃ bhajanti.
atk-s0101a0:1128_2: Anaggipakkikā ca asāmapākā ca agyāgāraṃ bhajanti.
atk-s0101a0:1128_3: Asmamuṭṭhikā ca dantavakkalikā ca kandamūlaphalabhojanaṃ bhajanti.
atk-s0101a0:1128_4: Pavattaphalabhojanā ca paṇḍupalāsikā ca pavattaphalabhojanaṃ bhajanti.
atk-s0101a0:1128_6: “ettāvatā ca bhagavatā sabbāpi tāpasapabbajjā niddiṭṭhā hontī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1129_1: Idāni bhagavā sācariyakassa ambaṭṭhassa vijjācaraṇasampadāya apāyamukhampi appattabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ taṃ kiṃ maññasi ambaṭṭhātiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1129_3: Attanā āpāyikopi aparipūramānoti attanā vijjācaraṇasampadāya āpāyikenāpi aparipūramānena.
atk-s0101a0:1131_2: Sammukhībhāvampi na dadātīti kasmā na dadāti?
atk-s0101a0:1131_3: So kira sammukhā āvaṭṭaniṃ nāma vijjaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0101a0:1131_4: Yadā rājā mahārahena alaṅkārena alaṅkato hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1131_5: tadā rañño samīpe ṭhatvā tassa alaṅkārassa nāmaṃ gaṇhati.
atk-s0101a0:1131_6: Tassa rājā nāme gahite na demīti vattuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0101a0:1131_7: Datvā puna chaṇadivase alaṅkāraṃ āharathāti vatvā, natthi, deva,
atk-s0101a0:1131_10: Te amaccā ‘so brāhmaṇo sammukhā āvaṭṭanimāyaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0101a0:1131_11: Tāya tumhe āvaṭṭetvā gahetvā gacchatī’ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1131_12: Apare raññā saha tassa atisahāyabhāvaṃ asahantā āhaṃsu – “deva,
atk-s0101a0:1131_13: etassa brāhmaṇassa sarīre saṅkhaphalitakuṭṭhaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0101a0:1131_17: Tato paṭṭhāya tassa rājā sammukhībhāvaṃ na deti.
atk-s0101a0:1132_0: Yasmā pana so brāhmaṇo paṇḍito khattavijjāya kusalo,
atk-s0101a0:1132_1: tena saha mantetvā katakammaṃ nāma na virujjhati,
atk-s0101a0:1132_2: tasmā sāṇipākārassa anto ṭhatvā bahi ṭhitena tena saddhiṃ manteti.
atk-s0101a0:1132_8: Kathaṃ tassa rājāti yassa rañño brāhmaṇo īdisaṃ bhikkhaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya,
atk-s0101a0:1132_9: kathaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa so rājā sammukhībhāvampi na dadeyya.
atk-s0101a0:1132_11: tenassa sammukhībhāvaṃ rājā na detīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0101a0:1132_12: “Idaṃ pana kāraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā rājānañceva brāhmaṇañca na añño koci jānāti.
