atk-s0101a0:1185_0: Na tasmiṃ gāme vāti yattha kira bhagavā paṭivasati,
atk-s0101a0:1185_2: taṃ nissāya manussānaṃ upaddavo na hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1185_5: Api ca bhagavato mettābalenapi na amanussā manusse viheṭhenti.
atk-s0101a0:1186_0: Saṅghītiādīsu anusāsitabbo sayaṃ vā uppādito saṅgho assa atthīti saṅghī.
atk-s0101a0:1186_5: Yathā vā tathā vāti yena vā tena vā acelakādimattakenāpi kāraṇena.
atk-s0101a0:1187_0: Atithi no te hontīti te amhākaṃ āgantukā,
atk-s0101a0:1192_1: Imaṃ pana satthu guṇakathaṃ sutvā te brāhmaṇā cintayiṃsu –
atk-s0101a0:1192_2: yathā soṇadaṇḍo brāhmaṇo samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇe bhaṇati,
atk-s0101a0:1192_4: evaṃ tassa guṇe jānamānena kho pana ācariyena aticiraṃ adhivāsitaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1192_14: Aṃsena hi pātheyyapuṭaṃ vahantenāpīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1194_10: ‘Kiṃ sīsena bhūmiyaṃ paharanteneva vandanaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1194_15: idhāgato”ti vadantā nāmaṃ sāventi nāma. “Bho, gotama,
atk-s0101a0:1194_19: Ete kira daliddā jiṇṇā kulaputtā “parisamajjhe nāmagottavasena pākaṭā bhavissāmā”ti evamakaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1194_24: atha vissāse sati ekaṃ dve bhikkhā adātuṃ na yutta”nti tato attānaṃ mocetvā tuṇhī nisīdanti.
atk-s0101a0:1194_25: Andhabālā aññāṇatāyeva avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍo viya yattha katthaci tuṇhībhūtā nisīdanti.
atk-s0101a0:1196_2: “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo āgatakālato paṭṭhāya adhomukho thaddhagatto kiṃ cintayamāno nisinno,
atk-s0101a0:1196_3: kiṃ nu kho cintetī”ti āvajjanto attano cetasā tassa cittaṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1196_7: Anuviloketvā parisanti bhagavato sakasamaye pañhapucchanena udake miyamāno ukkhipitvā thale ṭhapito viya
atk-s0101a0:1196_8: samapassaddhakāyacitto hutvā parisaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ diṭṭhisañjāneneva “upadhārentu me bhonto vacana”nti
atk-s0101a0:1196_9: vadanto viya anuviloketvā parisaṃ bhagavantaṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0101a0:1197_1: Sujaṃ paggaṇhantānanti yaññayajanatthāya sujaṃ gaṇhantesu brāhmaṇesu paṭhamo vā dutiyo vāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1197_3: Iti brāhmaṇo sakasamayavasena sammadeva pañhaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0101a0:1197_6: Etadavocunti sace jātivaṇṇamantasampanno brāhmaṇo na hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1197_7: atha ko carahi loke brāhmaṇo bhavissati?
atk-s0101a0:1197_12: “sace tvaṃ pasādavasena samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gantukāmo, gaccha;
atk-s0101a0:1197_13: mā brāhmaṇassa samayaṃ bhindī”ti adhippāyena āhaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1198_1: Etadavocāti imesu brāhmaṇesu evaṃ ekappahāreneva viravantesu “ayaṃ kathā pariyosānaṃ na gamissati,
atk-s0101a0:1198_2: handa ne nissadde katvā soṇadaṇḍeneva saddhiṃ kathemī”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0101a0:1199_4: Ahamassa mātāpitaro jānāmīti bhaginiyā puttassa mātāpitaro kiṃ na jānissati,
atk-s0101a0:1199_7: Kiṃ vaṇṇo karissatīti abbhantare guṇe asati kiṃ karissati?
atk-s0101a0:1199_10: “pakatisīle ṭhitassa brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ sādhentī”ti evampi sīlameva sādhessati,
atk-s0101a0:1199_11: tasmiṃ hissa asati brāhmaṇabhāvo nāhosīti sammohamattaṃ vaṇṇādayo.
atk-s0101a0:1201_7: Yattha sīlaṃ tattha paññāti yasmiṃ puggale sīlaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1201_10: Paññārahite vā jaḷe eḷamūge kuto sīlanti?
atk-s0101a0:1201_13: Evametaṃ brāhmaṇāti bhagavā brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ anujānanto āha.
atk-s0101a0:1201_16: Yassa puthujjanassa sīlaṃ saṭṭhiasītivassāni akhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1201_17: so maraṇakālepi sabbakilese ghātetvā sīlena paññaṃ dhovitvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0101a0:1201_19: There kira maraṇamañce nipajjitvā balavavedanāya nitthunante,
atk-s0101a0:1201_20: tissamahārājā “theraṃ passissāmī”ti gantvā pariveṇadvāre ṭhito taṃ saddaṃ sutvā pucchi –
atk-s0101a0:1201_24: na dāni naṃ vandissāmī”ti nivattitvā mahābodhiṃ vandituṃ gato.
atk-s0101a0:1201_25: Tato upaṭṭhākadaharo theraṃ āha – “kiṃ no, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1201_27: saddhopi rājā vippaṭisārī hutvā na vandissāmī”ti gatoti.
atk-s0101a0:1201_30: “Tena hi me okāsaṃ karothā”ti vatvā vedanaṃ vikkhambhitvā arahattaṃ patvā daharassa saññaṃ adāsi –
atk-s0101a0:1201_38: puthujjanabhūmiyaṃ pana ṭhatvā rakkhitasīlameva vandāmī”ti āha,
atk-s0101a0:1201_41: ugghāṭitaññutāya pana catuppadikagāthāpariyosāne paññāya sīlaṃ dhovitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0101a0:1202_1: Katamaṃ pana taṃ brāhmaṇāti kasmā āha?
atk-s0101a0:1202_15: Samaṇo pana maṃ gotamo puna nivattitvā pucchati,
atk-s0101a0:1202_16: idānissāhaṃ cittaṃ paritosetvā vissajjituṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ vā na vā?
atk-s0101a0:1202_17: Sace na sakkhissaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppannāpi me lajjā bhijjissati.
atk-s0101a0:1202_18: Asakkontassa pana na sakkomīti vacane doso natthī”ti puna nivattitvā bhagavatoyeva bhāraṃ karonto “ettakaparamāva maya”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1202_19: Tattha ettakaparamāti ettakaṃ sīlapaññāṇanti vacanameva paramaṃ amhākaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1202_21: ito paraṃ etassa bhāsitassa atthaṃ na jānāmāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1203_0: Athassa bhagavā sīlapaññāya mūlabhūtassa tathāgatassa uppādato pabhuti sīlapaññāṇaṃ dassetuṃ –
atk-s0101a0:1203_6: “idampissa hoti sīlasmi”nti evaṃ sīlamicceva niyyātitaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīni cattāri jhānāni atthato paññāsampadā.
atk-s0101a0:1203_7: Evaṃ paññāvasena pana aniyyātetvā vipassanāpaññāya padaṭṭhānabhāvamattena dassetvā vipassanāpaññāto paṭṭhāya paññā niyyātitāti.
atk-s0101a0:1205_1: Svātanāyāti padassa attho ajjatanāyāti ettha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1205_2: Tena maṃ sā parisā paribhaveyyāti tena tumhe dūratova disvā āsanā vuṭṭhitakāraṇena maṃ sā parisā –
atk-s0101a0:1205_4: gotamo pana daharo yuvā nattāpissa nappahoti,
atk-s0101a0:1205_5: so nāma attano nattumattabhāvampi appattassa āsanā vuṭṭhātī”ti paribhaveyya.
atk-s0101a0:1205_6: Āsanā me taṃ bhavaṃ gotamo paccuṭṭhānanti mama agāravena avuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0101a0:1205_8: taṃ tumhe hi ceva mayā ca ñātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:1205_9: Tasmā āsanā me etaṃ bhavaṃ gotamo paccuṭṭhānaṃ dhāretūti,
atk-s0101a0:1205_14: Dhammiyā kathāyātiādīsu taṅkhaṇānurūpāya dhammiyā kathāya diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ sandassetvā kusale dhamme samādapetvā gaṇhāpetvā.
atk-s0101a0:1205_15: Tattha naṃ samuttejetvā saussāhaṃ katvā tāya ca saussāhatāya aññehi ca vijjamānaguṇehi sampahaṃsetvā dhammaratanavassaṃ vassitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0101a0:1205_16: Brāhmaṇo pana attano kuhakatāya evampi bhagavati dhammavassaṃ vassite visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0101a0:1205_17: Kevalamassa āyatiṃ nibbānatthāya vāsanābhāgiyāya ca sabbā purimapacchimakathā ahosīti.
atk-s0101a0:1207_5: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado rūḷhīsaddena magadhāti vuccati,
atk-s0101a0:1207_14: Pāḷiyaṃ pana anāgatānampi anekesaṃ migapakkhīnaṃ sattasattasatāni sampiṇḍitānevāti veditabbāni.
atk-s0101a0:1207_16: Thūṇūpanītānīti bandhitvā ṭhapanatthāya yūpasaṅkhātaṃ thūṇaṃ upanītāni.
atk-s0101a0:1209_2: Bhūtapubbanti idaṃ bhagavā pathavīgataṃ nidhiṃ uddharitvā purato rāsiṃ karonto viya bhavapaṭicchannaṃ pubbacaritaṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0101a0:1209_3: Mahāvijitoti so kira sāgarapariyantaṃ mahantaṃ pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ vijini,
atk-s0101a0:1209_4: iti mahantaṃ vijitamassāti mahāvijito tveva saṅkhyaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1209_5: Aḍḍhotiādīsu yo koci attano santakena vibhavena aḍḍho hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1209_8: Pañcakāmaguṇavasena mahantā uḷārā bhogā assāti mahābhogo.
atk-s0101a0:1209_9: Piṇḍapiṇḍavasena ceva suvaṇṇamāsakarajatamāsakādivasena ca jātarūparajatassa pahūtatāya pahūtajātarūparajato,
atk-s0101a0:1209_14: Sattaratanasaṅkhātassa nidahitvā ṭhapitadhanassa sabbapubbaṇṇāparaṇṇasaṅgahitassa dhaññassa ca pahūtatāya pahūtadhanadhañño.
atk-s0101a0:1209_15: Athavā idamassa devasikaṃ paribbayadānaggahaṇādivasena parivattanadhanadhaññavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1210_3: Athavā catubbidho koso – hatthī, assā, rathā, pattīti.
atk-s0101a0:1210_10: Ayaṃ kira rājā ekadivasaṃ ratanāvalokanacārikaṃ nāma nikkhanto.
atk-s0101a0:1210_14: Idaṃ pana dhanaṃ saṅgharitvā te kuhiṃ gatāti?
atk-s0101a0:1210_17: Attano dhanaṃ agahetvāva gatā, tātāti? Deva,
atk-s0101a0:1211_3: “dānaṃ dentena nāma ekena paṇḍitena saddhiṃ mantetvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a0:1211_9: te avūpasametvā dānaṃ dentassa khīradadhitaṇḍulādike dānasambhāre āharantānaṃ nippurisāni gehāni corā
atk-s0101a0:1211_11: tato rañño dānaṃ na ciraṃ pavattissati,
atk-s0101a0:1211_13: naṃ etamatthaṃ saññāpemī”ti tato tamatthaṃ saññāpento “bhoto,
atk-s0101a0:1212_6: Vadhena vāti māraṇena vā koṭṭanena vā.
atk-s0101a0:1212_15: Samūhanissāmīti sammā hetunā nayena kāraṇena ūhanissāmi.
atk-s0101a0:1212_18: Anuppadetūti dinne appahonte puna aññampi bījañca bhattañca kasiupakaraṇabhaṇḍañca sabbaṃ detūti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1212_19: Pābhataṃ anuppadetūti sakkhiṃ akatvā paṇṇe anāropetvā mūlacchejjavasena bhaṇḍamūlaṃ detūti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1215_0: Bhattavetananti devasikaṃ bhattañceva māsikādiparibbayañca tassa tassa kusalakammasūrabhāvānurūpena ṭhānantaragāmanigamādidānena saddhiṃ detūti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1215_1: Sakammapasutāti kasivāṇijjādīsu sakesu kammesu uyyuttā byāvaṭā.
atk-s0101a0:1215_8: Apārutagharāti corānaṃ abhāvena dvārāni asaṃvaritvā vivaṭadvārāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1215_9: Etadavocāti janapadassa sabbākārena iddhaphītabhāvaṃ ñatvā etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0101a0:1217_1: Tena hi bhavaṃ rājāti brāhmaṇo kira cintesi –
atk-s0101a0:1217_3: Sace pana attano anuyantā khattiyādayo anāmantetvā dassati.
atk-s0101a0:1217_11: Yaṃ mama assāti yaṃ tumhākaṃ anujānanaṃ mama bhaveyya.
atk-s0101a0:1217_14: Yajataṃ bhavaṃ rājāti yajatu bhavaṃ, te kira –
atk-s0101a0:1217_15: ayaṃ rājā “ahaṃ issaro”ti pasayha dānaṃ adatvā amhe āmantesi,
atk-s0101a0:1217_17: Anāmantite panassa yaññaṭṭhānaṃ dassanāyapi na gaccheyyuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1217_18: Yaññakālo mahārājāti deyyadhammasmiñhi asati mahallakakāle ca evarūpaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0101a0:1217_19: tvaṃ pana mahādhano ceva taruṇo ca,
atk-s0101a0:1217_25: jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”ti ettha pana alaṅkāro parikkhāroti vutto.
atk-s0101a0:1219_8: tassa pati hutvā deti, na dāso,
atk-s0101a0:1219_12: so dānasaṅkhātassa deyyadhammassa dāso hutvā deti.
atk-s0101a0:1219_16: Yo pana attanā yena kenaci yāpeti,
atk-s0101a0:1219_18: so pati jeṭṭhako sāmī hutvā deti,
atk-s0101a0:1219_28: gacchatu bhavaṃ brahmaloka”ntiādinā nayena dānassa vaṇṇaṃ thomayamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0101a0:1219_38: evaṃ cintento atītamatthaṃ cintetuṃ paṭibalo nāma hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1219_39: “Idāni puññaṃ katvāva anāgate sakkā sampattiṃ pāpuṇitu”nti cintento anāgatamatthaṃ cintetuṃ paṭibalo nāma hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1219_43: handāhaṃ puññāni karomī”ti cintento paccuppannamatthaṃ cintetuṃ paṭibalo nāma hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1219_44: Iti imānīti evaṃ yathā vuttāni etāni.
atk-s0101a0:1219_45: Etehi kira aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa dānaṃ sabbadisāhi mahājano upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0101a0:1219_47: idāni vippaṭisārī hutvā upacchindissatī”ti evamādīni cintetvā na koci upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññati.
atk-s0101a0:1219_48: Tasmā etāni aṭṭhaṅgāni parikkhārā bhavantīti vuttāni.
atk-s0101a0:1221_4: “evaṃ dujjātassa saṃvidhānena pavattadānaṃ kittakaṃ kālaṃ pavattissatī”tiādīni vatvā upasaṅkamitāro na honti.
atk-s0101a0:1222_1: Tisso vidhā desesīti tīṇi ṭhapanāni desesi.
atk-s0101a0:1222_3: “dānaṃ dadamānā nāma tiṇṇaṃ ṭhānānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ calanti handāhaṃ imaṃ rājānaṃ tesu ṭhānesu paṭhamataraññeva niccalaṃ karomī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1222_5: So bhoto raññoti idaṃ karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1222_7: Vippaṭisāro na karaṇīyoti “bhogānaṃ vigamahetuko pacchānutāpo na kattabbo,
atk-s0101a0:1222_11: Muñcacetanāpi hi pacchāsamanussaraṇacetanā ca niccalāva kātabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1222_12: Tathā akarontassa dānaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1223_5: yassa me evarūpā dussīlā bhuñjantī”ti sīlavantesupi vippaṭisāraṃ uppādessati,
atk-s0101a0:1223_7: Vippaṭisāro ca nāma dāyakānaṃ paṭiggāhakatova uppajjati,
atk-s0101a0:1223_9: Tasmā dasahākārehi upacchijjituṃ yuttaṃ paṭiggāhakesupi vippaṭisāraṃ vinodesīti.
atk-s0101a0:1223_10: Tesaññeva tenāti tesaññeva tena pāpena aniṭṭho vipāko bhavissati,
atk-s0101a0:1224_1: Soḷasahi ākārehi cittaṃ sandassesīti idha brāhmaṇo rañño mahādānānumodanaṃ nāma āraddho.
atk-s0101a0:1224_3: ‘idaṃ dānaṃ dātā evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ labhatī’ti dassetvā dassetvā kathesi.
atk-s0101a0:1224_8: Vattā dhammato natthīti dhammena samena kāraṇena vattā natthi.
atk-s0101a0:1225_1: Na rukkhā chijjiṃsu yūpatthāya na dabbhā lūyiṃsu barihisatthāyāti ye yūpanāmake mahāthambhe ussāpetvā –
atk-s0101a0:1225_2: “asukarājā asukāmacco asukabrāhmaṇo evarūpaṃ nāma mahāyāgaṃ yajatī”ti nāmaṃ likhitvā ṭhapenti.
atk-s0101a0:1225_3: Yāni ca dabbhatiṇāni lāyitvā vanamālāsaṅkhepena yaññasālaṃ parikkhipanti,
atk-s0101a0:1225_7: Kiṃ pana gāvo vā ajādayo vā haññissantīti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:1225_9: Pessāti ye pubbameva dhanaṃ gahetvā kammaṃ karonti.
atk-s0101a0:1225_16: chindissāma vā bandhissāma vā māressāma vāti evaṃ bhayena tajjitā.
atk-s0101a0:1225_21: Na hi tattha dāsaṃ vā dāsāti,
atk-s0101a0:1225_24: Yathānāmavaseneva pana piyasamudācārena ālapitvā itthipurisabalavantadubbalānaṃ anurūpameva kammaṃ dassetvā –
atk-s0101a0:1225_36: Sappitelanavanītadadhimadhuphāṇitena ceva so yañño niṭṭhānamagamāsīti rājā kira bahinagarassa catūsu
atk-s0101a0:1225_37: dvāresu antonagarassa ca majjheti pañcasu ṭhānesu mahādānasālāyo kārāpetvā ekekissāya sālāya satasahassaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1225_38: satasahassaṃ katvā divase divase pañcasatasahassāni vissajjetvā sūriyuggamanato paṭṭhāya tassa tassa
atk-s0101a0:1225_39: kālassa anurūpehi sahatthena suvaṇṇakaṭacchuṃ gahetvā paṇītehi sappitelādisammisseheva yāgukhajjakabhattabyañjanapānakādīhi
atk-s0101a0:1225_45: so taṃ paribhuñjatū”ti anekasatesu ṭhānesu ṭhapāpesi.
atk-s0101a0:1226_1: Pahūtaṃ sāpateyyaṃ ādāyāti bahuṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0101a0:1226_3: “ayaṃ rājā sappitelādīni janapadato anāharāpetvā attano santakameva nīharitvā mahādānaṃ deti.
atk-s0101a0:1226_4: Amhehi pana ‘rājā na kiñci āharāpetī’ti na yuttaṃ tuṇhī bhavituṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1226_5: Na hi rañño ghare dhanaṃ akkhayadhammameva,
atk-s0101a0:1226_6: amhesu ca adentesu ko añño rañño dassati,
atk-s0101a0:1226_7: handassa dhanaṃ upasaṃharāmā”ti te gāmabhāgena ca nigamabhāgena ca nagarabhāgena ca sāpateyyaṃ saṃharitvā sakaṭāni pūretvā rañño upahariṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1227_1: Puratthimena yaññavāṭassāti puratthimato nagaradvāre dānasālāya puratthimabhāge.
atk-s0101a0:1227_2: Yathā puratthimadisato āgacchantā khattiyānaṃ dānasālāya yāguṃ pivitvā rañño dānasālāya bhuñjitvā nagaraṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0101a0:1227_4: Dakkhiṇena yaññavāṭassāti dakkhiṇato nagaradvāre dānasālāya vuttanayeneva dakkhiṇabhāge paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1228_2: aho yaññasampadāti brāhmaṇā sappiādīhi niṭṭhānagamanaṃ sutvā –
atk-s0101a0:1228_5: handassa yaññaṃ pasaṃsāmā”ti tuṭṭhacittā pasaṃsamānā evamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1228_6: Tuṇhībhūtova nisinno hotīti upari vattabbamatthaṃ cintayamāno nissaddova nisinno hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1228_7: Abhijānāti pana bhavaṃ gotamoti idaṃ brāhmaṇo parihārena pucchanto āha.
atk-s0101a0:1228_12: udāhu purohito brāhmaṇo”ti evaṃ ujukameva pucchayamāno agāravo viya hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1230_3: idaṃ brāhmaṇo “sakalajambudīpavāsīnaṃ uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya dānaṃ nāma dātuṃ garukaṃ sakalajanapado ca attano kammāni akaronto nassissati,
atk-s0101a0:1230_4: atthi nu kho amhākampi imamhā yaññā añño yañño appasamārambhataro ceva mahapphalataro cā”ti etamatthaṃ pucchanto āha.
atk-s0101a0:1230_7: “amhākaṃ pitupitāmahādīhi pavattitānī”ti katvā pacchā duggatapurisehipi vaṃsaparamparāya pavattetabbāni yāgāni,
atk-s0101a0:1230_8: evarūpāni kira sīlavante uddissa nibaddhadānāni tasmiṃ kule daliddāpi na upacchindanti.
atk-s0101a0:1231_1: anāthapiṇḍikassa kira ghare pañca niccabhattasatāni dīyiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1231_3: Atha taṃ kulaṃ anukkamena dāliddiyena abhibhūtaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1231_4: ekā tasmiṃ kule dārikā ekasalākato uddhaṃ dātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0101a0:1231_5: Sāpi pacchā setavāhanarajjaṃ gantvā khalaṃ sodhetvā laddhadhaññena taṃ salākaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1231_8: Sā tato paṭṭhāya puna pañcapi salākabhattasatāni pavattesi.
atk-s0101a0:1232_1: “paṭipāṭiyā tiṭṭhatha tiṭṭhathā”ti ujuṃ gantvā gaṇhatha gaṇhathāti ca ādīni vatvā dīyamānā daṇḍappahārāpi galaggāhāpi dissanti. Ayaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, hetu…pe…
atk-s0101a0:1232_3: Ettha yasmā mahāyaññe viya imasmiṃ salākabhatte na bahūhi veyyāvaccakarehi vā upakaraṇehi vā attho atthi,
atk-s0101a0:1232_5: Yasmā cettha na bahūnaṃ kammacchedavasena pīḷāsaṅkhāto samārambho atthi,
atk-s0101a0:1232_9: yasmā pana chaḷaṅgasamannāgatāya dakkhiṇāya mahāsamudde udakasseva na sukaraṃ puññābhisandassa pamāṇaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1232_13: idampi niccabhattaṃ uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya dadato divase divase ekassa kammaṃ nassati.
atk-s0101a0:1232_15: atthi nu kho itopi añño yañño appaṭṭhataro ca appasamārambhataro cāti.
atk-s0101a0:1232_19: ekena uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya aññaṃ kammaṃ akatvā saṃvidhātabbameva.
atk-s0101a0:1232_21: Paṇṇasālaṃ vā hi kāretuṃ koṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā mahāvihāraṃ vā,
atk-s0101a0:1232_22: ekavāraṃ dhanapariccāgaṃ katvā kāritaṃ sattaṭṭhavassānipi vassasatampi vassasahassampi gacchatiyeva.
atk-s0101a0:1232_24: Tasmā idaṃ vihāradānaṃ salākabhattato appaṭṭhataraṃ appasamārambhatarañca hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1232_25: Yasmā panettha suttantapariyāyena yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyāti ādayo navānisaṃsā vuttā,
atk-s0101a0:1234_0: Siriṃsape ca makase ca, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0101a0:1238_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano;
atk-s0101a0:1243_0: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:1244_1: Tasmā etaṃ salākabhattato mahapphalatarañca mahānisaṃsatarañcāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1244_5: attano santakā hi kākaṇikāpi parassa duppariccajā,
atk-s0101a0:1244_6: handāhaṃ itopi appaṭṭhatarañca appasamārambhatarañca yaññaṃ pucchāmī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1245_1: Tattha yasmā sakiṃ pariccattepi vihāre punappunaṃ chādanakhaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇādivasena kiccaṃ atthiyeva,
atk-s0101a0:1245_2: saraṇaṃ pana ekabhikkhussa vā santike saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā sakiṃ gahitaṃ gahitameva hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1245_4: tasmā taṃ vihāradānato appaṭṭhatarañca appasamārambhatarañca hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1245_5: Yasmā ca saraṇagamanaṃ nāma tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ jīvitapariccāgamayaṃ puññakammaṃ saggasampattiṃ deti,
atk-s0101a0:1245_7: Tiṇṇaṃ pana ratanānaṃ jīvitapariccāgavasena yaññoti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:1246_3: atthi nu kho itopi appaṭṭhataro yañño”ti tato taṃ pucchanto puna “atthi pana,
atk-s0101a0:1246_5: Tattha pāṇātipātā veramaṇītiādīsu veramaṇī nāma virati.
atk-s0101a0:1246_9: Tattha yo sikkhāpadāni agahetvāpi kevalaṃ attano jātigottakulāpadesādīni anussaritvā –
atk-s0101a0:1246_10: “na me idaṃ patirūpa”nti pāṇātipātādīni na karoti,
atk-s0101a0:1247_0: “Ajjatagge jīvitahetupi pāṇaṃ na hanāmī”ti vā “pāṇātipātā viramāmī”ti vā “veramaṇiṃ samādiyāmī”ti vā
atk-s0101a0:1247_1: evaṃ sikkhāpadāni gaṇhantassa pana virati samādānaviratīti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1248_0: Ariyasāvakānaṃ pana maggasampayuttā virati setughātavirati nāma.
atk-s0101a0:1248_1: Tattha purimā dve viratiyo yaṃ voropanādivasena vītikkamitabbaṃ jīvitindriyādivatthu,
atk-s0101a0:1248_4: Ettha ca yo pañca sikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇhati,
atk-s0101a0:1248_5: tassa ekasmiṃ bhinne sabbāni bhinnāni honti.
atk-s0101a0:1248_10: bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako jīvitahetupi neva pāṇaṃ hanati na suraṃ pivati.
atk-s0101a0:1248_11: Sacepissa surañca khīrañca missetvā mukhe pakkhipanti,
atk-s0101a0:1248_18: Yasmā pana saraṇagamane diṭṭhiujukakaraṇaṃ nāma bhāriyaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1248_20: Tasmā etaṃ yathā vā tathā vā gaṇhantassāpi sādhukaṃ gaṇhantassāpi appaṭṭhatarañca appasamārambhatarañca.
atk-s0101a0:1248_21: Pañcasīlasadisassa pana dānassa abhāvato ettha mahapphalatā mahānisaṃsatā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1249_2: dānāni mahādānāni aggaññāni rattaññāni vaṃsaññāni porāṇāni asaṃkiṇṇāni asaṃkiṇṇapubbāni na saṅkiyanti
atk-s0101a0:1249_3: na saṅkiyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhāni samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
atk-s0101a0:1249_6: ariyasāvako pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1249_11: Aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā averaṃ datvā abyāpajjhaṃ datvā aparimāṇassa abhayassa averassa abyāpajjhassa bhāgī hoti. Idaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1251_1: “attasinehañca jīvitasinehañca pariccajitvā rakkhissāmī”ti samādinnatāya yaññoti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:1251_3: idaṃ pana saraṇagamaneyeva patiṭṭhāya rakkhitasīlavasena mahapphalanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1252_3: atthi nu kho aññaṃ kiñci īdisameva hutvā ito appaṭṭhatarañca mahapphalatarañcā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1252_7: Athassa bhagavā tividhasīlapāripūriyaṃ ṭhitassa paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ yaññānaṃ appaṭṭhatarañca mahapphalatarañca
atk-s0101a0:1252_8: dassetukāmo buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya desanaṃ ārabhanto “idha brāhmaṇā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1252_9: Tattha yasmā heṭṭhā vuttehi guṇehi samannāgato paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1252_10: paṭhamajjhānādīsu ṭhito dutiyajjhānādīni nibbattento na kilamati,
atk-s0101a0:1252_12: Yasmā panettha paṭhamajjhānaṃ ekaṃ kappaṃ brahmaloke āyuṃ deti.
atk-s0101a0:1252_20: Nīvaraṇādīnaṃ pana paccanīkānaṃ dhammānaṃ pariccattattā taṃ yaññanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1253_0: Vipassanāñāṇampi yasmā catutthajjhānapariyosānesu guṇesu patiṭṭhāya nibbattento na kilamati,
atk-s0101a0:1253_4: Manomayiddhipi yasmā vipassanāñāṇe patiṭṭhāya nibbattento na kilamati,
atk-s0101a0:1253_8: Iddhividhañāṇādīnipi yasmā manomayañāṇādīsu patiṭṭhāya nibbattento na kilamati,
atk-s0101a0:1253_17: Yasmā pana arahattato visiṭṭhataro añño yañño nāma natthi,
atk-s0101a0:1255_1: Evaṃ vutteti evaṃ bhagavatā vutte desanāya pasīditvā saraṇaṃ gantukāmo kūṭadanto brāhmaṇo –
atk-s0101a0:1255_4: Upavāyatūti upagantvā sarīradarathaṃ nibbāpento tanusītalo vāto vāyatūti.
atk-s0101a0:1255_5: Idañca pana vatvā brāhmaṇo purisaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, tāta,
atk-s0101a0:1255_6: yaññavāṭaṃ pavisitvā sabbe te pāṇayo bandhanā mocehī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1255_7: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā tathā katvā āgantvā “muttā bho,
atk-s0101a0:1255_9: Yāva brāhmaṇo taṃ pavattiṃ na suṇi,
atk-s0101a0:1255_10: na tāva bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:1255_12: Sutvā panassa “bahū vata me pāṇā mocitā”ti cittacāro vippasīdati.
atk-s0101a0:1255_13: Bhagavā tassa vippasannamanataṃ ñatvā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0101a0:1258_4: Vesāliyanti punappunaṃ visālabhāvūpagamanato vesālīti laddhanāmake nagare.
atk-s0101a0:1258_5: Mahāvaneti bahinagare himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ sayaṃ jātavanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0101a0:1258_9: Tattha kaṇṇikaṃ yojetvā thambhānaṃ upari kūṭāgārasālāsaṅkhepena devavimānasadisaṃ pāsādaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0101a0:1258_11: Bhagavā taṃ vesāliṃ upanissāya tasmiṃ saṅghārāme viharati.
atk-s0101a0:1259_1: Paṭisallīno bhagavāti nānārammaṇacārato paṭikkamma sallīno nilīno,
atk-s0101a0:1259_2: ekībhāvaṃ upagamma ekattārammaṇe jhānaratiṃ anubhavatīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1259_4: Ekamantanti tasmā ṭhānā apakkamma tāsu tāsu rukkhacchāyāsu nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1261_2: Mahatiyā licchavīparisāyāti purebhattaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā bhagavato santike
atk-s0101a0:1261_3: uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhahitvā gandhamālādīni gāhāpetvā ugghosanāya mahatiṃ licchavirājaparisaṃ sannipātāpetvā
atk-s0101a0:1261_6: Akālo kho mahālīti tassa oṭṭhaddhassa mahālīti mūlanāmaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1261_7: tena mūlanāmamattena naṃ thero mahālīti ālapati.
atk-s0101a0:1261_8: Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti patirūpāsu rukkhacchāyāsu tāya licchaviparisāya saddhiṃ ratanattayassa vaṇṇaṃ kathayanto nisīdi.
atk-s0101a0:1262_1: Sīho samaṇuddesoti āyasmato nāgitassa bhāgineyyo sattavassakāle pabbajitvā sāsane yuttapayutto “sīho”ti evaṃnāmako sāmaṇero,
atk-s0101a0:1262_5: addhā bhagavā ajja imissā parisāya mahantena ussāhena dhammaṃ desessati,
atk-s0101a0:1262_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ upajjhāyassācikkhitvā bhagavato mahāparisāya sannipatitabhāvaṃ ārocāpeyya”nti cintetvā yenāyasmā nāgito tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0101a0:1263_0: Tvaññeva bhagavato ārocehīti sīho kira bhagavato vissāsiko,
atk-s0101a0:1263_2: tenassa sarīragarutāya uṭṭhānanisajjādīsu ālasiyabhāvo īsakaṃ appahīno viya hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1263_3: Athāyaṃ sāmaṇero bhagavato kālena kālaṃ vattaṃ karoti.
atk-s0101a0:1263_4: Tena naṃ thero “tvampi dasabalassa vissāsiko”ti vatvā gaccha tvaññevārocehīti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1263_7: Sā kira kūṭāgārasālā dakkhiṇuttarato dīghā pācīnamukhā,
atk-s0101a0:1263_8: tenassā purato mahatī chāyā patthaṭā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1264_1: Atha kho bhagavā dvārantarehi ceva vātapānantarehi ca nikkhamitvā vidhāvantāhi vippharantīhi chabbaṇṇāhi
atk-s0101a0:1264_2: buddharasmīhi saṃsūcitanikkhamano valāhakantarato puṇṇacando viya kūṭāgārasālato nikkhamitvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0101a0:1264_4: “atha kho bhagavā vihārā nikkhamma vihārapacchāyāya paññatte āsane nisīdī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1265_1: divasāni purimatarānīti ettha hiyyo divasaṃ purimaṃ nāma,
atk-s0101a0:1265_3: Tato paṭṭhāya pana sabbāni purimāni ceva purimatarāni ca honti.
atk-s0101a0:1265_4: Yadaggeti mūladivasato paṭṭhāya yaṃ divasaṃ aggaṃ parakoṭiṃ katvā viharāmīti attho,
atk-s0101a0:1265_6: Idāni tassa parimāṇaṃ dassento “naciraṃ tīṇi vassānī”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1265_7: Atha vā yadaggeti yaṃ divasaṃ aggaṃ katvā naciraṃ tīṇi vassāni viharāmītipi attho.
atk-s0101a0:1265_8: Yaṃ divasaṃ ādiṃ katvā naciraṃ vihāsiṃ tīṇiyeva vassānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1265_9: Ayaṃ kira bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhanto tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0101a0:1265_14: No ca kho dibbāni saddānīti kasmā sunakkhatto tāni na suṇāti?
atk-s0101a0:1265_15: So kira bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dibbacakkhuparikammaṃ yāci,
atk-s0101a0:1265_17: so yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipanno dibbacakkhuṃ uppādetvā devatānaṃ rūpāni disvā cintesi “imasmiṃ sarīrasaṇṭhāne saddena madhurena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1265_18: kathaṃ nu kho naṃ suṇeyya”nti bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dibbasotaparikammaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0101a0:1265_19: Ayañca atīte ekaṃ sīlavantaṃ bhikkhuṃ kaṇṇasakkhaliyaṃ paharitvā badhiramakāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1265_22: So ettāvatā bhagavati āghātaṃ bandhitvā cintesi –
atk-s0101a0:1265_26: ayampi sabbaññū bhavissatī’ti usūyāya mayhaṃ na kathesī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1265_27: So anukkamena gihibhāvaṃ patvā tamatthaṃ mahālilicchavino kathento evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:1266_2: dibbānaṃ vā rūpānaṃ dassanatthāya dibbānaṃ vā saddānaṃ savanatthāya bhāvitoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1266_5: Ayaṃ kho mahāli hetūti ayaṃ dibbānaṃyeva rūpānaṃ dassanāya ekaṃsabhāvito samādhi hetu.
atk-s0101a0:1266_7: “idaṃ dibbasotena saddasuṇanaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane uttamatthabhūtaṃ maññe imassa nūna atthāya ete bhikkhū
atk-s0101a0:1266_8: paññāsampi saṭṭhipi vassāni apaṇṇakaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caranti,
atk-s0101a0:1267_5: Atha yasmā sāsanato bāhirā etā samādhibhāvanā,
atk-s0101a0:1267_7: Tasmā tā paṭikkhipitvā yadatthaṃ bhikkhū brahmacariyaṃ caranti,
atk-s0101a0:1269_2: Tāni hi vaṭṭadukkhamaye rathe satte saṃyojenti,
atk-s0101a0:1269_7: Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ assa,
atk-s0101a0:1270_0: Tanuttāti pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya ca kadāci karahaci uppattiyā ca tanubhāvā.
atk-s0101a0:1270_2: ye hi baddho upari suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ nibbattituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0101a0:1270_5: Anāvattidhammoti tato brahmalokā puna paṭisandhivasena anāvattanadhammo.
atk-s0101a0:1270_8: Paññāvimuttinti etthāpi sabbakilesabandhanavimuttā arahattaphalapaññāva paññāvimuttīti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1270_13: Atha vā abhiññā sacchikatvāti abhiññāya abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena sacchikaritvātipi attho.
atk-s0101a0:1270_16: “ayaṃ pana dhammo na sakuṇena viya uppatitvā,
atk-s0101a0:1270_17: nāpi godhāya viya urena gantvā sakkā paṭivijjhituṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1270_18: addhā pana imaṃ paṭivijjhantassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāya bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1272_2: Aṭṭhaṅgikoti pañcaṅgikaṃ turiyaṃ viya aṭṭhaṅgiko gāmo viya ca aṭṭhaṅgamattoyeva hutvā aṭṭhaṅgiko,
atk-s0101a0:1272_3: na aṅgato añño maggo nāma atthi.
atk-s0101a0:1272_16: Etesu ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kiccāni honti.
atk-s0101a0:1272_18: sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
atk-s0101a0:1273_0: Api cesā sammādiṭṭhi nāma pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1273_2: Kiccato pana “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0101a0:1273_5: Tesu sammāsaṅkappo kiccato “nekkhammasaṅkappo”tiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0101a0:1273_9: Sammāvāyāmo sammāsatīti idampi dvayaṃ kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0101a0:1274_0: Iti imesu aṭṭhasu dhammesu bhagavatā nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa yogino bahukārattā paṭhamaṃ sammādiṭṭhi desitā.
atk-s0101a0:1274_2: Tasmā etāya pubbabhāge vipassanāñāṇasaṅkhātāya sammādiṭṭhiyā avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā kilesacore ghātento khemena yogāvacaro nibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0101a0:1274_4: “nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa yogino bahukārattā paṭhamaṃ sammādiṭṭhi desitā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1275_2: Yathā hi heraññiko hatthena parivaṭṭetvā parivaṭṭetvā cakkhunā kahāpaṇaṃ olokento –
atk-s0101a0:1275_5: Evaṃ yogāvacaropi pubbabhāge vitakkena vitakketvā vipassanāpaññāya olokayamāno –
atk-s0101a0:1275_8: Yathā vā pana purisena koṭiyaṃ gahetvā parivaṭṭetvā parivaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ mahārukkhaṃ tacchako vāsiyā tacchetvā kamme upaneti,
atk-s0101a0:1275_9: evaṃ vitakkena vitakketvā vitakketvā dinne dhamme yogāvacaro paññāya –
atk-s0101a0:1275_11: ime rūpāvacarā”tiādinā nayena paricchinditvā kamme upaneti.
atk-s0101a0:1275_15: Svāyaṃ yathā sammādiṭṭhiyā evaṃ sammāvācāyapi upakārako. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:1276_1: “idañcidañca karissāmā”ti paṭhamaṃ vācāya saṃvidahitvā loke kammante payojenti;
atk-s0101a0:1276_2: tasmā vācā kāyakammassa upakārikāti sammāvācāya anantaraṃ sammākammanto vutto.
atk-s0101a0:1276_4: tividhañca kāyaduccaritaṃ pahāya ubhayaṃ sucaritaṃ pūrentasseva yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakaṃ sīlaṃ pūreti,
atk-s0101a0:1276_7: Evaṃ visuddhājīvena pana “parisuddho me ājīvo”ti ettāvatā ca paritosaṃ katvā suttapamattena viharituṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1276_8: atha kho “sabbiriyāpathesu idaṃ vīriyaṃ samārabhitabba”nti dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ sammāvāyāmo vutto.
atk-s0101a0:1276_9: Tato “āraddhavīriyenapi kāyādīsu catūsu vatthūsu sati sūpaṭṭhitā kātabbā”ti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ sammāsati desitā.
atk-s0101a0:1276_10: Yasmā panevaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā sati samādhissupakārānupakārānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesitvā pahoti ekattārammaṇe cittaṃ samādhātuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1276_11: tasmā sammāsatiyā anantaraṃ sammāsamādhi desitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1276_12: Etesaṃ dhammānaṃ sacchikiriyāyāti etesaṃ sotāpattiphalādīnaṃ paccakkhakiriyatthāya.
atk-s0101a0:1278_5: Atha bhagavatā tassa laddhiyā āvikaraṇatthaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharituṃ idamāraddhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1278_8: tatra vasantaṃ maṃ te dve pabbajitā evaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1278_9: Athāhaṃ tesaṃ buddhuppādaṃ dassetvā tantidhammaṃ nāma kathento idamavocaṃ – “āvuso,
atk-s0101a0:1278_10: saddhāsampanno nāma kulaputto evarūpassa satthu sāsane pabbajito,
atk-s0101a0:1278_11: evaṃ tividhaṃ sīlaṃ pūretvā paṭhamajjhānādīni patvā ṭhito ‘taṃ jīva’ntiādīni vadeyya,
atk-s0101a0:1278_13: Tato tehi “yutta”nti vutte “ahaṃ kho panetaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0101a0:1278_16: atha ca panāhaṃ na vadāmī”ti taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā uttari khīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā “imassa evaṃ vattuṃ na yutta”nti avocaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1278_17: Te mama vacanaṃ sutvā attamanā ahesunti.
atk-s0101a0:1278_18: Evaṃ vutte sopi attamano ahosi. Tenāha –
atk-s0101a0:1278_20: Attamano oṭṭhaddho licchavī bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1281_6: Tato kotūhaliko nāma daliddo chātakabhayena saputtadāro avantiraṭṭhaṃ gacchanto puttaṃ vahituṃ asakkonto chaḍḍetvā agamāsi,
atk-s0101a0:1281_9: Gopālakena ca tadā bahupāyāso paṭiyatto hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1281_11: Atha so puriso balavapāyāsaṃ bhutto jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto rattibhāge kālaṃ katvā tattheva sunakhiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā kukkuro jāto,
atk-s0101a0:1281_14: Paccekabuddhopi bhattakiccapariyosāne kukkurassa ekekaṃ piṇḍaṃ deti,
atk-s0101a0:1281_15: so paccekabuddhe sinehaṃ uppādetvā gopālakena saddhiṃ paṇṇasālampi gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:1281_16: Gopālake asannihite bhattavelāyaṃ sayameva gantvā kālārocanatthaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre bhussati,
atk-s0101a0:1281_18: So paccekabuddhe mudukena cittena kālaṃkatvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0101a0:1281_20: So devalokato cavitvā kosambiyaṃ ekassa kulassa ghare nibbatti.
atk-s0101a0:1281_21: Taṃ aputtako seṭṭhi tassa mātāpitūnaṃ dhanaṃ datvā puttaṃ katvā aggahesi.
atk-s0101a0:1281_22: Atha attano putte jāte sattakkhattuṃ ghātāpetuṃ upakkami.
atk-s0101a0:1281_23: So puññavantatāya sattasupi ṭhānesu maraṇaṃ appatvā avasāne ekāya seṭṭhidhītāya veyyattiyena laddhajīvito
atk-s0101a0:1281_24: aparabhāge pituaccayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ patvā ghosakaseṭṭhi nāma jāto.
atk-s0101a0:1282_0: Tena ca samayena himavantato pañcasatatāpasā sarīrasantappanatthaṃ antarantarākosambiṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0101a0:1282_1: tesaṃ ete tayo seṭṭhī attano attano uyyānesu paṇṇakuṭiyo katvā upaṭṭhānaṃ karonti.
atk-s0101a0:1282_2: Athekadivasaṃ te tāpasā himavantato āgacchantā mahākantāre tasitā kilantā ekaṃ mahantaṃ vaṭarukkhaṃ patvā
atk-s0101a0:1282_3: tattha adhivatthāya devatāya santikā saṅgahaṃ paccāsisantā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1282_4: Devatā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā tesaṃ pānīyapānakādīni datvā kilamathaṃ paṭivinodesi,
atk-s0101a0:1282_7: kammaṃ katvā tayā ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti?
atk-s0101a0:1282_12: So uposathadivasesu attano bhatakānaṃ pakatibhattavetanameva datvā uposathaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0101a0:1282_13: Athāhaṃ ekadivasaṃ majjhanhike pātarāsatthāya āgato kañci bhatakakammaṃ akarontaṃ disvā –
atk-s0101a0:1282_14: ‘ajja manussā kasmā kammaṃ na karontī’ti pucchiṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1282_20: Svāhaṃ upaḍḍhadivasaṃ upaḍḍhuposathaṃ samādiyitvā tadaheva kālaṃ katvā imaṃ sampattiṃ paṭilabhi”nti.
atk-s0101a0:1283_0: Atha te tāpasā “buddho kira uppanno”ti sañjātapītipāmojjā tatova sāvatthiṃ gantukāmā hutvāpi –
atk-s0101a0:1283_1: “bahukārā no upaṭṭhākaseṭṭhino tesampi imamatthamārocessāmā”ti kosambiṃ gantvā seṭṭhīhi katasakkārabahumānā “tadaheva mayaṃ gacchāmā”ti āhaṃsu. “Kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1283_3: nanu tumhe pubbe cattāro pañca māse vasitvā gacchathā”ti ca vutte taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. “Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1283_5: tumhe saṇikaṃ āgacchathā”ti sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1283_6: Tepi seṭṭhino pañcasatapañcasatasakaṭaparivārā sāvatthiṃ gantvā dānādīni datvā kosambiṃ āgamanatthāya
atk-s0101a0:1283_7: bhagavantaṃ yācitvā paccāgamma tayo vihāre kāresuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1284_2: Yasmā panassa upajjhāyo dārumayena pattena piṇḍāya carati,
atk-s0101a0:1284_4: Etadavocunti upārambhādhippāyena vādaṃ āropetukāmā hutvā etadavocuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1284_6: sace samaṇo gotamo “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”nti vakkhati,
atk-s0101a0:1284_11: Sace pana “aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīra”nti vakkhati,
atk-s0101a0:1284_12: athassetaṃ vādaṃ āropessāma “tumhākaṃ vāde rūpaṃ bhijjati,
atk-s0101a0:1284_14: Tena vo vāde satto sassato āpajjatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1284_16: mama sāsane ime dve ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā atthīti na jānanti,
atk-s0101a0:1284_17: handa nesaṃ pañhaṃ avissajjetvā tassāyeva paṭipadāya āvibhāvatthaṃ dhammaṃ desemī”ti cintetvā “tena hāvuso”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1285_1: Tattha kallaṃ nu kho tassetaṃ vacanāyāti tassetaṃ saddhāpabbajitassa tividhaṃ sīlaṃ paripūretvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1285_2: pattassa yuttaṃ nu kho etaṃ vattunti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1285_3: Taṃ sutvā paribbājakā puthujjano nāma yasmā nibbicikiccho na hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1285_6: Atha ca panāhaṃ na vadāmīti ahaṃ etamevaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0101a0:1285_8: atha kho kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā bhāventassa paññābalena uppannaṃ mahaggatacittametanti saññaṃ ṭhapesiṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1285_9: Na kallaṃ tassetanti idaṃ te paribbājakā –
atk-s0101a0:1285_11: tasmā na yuttaṃ tassetaṃ vattu”nti maññamānā vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:1288_4: Uruññāyanti uruññāti tassa raṭṭhassapi nagarassapi etadeva nāmaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1288_6: Kaṇṇakatthale migadāyeti tassa nagarassa avidūre kaṇṇakatthalaṃ nāma eko ramaṇīyo bhūmibhāgo atthi.
atk-s0101a0:1288_12: Lūkhājīvinti acelakamuttācārādivasena lūkho ājīvo assāti lūkhājīvī,
atk-s0101a0:1288_16: Dhammassa ca anudhammaṃ byākarontīti bhotā gotamena vuttakāraṇassa anukāraṇaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0101a0:1288_17: Sahadhammiko vādānuvādoti parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā anuvādo vā viññūhi garahitabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1288_18: kāraṇaṃ koci appamattakopi kiṃ na āgacchati.
atk-s0101a0:1288_20: “kiṃ sabbākārenapi tava vāde gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1289_1: Ekaccaṃ tapassiṃ lūkhājīvintiādīsu idhekacco acelakapabbajjāditapanissitattā tapassī “lūkhena jīvitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1289_3: appapuññatāya ca sukhena jīvitavuttimeva na labhati,
atk-s0101a0:1289_4: so tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā niraye nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1290_2: So “na dāni mayā sadiso atthī”ti attānaṃ ucce ṭhāne sambhāvetvā “bhiyyosomattāya lābhaṃ uppādessāmī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1290_3: anesanavasena tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā niraye nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1291_3: handadāni puññāni karomī”ti tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā sagge nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1292_2: “mayhaṃ pubbepi katapuññatāya sukhajīvikā uppajjatī”ti cintetvā anesanaṃ pahāya tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā sagge nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1293_0: Eko pana tapassī appadukkhavihārī hoti bāhirakācārayutto tāpaso vā channaparibbājako vā,
atk-s0101a0:1293_1: appapuññatāya ca manāpe paccaye na labhati.
atk-s0101a0:1293_2: So anesanavasena tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā attānaṃ sukhe ṭhapetvā niraye nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1294_1: “na dāni mayā sadiso atthī”ti mānaṃ uppādetvā anesanavasena lābhasakkāraṃ vā uppādento micchādiṭṭhivasena –
atk-s0101a0:1294_2: “sukho imissā paribbājikāya daharāya mudukāya lomasāya samphasso”tiādīni cintetvā kāmesu pātabyataṃ vā
atk-s0101a0:1294_3: āpajjanto tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā niraye nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1295_0: Aparo pana appadukkhavihārī appapuñño hoti, so –
atk-s0101a0:1295_1: “ahaṃ pubbepi akatapuññatāya sukhena jīvikaṃ na labhāmī”ti tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā sagge nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1296_2: idāni puññāni karissāmī”ti tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā sagge nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1297_1: appapuññatāya vā sakalampi gāmaṃ vicaritvā udarapūraṃ na labhati. So –
atk-s0101a0:1297_4: tīṇi vā kuhanavatthūni paṭisevitvā niraye nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1298_1: So tāya puññasampattiyā mānaṃ janayitvā uppannaṃ lābhaṃ thāvaraṃ kattukāmo anesanavasena tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā niraye uppajjati.
atk-s0101a0:1299_4: āyatimpi dullabhasukho bhavissāmī”ti tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkonto sagge nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1300_2: idānipi puññaṃ karissāmī”ti anesanaṃ pahāya tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkonto sagge nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1301_10: na bhaṇḍikaṃ karonto mahārajako viya dhotañca adhotañca ekato karomā”ti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:1302_2: tañhi loke na koci “na sādhū”ti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:1302_3: Puna yaṃ te ekaccanti pañcavidhaṃ veraṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1302_5: Puna yaṃ te ekaccanti pañcadvāre asaṃvaraṃ, te kira –
atk-s0101a0:1302_9: Puna yaṃ te ekaccanti pañcadvāre saṃvaraṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1303_0: Evaṃ paresaṃ vādena saha attano vādassa samānāsamānataṃ dassetvā idāni attano vādena saha paresaṃ vādassa
atk-s0101a0:1305_2: ettha ca laddhiṃ pucchanto samanuyuñjati nāma,
atk-s0101a0:1305_5: Satthārā vā satthāranti satthārā vā saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṃharitvā –
atk-s0101a0:1305_6: “kiṃ te satthā te dhamme sabbaso pahāya vattati,
atk-s0101a0:1306_2: Tattha akusalā akusalasaṅkhātāti akusalā ceva “akusalā”ti ca saṅkhātā ñātā koṭṭhāsaṃ vā katvā ṭhapitāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1306_5: Na alamariyāti niddosaṭṭhena ariyā bhavituṃ nālaṃ asamatthā.
atk-s0101a0:1307_1: Yaṃ viññū samanuyuñjantāti yena viññū amhe ca aññe ca pucchantā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1307_4: Yaṃ vā pana bhonto pare gaṇācariyāti pare pana bhonto gaṇācariyā yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ pahāya vattantīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1307_5: Amheva tattha yebhuyyena pasaṃseyyunti idaṃ bhagavā satthārā satthāraṃ samanuyuñjanepi āha –
atk-s0101a0:1307_12: “lābhā vata bho sāvakānaṃ ye evarūpassa satthu santikāvacarā”ti,
atk-s0101a0:1307_14: Bhikkhūnaṃ panācāragocaraṃ abhikkamapaṭikkamādīni ca disvā bhavanti vattāro –
atk-s0101a0:1307_15: “santikāvacarānaṃ vata bho sāvakānaṃ ayañca upasamaguṇo satthu kīva rūpo bhavissatī”ti,
atk-s0101a0:1307_20: sā satthūti saṅghapasaṃsāyapi satthuyeva pasaṃsāsiddhito bhagavā dvīsupi nayesu –
atk-s0101a0:1307_22: Samaṇo gotamo ime dhamme anavasesaṃ pahāya vattati,
atk-s0101a0:1307_23: yaṃ vā pana bhonto pare gaṇācariyātiādīsupi panettha ayamadhippāyo –
atk-s0101a0:1307_29: Itarāni tīṇi pahānāni sabbena sabbaṃ natthi.
atk-s0101a0:1307_35: tesu pañcasīlamattameva adhivāsanakhantimattameva ca aññesaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1308_10: mayhaṃ sāvakasaṅghena sadiso saṅgho nāma natthī”ti bhagavā sīhanādaṃ nadati.
atk-s0101a0:1310_1: Evaṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā tassa sīhanādassa aviparītabhāvāvabodhanatthaṃ – “atthi, kassapa,
atk-s0101a0:1310_6: Idāni taṃ duvidhaṃ maggañca paṭipadañca ekato katvā dassento –
atk-s0101a0:1310_9: “samaṇo gotamo mayhaṃyeva maggo ca paṭipadā ca atthi,
atk-s0101a0:1312_8: uccārakammādīsu lokiyakulaputtācārena virahito ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karoti,
atk-s0101a0:1312_11: Hatthāpalekhanoti hatthe piṇḍamhi ṭhite jivhāya hatthaṃ apalikhati,
atk-s0101a0:1312_12: uccāraṃ vā katvā hatthasmiññeva daṇḍakasaññī hutvā hatthena apalikhati.
atk-s0101a0:1312_14: bhante”ti vutto na etīti na ehibhaddantiko.
atk-s0101a0:1312_20: uddissakatanti “imaṃ tumhe uddissa kata”nti evaṃ ārocitaṃ bhikkhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1312_21: Na nimantananti “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthā”ti evaṃ nimantitabhikkhampi na sādiyati,
atk-s0101a0:1312_23: Na kumbhimukhāti kumbhito uddharitvā diyyamānaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhati.
atk-s0101a0:1312_24: Na kaḷopimukhāti kaḷopīti ukkhali vā pacchi vā,
atk-s0101a0:1312_26: Kumbhikaḷopiyo maṃ nissāya kaṭacchunā pahāraṃ labhantīti.
atk-s0101a0:1312_27: Na eḷakamantaranti ummāraṃ antaraṃ katvā diyyamānaṃ na gaṇhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:1313_0: Dvinnanti dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmiṃ uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:1313_2: Na gabbhiniyātiādīsu pana “gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamati.
atk-s0101a0:1313_6: dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānaṃ atthāya tato tato taṇḍulādīni samādapetvā bhattaṃ pacanti.
atk-s0101a0:1313_10: tattha tassa adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:1313_15: tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopimukhādīsu nilīnā makkhikā uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti,
atk-s0101a0:1313_16: tato āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:1314_3: Ekāgārikoti yo ekasmiṃyeva gehe bhikkhaṃ labhitvā nivattati.
atk-s0101a0:1314_12: ekāhavārena dvīhavārena sattāhavārena aḍḍhamāsavārenāti evaṃ divasavārena āgatabhattabhojanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1315_3: Nīvārādīsu nīvāro nāma araññe sayaṃjātā vīhijāti.
atk-s0101a0:1317_6: uṇhe uṇho appaggho ca dubbaṇṇo ca duggandho dukkhasamphasso”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1318_3: gacchantopi ukkuṭikova hutvā uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:1318_4: Kaṇṭakāpassayikoti ayakaṇṭake vā pakatikaṇṭake vā bhūmiyaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ attharitvā ṭhānacaṅkamādīni karoti.
atk-s0101a0:1318_9: Rajojalladharoti sarīraṃ telena makkhitvā rajuṭṭhānaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0101a0:1318_12: Yathāsanthatikoti laddhaṃ āsanaṃ akopetvā yadeva labhati,
atk-s0101a0:1318_19: sāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ pāpaṃ pavāhessāmīti udakorohanānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharatīti.
atk-s0101a0:1320_1: Atha bhagavā sīlasampadādīhi vinā tesaṃ tapopakkamānaṃ niratthakataṃ dassento –
atk-s0101a0:1321_1: bho gotamāti idaṃ kassapo “mayaṃ pubbe ettakamattaṃ sāmaññañca brahmaññañcāti vicarāma,
atk-s0101a0:1321_2: tumhe pana aññaṃyeva sāmaññañca brahmaññañca vadathā”ti dīpento āha.
atk-s0101a0:1321_3: Pakati kho esāti pakatikathā esā. Imāya ca, kassapa,
atk-s0101a0:1321_4: mattāyāti “kassapa yadi iminā pamāṇena evaṃ parittakena paṭipattikkamena sāmaññaṃ vā brahmaññaṃ vā dukkaraṃ sudukkaraṃ nāma abhavissa,
atk-s0101a0:1321_5: tato netaṃ abhavissa kallaṃ vacanāya dukkaraṃ sāmañña”nti ayamettha padasambandhena saddhiṃ attho.
atk-s0101a0:1322_1: Dujjānoti idampi so “mayaṃ pubbe ettakena samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā hotīti vicarāma,
atk-s0101a0:1322_2: tumhe pana aññathā vadathā”ti idaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0101a0:1322_3: Athassa bhagavā taṃ pakativādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sabhāvatova dujjānabhāvaṃ āvikaronto punapi –
atk-s0101a0:1322_5: Tatrāpi vuttanayeneva padasambandhaṃ katvā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1324_3: Ayaṃ kira paṇḍito bhagavato kathentasseva kathaṃ uggahesi,
atk-s0101a0:1324_4: atha attano paṭipattiyā niratthakataṃ viditvā samaṇo gotamo –
atk-s0101a0:1324_9: Handa dāni naṃ tā sampattiyo pucchāmī”ti sīlasampadādivijānanatthaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0101a0:1324_10: Athassa bhagavā buddhuppādaṃ dassetvā tantidhammaṃ kathento tā sampattiyo dassetuṃ –
atk-s0101a0:1324_12: Imāya ca kassapa sīlasampadāyāti idaṃ arahattaphalameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1324_14: Tasmā arahattaphalasampayuttāhi sīlacittapaññāsampadāhi aññā uttaritarā vā paṇītatarā vā sīlādisampadā natthīti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1326_1: Evañca pana vatvā idāni anuttaraṃ mahāsīhanādaṃ nadanto –
atk-s0101a0:1326_5: pañcasīlāni hiādiṃ katvā yāva pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlā sīlameva,
atk-s0101a0:1326_7: Nāhaṃ tatthāti tattha sīlepi paramasīlepi ahaṃ attano samasamaṃ mama sīlasamena sīlena mayā samaṃ puggalaṃ na passāmīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1326_8: Ahameva tattha bhiyyoti ahameva tasmiṃ sīle uttamo.
atk-s0101a0:1326_10: Yadidaṃ adhisīlanti yaṃ etaṃ uttamaṃ sīlanti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1327_10: tattha ahameva bhiyyoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1327_11: Paññādhikārepi kammassakatāpaññā ca vipassanāpaññā ca paññā nāma,
atk-s0101a0:1327_15: yāyaṃ adhipaññā nāma ahameva tattha bhiyyoti vimuttādhikāre tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttiyo vimutti nāma,
atk-s0101a0:1327_17: Idhāpi ca yadidaṃ adhivimuttīti yā ayaṃ adhivimutti,
atk-s0101a0:1329_3: Yehi vesārajjehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-s0101a0:1330_0: Pañhañca naṃ pucchantīti paṇḍitā devamanussā naṃ pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā pucchanti.
atk-s0101a0:1330_2: Cittaṃ ārādhetīti pañhāvissajjanena mahājanassa cittaṃ paritosetiyeva.
atk-s0101a0:1330_3: No ca kho sotabbaṃ maññantīti cittaṃ ārādhetvā kathentassapissa vacanaṃ pare sotabbaṃ na maññantīti,
atk-s0101a0:1330_5: Sotabbañcassa maññantīti devāpi manussāpi mahanteneva ussāhena sotabbaṃ maññanti.
atk-s0101a0:1330_8: paṇītāni cīvarādīni veḷuvanavihārādayo ca mahāvihāre pariccajantā pasannākāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0101a0:1330_9: Tathattāyāti yaṃ so dhammaṃ deseti tathā bhāvāya,
atk-s0101a0:1330_12: tassa hi bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā keci saraṇesu keci pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0101a0:1330_14: Paṭipannā ca ārādhentīti tañca pana paṭipadaṃ paṭipannā pūretuṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0101a0:1330_16: paṭipattipūraṇena tassa bhoto gotamassa cittaṃ ārādhentīti vattabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1331_1: Ekaccaṃ tapassiṃ niraye nibbattaṃ passāmīti hi bhagavato eko sīhanādo.
atk-s0101a0:1331_11: sīhanādaṃ nadanto parisamajjhe nisīditvā nadāmīti eko.
atk-s0101a0:1331_23: “parisāsu ca nadatī”ti ādayo dasa dasa parivārā.
atk-s0101a0:1331_24: Evaṃ te dasa purimānaṃ dasannaṃ parivāravasena sataṃ purimā ca dasāti dasādhikaṃ sīhanādasataṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1331_25: Ito aññasmiṃ pana sutte ettakā sīhanādā dullabhā,
atk-s0101a0:1331_27: Iti bhagavā “sīhanādaṃ kho samaṇo gotamo nadati,
atk-s0101a0:1331_28: tañca kho suññāgāre nadatī”ti evaṃ vādānu vādaṃ paṭisedhetvā idāni parisati naditapubbaṃ sīhanādaṃ dassento “ekamidāha”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1333_1: Tattha tatra maṃ aññataro tapabrahmacārīti tatra rājagahe gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharantaṃ maṃ aññataro tapabrahmacārī nigrodho nāma paribbājako.
atk-s0101a0:1333_3: Idaṃ yaṃ taṃ bhagavā gijjhakūṭe mahāvihāre nisinno udumbarikāya deviyā uyyāne nisinnassa nigrodhassa
atk-s0101a0:1333_4: ca paribbājakassa sandhānassa ca upāsakassa dibbāya sotadhātuyā kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā ākāsenāgantvā tesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1333_5: santike paññatte āsane nisīditvā nigrodhena adhijegucche puṭṭhapañhaṃ vissajjesi,
atk-s0101a0:1333_9: bhanteti ṭhapetvā andhabālaṃ diṭṭhigatikaṃ añño paṇḍitajātiko “ko nāma bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā na attamano assā”ti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:1333_11: “ciraṃ vata me aniyyānikapakkhe yojetvā attā kilamito,
atk-s0101a0:1333_12: ‘sukkhanadītīre nhāyissāmī’ti samparivattentena viya thuse koṭṭentena viya na koci attho nipphādito.
atk-s0101a0:1333_13: Handāhaṃ attānaṃ yoge yojessāmī”ti cintetvā āha.
atk-s0101a0:1333_14: Atha bhagavā yo anena khandhake titthiyaparivāso paññatto,
atk-s0101a0:1333_17: itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhāmi upasampadaṃ, svāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1333_18: saṃghaṃ cattāro māse parivāsaṃ yācāmī”tiādinā nayena samādiyitvā parivasati,
atk-s0101a0:1334_3: Upasampadatthikena pana nātikālena gāmappavesanādīni aṭṭha vattāni pūrentena parivasitabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1334_6: Vitthārato panesa titthiyaparivāso samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pabbajjakhandhakavaṇṇanāya vuttanayena veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1334_7: Api ca metthāti api ca me ettha.
atk-s0101a0:1334_10: ayaṃ na parivāsāraho”ti idaṃ mayhaṃ pākaṭanti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:1334_13: yattha evaṃ ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvā yuttameva gaṇhanti,
atk-s0101a0:1335_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassa tibbacchandataṃ viditvā –
atk-s0101a0:1335_1: “na kassapo parivāsaṃ arahatī”ti aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0101a0:1335_3: So tathā katvā taṃ pabbājetvā bhagavato santikaṃ āgamāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1335_6: “alattha kho acelo kassapo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1335_9: Vūpakaṭṭhoti vatthukāmakilesakāmehi kāyena ceva cittena ca vūpakaṭṭho.
atk-s0101a0:1335_12: Pahitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pesitacitto vissaṭṭhaattabhāvo.
atk-s0101a0:1335_20: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā,
atk-s0101a0:1336_0: Evamassa paccavekkhaṇabhūmiṃ dassetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetuṃ “aññataro kho panāyasmā kassapo arahataṃ ahosī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1336_3: bhagavato sāvakānaṃ arahantānaṃ abbhantaro ahosīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0101a0:1336_4: Yaṃ yaṃ pana antarantarā na vuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1336_5: taṃ taṃ tattha tattha vuttattā pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0101a0:1339_4: Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmeti sāvatthiṃ upanissāya yo jetassa kumārassa vane anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā ārāmo kārito,
atk-s0101a0:1339_6: Poṭṭhapādo paribbājakoti nāmena poṭṭhapādo nāma channaparibbājako.
atk-s0101a0:1339_7: So kira gihikāle brāhmaṇamahāsālo kāmesuādīnavaṃ disvā cattālīsakoṭiparimāṇaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā titthiyānaṃ gaṇācariyo jāto.
atk-s0101a0:1339_9: tasmiṃ kira ṭhāne caṅkītārukkhapokkharasātippabhutayo brāhmaṇā nigaṇṭhaacelakaparibbājakādayo ca pabbajitā
atk-s0101a0:1339_10: sannipatitvā attano attano samayaṃ vadanti kathenti dīpenti,
atk-s0101a0:1339_12: Sveva ca tindukācīrasaṅkhātāya timbarūrukkhapantiyā parikkhittattā tindukācīro.
atk-s0101a0:1339_13: Yasmā panettha paṭhamaṃ ekāva sālā ahosi,
atk-s0101a0:1339_14: pacchā mahāpuññaṃ paribbājakaṃ nissāya bahū sālā katā.
atk-s0101a0:1339_15: Tasmā tameva ekaṃ sālaṃ upādāya laddhanāmavasena ekasālakoti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:1339_16: Mallikāya pana pasenadirañño deviyā uyyānabhūto so pupphaphalasampanno ārāmoti katvā mallikāya ārāmoti saṅkhyaṃ gato.
atk-s0101a0:1339_17: Tasmiṃ samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme.
atk-s0101a0:1340_1: Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā paccūsasamaye sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pattharitvā lokaṃ pariggaṇhanto ñāṇajālassa antogataṃ paribbājakaṃ disvā –
atk-s0101a0:1340_5: atha maṃ poṭṭhapādo nirodhañca nirodhavuṭṭhānañca pucchissati,
atk-s0101a0:1340_6: tassāhaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ ñāṇena saṃsanditvā tadubhayaṃ kathessāmi,
atk-s0101a0:1340_7: atha so katipāhaccayena cittaṃ hatthisāriputtaṃ gahetvā mama santikaṃ āgamissati,
atk-s0101a0:1340_10: citto hatthisāriputto mama santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1340_11: Tato pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā vijjulatāsadisaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0101a0:1340_12: yugandharapabbataṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitamahāmeghaṃ viya meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ ekaṃsavaragataṃ katvā paccagghaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1340_13: selamayapattaṃ vāmaaṃsakūṭe laggetvā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisissāmīti sīho viya himavantapādā vihārā nikkhami.
atk-s0101a0:1341_1: Etadahosīti nagaradvārasamīpaṃ gantvā attano rucivasena sūriyaṃ oloketvā atippagabhāvameva disvā etaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1341_7: imassa na desessāmā”ti evaṃ parivitakkapubbabhāgo panesa sabbabuddhānaṃ labbhati. Tenāha –
atk-s0101a0:1342_2: evaṃ nadamānāya cassā uddhaṃ gamanavasena ucco,
atk-s0101a0:1342_4: tesañhi paribbājakānaṃ pātova vuṭṭhāya kattabbaṃ nāma cetiyavattaṃ vā bodhivattaṃ vā ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ vā yoniso manasikāro vā natthi.
atk-s0101a0:1342_5: Tena te pātova vuṭṭhāya bālātape nisinnā –
atk-s0101a0:1342_7: imassa pādo”ti evaṃ aññamaññassa hatthapādādīni vā ārabbha,
atk-s0101a0:1342_9: aññaṃ vā kāmassādabhavassādādivatthuṃ ārabbha kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā anupubbena rājakathādianekavidhaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0101a0:1343_0: Tato poṭṭhapādo paribbājako te paribbājake oloketvā –
atk-s0101a0:1343_2: mayañca samaṇassa gotamassa pātubhāvato paṭṭhāya sūriyuggamane khajjopanakūpamā jātā,
atk-s0101a0:1343_4: Sace panimaṃ ṭhānaṃ samaṇo gotamo vā gotamassa sāvako vā gihī upaṭṭhāko vā tassa āgaccheyya,
atk-s0101a0:1343_6: parisadoso kho pana parisajeṭṭhakasseva upari ārohatī”ti itocito ca vilokento bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0101a0:1344_5: Yathā nāma parisamajjhaṃ pavisanto puriso vajjapaṭicchādanatthaṃ nivāsanaṃ saṇṭhapeti,
atk-s0101a0:1344_18: Paribbājakā kira buddhesu vā buddhasāvakesu vā attano santikaṃ āgatesu –
atk-s0101a0:1344_21: na kho pana te yassa vā tassa vā santikaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0101a0:1344_22: passatha amhākaṃ uttamabhāva”nti attano upaṭṭhākānaṃ santike attānaṃ ukkhipanti,
atk-s0101a0:1344_25: Te kira bhagavato upaṭṭhāke disvā evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0101a0:1344_26: “tumhākaṃ satthā bhavaṃ gotamopi gotamasāvakāpi amhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0101a0:1344_28: Tumhe pana amhe akkhīhipi passituṃ na icchatha,
atk-s0101a0:1344_32: “buddhāpi etesaṃ santikaṃ gacchanti kiṃ amhāka”nti tato paṭṭhāya te disvā nappamajjanti.
atk-s0101a0:1344_33: Tuṇhī ahesunti poṭṭhapādaṃ parivāretvā nissaddā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1345_3: bhagavati hi no āgate ānando hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1345_15: Evañca pana vatvā na mānathaddho hutvā nisīdi,
atk-s0101a0:1345_17: Bhagavantañhi upagataṃ disvā āsanena animantento vā apacitiṃ akaronto vā dullabho. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:1345_19: Ayampi paribbājako attano nisinnāsanaṃ papphoṭetvā bhagavantaṃ āsanena nimantento –
atk-s0101a0:1345_22: Antarākathā vippakatāti nisinnānaṃ vo ādito paṭṭhāya yāva mamāgamanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1345_23: etasmiṃ antare kā nāma kathā vippakatā,
atk-s0101a0:1345_24: mamāgamanapaccayā katamā kathā pariyantaṃ na gatā, vadatha,
atk-s0101a0:1345_25: yāva naṃ pariyantaṃ netvā demīti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi.
atk-s0101a0:1345_28: na tumhākaṃ purato vattabbataṃ arahatī”ti dīpento “tiṭṭhatesā,
atk-s0101a0:1347_5: Bhagavato panāgamanaṃ labhitvā mayaṃ aññadeva sukāraṇaṃ pucchāmāti dīpeti.
atk-s0101a0:1347_9: Tattha kotūhalasālāyanti kotūhalasālā nāma paccekasālā natthi.
atk-s0101a0:1347_10: Yattha pana nānātitthiyā samaṇabrāhmaṇā nānāvidhaṃ kathaṃ pavattenti,
atk-s0101a0:1347_13: ayaṃ kiṃ vadatī”ti kotūhaluppattiṭṭhānato kotūhalasālāti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:1347_18: Yadā kira bhagavā jātakaṃ vā katheti,
atk-s0101a0:1347_19: sikkhāpadaṃ vā paññapeti tadā sakalajambudīpe bhagavato kittighoso pattharati,
atk-s0101a0:1347_22: mayaṃ kiṃ na sakkoma tādisaṃ kiñci kathetu”nti bhagavato paṭibhāgakiriyaṃ karontā ekaṃ bhavantarasamayaṃ kathenti –
atk-s0101a0:1347_24: mayaṃ kiṃ na sakkoma paññapetu”nti attano sāvakānaṃ kiñcideva sikkhāpadaṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0101a0:1347_25: Tadā pana bhagavā aṭṭhavidhaparisamajjhe nisīditvā nirodhakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0101a0:1348_1: Purimo cettha yvāyaṃ bāhire titthāyatane pabbajito cittappavattiyaṃ dosaṃ disvā acittakabhāvo santoti
atk-s0101a0:1348_2: samāpattiṃ bhāvetvā ito cuto pañca kappasatāni asaññībhave ṭhatvā puna idha uppajjati.
atk-s0101a0:1348_3: Tassa saññuppāde ca nirodhe ca hetuṃ apassanto –
atk-s0101a0:1349_0: Dutiyo naṃ nisedhetvā migasiṅgatāpasassa asaññakabhāvaṃ gahetvā –
atk-s0101a0:1349_2: Migasiṅgatāpaso kira attantapo ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1349_4: Sakko devarājā “sakkaṭṭhānaṃ nu kho tāpaso patthetī”ti alambusaṃ nāma devakaññaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:1349_7: Tāpaso paṭhamadivase taṃ disvāva palāyitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0101a0:1349_8: Dutiyadivase kāmacchandanīvaraṇena bhaggo taṃ hatthe aggahesi,
atk-s0101a0:1349_9: so tena dibbaphassena phuṭṭho visaññī hutvā tiṇṇaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ accayena saññaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0101a0:1349_11: “tiṇṇaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ accayena nirodhā vuṭṭhito”ti maññamāno evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:1350_0: Tatiyo naṃ nisedhetvā āthabbaṇapayogaṃ sandhāya “upakaḍḍhantipi apakaḍḍhantipī”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1350_1: Āthabbaṇikā kira āthabbaṇaṃ payojetvā sattaṃ sīsacchinnaṃ viya hatthacchinnaṃ viya mataṃ viya ca katvā dassenti.
atk-s0101a0:1350_2: Tassa puna pākatikabhāvaṃ disvā so diṭṭhigatiko –
atk-s0101a0:1351_0: Catuttho naṃ nisedhetvā yakkhadāsīnaṃ madaniddaṃ sandhāya “santi hi bho devatā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1351_1: Yakkhadāsiyo kira sabbarattiṃ devatūpahāraṃ kurumānā naccitvā gāyitvā aruṇodaye ekaṃ surāpātiṃ pivitvā parivattitvā supitvā divā vuṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0101a0:1352_1: Tenassa taṃ kathaṃ sutvā vippaṭisāro uppajji.
atk-s0101a0:1352_2: “Imesaṃ kathā eḷamūgakathā viya cattāro hi nirodhe ete paññapenti,
atk-s0101a0:1352_3: iminā ca nirodhena nāma ekena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1352_6: so pana aññena ñātuṃ na sakkā aññatra sabbaññunā.
atk-s0101a0:1352_7: Sace bhagavā idha abhavissa ‘ayaṃ nirodho ayaṃ na nirodho’ti dīpasahassaṃ viya ujjāletvā ajjameva pākaṭaṃ akarissā”ti dasabalaññeva anussari.
atk-s0101a0:1352_10: tena tassa bhagavantaṃ anussarantassa etadahosi “aho nūna bhagavā aho nūna sugato”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1352_11: Yo imesanti yo etesaṃ nirodhadhammānaṃ sukusalo nipuṇo cheko,
atk-s0101a0:1352_13: sugato aho nūna katheyyāti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0101a0:1352_14: Pakataññūti ciṇṇavasitāya pakatiṃ sabhāvaṃ jānātīti pakataññū.
atk-s0101a0:1352_15: Kathaṃ nu khoti idaṃ paribbājako “mayaṃ bhagavā na jānāma,
atk-s0101a0:1354_2: Āditova tesaṃ aparaddhanti tesaṃ ādimhiyeva viraddhaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1354_4: Sahetū sappaccayāti ettha hetupi paccayopi kāraṇasseva nāmaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1354_6: Taṃ pana kāraṇaṃ dassento “sikkhā ekā”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1354_7: Tattha sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjantīti sikkhāya ekaccā saññā jāyantīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1355_1: Kā ca sikkhāti bhagavā avocāti katamā ca sā sikkhāti bhagavā vitthāretukamyatāpucchāvasena avoca.
atk-s0101a0:1355_2: Atha yasmā adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhā adhipaññāsikkhāti tisso sikkhā honti.
atk-s0101a0:1355_3: Tasmā tā dassento bhagavā saññāya sahetukaṃ uppādanirodhaṃ dīpetuṃ buddhuppādato pabhuti tantidhammaṃ ṭhapento “idha poṭṭhapāda,
atk-s0101a0:1355_5: Tattha adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhāti dve eva sikkhā sarūpena āgatā,
atk-s0101a0:1355_6: tatiyā pana “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti kho poṭṭhapāda mayā ekaṃsiko dhammo desito”ti ettha
atk-s0101a0:1355_11: Tasmā tassa yā purimā kāmasaññāti tassa paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgino yā pubbe uppannapubbāya kāmasaññāya sadisattā purimā kāmasaññāti vucceyya,
atk-s0101a0:1356_0: Vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññīyeva tasmiṃ samaye hotīti tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānasamaye vivekajapītisukhasaṅkhātā sukhumasaññā saccā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1356_2: Atha vā kāmacchandādioḷārikaṅgappahānavasena sukhumā ca sā bhūtatāya saccā ca saññāti sukhumasaccasaññā,
atk-s0101a0:1356_3: vivekajehi pītisukhehi sampayuttā sukhumasaccasaññāti vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññā sā assa atthīti
atk-s0101a0:1356_6: Evampi sikkhāti ettha yasmā paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjanto adhiṭṭhahanto,
atk-s0101a0:1356_8: tasmā taṃ evaṃ sikkhitabbato sikkhāti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:1356_9: Tenapi sikkhāsaṅkhātena paṭhamajjhānena evaṃ ekā vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññā uppajjati.
atk-s0101a0:1356_11: Ayaṃ sikkhāti bhagavā avocāti ayaṃ paṭhamajjhānasaṅkhātā ekā sikkhāti,
atk-s0101a0:1357_0: Yasmā pana aṭṭhamasamāpattiyā aṅgato sammasanaṃ buddhānaṃyeva hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1357_5: Tasmā ākiñcaññāyatanaparamaṃyeva saññaṃ dassetvā puna tadeva saññagganti dassetuṃ “yato kho poṭṭhapāda…pe…
atk-s0101a0:1358_1: Tattha yato kho poṭṭhapāda bhikkhūti yo nāma poṭṭhapāda bhikkhu.
atk-s0101a0:1358_2: Idha sakasaññī hotīti idha sāsane sakasaññī hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1358_5: So tato amutra tato amutrāti so bhikkhu tato paṭhamajjhānato amutra dutiyajjhāne,
atk-s0101a0:1358_6: tatopi amutra tatiyajjhāneti evaṃ tāya tāya jhānasaññāya sakasaññī sakasaññī hutvā anupubbena saññaggaṃ phusati.
atk-s0101a0:1358_10: Iti sā lokiyānaṃ kiccakārakasamāpattīnaṃ aggattā saññagganti vuccati,
atk-s0101a0:1359_2: abhisaṅkhareyyanti padadvaye ca jhānaṃ samāpajjanto ceteti nāma,
atk-s0101a0:1359_5: Imā ca me saññā nirujjheyyunti imā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā nirujjheyyuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1359_6: Aññā ca oḷārikāti aññā ca oḷārikā bhavaṅgasaññā uppajjeyyuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1359_7: So na ceva ceteti na abhisaṅkharotīti ettha kāmaṃ cesa cetentova na ceteti,
atk-s0101a0:1359_9: Imassa bhikkhuno ākiñcaññāyatanato vuṭṭhāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā “ekaṃ dve cittavāre ṭhassāmī”ti ābhogasamannāhāro natthi.
atk-s0101a0:1360_0: Pitugharamajjhena kira gantvā pacchābhāge puttassa gharaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1360_1: tato paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ ādāya āsanasālaṃ āgataṃ daharaṃ thero –
atk-s0101a0:1360_4: Yena panassa pitugharamajjhena gatopi āgatopi tattha ābhogopi natthi.
atk-s0101a0:1360_8: āsanasālāya ṭhatvā pitugharaṃ amanasikaritvā puttagharācikkhaṇaṃ viya ākiñcaññāyatanato vuṭṭhāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1360_9: samāpajjitvā “ekaṃ dve cittavāre ṭhassāmī”ti pitugharaṃ amanasikaritvāva uparinirodhasamāpattatthāya
atk-s0101a0:1360_13: Tā ceva saññāti tā jhānasaññā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0101a0:1360_14: Aññā cāti aññā ca oḷārikā bhavaṅgasaññā nuppajjanti.
atk-s0101a0:1360_15: So nirodhaṃ phusatīti so evaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ phusati vindati paṭilabhati.
atk-s0101a0:1361_3: Tatrāpi sampajānasaññānirodhasamāpattīti sampajānantassa ante saññā nirodhasamāpatti sampajānantassa
atk-s0101a0:1361_4: vā paṇḍitassa bhikkhuno saññānirodhasamāpattīti ayaṃ visesattho.
atk-s0101a0:1362_1: Sā panesā sabbākārena visuddhimagge paññābhāvanānisaṃsādhikāre kathitā,
atk-s0101a0:1363_0: Evaṃ bhagavā poṭṭhapādassa paribbājakassa nirodhakathaṃ kathetvā –
atk-s0101a0:1363_1: atha naṃ tādisāya kathāya aññattha abhāvaṃ paṭijānāpetuṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññasī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1363_2: Paribbājakopi “bhagavā ajja tumhākaṃ kathaṃ ṭhapetvā na mayā evarūpā kathā sutapubbā”ti paṭijānanto,
atk-s0101a0:1363_3: “no hetaṃ bhante”ti vatvā puna sakkaccaṃ bhagavato kathāya uggahitabhāvaṃ dassento “evaṃ kho ahaṃ bhante”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1363_4: Athassa bhagavā “suuggahitaṃ tayā”ti anujānanto “evaṃ poṭṭhapādā”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1364_3: udāhu avasesasamāpattīsupi saññaggaṃ atthī”ti cintetvā tamatthaṃ pucchanto “ekaññeva nu kho”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1364_8: nirodhaṃ phusatīti pathavīkasiṇādīsu yena yena kasiṇena,
atk-s0101a0:1364_11: sace hi pathavīkasiṇena karaṇabhūtena pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiṃ ekavāraṃ samāpajjanto purimasaññānirodhaṃ phusati ekaṃ saññaggaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1364_20: Jhānesupi sace paṭhamajjhānena karaṇabhūtena ekavāraṃ purimasaññānirodhaṃ phusati ekaṃ saññaggaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1364_28: Iti ekavāraṃ samāpajjanavasena vā sabbampi sañjānanalakkhaṇena saṅgahetvā vā ekaṃ saññaggaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1365_2: bhanteti bhante nirodhasamāpajjanakassa bhikkhuno “saññā nu kho paṭhamaṃ uppajjatī”ti pucchati.
atk-s0101a0:1366_2: Idāni nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ pucchanto “bhagavā nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa kiṃ paṭhamaṃ arahattaphalasaññā uppajjati,
atk-s0101a0:1366_4: Athassa bhagavā yasmā phalasaññā paṭhamaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0101a0:1366_9: Idappaccayā kira meti phalasamādhisaññāpaccayā kira mayhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ uppannanti.
atk-s0101a0:1368_1: Idāni paribbājako yathā nāma gāmasūkaro gandhodakena nhāpetvā gandhehi anulimpitvā mālādāmaṃ piḷandhitvā sirisayane āropitopi sukhaṃ na vindati,
atk-s0101a0:1368_3: Evameva bhagavatā saṇhasukhumatilakkhaṇabbhāhatāya desanāya nhāpitavilittamaṇḍitopi nirodhakathāsirisayanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1368_4: āropitopi tattha sukhaṃ na vindanto gūthaṭṭhānasadisaṃ attano laddhiṃ gahetvā tameva pucchanto “saññā nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1368_8: Tato so “arūpī attā”ti evaṃ laddhiko samānopi “bhagavā desanāya sukusalo,
atk-s0101a0:1368_9: so me āditova laddhiṃ mā viddhaṃsetū”ti cintetvā attano laddhiṃ pariharanto “oḷārikaṃ kho”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1368_10: Athassa bhagavā tattha dosaṃ dassento “oḷāriko ca hi te”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1368_13: Evaṃ santaṃ attānaṃ paccāgacchato tavāti ayaṃ vā ettha attho.
atk-s0101a0:1368_14: Catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ ekuppādekanirodhattā kiñcāpi yā saññā uppajjati,
atk-s0101a0:1368_16: Aparāparaṃ upādāya pana “aññā ca saññā uppajjanti,
atk-s0101a0:1369_3: bhante”tiādiṃ vatvā tatrāpi dose dinne yathā nāma ummattako yāvassa saññā nappatiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0101a0:1369_6: evameva aññaṃ gahetvā aññaṃ vissajjetvā idāni attano laddhiṃyeva vadanto “arūpī kho”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1369_7: Tatrāpi yasmā so saññāya uppādanirodhaṃ icchati,
atk-s0101a0:1369_9: Tasmā tathevassa dosaṃ dassento bhagavā “evaṃ santampī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1369_10: Tato paribbājako micchādassanena abhibhūtattā bhagavatā vuccamānampi taṃ nānattaṃ ajānanto “sakkā panetaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1369_12: Athassa bhagavā yasmā so saññāya uppādanirodhaṃ passantopi saññāmayaṃ attānaṃ niccameva maññati.
atk-s0101a0:1370_5: aññadeva ca te khamati ceva ruccati ca,
atk-s0101a0:1370_10: Tena tayā evaṃ aññadiṭṭhikena aññakhantikena aññarucikena aññatrāyogena aññatrācariyakena dujjānaṃ etanti.
atk-s0101a0:1370_14: taṃ sassatādi bhāvamassa pucchissa”nti puna “kiṃ pana bhante”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1371_1: Na hetaṃ poṭṭhapāda atthasañhitanti poṭṭhapāda etaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ na idhalokaparalokaatthanissitaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1371_6: Na nibbidāyāti saṃsāravaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya na saṃvattati.
atk-s0101a0:1371_8: Na nirodhāyāti vaṭṭassa nirodhakaraṇatthāya na saṃvattati.
atk-s0101a0:1371_9: Na upasamāyāti vaṭṭassa vūpasamanatthāya na saṃvattati.
atk-s0101a0:1371_10: Na abhiññāyāti vaṭṭābhijānanāya paccakkhakiriyāya na saṃvattati.
atk-s0101a0:1371_12: Na nibbānāyāti amatamahānibbānassa paccakkhakiriyāya na saṃvattati.
atk-s0101a0:1372_0: Idaṃ dukkhantiādīsu taṇhaṃ ṭhapetvā tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā dukkhanti,
atk-s0101a0:1372_1: tasseva dukkhassa pabhāvanato sappaccayā taṇhā dukkhasamudayoti.
atk-s0101a0:1372_3: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti mayā byākatanti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1372_4: Evañca pana vatvā bhagavā “imassa paribbājakassa maggapātubhāvo vā phalasacchikiriyā vā natthi,
atk-s0101a0:1372_6: Paribbājakopi taṃ ākāraṃ ñatvā bhagavato gamanakālaṃ ārocento viya “evameta”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1375_1: Citto ca hatthisāriputtoti so kira sāvatthiyaṃ hatthiācariyassa putto bhagavato santike pabbajitvā tīṇi
atk-s0101a0:1375_2: piṭakāni uggahetvā sukhumesu atthantaresu kusalo ahosi,
atk-s0101a0:1375_3: pubbe katapāpakammavasena pana sattavāre vibbhamitvā gihi jāto.
atk-s0101a0:1375_4: Kassapasammāsambuddhassa kira sāsane dve sahāyakā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1375_6: Tesu eko anabhirato gihibhāve cittaṃ uppādetvā itarassa ārocesi.
atk-s0101a0:1375_7: So gihibhāve ādīnavaṃ pabbajjāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā taṃ ovadi.
atk-s0101a0:1375_8: So taṃ sutvā abhiramitvā punekadivasaṃ tādise citte uppanne taṃ etadavoca “mayhaṃ āvuso evarūpaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati –
atk-s0101a0:1375_10: So pattacīvaralobhena tassa gihibhāve ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā pabbajjāya ādīnavaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0101a0:1375_11: Athassa taṃ sutvāva gihibhāvato cittaṃ virajjitvā pabbajjāyameva abhirami.
atk-s0101a0:1375_12: Evamesa tadā sīlavantassa bhikkhuno gihibhāve ānisaṃsakathāya kathitattā idāni cha vāre vibbhamitvā sattame vāre pabbajito.
atk-s0101a0:1375_14: mahākoṭṭhikattherassa ca abhidhammakathaṃ kathentānaṃ antarantarā kathaṃ opāteti.
atk-s0101a0:1375_16: So mahāsāvakassa kathite patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto vibbhamitvā gihi jāto.
atk-s0101a0:1375_18: Tasmā vibbhamitvā dvīhatīhaccayena poṭṭhapādassa santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0101a0:1375_19: Atha naṃ so disvā “samma kiṃ tayā kataṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1375_21: ehi pabbajituṃ idāni te vaṭṭatī”ti taṃ gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1375_22: Tena vuttaṃ “citto ca hatthisāriputto poṭṭhapādo ca paribbājako”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1376_3: Tvaṃyeva nesaṃ eko cakkhumāti subhāsitadubbhāsitajānanabhāvamattena paññācakkhunā cakkhumā.
atk-s0101a0:1376_6: Anekaṃsikāti na ekakoṭṭhāsā ekeneva koṭṭhāsena sassatāti vā asassatāti vā na vuttāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1378_1: Santi poṭṭhapādāti idaṃ bhagavā kasmā ārabhi?
atk-s0101a0:1378_3: Sabbe hi titthiyā yathā bhagavā amataṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1378_4: evaṃ attano attano samaye lokathupikādivasena niṭṭhaṃ paññapenti,
atk-s0101a0:1378_6: Yathā paññattā hutvā na niyyāti na gacchati,
atk-s0101a0:1378_9: Tattha ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ jānaṃ passanti puratthimāya disāya ekantasukho loko pacchimādīnaṃ vā aññatarāyāti evaṃ jānantā evaṃ passantā viharatha.
atk-s0101a0:1378_10: Diṭṭhapubbāni kho tasmiṃ loke manussānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānādīnīti.
atk-s0101a0:1379_0: 426-427. Janapadakalyāṇīti janapade aññāhi itthīhi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavilāsākappādīhi asadisā.
atk-s0101a0:1381_1: Evaṃ bhagavā paresaṃ niṭṭhāya aniyyānikattaṃ dassetvā attano niṭṭhāya niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tayo kho me poṭṭhapādā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1381_3: ettha ca bhagavā tīhi attabhāvapaṭilābhehi tayo bhave dassesi.
atk-s0101a0:1381_4: Oḷārikattabhāvapaṭilābhena avīcito paṭṭhāya paranimmitavasavattipariyosānaṃ kāmabhavaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0101a0:1381_5: Manomayaattabhāvapaṭilābhena paṭhamajjhānabhūmito paṭṭhāya akaniṭṭhabrahmalokapariyosānaṃ rūpabhavaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0101a0:1382_5: Yaṃ avocumha “sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihiratī”ti,
atk-s0101a0:1382_6: tattha tassa evaṃ viharato taṃ pāmojjañceva bhavissati,
atk-s0101a0:1382_7: pīti ca nāmakāyapassaddhi ca sati ca sūpaṭṭhitā uttamañāṇañca sukho ca vihāro.
atk-s0101a0:1382_8: Sabbavihāresu ca ayameva vihāro “sukho”ti vattuṃ yutto “upasanto paramamadhuro”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1382_9: Tattha paṭhamajjhāne pāmojjādayo chapi dhammā labbhanti,
atk-s0101a0:1382_15: Imesu catūsu jhānesu sampasādanasutte suddhavipassanā pādakajjhānameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1382_16: Pāsādikasutte catūhi maggehi saddhiṃ vipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0101a0:1382_18: Imasmiṃ poṭṭhapādasutte pāmojjaṃ pītivevacanameva katvā dutiyajjhānikaphalasamāpattināma kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1383_1: Ayaṃ vā soti ettha vā saddo vibhāvanattho hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1383_2: Ayaṃ soti evaṃ vibhāvetvā pakāsetvā byākareyyāma.

atk-s0101a0:1386_0: Buddhānaṃ pana dve kathā sammutikathā ca paramatthakathā ca.

atk-s0101a0:1386_3: Tattha yo sammutidesanāya “satto”ti vā “poso”ti vā “devo”ti vā “brahmā”ti vā vutte vijānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0101a0:1386_5: tassa bhagavā āditova “satto”ti vā “poso”ti vā “devo”ti vā “brahmā”ti vā katheti,

atk-s0101a0:1386_9: Sammutikathāya pana bodhetvā pacchā paramatthakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0101a0:1386_10: Paramatthakathāya bujjhanakasattassāpi na paṭhamaṃ sammutikathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0101a0:1386_11: Paramatthakathāya pana bodhetvā pacchā sammutikathaṃ katheti.

atk-s0101a0:1394_6: Nidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ ādāya āgantvā khīravirecanaṃ pivitvā vihāre nisinnadivasaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

atk-s0101a0:1394_12: “dadato bhogānaṃ aparikkhayo nāma natthī”ti cintetvā kassaci kiñci na deti,
atk-s0101a0:1397_0: Evaṃ adānameva sikkhāpetvā kāyassa bhedā tasmiṃyeva ghare sunakho hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0101a0:1397_4: Atha bhagavā ekadivasaṃ nikkhante māṇave taṃ gharaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0101a0:1397_5: Sunakho bhagavantaṃ disvā bhukkāraṃ karonto bhagavato samīpaṃ gato.
atk-s0101a0:1397_6: Tato naṃ bhagavā avoca “todeyya tvaṃ pubbepi maṃ ‘bho,
atk-s0101a0:1397_9: Sunakho taṃ kathaṃ sutvā vippaṭisārī hutvā uddhanantare chārikāya nipanno,
atk-s0101a0:1397_10: manussā naṃ ukkhipitvā sayane sayāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1398_0: Subho āgantvā “kenāyaṃ sunakho sayanā oropito”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1398_1: Manussā “na kenacī”ti vatvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1398_3: samaṇo pana gotamo me pitaraṃ sunakhaṃ karoti yaṃ kiñci esa mukhārūḷhaṃ bhāsatī”ti kujjhitvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1398_4: musāvādena codetukāmo vihāraṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ pucchi.
atk-s0101a0:1398_5: Bhagavā tassa tatheva vatvā avisaṃvādanatthaṃ āha –
atk-s0101a0:1398_13: Gaccha taṃ sunakhaṃ appodakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ bhojetvā sayanaṃ āropetvā īsakaṃ niddaṃ okkantakāle puccha,
atk-s0101a0:1398_20: “pitā me”ti ñatvā bhagavati pasannacitto gantvā bhagavantaṃcuddasa pañhe pucchitvā vissajjanapariyosāne bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gato,
atk-s0101a0:1398_22: Sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasatīti attano bhogagāmato āgantvā vasati.
atk-s0101a0:1399_1: Aññataraṃ māṇavakaṃ āmantesīti satthari parinibbute “ānandatthero kirassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā āgato,

atk-s0101a0:1400_1: Kālañca samayañca upādāyāti kālañca samayañca paññāya gahetvā upadhāretvāti attho.

atk-s0101a0:1401_5: Api ca satthu parinibbānena tumhākaṃ soko udapādi,

atk-s0101a0:1401_9: yatra so sadevakassa lokassa aggapuggalo parinibbuto,
atk-s0101a0:1401_10: idāni kaṃ aññaṃ disvā maccurājā lajjissatīti evamādinā nayena maraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1401_11: sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā therassa hiyyo pītabhesajjānurūpaṃ āhāraṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0101a0:1402_4: Yesaṃ so bhavaṃ gotamoti kasmā pucchati?
atk-s0101a0:1402_5: Tassa kira evaṃ ahosi “yesu dhammesu bhavaṃ gotamo imaṃ lokaṃ patiṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0101a0:1402_6: te tassa accayena naṭṭhā nu kho,
atk-s0101a0:1403_1: Athassa thero tīṇi piṭakāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā dassento “tiṇṇaṃ kho”tiādimāha.

atk-s0101a0:1405_4: Theropissa buddhuppādaṃ dassetvā tantidhammaṃ desento anukkamena bhagavatā vuttanayeneva sabbaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0101a0:1405_5: Tattha atthi cevettha uttarikaraṇīyanti ettha bhagavato sāsane na sīlameva sāro,
atk-s0101a0:1405_7: Ito uttari pana aññampi kattabbaṃ atthi yevāti dassesi.

atk-s0101a0:1407_3: ariyo samādhikkhandho”ti evaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ puṭṭhopi ye te “sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro satisampajaññena
atk-s0101a0:1407_4: samannāgato santuṭṭho”ti evaṃ sīlānantaraṃ indriyasaṃvarādayo sīlasamādhīnaṃ antare ubhinnampi upakārakadhammā uddiṭṭhā,
atk-s0101a0:1407_9: Catutthajjhānena hi asaṅgahitā arūpasamāpatti nāma natthiyeva.

atk-s0101a0:1411_6: So kira cattālīsakoṭidhano gahapatimahāsālo ativiya saddho pasanno ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1411_7: So saddhādhikattāyeva “sace eko bhikkhu aḍḍhamāsantarena vā māsantarena vā saṃvaccharena vā ākāse uppatitvā vividhāni pāṭihāriyāni dasseyya,

atk-s0101a0:1412_0: Tattha iddhāti samiddhā phītāti nānābhaṇḍaussannatāya vuddhippattā.
atk-s0101a0:1412_1: Ākiṇṇamanussāti aṃsakūṭena aṃsakūṭaṃ paharitvā viya vicarantehi manussehi ākiṇṇā.
atk-s0101a0:1412_5: Bhiyyosomattāyāti pakatiyāpi pajjalitapadīpo telasnehaṃ labhitvā viya atirekappamāṇena abhippasīdissati.
atk-s0101a0:1412_6: Na kho ahanti bhagavā rājagahaseṭṭhivatthusmiṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi,
atk-s0101a0:1413_2: sīlabhedaṃ pāpetvā anupubbena uccaṭṭhānato otārento nīcaṭṭhāne na ṭhapemi,
atk-s0101a0:1413_3: atha kho ahaṃ buddhasāsanassa vuddhiṃ paccāsīsanto kathemīti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:1413_4: Tatiyampi khoti yāvatatiyaṃ buddhānaṃ kathaṃ paṭibāhitvā kathetuṃ visahanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0101a0:1413_5: Ayaṃ pana bhagavatā saddhiṃ vissāsiko vissāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vallabho hutvā atthakāmosmīti tikkhattuṃ kathesi.

atk-s0101a0:1415_3: Tattha amāhaṃ bhikkhunti amuṃ ahaṃ bhikkhuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1415_10: Jigucchāmīti gūthaṃ disvā viya jigucchaṃ uppādemi.

atk-s0101a0:1417_7: Itipi te cittanti iti tava cittaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1417_9: Maṇikā nāma vijjāti cintāmaṇīti evaṃ laddhanāmā loke ekā vijjā atthi.
atk-s0101a0:1419_1: Evaṃ vitakkethāti nekkhammavitakkādayo evaṃ pavattentā vitakketha.
atk-s0101a0:1419_2: Mā evaṃ vitakkayitthāti evaṃ kāmavitakkādayo pavattentā mā vitakkayittha.
atk-s0101a0:1419_5: Mā evanti “nicca”ntiādinā nayena mā manasi karittha.
atk-s0101a0:1419_7: Idaṃ upasampajjāti idaṃ catumaggaphalappabhedaṃ lokuttaradhammameva upasampajja pāpuṇitvā nipphādetvā viharatha.
atk-s0101a0:1420_2: Devadatte saṃghaṃ bhinditvā pañca bhikkhusatāni gahetvā gayāsīse buddhalīḷāya tesaṃ dhammaṃ desante hi

atk-s0101a0:1420_7: Atha dvepi mahānāgā pañca bhikkhusatāni gahetvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā veḷuvanamevāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1422_4: Api ca sabbabuddhānaṃ mahābhūtapariyesako nāmeko bhikkhu hotiyeva.
atk-s0101a0:1422_5: Yo mahābhūte pariyesanto yāva brahmalokā vicaritvā vissajjetāraṃ alabhitvā āgamma buddhameva pucchitvā nikkaṅkho hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1422_8: atha naṃ vivaṭaṃ katvā desentopi bhagavā “bhūtapubba”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1423_0: Tattha kattha nu khoti kismiṃ ṭhāne kiṃ āgamma kiṃ pattassa te anavasesā appavattivasena nirujjhanti.
atk-s0101a0:1424_1: Devayāniyo maggoti pāṭiyekko devalokagamanamaggo nāma natthi,
atk-s0101a0:1424_3: Tena hesa yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattento devalokaṃ yāti.
atk-s0101a0:1424_5: Yena cātumahārājikāti samīpe ṭhitampi bhagavantaṃ apucchitvā dhammatāya codito devatā mahānubhāvāti maññamāno upasaṅkami.
atk-s0101a0:1424_7: na jānāmāti buddhavisaye pañhaṃ pucchitā devatā na jānanti,
atk-s0101a0:1424_9: Atha kho so bhikkhu “mama imaṃ pañhaṃ na kathetuṃ na labbhā,
atk-s0101a0:1424_13: handa naṃ hatthato mocessāmā”ti cintetvā “atthi kho bhikkhu cattāro mahārājāno”tiādimāhaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1424_15: Paṇītatarāti vaṇṇayasaissariyādīhi uttamatarā etena nayena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo.

atk-s0101a0:1425_6: loke aggapuggalaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ pahāya devatā pucchanto vicarati,
atk-s0101a0:1425_8: Tato punadeva so cintesi “sudūrampi gantvā satthu santikeva nikkaṅkho bhavissati.

atk-s0101a0:1425_13: Devayāniyamaggoti vā brahmayāniyamaggoti vā dhammasetūti vā ekacittakkhaṇikaappanāti vā sanniṭṭhānikacetanāti
atk-s0101a0:1425_14: vā mahaggatacittanti vā abhiññāñāṇanti vā sabbametaṃ iddhividhañāṇasseva nāmaṃ.

atk-s0101a0:1426_5: Atha kho so brahmā tena bhikkhunā puṭṭho attano avisayabhāvaṃ ñatvā sacāhaṃ “na jānāmī”ti vakkhāmi,

atk-s0101a0:1426_9: “Ahamasmi bhikkhu brahmā”tiādīni pana me bhaṇantassa na koci vacanaṃ saddahissati.
atk-s0101a0:1426_10: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ vikkhepaṃ katvā imaṃ bhikkhuṃ satthusantikaṃyeva peseyyanti cintetvā “ahamasmi bhikkhu brahmā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1427_3: Bahiddhā pariyeṭṭhinti telatthiko vālikaṃ nippīḷiyamāno viya yāva brahmalokā bahiddhā pariyesanaṃ āpajjati.

atk-s0101a0:1428_7: pucchāmūḷhassa janassa pucchāya dosaṃ dassetvā pucchaṃ sikkhāpetvā pucchāvissajjanaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:1429_2: ime cattāro mahābhūtā kiṃ āgamma appatiṭṭhā bhavantīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1429_5: Aṇuṃ thūlanti khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā,
atk-s0101a0:1429_8: Kiṃ pana upādārūpaṃ subhanti asubhanti atthi? Natthi.
atk-s0101a0:1430_0: Evaṃ pucchitabbaṃ siyāti pucchaṃ dassetvā idāni vissajjanaṃ dassento tatra veyyākaraṇaṃ bhavatīti vatvā –
atk-s0101a0:1431_3: Uppādanto vā vayanto vā ṭhitassa aññathattanto vā etassa natthīti anantaṃ.
